2.2: DHALIKEL-KITABU LA RAJBE FIHI HUDEN LILMUTTEKIN
2.3: EL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-GAJBI WE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
2.4: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE WE BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
2.6: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SEWA’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘E ‘ENDHERTEHUM ‘EM LEM TUNDHIRHUM LA JU’UMINUN
2.7: HATEMEL-LAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE ‘ALA SEM’IHIM WE ‘ALA ‘EBSARIHIM GISHAWETUN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
2.8: WE MINE NASI MEN JEKULU ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MA HUM BIMU’UMININ
2.9: JUHADI’UNEL-LAHE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE MA JEHDA’UNE ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSEHUM WE MA JESH’URUN
2.10: FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN FEZADEHUMU ALLAHU MERADËN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMUN BIMA KANU JEKDHIBUN
2.11: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ERDI KALU ‘INNEMA NEHNU MUSLIHUN
2.13: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM ‘AMINU KEMA ‘AMENE NASU KALU ‘ENU’UMINU KEMA ‘AMENE SUFEHA’U ‘ELA ‘INNEHUM HUMU SUFEHA’U WE LEKIN LA JA’LEMUN
2.14: WE ‘IDHA LEKUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KALU ‘AMENNA WE ‘IDHA HALEW ‘ILA SHEJATINIHIM KALU ‘INNA ME’AKUM ‘INNEMA NEHNU MUSTEHZI’UN
2.15: ALLAHU JESTEHZI’U BIHIM WE JEMUDDUHUM FI TUGJANIHIM JA’MEHUN
2.16: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE ESHTERAW ED-DELALETE BIL-HUDA FEMA RABIHET TIXHARATUHUM WE MA KANU MUHTEDIN
2.17: METHELUHUM KEMETHELIL-LEDHI ESTEWKADE NARËN FELEMMA ‘EDA’ET MA HEWLEHU DHEHEBEL-LAHU BINURIHIM WE TERAKEHUM FI DHULUMATIN LA JUBSIRUN
2.19: ‘EW KESEJJIBIN MINE SEMA’I FIHI DHULUMATUN WE RA’DUN WE BERKUN JEXH’ALUNE ‘ESABI’AHUM FI ‘ADHANIHIM MINE SEWA’IKI HEDHERAL-MEWTI WEL-LAHU MUHITUN BIL-KAFIRIN
2.20: JEKADUL-BERKU JEHTEFU ‘EBSARAHUM KUL-LEMA ‘EDA’E LEHUM MESHEW FIHI WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHLEME ‘ALEJHIM KAMU WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LEDHEHEBE BISEM’IHIM WE ‘EBSARIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.21: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU A’BUDU RABBEKUMUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.22: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDE FIRASHËN WE SEMA’E BINA’EN WE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHE BIHI MINE ETH-THEMERATI RIZKËN LEKUM FELA TEXH’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.23: WE ‘IN KUNTUM FI RAJBIN MIMMA NEZZELNA ‘ALA ‘ABDINA FE’TU BISURATIN MIN MITHLIHI WE ED’U SHUHEDA’EKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.24: FE’IN LEM TEF’ALU WE LEN TEF’ALU FE ETTEKU NARAL-LETI WEKUDUHA NASU WEL-HIXHARATU ‘U’IDDET LILKAFIRIN
2.25: WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU KUL-LEMA RUZIKU MINHA MIN THEMERATIN RIZKËN KALU HADHAL-LEDHI RUZIKNA MIN KABLU WE ‘UTU BIHI MUTES'HABIHËN WE LEHUM FIHA ‘EZWAXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.26: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JESTEHJI ‘EN JEDRIBE METHELËN MA BA’UDETEN FEMA FEWKAHA FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FEJA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEJEKULUNE MADHA ‘ERADAL-LAHU BIHEDHA METHELËN JUDIL-LU BIHI KETHIRËN WE JEHDI BIHI KETHIRËN WE MA JUDIL-LU BIHI ‘IL-LAL-FASIKIN
2.27: EL-LEDHINE JENKUDUNE ‘AHDAL-LAHI MIN BA’DI MITHAKIHI WE JEKTA’UNE MA ‘EMERAL-LAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ERDI ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
2.28: KEJFE TEKFURUNE BIL-LAHI WE KUNTUM ‘EMWATËN FE’EHJAKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JUHJIKUM THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
2.29: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA LEKUM MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ILA SEMA’I FESEWWAHUNNE SEB’A SEMAWATIN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.30: WE ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELA’IKETI ‘INNI XHA’ILUN FIL-’ERDI HALIFETEN KALU ‘ETEXH’ALU FIHA MEN JUFSIDU FIHA WE JESFIKU ED-DIMA’E WE NEHNU NUSEBBIHU BIHEMDIKE WE NUKADDISU LEKE KALE ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.31: WE ‘AL-LEME ‘ADEMEL-’ESMA’E KUL-LEHA THUMME ‘ARADEHUM ‘ALEL-MELA’IKETI FEKALE ‘ENBI’UNI BI’ESMA’I HA’UULA’ ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.33: KALE JA ‘ADEMU ‘ENBI’HUM BI’ESMA’IHIM FELEMMA ‘ENBE’EHUM BI’ESMA’IHIM KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKUM ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU GAJBE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘A’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA KUNTUM TEKTUMUN
2.34: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELA’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE ‘EBA WE ESTEKBERA WE KANE MINEL-KAFIRIN
2.35: WE KULNA JA ‘ADEMU ESKUN ‘ENTE WE ZEWXHUKEL-XHENNETE WE KULA MINHA RAGADËN HEJTHU SHI’TUMA WE LA TEKRABA HEDHIHI ESH-SHEXHERATE FETEKUNA MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
2.36: FE’EZEL-LEHUMA ESH-SHEJTANU ‘ANHA FE’EHRAXHEHUMA MIMMA KANA FIHI WE KULNA EHBITU BA’DUKUM LIBA’DIN ‘ADUWUN WE LEKUM FIL-’ERDI MUSTEKARRUN WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
2.37: FETELEKKA ‘ADEMU MIN RABBIHI KELIMATIN FETABE ‘ALEJHI ‘INNEHU HUWET-TEWWABU RAHIM
2.38: KULNA EHBITU MINHA XHEMI’ËN FE’IMMA JE’TIJENNEKUM MINNI HUDEN FEMEN TEBI’A HUDAJE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.40: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJEL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘EWFU BI’AHDI ‘UFI BI’AHDIKUM WE ‘IJAJE FARHEBUN
2.41: WE ‘AMINU BIMA ‘ENZELTU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AKUM WE LA TEKUNU ‘EWWELE KAFIRIN BIHI WE LA TESHTERU BI’AJATI THEMENËN KALILËN WE ‘IJAJE FE ETTEKUN
2.42: WE LA TELBISUL-HEKKA BIL-BATILI WE TEKTUMUL-HEKKA WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.43: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ERKA’U ME’A ER-RAKI’IN
2.44: ‘ETE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BIRRI WE TENSEWNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE ‘ENTUM TETLUNEL-KITABE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
2.45: WE ESTA’INU BIS-SEBRI WE SELËTI WE ‘INNEHA LEKEBIRATUN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEL-HASHI’IN
2.46: EL-LEDHINE JEDHUNNUNE ‘ENNEHUM MULAKU RABBIHIM WE ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJHI RAXHI’UN
2.47: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJEL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘ENNI FEDDELTUKUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.48: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN LA TEXHZI NEFSUN ‘AN NEFSIN SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUKBELU MINHA SHEFA’ATUN WE LA JU’UHADHU MINHA ‘ADLUN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.49: WE ‘IDH NEXHXHEJNAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’EL-’ADHABI JUDHEBBIHUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
2.50: WE ‘IDH FERAKNA BIKUMUL-BEHRA FE’ENXHEJNAKUM WE ‘EGRAKNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
2.51: WE ‘IDH WA’ADNA MUSA ‘ERBA’INE LEJLETEN THUMME ETTEHADHTUMUL-’IXHLE MIN BA’DIHI WE ‘ENTUM DHALIMUN
2.52: THUMME ‘AFEWNA ‘ANKUM MIN BA’DI DHALIKE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.54: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI ‘INNEKUM DHELEMTUM ‘ENFUSEKUM BIATTIHADHIKUMUL-’IXHLE FETUBU ‘ILA BARI’IKUM FAKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘INDE BARI’IKUM FETABE ‘ALEJKUM ‘INNEHU HUWET-TEWWABU RAHIM
2.55: WE ‘IDH KULTUM JA MUSA LEN NU’UMINE LEKE HETTA NERA ELLAHE XHEHRATEN FE’EHADHETKUMU SA’IKATU WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
2.56: THUMME BE’ATHNAKUM MIN BA’DI MEWTIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.57: WE DHEL-LELNA ‘ALEJKUMUL-GAMAME WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKUMUL-MENNE WE SELWA KULU MIN TEJJIBATI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE MA DHELEMUNA WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
2.58: WE ‘IDH KULNA EDHULU HEDHIHIL-KARJETE FEKULU MINHA HEJTHU SHI’TUM RAGADËN WE EDHULUL-BABE SUXHXHEDËN WE KULU HITTETUN NEGFIR LEKUM HATAJAKUM WE SENEZIDUL-MUHSININ
2.59: FEBEDDELEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU KAWLËN GAJRAL-LEDHI KILE LEHUM FE’ENZELNA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KANU JEFSUKUN
2.60: WE ‘IDH ESTESKA MUSA LIKAWMIHI FEKULNA EDRIB BI’ASAKEL-HEXHERA FANFEXHERAT MINHU ETHNETA ‘ASHRATE ‘AJNËN KAD ‘ALIME KUL-LU ‘UNASIN MESHRABEHUM KULU WE ESHRABU MIN RIZKI ALLAHI WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ERDI MUFSIDIN
2.61: WE ‘IDHI KULTUM JA MUSA LEN NESBIRA ‘ALA TA’AMIN WAHIDIN FAD’U LENA RABBEKE JUHRIXH LENA MIMMA TUNBITUL-’ERDU MIN BEKLIHA WE KITHTHA’IHA WE FUMIHA WE ‘ADESIHA WE BESELIHA KALE ‘ETESTEBDILUNEL-LEDHI HUWE ‘EDNA BIEL-LEDHI HUWE HAJRUN EHBITU MISRËN FE’INNE LEKUM MA SE’ELTUM WE DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMU EDH-DHILLETU WEL-MESKENETU WE BA’U BIGADEBIN MINEL-LAHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KANU JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE JEKTULUNE NEBIJINE BIGAJRIL-HEKKI DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KANU JA’TEDUN
2.62: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE NESARA WE SABI’INE MEN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.63: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM WE RAFA’NA FEWKAKUMUT-TURA HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE EDHKURU MA FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.64: THUMME TEWEL-LEJTUM MIN BA’DI DHALIKE FELEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU LEKUNTUM MINEL-HASIRIN
2.65: WE LEKAD ‘ALIMTUMUL-LEDHINE A’TEDEW MINKUM FI SEBTI FEKULNA LEHUM KUNU KIRADETEN HASI’IN
2.66: FEXHE’ALNAHA NEKALËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHA WE MA HALFEHA WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTEKIN
2.67: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURUKUM ‘EN TEDHBEHU BEKARATEN KALU ‘ETETTEHIDHUNA HUZUEN KALE ‘A’UDHU BIL-LAHI ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-XHAHILI
2.68: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA HIJE KALE ‘INNEHU JEKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN LA FARIDUN WE LA BIKRUN ‘AWANUN BEJNE DHALIKE FAF’ALU MA TU’UMERUN
2.69: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA LEWNUHA KALE ‘INNEHU JEKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN SEFRA’U FAKI’UN LEWNUHA TESURRU NADHIRIN
2.70: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA HIJE ‘INNEL-BEKARA TESHABEHE ‘ALEJNA WE ‘INNA ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU LEMUHTEDUN
2.71: KALE ‘INNEHU JEKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN LA DHELULUN TUTHIRUL-’ERDE WE LA TESKIL-HERTHE MUSEL-LEMETUN LA SHIJETE FIHA KALUL-’ANE XHI’TE BIL-HEKKI FEDHEBEHUHA WE MA KADU JEF’ALUN
2.72: WE ‘IDH KATELTUM NEFSËN FE EDDARA’TUM FIHA WEL-LAHU MUHRIXHUN MA KUNTUM TEKTUMUN
2.73: FEKULNA EDRIBUHU BIBA’DIHA KEDHALIKE JUHJI ALLAHUL-MEWTA WE JURIKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
2.74: THUMME KASET KULUBUKUM MIN BA’DI DHALIKE FEHIJE KALHIXHARATI ‘EW ‘ESHEDDU KASWETEN WE ‘INNE MINEL-HIXHARATI LEMA JETEFEXHXHERU MINHUL-’ENHARU WE ‘INNE MINHA LEMA JESHSHEKKAKU FEJEHRUXHU MINHUL-MA’U WE ‘INNE MINHA LEMA JEHBITU MIN HASHJETI ALLAHI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.75: ‘EFETETMA’UNE ‘EN JU’UMINU LEKUM WE KAD KANE FERIKUN MINHUM JESMA’UNE KELAMEL-LAHI THUMME JUHERRIFUNEHU MIN BA’DI MA ‘AKALUHU WE HUM JA’LEMUN
2.76: WE ‘IDHA LEKUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KALU ‘AMENNA WE ‘IDHA HALA BA’DUHUM ‘ILA BA’DIN KALU ‘ETUHEDDITHUNEHUM BIMA FETEHEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM LIJUHAXHXHUKUM BIHI ‘INDE RABBIKUM ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
2.77: ‘EWELA JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUN
2.78: WE MINHUM ‘UMMIJUNE LA JA’LEMUNEL-KITABE ‘IL-LA ‘EMANIJE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEDHUNNUN
2.79: FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE JEKTUBUNEL-KITABE BI’EJDIHIM THUMME JEKULUNE HADHA MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI LIJESHTERU BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN FEWEJLUN LEHUM MIMMA KETEBET ‘EJDIHIM WE WEJLUN LEHUM MIMMA JEKSIBUN
2.80: WE KALU LEN TEMESSENA NARU ‘IL-LA ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDETEN KUL ‘ATTEHADHTUM ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘AHDËN FELEN JUHLIFEL-LAHU ‘AHDEHU ‘EM TEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.81: BELA MEN KESEBE SEJJI’ETEN WE ‘EHATET BIHI HATI’ETUHU FE’ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.82: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.83: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE LA TA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LALLAHE WE BIL-WALIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE DHIL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE KULU LILNNASI HUSNËN WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE THUMME TEWEL-LEJTUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINKUM WE ‘ENTUM MU’RIDUN
2.84: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM LA TESFIKUNE DIMA’EKUM WE LA TUHRIXHUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM MIN DIJARIKUM THUMME ‘EKRARTUM WE ‘ENTUM TESH/HEDUN
2.85: THUMME ‘ENTUM HA’UULA’ TEKTULUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE TUHRIXHUNE FERIKËN MINKUM MIN DIJARIHIM TEDHAHERUNE ‘ALEJHIM BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWANI WE ‘IN JE’TUKUM ‘USARA TUFADUHUM WE HUWE MUHERRAMUN ‘ALEJKUM ‘IHRAXHUHUM ‘E FETU’UMINUNE BIBA’DIL-KITABI WE TEKFURUNE BIBA’DIN FEMA XHEZA’U MEN JEF’ALU DHALIKE MINKUM ‘IL-LA HIZJUN FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ESHEDDIL-’ADHABI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.86: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE ESHTERAWL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA BIL-’AHIRATI FELA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.87: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE KAFFEJNA MIN BA’DIHI BIR-RUSULI WE ‘ATEJNA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEMEL-BEJJINATI WE ‘EJJEDNAHU BIRUHIL-KUDUSI ‘EFEKUL-LEMA XHA’EKUM RASULUN BIMA LA TEHWA ‘ENFUSUKUM ESTEKBERTUM FEFERIKËN KEDHDHEBTUM WE FERIKËN TEKTULU
2.88: WE KALU KULUBUNA GULFUN BEL LE’ANEHUMU ALLAHU BIKUFRIHIM FEKALILËN MA JU’UMINUN
2.89: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUM KITABUN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AHUM WE KANU MIN KABLU JESTEFTIHUNE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FELEMMA XHA’EHUM MA ‘ARAFU KEFERU BIHI FELA’NETU ALLAHI ‘ALEL-KAFIRIN
2.90: BI’SE MA ESHTERAW BIHI ‘ENFUSEHUM ‘EN JEKFURU BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU BEGJËN ‘EN JUNEZZILEL-LAHU MIN FEDLIH ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI FEBA’U BIGADEBIN ‘ALA GADEBIN WE LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
2.91: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM ‘AMINU BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU KALU NU’UMINU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNA WE JEKFURUNE BIMA WERA’EHU WE HUWEL-HEKKU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AHUM KUL FELIME TEKTULUNE ‘ENBIJA’EL-LAHI MIN KABLU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.92: WE LEKAD XHA’EKUM MUSA BIL-BEJJINATI THUMME ETTEHADHTUMUL-’IXHLE MIN BA’DIHI WE ‘ENTUM DHALIMUN
2.93: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM WE RAFA’NA FEWKAKUMUT-TURA HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE ESMA’U KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ASEJNA WE ‘USHRIBU FI KULUBIHIMUL-’IXHLE BIKUFRIHIM KUL BI’SEMA JE’MURUKUM BIHI ‘IMANUKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.94: KUL ‘IN KANET LEKUMU ED-DARUL-’AHIRATU ‘INDEL-LAHI HALISETEN MIN DUNI NASI FETEMENNEWL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.95: WE LEN JETEMENNEWHU ‘EBEDËN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
2.96: WE LETEXHIDENNEHUM ‘EHRASE NASI ‘ALA HEJËTIN WE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU JEWEDDU ‘EHEDUHUM LEW JU’AMMERU ‘ELFE SENETIN WE MA HUWE BIMUZEHZIHIHI MINEL-’ADHABI ‘EN JU’AMMERA WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
2.97: KUL MEN KANE ‘ADUWËN LIXHIBRILE FE’INNEHU NEZZELEHU ‘ALA KALBIKE BI’IDHNI ALLAHI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI WE HUDEN WE BUSHRA LILMU’UMININ
2.98: MEN KANE ‘ADUWËN LIL-LAHI WE MELA’IKETIHI WE RUSULIHI WE XHIBRILE WE MIKALE FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘ADUWUN LILKAFIRIN
2.99: WE LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN WE MA JEKFURU BIHA ‘IL-LAL-FASIKUN
2.100: ‘EWEKUL-LEMA ‘AHEDU ‘AHDËN NEBEDHEHU FERIKUN MINHUM BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JU’UMINUN
2.101: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUM RASULUN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AHUM NEBEDHE FERIKUN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE KITABEL-LAHI WERA’E DHUHURIHIM KE’ENNEHUM LA JA’LEMUN
2.102: WE ETTEBA’U MA TETLU ESH-SHEJATINU ‘ALA MULKI SULEJMANE WE MA KEFERA SULEJMANU WE LEKINNE ESH-SHEJATINE KEFERU JU’ALLIMUNE NASE SIHRA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEL-MELEKEJNI BIBABILE HARUTE WE MARUTE WE MA JU’ALLIMANI MIN ‘EHEDIN HETTA JEKULA ‘INNEMA NEHNU FITNETUN FELA TEKFUR FEJETE’ALLEMUNE MINHUMA MA JUFERRIKUNE BIHI BEJNEL-MER’I WE ZEWXHIHI WE MA HUM BIDARRINE BIHI MIN ‘EHEDIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE JETE’ALLEMUNE MA JEDURRUHUM WE LA JENFA’UHUM WE LEKAD ‘ALIMU LEMENI ESHTERAHU MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN HALAKIN WE LEBI’SE MA SHERAW BIHI ‘ENFUSEHUM LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
2.103: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEMETHUBETUN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI HAJRUN LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
2.104: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKULU RA’INA WE KULU ENDHURNA WE ESMA’U WE LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.105: MA JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI WE LAL-MUSHRIKINE ‘EN JUNEZZELE ‘ALEJKUM MIN HAJRIN MIN RABBIKUM WEL-LAHU JEHTESSU BIRAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
2.106: MA NENSEH MIN ‘AJETIN ‘EW NUNSIHA NE’TI BIHAJRIN MINHA ‘EW MITHLIHA ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.107: ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
2.108: ‘EM TURIDUNE ‘EN TES’ELU RASULEKUM KEMA SU’ILE MUSA MIN KABLU WE MEN JETEBEDDELIL-KUFRA BIL-’IMANI FEKAD DEL-LE SEWA’E SEBIL
2.109: WEDDE KETHIRUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEW JERUDDUNEKUM MIN BA’DI ‘IMANIKUM KUFFARËN HESEDËN MIN ‘INDI ‘ENFUSIHIM MIN BA’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HEKKU FA’FU WE ESFEHU HETTA JE’TIJEL-LAHU BI’EMRIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.110: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE MA TUKADDIMU LI’NFUSIKUM MIN HAJRIN TEXHIDUHU ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.111: WE KALU LEN JEDHULEL-XHENNETE ‘IL-LA MEN KANE HUDËN ‘EW NESARA TILKE ‘EMANIJUHUM KUL HATU BURHANEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKI
2.112: BELA MEN ‘ESLEME WEXHHEHU LIL-LAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN FELEHU ‘EXHRUHU ‘INDE RABBIHI WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.113: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU LEJSETI NESARA ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE KALETI NESARA LEJSETIL-JEHUDU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE HUM JETLUNEL-KITABE KEDHALIKE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE MITHLE KAWLIHIM FE-ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
2.114: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN MENE’A MESAXHIDEL-LAHI ‘EN JUDHKERA FIHA ESMUHU WE SA’A FI HARABIHA ‘ULA’IKE MA KANE LEHUM ‘EN JEDHULUHA ‘ILA HA’IFINE LEHUM FI ED-DUNJA HIZJUN WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
2.115: WE LIL-LEHIL-MESHRIKU WEL-MEGRIBU FE’EJNEMA TUWELLU FETHEMME WEXHHU ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.116: WE KALU ETTEHADHEL-LAHU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU BEL LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KUL-LUN LEHU KANITUN
2.117: BEDI’U SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘IDHA KADA ‘EMRËN FE’INNEMA JEKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
2.118: WE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE LEWLA JUKELLIMUNALLAHU ‘EW TE’TINA ‘AJETUN KEDHALIKE KALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM MITHLE KAWLIHIM TESHABEHET KULUBUHUM KAD BEJJENNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
2.119: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE BIL-HEKKI BESHIRËN WE NEDHIRËN WE LA TUS’ELU ‘AN ‘ES'HABIL-XHEHIM
2.120: WE LEN TERDA ‘ANKEL-JEHUDU WE LA NESARA HETTA TETTEBI’A MILLETEHUM KUL ‘INNE HUDA ALLAHI HUWEL-HUDA WE LE’INI ETTEBA’TE ‘EHWA’EHUM BA’DEL-LEDHI XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI MA LEKE MINEL-LAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
2.121: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JETLUNEHU HEKKA TILAWETIHI ‘ULA’IKE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MEN JEKFUR BIHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
2.122: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJEL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘ENNI FEDDELTUKUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.123: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN LA TEXHZI NEFSUN ‘AN NEFSIN SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUKBELU MINHA ‘ADLUN WE LA TENFA’UHA SHEFA’ATUN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.124: WE ‘IDH EBTELA ‘IBRAHIME RABBUHU BIKELIMATIN FE’ETEMMEHUNNE KALE ‘INNI XHA’ILUKE LILNNASI ‘IMAMËN KALE WE MIN DHURRIJETI KALE LA JENALU ‘AHDI EDH-DHALIMIN
2.125: WE ‘IDH XHE’ALNAL-BEJTE METHABETEN LILNNASI WE ‘EMNËN WE ETTEHIDHU MIN MEKAMI ‘IBRAHIME MUSELLEN WE ‘AHIDNA ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE ‘EN TEHHIRA BEJTIJE LILTTA’IFINE WEL-’AKIFINE WE ER-RUKKA’I SUXHUD
2.126: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI EXH’AL HADHA BELEDËN ‘AMINËN WE ERZUK ‘EHLEHU MINE ETH-THEMERATI MEN ‘AMENE MINHUM BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI KALE WE MEN KEFERA FE’UMETTI’UHU KALILËN THUMME ‘EDTERRUHU ‘ILA ‘ADHABI NARI WE BI’SEL-MESIR
2.127: WE ‘IDH JERFA’U ‘IBRAHIMUL-KAWA’IDE MINEL-BEJTI WE ‘ISMA’ILU RABBENA TEKABBEL MINNA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
2.128: RABBENA WE EXH’ALNA MUSLIMEJNI LEKE WE MIN DHURRIJETINA ‘UMMETEN MUSLIMETEN LEKE WE ‘ERINA MENASIKENA WE TUB ‘ALEJNA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTET-TEWWABU RAHIM
2.129: RABBENA WE EB’ATH FIHIM RASULËN MINHUM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIKE WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE JUZEKKIHIM ‘INNEKE ‘ENTEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
2.130: WE MEN JERGABU ‘AN MILLETI ‘IBRAHIME ‘IL-LA MEN SEFIHE NEFSEHU WE LEKADI ESTEFEJNAHU FI ED-DUNJA WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHIN
2.132: WE WESSA BIHA ‘IBRAHIMU BENIHI WE JA’KUBU JA BENIJE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFA LEKUMU ED-DINE FELA TEMUTUNNE ‘IL-LA WE ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
2.133: ‘EM KUNTUM SHUHEDA’E ‘IDH HEDERA JA’KUBEL-MEWTU ‘IDH KALE LIBENIHI MA TA’BUDUNE MIN BA’DI KALU NA’BUDU ‘ILEHEKE WE ‘ILEHE ‘ABA’IKE ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA ‘ILEHËN WAHIDËN WE NEHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
2.134: TILKE ‘UMMETUN KAD HALET LEHA MA KESEBET WE LEKUM MA KESEBTUM WE LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA KANU JA’MELUN
2.135: WE KALU KUNU HUDËN ‘EW NESARA TEHTEDU KUL BEL MILLETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
2.136: KULU ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBATI WE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA WE ‘ISA WE MA ‘UTIJE NEBIJUNE MIN RABBIHIM LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM WE NEHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
2.137: FE’IN ‘AMENU BIMITHLI MA ‘AMENTUM BIHI FEKADI EHTEDEW WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNEMA HUM FI SHIKAKIN FESEJEKFIKEHUMU ALLAHU WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
2.138: SIBGATEL-LAHI WE MEN ‘EHSENU MINEL-LAHI SIBGATEN WE NEHNU LEHU ‘ABIDUN
2.139: KUL ‘ETUHAXHXHUNENA FI ALLAHI WE HUWE RABBUNA WE RABBUKUM WE LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM WE NEHNU LEHU MUHLISUN
2.140: ‘EM TEKULUNE ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBATE KANU HUDËN ‘EW NESARA KUL ‘E’ENTUM ‘A’LEMU ‘EMI ALLAHU WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KETEME SHEHADETEN ‘INDEHU MINEL-LAHI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.141: TILKE ‘UMMETUN KAD HALET LEHA MA KESEBET WE LEKUM MA KESEBTUM WE LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA KANU JA’MELUN
2.142: SEJEKULU SUFEHA’U MINE NASI MA WE LLAHUM ‘AN KIBLETIHIMU EL-LETI KANU ‘ALEJHA KUL LIL-LAHIL-MESHRIKU WEL-MEGRIBU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
2.143: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNAKUM ‘UMMETEN WESETËN LITEKUNU SHUHEDA’E ‘ALA NASI WE JEKUNE RASULU ‘ALEJKUM SHEHIDËN WE MA XHE’ALNAL-KIBLETEL-LETI KUNTE ‘ALEJHA ‘IL-LA LINA’LEME MEN JETTEBI’U RASULE MIMMEN JENKALIBU ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI WE ‘IN KANET LEKEBIRATEN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HEDALLAHU WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJUDI’A ‘IMANEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIN-NASI LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
2.144: KAD NERA TEKALLUBE WEXHHIKE FI SEMA’I FELENUWELLIJENNEKE KIBLETEN TERDAHA FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE HEJTHU MA KUNTUM FEWELLU WUXHUHEKUM SHETRAHU WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE LEJA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA JA’MELUN
2.145: WE LE’IN ‘ETEJTEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE BIKUL-LI ‘AJETIN MA TEBI’U KIBLETEKE WE MA ‘ENTE BITABI’IN KIBLETEHUM WE MA BA’DUHUM BITABI’IN KIBLETE BA’DIN WE LE’INI ETTEBA’TE ‘EHWA’EHUM MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI ‘INNEKE ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
2.146: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’RIFUNEHU KEMA JA’RIFUNE ‘EBNA’EHUM WE ‘INNE FERIKËN MINHUM LEJEKTUMUNEL-HEKKA WE HUM JA’LEMUN
2.147: EL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
2.148: WE LIKUL-LIN WIXHHETUN HUWE MUWELLIHA FASTEBIKUL-HAJRATI ‘EJNE MA TEKUNU JE’TI BIKUMU ALLAHU XHEMI’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.149: WE MIN HEJTHU HARAXHTE FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE ‘INNEHU LELHEKKU MIN RABBIKE WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.150: WE MIN HEJTHU HARAXHTE FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE HEJTHU MA KUNTUM FEWELLU WUXHUHEKUM SHETRAHU LI’EL-LA JEKUNE LILNNASI ‘ALEJKUM HUXHXHETUN ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM FELA TEHSHEWHUM WE EHSHEWNI WE LI’ETIMME NI’METI ‘ALEJKUM WE LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
2.151: KEMA ‘ERSELNA FIKUM RASULËN MINKUM JETLU ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATINA WE JUZEKKIKUM WE JU’ALLIMUKUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE JU’ALLIMUKUM MA LEM TEKUNU TA’LEMUN
2.152: FADHKURUNI ‘EDHKURKUM WE ESHKURU LI WE LA TEKFURUN
2.153: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESTA’INU BIS-SEBRI WE SELËTI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’A SABIRIN
2.154: WE LA TEKULU LIMEN JUKTELU FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘EMWATUN BEL ‘EHJA’UN WE LEKIN LA TESH’URUN
2.155: WE LENEBLUWENNEKUM BISHEJ’IN MINEL-HAWFI WEL-XHU’I WE NEKSIN MINEL-’EMWLI WEL-’ENFUSI WE ETH-THEMERATI WE BESHSHIRI SABIRIN
2.156: EL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA ‘ESABET/HUM MUSIBETUN KALU ‘INNA LIL-LAHI WE ‘INNA ‘ILEJHI RAXHI’UN
2.157: ‘ULA’IKE ‘ALEJHIM SELEWATUN MIN RABBIHIM WE RAHMETUN WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUHTEDUN
2.158: ‘INNE SEFA WEL-MERWETE MIN SHA’A’IRI ALLAHI FEMEN HEXHXHEL-BEJTE ‘EW A’TEMERA FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHI ‘EN JETTEWWEFE BIHIMA WE MEN TETEWWE’A HAJRËN FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHAKIRUN ‘ALIMU
2.159: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ENZELNA MINEL-BEJJINATI WEL-HUDA MIN BA’DI MA BEJJENNAHU LILNNASI FIL-KITABI ‘ULA’IKE JEL’ANUHUMU ALLAHU WE JEL’ANUHUMUL-LA’INUN
2.160: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE TABU WE ‘ESLEHU WE BEJJENU FE’ULA’IKE ‘ETUBU ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ENAT-TEWWABU RAHIM
2.161: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE MATU WE HUM KUFFARUN ‘ULA’IKE ‘ALEJHIM LA’NETU ALLAHI WEL-MELA’IKETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
2.162: HALIDINE FIHA LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
2.163: WE ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE RAHMANU RAHIM
2.164: ‘INNE FI HALKI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WEL-FULKI EL-LETI TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BIMA JENFA’U NASE WE MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU MINE SEMA’I MIN MA’IN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA WE BETHTHE FIHA MIN KUL-LI DABBETIN WE TESRIFI ER-RIJAHI WE SEHABIL-MUSEHHARI BEJNE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
2.165: WE MINE NASI MEN JETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘ENDADËN JUHIBBUNEHUM KEHUBBI ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ESHEDDU HUBBËN LIL-LAHI WE LEW JERAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘IDH JERAWNEL-’ADHABE ‘ENNEL-KUWETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE SHEDIDUL-’ADHAB
2.166: ‘IDH TEBERRA’EL-LEDHINE ETTUBI’U MINEL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’U WE RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE TEKATTE’AT BIHIMUL-’ESBAB
2.167: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’U LEW ‘ENNE LENA KERRATEN FENETEBERRA’E MINHUM KEMA TEBERRA’U MINNA KEDHALIKE JURIHIMU ALLAHU ‘A’MALEHUM HESERATIN ‘ALEJHIM WE MA HUM BIHARIXHINE MINE NAR
2.168: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KULU MIMMA FIL-’ERDI HELALËN TEJJIBËN WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWATI ESH-SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBI
2.169: ‘INNEMA JE’MURUKUM BIS-SU’I WEL-FEHSHA’I WE ‘EN TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.170: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM ETTEBI’U MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU KALU BEL NETTEBI’U MA ‘ELFEJNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABA’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE ‘ABA’UUHUM LA JA’KILUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEHTEDUN
2.171: WE METHELUL-LEDHINE KEFERU KEMETHELIL-LEDHI JEN’IKU BIMA LA JESMA’U ‘IL-LA DU’A’EN WE NIDA’EN SUMMUN BUKMUN ‘UMJUN FEHUM LA JA’KILUN
2.172: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KULU MIN TEJJIBATI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE ESHKURU LIL-LAHI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
2.173: ‘INNEMA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETE WE ED-DEME WE LEHMEL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE BIHI LIGAJRI ALLAHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BAGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.174: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU MINEL-KITABI WE JESHTERUNE BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULA’IKE MA JE’KULUNE FI BUTUNIHIM ‘IL-LA NARA WE LA JUKELLIMUHUMU ALLAHU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE LA JUZEKKIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.175: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE ESHTERAW ED-DELALETE BIL-HUDA WEL-’ADHABE BIL-MEGFIRATI FEMA ‘ESBERAHUM ‘ALA NAR
2.176: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE NEZZELEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIL-KITABI LEFI SHIKAKIN BA’IDI
2.177: LEJSEL-BIRRA ‘EN TUWELLU WUXHUHEKUM KIBELEL-MESHRIKI WEL-MEGRIBI WE LEKINNEL-BIRRA MEN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WEL-MELA’IKETI WEL-KITABI WE NEBIJINE WE ‘ATAL-MALE ‘ALA HUBBIHI DHEWIL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINE WE EBNE SEBILI WE SA’ILINE WE FI ER-RIKABI WE ‘EKAME SELËTE WE ‘ATA EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-MUFUNE BI’AHDIHIM ‘IDHA ‘AHEDU WE SABIRINE FIL-BE’SA’I WE ED-DERRA’I WE HINEL-BE’SI ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUTTEKUN
2.178: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KISASU FIL-KATLAL-HURRU BIL-HURRI WEL-’ABDU BIL-’ABDI WEL-’UNTHA BIL-’UNTHA FEMEN ‘UFIJE LEHU MIN ‘EHIHI SHEJ’UN FE ETTIBA’UN BIL-MA’RUFI WE ‘EDA’UN ‘ILEJHI BI’IHSANIN DHALIKE TEHFIFUN MIN RABBIKUM WE RAHMETUN FEMENI A’TEDA BA’DE DHALIKE FELEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.179: WE LEKUM FIL-KISASI HEJËTUN JA ‘ULIL-’ELBABI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.180: KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU ‘IN TERAKE HAJRËNL-WESIJETU LILWALIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE BIL-MA’RUFI HEKKËN ‘ALEL-MUTTEKIN
2.181: FEMEN BEDDELEHU BA’DEMA SEMI’AHU FE’INNEMA ‘ITHMUHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JUBEDDILUNEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.182: FEMEN HAFE MIN MUSIN XHENEFËN ‘EW ‘ITHMËN FE’ESLEHE BEJNEHUM FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.183: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMU SIJAMU KEMA KUTIBE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.184: ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDATIN FEMEN KANE MINKUM MERIDËN ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN FA’IDDETUN MIN ‘EJJAMIN ‘UHARA WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JUTIKUNEHU FIDJETUN TA’AMU MISKININ FEMEN TETEWWE’A HAJRËN FEHUWE HAJRUN LEHU WE ‘EN TESUMU HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
2.185: SHEHRU RAMEDANEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE FIHIL-KUR’ANU HUDEN LILNNASI WE BEJJINATIN MINEL-HUDA WEL-FURKANI FEMEN SHEHIDE MINKUMU ESH-SHEHRA FELJESUMHU WE MEN KANE MERIDËN ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN FA’IDDETUN MIN ‘EJJAMIN ‘UHARA JURIDU ALLAHU BIKUMUL-JUSRA WE LA JURIDU BIKUMUL-’USRA WE LITUKMILUL-’IDDETE WE LITUKEBBIRU ELLAHE ‘ALA MA HEDAKUM WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.186: WE ‘IDHA SE’ELEKE ‘IBADI ‘ANNI FE’INNI KARIBUN ‘UXHIBU DA’WETE ED-DA’I ‘IDHA DA’ANI FELJESTEXHIBU LI WE LIU’UMINU BI LE’ALLEHUM JERSHUDUN
2.187: ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM LEJLETE SIJAMI RAFETHU ‘ILA NISA’IKUM HUNNE LIBASUN LEKUM WE ‘ENTUM LIBASUN LEHUNNE ‘ALIMEL-LAHU ‘ENNEKUM KUNTUM TEHTANUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM FETABE ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘AFA ‘ANKUM FAL’ANE BASHIRUHUNNE WE EBTEGU MA KETEBEL-LAHU LEKUM WE KULU WE ESHRABU HETTA JETEBEJJENE LEKUMUL-HAJTUL-’EBJEDU MINEL-HAJTIL-’ESWEDI MINEL-FEXHRI THUMME ‘ETIMMU SIJAME ‘ILAL-LEJLI WE LA TUBASHIRUHUNNE WE ‘ENTUM ‘AKIFUNE FIL-MESAXHIDI TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI FELA TEKRABUHA KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU ‘AJATIHI LILNNASI LE’ALLEHUM JETTEKUN
2.188: WE LA TE’KULU ‘EMWALEKUM BEJNEKUM BIL-BATILI WE TUDLU BIHA ‘ILAL-HUKKAMI LITE’KULU FERIKËN MIN ‘EMWALI NASI BIL-’ITHMI WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.189: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-’EHILLETI KUL HIJE MEWAKITU LILNNASI WEL-HEXHXHI WE LEJSEL-BIRRU BI’EN TE’TUL-BUJUTE MIN DHUHURIHA WE LEKINNEL-BIRRA MENI ETTEKA WE ‘TUL-BUJUTE MIN ‘EBWABIHA WE ETTEKU ELLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
2.190: WE KATILU FI SEBILI ALLAHIL-LEDHINE JUKATILUNEKUM WE LA TA’TEDU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
2.191: WAKTULUHUM HEJTHU THEKIFTUMUHUM WE ‘EHRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU ‘EHRAXHUKUM WEL-FITNETU ‘ESHEDDU MINEL-KATLI WE LA TUKATILUHUM ‘INDEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI HETTA JUKATILUKUM FIHI FE’IN KATELUKUM FAKTULUHUM KEDHALIKE XHEZA’UL-KAFIRIN
2.193: WE KATILUHUM HETTA LA TEKUNE FITNETUN WE JEKUNE ED-DINU LIL-LAHI FE’INI ENTEHEW FELA ‘UDWANE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
2.194: ESH-SHEHRUL-HERAMU BISH-SHEHRIL-HERAMI WEL-HURUMATU KISASUN FEMENI A’TEDA ‘ALEJKUM FA’TEDU ‘ALEJHI BIMITHLI MA A’TEDA ‘ALEJKUM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
2.195: WE ‘ENFIKU FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE LA TULKU BI’EJDIKUM ‘ILAT-TEHLUKETI WE ‘EHSINU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
2.196: WE ‘ETIMMUL-HEXHXHE WEL-’UMRATE LIL-LAHI FE’IN ‘UHSIRTUM FEMA ESTEJSERA MINEL-HEDJI WE LA TEHLIKU RU’USEKUM HETTA JEBLUGAL-HEDJU MEHILLEHU FEMEN KANE MINKUM MERIDËN ‘EW BIHI ‘EDHEN MIN RA’SIHI FEFIDJETUN MIN SIJAMIN ‘EW SEDEKATIN ‘EW NUSUKIN FE’IDHA ‘EMINTUM FEMEN TEMETTE’A BIL-’UMRATI ‘ILAL-HEXHXHI FEMA ESTEJSERA MINEL-HEDJI FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU THELATHETI ‘EJJAMIN FIL-HEXHXHI WE SEB’ATIN ‘IDHA RAXHA’TUM TILKE ‘ASHERATUN KAMILETUN DHALIKE LIMEN LEM JEKUN ‘EHLUHU HADIRIL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
2.197: EL-HEXHXHU ‘ESH/HURUN MA’LUMATUN FEMEN FERADE FIHINNEL-HEXHXHE FELA RAFETHE WE LA FUSUKA WE LA XHIDALE FIL-HEXHXHI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN JA’LEMHU ALLAHU WE TEZEWWEDU FE’INNE HAJRA EZ-ZADIT-TEKWA WE ETTEKUNI JA ‘ULIL-’ELBAB
2.198: LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEBTEGU FEDLËN MIN RABBIKUM FE’IDHA ‘EFEDTUM MIN ‘ARAFATIN FADHKURU ELLAHE ‘INDEL-MESH’ARIL-HERAMI WE EDHKURUHU KEMA HEDAKUM WE ‘IN KUNTUM MIN KABLIHI LEMINE ED-DALLIN
2.199: THUMME ‘EFIDU MIN HEJTHU ‘EFADE NASU WE ESTEGFIRU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.200: FE’IDHA KADEJTUM MENASIKEKUM FADHKURU ELLAHE KEDHIKRIKUM ‘ABA’EKUM ‘EW ‘ESHEDDE DHIKRËN FEMINE NASI MEN JEKULU RABBENA ‘ATINA FI ED-DUNJA WE MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN HALAKI
2.201: WE MINHUM MEN JEKULU RABBENA ‘ATINA FI ED-DUNJA HESENETEN WE FIL-’AHIRATI HESENETEN WE KINA ‘ADHABE NAR
2.202: ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM NESIBUN MIMMA KESEBU WEL-LAHU SERI’UL-HISAB
2.203: WE EDHKURU ELLAHE FI ‘EJJAMIN MA’DUDATIN FEMEN TE’AXHXHELE FI JEWMEJNI FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI WE MEN TE’EHHARA FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI LIMENI ETTEKA WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
2.204: WE MINE NASI MEN JU’XHIBUKE KAWLUHU FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE JUSH/HIDU ELLAHE ‘ALA MA FI KALBIHI WE HUWE ‘ELEDDUL-HISAM
2.205: WE ‘IDHA TEWELLA SA’A FIL-’ERDI LIJUFSIDE FIHA WE JUHLIKEL-HERTHE WE NESLE WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBUL-FESAD
2.206: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHU ETTEKI ELLAHE ‘EHADHET/HUL-’IZZETU BIL-’ITHMI FEHESBUHU XHEHENNEMU WE LEBI’SEL-MIHAD
2.207: WE MINE NASI MEN JESHRI NEFSEHU EBTIGA’E MERDËTI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU RA’UFUN BIL-’IBAD
2.208: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHULU FI SILMI KAFFETEN WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWATI ESH-SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
2.209: FE’IN ZELELTUM MIN BA’DI MA XHA’ETKUMUL-BEJJINATU FA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.210: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUMU ALLAHU FI DHULELIN MINEL-GAMAMI WEL-MELA’IKETU WE KUDIJEL-’EMRU WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
2.211: SEL BENI ‘ISRA’ILE KEM ‘ATEJNAHUM MIN ‘AJETIN BEJJINETIN WE MEN JUBEDDIL NI’METEL-LAHI MIN BA’DI MA XHA’ET/HU FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
2.212: ZUJJINE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERUL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA WE JESHARUNE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW FEWKAHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WEL-LAHU JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
2.213: KANE NASU ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN FEBE’ATHEL-LAHU NEBIJINE MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE WE ‘ENZELE ME’AHUMUL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI LIJEHKUME BEJNE NASI FIMA EHTELEFU FIHI WE MA EHTELEFE FIHI ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUHU MIN BA’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU BEGJËN BEJNEHUM FEHEDALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LIMA EHTELEFU FIHI MINEL-HEKKI BI’IDHNIHI WEL-LAHU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
2.214: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TEDHULUL-XHENNETE WE LEMMA JE’TIKUM METHELUL-LEDHINE HALEW MIN KABLIKUM MESSET/HUMUL-BE’SA’U WE ED-DERRA’U WE ZULZILU HETTA JEKULE RASULU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU META NESRU ALLAHI ‘ELA ‘INNE NESRAL-LAHI KARIBU
2.215: JES’ELUNEKE MADHA JUNFIKUNE KUL MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN HAJRIN FELILWALIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
2.216: KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KITALU WE HUWE KURHUN LEKUM WE ‘ASA ‘EN TEKRAHU SHEJ’ËN WE HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘ASA ‘EN TUHIBBU SHEJ’ËN WE HUWE SHERRUN LEKUM WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
2.217: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI ESH-SHEHRIL-HERAMI KITALIN FIHI KUL KITALUN FIHI KEBIRUN WE SEDDUN ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE KUFRUN BIHI WEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE ‘IHRAXHU ‘EHLIHI MINHU ‘EKBERU ‘INDEL-LAHI WEL-FITNETU ‘EKBERU MINEL-KATLI WE LA JEZALUNE JUKATILUNEKUM HETTA JERUDDUKUM ‘AN DINIKUM ‘INI ESTETA’U WE MEN JERTEDID MINKUM ‘AN DINIHI FEJEMUT WE HUWE KAFIRUN FE’ULA’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.218: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘ULA’IKE JERXHUNE RAHMETEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.219: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-HAMRI WEL-MEJSIRI KUL FIHIMA ‘ITHMUN KEBIRUN WE MENAFI’U LILNNASI WE ‘ITHMUHUMA ‘EKBERU MIN NEF’IHIMA WE JES’ELUNEKE MADHA JUNFIKUNE KULIL-’AFWE KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TETEFEKKERUN
2.220: FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-JETAMA KUL ‘ISLAHUN LEHUM HAJRUN WE ‘IN TUHALITUHUM FE’IHWANUKUM WEL-LAHU JA’LEMUL-MUFSIDE MINEL-MUSLIHI WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LE’A’NETEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.221: WE LA TENKIHUL-MUSHRIKATI HETTA JU’UMINNE WE LE’EMETUN MU’UMINETUN HAJRUN MIN MUSHRIKETIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBETKUM WE LA TUNKIHUL-MUSHRIKINE HETTA JU’UMINU WE LE’ABDUN MU’UMINUN HAJRUN MIN MUSHRIKIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKUM ‘ULA’IKE JED’UNE ‘ILA NARI WEL-LAHU JED’U ‘ILAL-XHENNETI WEL-MEGFIRATI BI’IDHNIHI WE JUBEJJINU ‘AJATIHI LILNNASI LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
2.222: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-MEHIDI KUL HUWE ‘EDHEN FA’TEZILU NISA’ FIL-MEHIDI WE LA TEKRABUHUNNE HETTA JETHURNE FE’IDHA TETEHHERNE FE’TUHUNNE MIN HEJTHU ‘EMERAKUMU ALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUT-TEWWABINE WE JUHIBBUL-MUTETEHHIRIN
2.223: NISA’UUKUM HERTHUN LEKUM FE’TU HERTHEKUM ‘ENNA SHI’TUM WE KADDIMU LI’NFUSIKUM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM MULAKUHU WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
2.224: WE LA TEXH’ALU ELLAHE ‘URDETEN LI’JMANIKUM ‘EN TEBERRU WE TETTEKU WE TUSLIHU BEJNE NASI WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.225: LA JU’UAHIDHUKUMU ALLAHU BIL-LEGWI FI ‘EJMANIKUM WE LEKIN JU’UAHIDHUKUM BIMA KESEBET KULUBUKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN HELIMU
2.226: LIL-LEDHINE JU’ULUNE MIN NISA’IHIM TERABBUSU ‘ERBE’ATI ‘ESH/HURIN FE’IN FA’U FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.228: WEL-MUTELLEKATU JETERABBESNE BI’ENFUSIHINNE THELATHETE KURU’IN WE LA JEHIL-LU LEHUNNE ‘EN JEKTUMNE MA HALEKAL-LAHU FI ‘ERHAMIHINNE ‘IN KUNNE JU’UMINNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE BU’ULETUHUNNE ‘EHEKKU BIRADDIHINNE FI DHALIKE ‘IN ‘ERADU ‘ISLAHËN WE LEHUNNE MITHLUL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHINNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE LILRRIXHALI ‘ALEJHINNE DERAXHETUN WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.229: ET-TELAKU MERRATANI FE’IMSAKUN BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW TESRIHUN BI’IHSANIN WE LA JEHIL-LU LEKUM ‘EN TE’HUDHU MIMMA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JEHAFA ‘ELLA JUKIMA HUDUDEL-LAHI FE’IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA JUKIMA HUDUDEL-LAHI FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA FIMA EFTEDET BIHI TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI FELA TA’TEDUHA WE MEN JETE’ADDE HUDUDEL-LAHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
2.230: FE’IN TELLEKAHA FELA TEHILLU LEHU MIN BA’DU HETTA TENKIHE ZEWXHËN GAJRAHU FE’IN TELLEKAHA FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA ‘EN JETERAXHA’A ‘IN DHENNA ‘EN JUKIMA HUDUDEL-LAHI WE TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI JUBEJJINUHA LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
2.231: WE ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FEBELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FE’EMSIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW SERRIHUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN WE LA TUMSIKUHUNNE DIRARËN LITA’TEDU WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FEKAD DHELEME NEFSEHU WE LA TETTEHIDHU ‘AJATI ALLAHI HUZUEN WE EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE MA ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKUM MINEL-KITABI WEL-HIKMETI JA’IDHUKUM BIHI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.232: WE ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FEBELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FELA TA’DULUHUNNE ‘EN JENKIHNE ‘EZWAXHEHUNNE ‘IDHA TERADEW BEJNEHUM BIL-MA’RUFI DHALIKE JU’ADHU BIHI MEN KANE MINKUM JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI DHALIKUM ‘EZKA LEKUM WE ‘ETHERU WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
2.233: WEL-WALIDATU JURDI’NE ‘EWLADEHUNNE HEWLEJNI KAMILEJNI LIMEN ‘ERADE ‘EN JUTIMME RADA’ATE WE ‘ALEL-MEWLUDI LEHU RIZKUHUNNE WE KISWETUHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI LA TUKELLEFU NEFSUN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA LA TUDARRA WE E-DETUN BIWELEDIHA WE LA MEWLUDUN LEHU BIWELEDIHI WE ‘ALEL-WARITHI MITHLU DHALIKE FE’IN ‘ERADA FISALËN ‘AN TERADIN MINHUMA WE TESHAWURIN FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA WE ‘IN ‘ERADTUM ‘EN TESTERDI’U ‘EWLADEKUM FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDHA SELLEMTUM MA ‘ATEJTUM BIL-MA’RUFI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.234: WEL-LEDHINE JUTEWEFFEWNE MINKUM WE JEDHERUNE ‘EZWAXHËN JETERABBESNE BI’ENFUSIHINNE ‘ERBE’ATE ‘ESH/HURIN WE ‘ASHRËN FE’IDHA BELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA FE’ALNE FI ‘ENFUSIHINNE BIL-MA’RUFI WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
2.235: WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA ‘ARRADTUM BIHI MIN HITBETI NISA’ ‘EW ‘EKNENTUM FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘ALIMEL-LAHU ‘ENNEKUM SETEDHKURUNEHUNNE WE LEKIN LA TUWA’IDUHUNNE SIRRËN ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKULU KAWLËN MA’RUFËN WE LA TA’ZIMU ‘UKDETE NIKAHI HETTA JEBLUGAL-KITABU ‘EXHELEHU WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM FAHDHERUHU WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE GAFURUN HELIMU
2.236: LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IN TELLEKTUMU NISA’ MA LEM TEMESSUHUNNE ‘EW TEFRIDU LEHUNNE FERIDETEN WE METTI’UHUNNE ‘ALEL-MUSI’I KADERUHU WE ‘ALEL-MUKTIRI KADERUHU META’ËN BIL-MA’RUFI HEKKËN ‘ALEL-MUHSININ
2.237: WE ‘IN TELLEKTUMUHUNNE MIN KABLI ‘EN TEMESSUHUNNE WE KAD FERADTUM LEHUNNE FERIDETEN FENISFU MA FERADTUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN JA’FUNE ‘EW JA’FUWEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHI ‘UKDETU NIKAHI WE ‘EN TA’FU ‘EKRABU LILTTEKWA WE LA TENSEWL-FEDLE BEJNEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.238: HAFIDHU ‘ALA SELEWATI WE SELËTIL-WUSTA WE KUMU LIL-LAHI KANITIN
2.239: FE’IN HIFTUM FERIXHALËN ‘EW RUKBANËN FE’IDHA ‘EMINTUM FADHKURU ELLAHE KEMA ‘AL-LEMEKUM MA LEM TEKUNU TA’LEMUN
2.240: WEL-LEDHINE JUTEWEFFEWNE MINKUM WE JEDHERUNE ‘EZWAXHËN WESIJETEN LI’ZWAXHIHIM META’ËN ‘ILAL-HEWLI GAJRA ‘IHRAXHIN FE’IN HARAXHNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FI MA FE’ALNE FI ‘ENFUSIHINNE MIN MA’RUFIN WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.242: KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
2.243: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE HARAXHU MIN DIJARIHIM WE HUM ‘ULUFUN HEDHERAL-MEWTI FEKALE LEHUMU ALLAHU MUTU THUMME ‘EHJAHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
2.244: WE KATILU FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.245: MEN DHAL-LEDHI JUKRIDU ELLAHE KARDËN HESENËN FEJUDA’IFEHU LEHU ‘ED’AFËN KETHIRATEN WEL-LAHU JEKBIDU WE JEBSUTU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
2.246: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-MELE’I MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE MIN BA’DI MUSA ‘IDH KALU LINEBIJIN LEHUM EB’ATH LENA MELIKËN NUKATIL FI SEBILI ALLAHI KALE HEL ‘ASEJTUM ‘IN KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KITALU ‘ELLA TUKATILU KALU WE MA LENA ‘ELLA NUKATILE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE KAD ‘UHRIXHNA MIN DIJARINA WE ‘EBNA’INA FELEMMA KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KITALU TEWEL-LEW ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
2.247: WE KALE LEHUM NEBIJUHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAD BE’ATHE LEKUM TALUTE MELIKËN KALU ‘ENNA JEKUNU LEHUL-MULKU ‘ALEJNA WE NEHNU ‘EHEKKU BIL-MULKI MINHU WE LEM JU’UTE SE’ATEN MINEL-MALI KALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFAHU ‘ALEJKUM WE ZADEHU BESTETEN FIL-’ILMI WEL-XHISMI WEL-LAHU JU’UTI MULKEHU MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.248: WE KALE LEHUM NEBIJUHUM ‘INNE ‘AJETE MULKIHI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUT-TABUTU FIHI SEKINETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE BEKIJETUN MIMMA TERAKE ‘ALU MUSA WE ‘ALU HARUNE TEHMILUHUL-MELA’IKETU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.249: FELEMMA FESELE TALUTU BIL-XHUNUDI KALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE MUBTELIKUM BINEHERIN FEMEN SHERIBE MINHU FELEJSE MINNI WE MEN LEM JET’AMHU FE’INNEHU MINNI ‘IL-LA MENI EGTERAFE GURFETEN BIJEDIHI FESHERIBU MINHU ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM FELEMMA XHAWEZEHU HUWE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU KALU LA TAKATE LENAL-JEWME BIXHALUTE WE XHUNUDIHI KALEL-LEDHINE JEDHUNNUNE ‘ENNEHUM MULAKU ALLAHI KEM MIN FI’ETIN KALILETIN GALEBET FI’ETEN KETHIRATEN BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU ME’A SABIRIN
2.250: WE LEMMA BERAZU LIXHALUTE WE XHUNUDIHI KALU RABBENA ‘EFRIG ‘ALEJNA SEBRËN WE THEBBIT ‘EKDAMENA WE ENSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KAFIRIN
2.251: FEHEZEMUHUM BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE KATELE DAWUDU XHALUTE WE ‘ATAHU ALLAHUL-MULKE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘AL-LEMEHU MIMMA JESHA’U WE LEWLA DEF’U ALLAHI NASE BA’DEHUM BIBA’DIN LEFESEDETIL-’ERDU WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE DHU FEDLIN ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.252: TILKE ‘AJATU ALLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HEKKI WE ‘INNEKE LEMINEL-MURSELIN
2.253: TILKE ER-RUSULU FEDDELNA BA’DEHUM ‘ALA BA’DIN MINHUM MEN KELLEMEL-LAHU WE RAFE’A BA’DEHUM DERAXHATIN WE ‘ATEJNA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEMEL-BEJJINATI WE ‘EJJEDNAHU BIRUHIL-KUDUSI WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA EKTETELEL-LEDHINE MIN BA’DIHIM MIN BA’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU WE LEKINI EHTELEFU FEMINHUM MEN ‘AMENE WE MINHUM MEN KEFERA WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA EKTETELU WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JURID
2.254: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENFIKU MIMMA RAZEKNAKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA BEJ’UN FIHI WE LA HULLETUN WE LA SHEFA’ATUN WEL-KAFIRUNE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
2.255: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-HEJJUL-KAJJUMU LA TE’HUDHUHU SINETUN WE LA NEWMUN LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI MEN DHAL-LEDHI JESHFA’U ‘INDEHU ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE LA JUHITUNE BISHEJ’IN MIN ‘ILMIHI ‘IL-LA BIMA SHA’E WESI’A KURSIJUHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE LA JE’UDUHU HIFDHUHUMA WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-’ADHIM
2.256: LA ‘IKRAHE FI ED-DINI KAD TEBEJJENE ER-RUSHDU MINEL-GAJJI FEMEN JEKFUR BIT-TAGUTI WE JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI FEKADI ESTEMSEKE BIL-’URWETIL-WUTHKA LA ENFISAME LEHA WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.257: ALLAHU WE LIJUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUHRIXHUHUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NUR WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EWLIJA’UUHUMUT-TAGUTU JUHRIXHUNEHUM MINE NUR ‘ILA EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.258: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHI HAXHXHE ‘IBRAHIME FI RABBIHI ‘EN ‘ATAHU ALLAHUL-MULKE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBIL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU KALE ‘ENA ‘UHJI WE ‘UMITU KALE ‘IBRAHIMU FE’INNALL-LLAHE JE’TI BISH-SHEMSI MINEL-MESHRIKI FE’TI BIHA MINEL-MEGRIBI FEBUHITEL-LEDHI KEFERA WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
2.259: ‘EW KAL-LEDHI MERRA ‘ALA KARJETIN WE HIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA KALE ‘ENNA JUHJI HEDHIHI ALLAHU BA’DE MEWTIHA FE’EMATEHU ALLAHU MIA’ETE ‘AMIN THUMME BE’ATHEHU KALE KEM LEBITHTE KALE LEBITHTU JEWMËN ‘EW BA’DE JEWMIN KALE BEL LEBITHTE MIA’ETE ‘AMIN FANDHUR ‘ILA TA’AMIKE WE SHERABIKE LEM JETESENNEH WE ENDHUR ‘ILA HIMARIKE WE LINEXH’ALEKE ‘AJETEN LILNNASI WE ENDHUR ‘ILAL-’IDHAMI KEJFE NUNSHIZUHA THUMME NEKSUHA LEHMËN FELEMMA TEBEJJENE LEHU KALE ‘A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.260: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI ‘ERINI KEJFE TUHJIL-MEWTA KALE ‘EWELEM TU’UMIN KALE BELA WE LEKIN LIJETME’INNE KALBI KALE FEHUDH ‘ERBE’ATEN MINET-TEJRI FESURHUNNE ‘ILEJKE THUMME EXH’AL ‘ALA KUL-LI XHEBELIN MINHUNNE XHUZ’ËN THUMME ED’UHUNNE JE’TINEKE SA’JËN WE A’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.261: METHELUL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI KEMETHELI HEBBETIN ‘ENBETET SEB’A SENABILE FI KUL-LI SUNBULETIN MIA’ETU HEBBETIN WEL-LAHU JUDA’IFU LIMEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.262: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI THUMME LA JUTBI’UNE MA ‘ENFEKU MENNËN WE LA ‘EDHEN LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.263: KAWLUN MA’RUFUN WE MEGFIRATUN HAJRUN MIN SEDEKATIN JETBA’UHA ‘EDHEN WEL-LAHU GANIJUN HELIMU
2.264: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUBTILU SEDEKATIKUM BIL-MENNI WEL-’EDHA KAL-LEDHI JUNFIKU MALEHU RI’A’E NASI WE LA JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI FEMETHELUHU KEMETHELI SEFWANIN ‘ALEJHI TURABUN FE’ESABEHU WE EBILUN FETERAKEHU SELDËN LA JEKDIRUNE ‘ALA SHEJ’IN MIMMA KESEBU WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-KAFIRIN
2.265: WE METHELUL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUMU EBTIGA’E MERDËTI ALLAHI WE TETHBITËN MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM KEMETHELI XHENNETIN BIRABWETIN ‘ESABEHA WE EBILUN FE’ATET ‘UKULEHA DI’FEJNI FE’IN LEM JUSIBHA WE EBILUN FETELLUN WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.266: ‘EJEWEDDU ‘EHEDUKUM ‘EN TEKUNE LEHU XHENNETUN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU LEHU FIHA MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI WE ‘ESABEHUL-KIBERU WE LEHU DHURRIJETUN DU’AFA’U FE’ESABEHA ‘I’SARUN FIHI NARUN FAHTERAKAT KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TETEFEKKERUN
2.267: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENFIKU MIN TEJJIBATI MA KESEBTUM WE MIMMA ‘EHRAXHNA LEKUM MINEL-’ERDI WE LA TEJEMMEMUL-HABITHE MINHU TUNFIKUNE WE LESTUM BI’AHIDHIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TUGMIDU FIHI WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE GANIJUN HEMIDU
2.268: ESH-SHEJTANU JA’IDUKUMUL-FEKRA WE JE’MURUKUM BIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-LAHU JA’IDUKUM MEGFIRATEN MINHU WE FEDLËN WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.269: JU’UTIL-HIKMETE MEN JESHA’U WE MEN JU’UTEL-HIKMETE FEKAD ‘UTIJE HAJRËN KETHIRËN WE MA JEDHDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA ‘ULUL-’ELBAB
2.270: WE MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN NEFEKATIN ‘EW NEDHERTUM MIN NEDHRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMUHU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
2.271: ‘IN TUBDU SEDEKATI FENI’IMMA HIJE WE ‘IN TUHFUHA WE TU’UTUHAL-FUKARA’E FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE JUKEFFIRU ‘ANKUM MIN SEJJI’ATIKUM WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
2.272: LEJSE ‘ALEJKE HUDAHUM WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN FELI’ENFUSIKUM WE MA TUNFIKUNE ‘IL-LA EBTIGA’E WEXHHI ALLAHI WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN JUWEFFE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TUDHLEMUN
2.273: LILFUKARA’IL-LEDHINE ‘UHSIRU FI SEBILI ALLAHI LA JESTETI’UNE DERBËN FIL-’ERDI JEHSEBUHUMUL-XHAHILU ‘EGNIJA’E MINET-TE’AFFUFI TA’RIFUHUM BISIMAHUM LA JES’ELUNE NASE ‘ILHAFËN WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
2.274: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI SIRRËN WE ‘ALANIJETEN FELEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.275: EL-LEDHINE JE’KULUNE ER-RIBA LA JEKUMUNE ‘IL-LA KEMA JEKUMUL-LEDHI JETEHABBETUHU ESH-SHEJTANU MINEL-MESSI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU ‘INNEMAL-BEJ’U MITHLU ER-RIBA WE ‘EHELLEL-LAHUL-BEJ’A WE HERRAME ER-RIBA FEMEN XHA’EHU MEW’IDHETUN MIN RABBIHI FANTEHA FELEHU MA SELEFE WE ‘EMRUHU ‘ILA ALLAHI WE MEN ‘ADE FE’ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
2.276: JEMHEKU ALLAHU ER-RIBA WE JURBI SEDEKATI WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE KEFFARIN ‘ETHIMI
2.277: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.278: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE DHERU MA BEKIJE MINE ER-RIBA ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.279: FE’IN LEM TEF’ALU FE’DHENU BIHERBIN MINEL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘IN TUBTUM FELEKUM RU’USU ‘EMWALIKUM LA TEDHLIMUNE WE LA TUDHLEMUN
2.280: WE ‘IN KANE DHU ‘USRATIN FENEDHIRATUN ‘ILA MEJSERATIN WE ‘EN TESEDDEKU HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
2.281: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN TURXHA’UNE FIHI ‘ILA ALLAHI THUMME TUWEFFA KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
2.282: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA TEDAJENTUM BIDEJNIN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FAKTUBUHU WE LIEKTUB BEJNEKUM KATIBUN BIL-’ADLI WE LA JE’BE KATIBUN ‘EN JEKTUBE KEMA ‘AL-LEMEHU ALLAHU FELJEKTUB WE LIUMLILIL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHIL-HEKKU WE LIETTEKI ELLAHE RABBEHU WE LA JEBHAS MINHU SHEJ’ËN FE’IN KANEL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHIL-HEKKU SEFIHËN ‘EW DA’IFËN ‘EW LA JESTETI’U ‘EN JUMILLE HUWE FELJUMLIL WELIJUHU BIL-’ADLI WE ESTESH/HIDU SHEHIDEJNI MIN RIXHALIKUM FE’IN LEM JEKUNA RAXHULEJNI FERAXHULUN WE EMRA’ETANI MIMMEN TERDEWNE MINE ESH-SHUHEDA’I ‘EN TEDILLE ‘IHDAHUMA FETUDHEKKIRA ‘IHDAHUMAL-’UHRA WE LA JE’BE ESH-SHUHEDA’U ‘IDHA MA DU’U WE LA TES’EMU ‘EN TEKTUBUHU SEGIRËN ‘EW KEBIRËN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIHI DHALIKUM ‘EKSETU ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘EKWEMU LILSHSHEHADETI WE ‘EDNA ‘ELLA TERTABU ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE TIXHARATEN HADIRATEN TUDIRUNEHA BEJNEKUM FELEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘ELLA TEKTUBUHA WE ‘ESH/HIDU ‘IDHA TEBAJA’TUM WE LA JUDARRA KATIBUN WE LA SHEHIDUN WE ‘IN TEF’ALU FE’INNEHU FUSUKUN BIKUM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE JU’ALLIMUKUMU ALLAHU WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.283: WE ‘IN KUNTUM ‘ALA SEFERIN WE LEM TXHIDU KATIBËN FERIHANUN MEKBUDETUN FE’IN ‘EMINE BA’DUKUM BA’DËN FELJU’UEDDIL-LEDHI E’UTUMINE ‘EMANETEHU WE LIETTEKI ELLAHE RABBEHU WE LA TEKTUMU ESH-SHEHADETE WE MEN JEKTUMHA FE’INNEHU ‘ATHIMUN KALBUHU WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
2.284: LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE ‘IN TUBDU MA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EW TUHFUHU JUHASIBKUM BIHI ALLAHU FEJEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.285: ‘AMENE RASULU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MIN RABBIHI WEL-MU’UMINUNE KUL-LUN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WE MELA’IKETIHI WE KUTUBIHI WE RUSULIHI LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MIN RUSULIHI WE KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA GUFRANEKE RABBENA WE ‘ILEJKEL-MESIR
2.286: LA JUKELLIFU ALLAHU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA LEHA MA KESEBET WE ‘ALEJHA MA EKTESEBET RABBENA LA TU’UAHIDHNA ‘IN NESINA ‘EW ‘EHTE’NA RABBENA WE LA TEHMIL ‘ALEJNA ‘ISRËN KEMA HEMELTEHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLINA RABBENA WE LA TUHEMMILNA MA LA TAKATE LENA BIHI WE A’FU ‘ANNA WE EGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA ‘ENTE MEWLANA FANSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KAFIRIN

3.3: NEZZELE ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI WE ‘ENZELET-TEWRËTE WEL-’INXHIL
3.4: MIN KABLU HUDEN LILNNASI WE ‘ENZELEL-FURKANE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI ALLAHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
3.5: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHFA ‘ALEJHI SHEJ’UN FIL-’ERDI WE LA FI SEMA’
3.6: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSEWWIRUKUM FIL-’ERHAMI KEJFE JESHA’U LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.7: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE MINHU ‘AJATUN MUHKEMATUN HUNNE ‘UMMUL-KITABI WE ‘UHARU MUTES'HABIHATUN FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM ZEJGUN FEJETTEBI’UNE MA TESHABEHE MINHU EBTIGA’EL-FITNETI WE EBTIGA’E TE’WILIHI WE MA JA’LEMU TE’WILEHU ‘IL-LALLAHU WE ER-RASIHUNE FIL-’ILMI JEKULUNE ‘AMENNA BIHI KUL-LUN MIN ‘INDI RABBINA WE MA JEDHDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA ‘ULUL-’ELBAB
3.8: RABBENA LA TUZIG KULUBENA BA’DE ‘IDH HEDEJTENA WE HEB LENA MIN LEDUNKE RAHMETEN ‘INNEKE ‘ENTEL-WEHHAB
3.9: RABBENA ‘INNEKE XHAMI’U NASI LIJEWMIN LA RAJBE FIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHLIFUL-MI’AD
3.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWALUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘ULA’IKE HUM WE KUDU NAR
3.11: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FE’EHADHEHUMU ALLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM WEL-LAHU SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
3.12: KUL LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU SETUGLEBUNE WE TUHSHERUNE ‘ILA XHEHENNEME WE BI’SEL-MIHAD
3.13: KAD KANE LEKUM ‘AJETUN FI FI’ETEJNIT-TEKATA FI’ETUN TUKATILU FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE ‘UHRA KAFIRATUN JERAWNEHUM MITHLEJHIM RA’JEL-’AJNI WEL-LAHU JU’UEJJIDU BINESRIHI MEN JESHA’U ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LA’IBRATEN LI’WLIL-’EBSAR
3.14: ZUJJINE LILNNASI HUBBU ESH-SHEHEWATI MINE NISA’ WEL-BENINE WEL-KANATIRIL-MUKANTERATI MINE EDH-DHEHEBI WEL-FIDDETI WEL-HAJLIL-MUSEWWEMETI WEL-’EN’AMI WEL-HERTHI DHALIKE META’UL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WEL-LAHU ‘INDEHU HUSNUL-ME’AB
3.15: KUL ‘E’UUNEBBI’UKUM BIHAJRIN MIN DHALIKUM LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘INDE RABBIHIM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE ‘EZWAXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE RIDWANUN MINEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIL-’IBAD
3.16: EL-LEDHINE JEKULUNE RABBENA ‘INNENA ‘AMENNA FAGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE KINA ‘ADHABE NAR
3.17: SABIRINE WE SADIKINE WEL-KANITINE WEL-MUNFIKINE WEL-MUSTEGFIRINE BIL-’ESHAR
3.18: SHEHIDEL-LAHU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WEL-MELA’IKETU WE ‘ULUL-’ILMI KA’IMËN BIL-KISTI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.19: ‘INNE ED-DINE ‘INDEL-LAHIL-’ISLAMU WE MA EHTELEFEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEGJËN BEJNEHUM WE MEN JEKFUR BI’AJATI ALLAHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
3.20: FE’IN HAXHXHUKE FEKUL ‘ESLEMTU WEXHHIJE LIL-LAHI WE MENI ETTEBE’ANI WE KUL LIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE WEL-’UMMIJINE ‘E’ESLEMTUM FE’IN ‘ESLEMU FEKADI EHTEDEW WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNEMA ‘ALEJKEL-BELAGU WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIL-’IBAD
3.21: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE JEKTULUNE NEBIJINE BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE JEKTULUNEL-LEDHINE JE’MURUNE BIL-KISTI MINE NASI FEBESHSHIRHUM BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
3.22: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.23: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JUD’AWNE ‘ILA KITABI ALLAHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM THUMME JETEWELLA FERIKUN MINHUM WE HUM MU’RIDUN
3.24: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LEN TEMESSENA NARU ‘IL-LA ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDATIN WE GARRAHUM FI DINIHIM MA KANU JEFTERUN
3.25: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA XHEMA’NAHUM LIJEWMIN LA RAJBE FIHI WE WUFFIJET KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
3.26: KULIL-LEHUMME MALIKEL-MULKI TU’UTIL-MULKE MEN TESHA’U WE TENZI’UL-MULKE MIMMEN TESHA’U WE TU’IZZU MEN TESHA’U WE TUDHILLU MEN TESHA’U BIJEDIKEL-HAJRU ‘INNEKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.27: TULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE TULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE TUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE TUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE TERZUKU MEN TESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
3.28: LA JETTEHIDHIL-MU’UMINUNEL-KAFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FELEJSE MINEL-LAHI FI SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA ‘EN TETTEKU MINHUM TUKËTEN WE JUHEDHDHIRUKUMU ALLAHU NEFSEHU WE ‘ILA ALLAHIL-MESIR
3.29: KUL ‘IN TUHFU MA FI SUDURIKUM ‘EW TUBDUHU JA’LEMHU ALLAHU WE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.30: JEWME TEXHIDU KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET MIN HAJRIN MUHDERËN WE MA ‘AMILET MIN SU’IN TEWEDDU LEW ‘ENNE BEJNEHA WE BEJNEHU ‘EMEDËN BA’IDËN WE JUHEDHDHIRUKUMU ALLAHU NEFSEHU WEL-LAHU RA’UFUN BIL-’IBAD
3.31: KUL ‘IN KUNTUM TUHIBBUNEL-LAHE FE ETTEBI’UNI JUHBIBKUMU ALLAHU WE JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.32: KUL ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-KAFIRIN
3.34: DHURRIJETEN BA’DUHA MIN BA’DIN WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.35: ‘IDH KALETI EMRA’ETU ‘IMRANE RABBI ‘INNI NEDHERTU LEKE MA FI BETNI MUHERRARËN FETEKABBEL MINNI ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
3.36: FELEMMA WEDE’AT/HA KALET RABBI ‘INNI WEDA’TUHA ‘UNTHA WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA WEDE’AT WE LEJSE EDH-DHEKERU KAL’UNTHA WE ‘INNI SEMMEJTUHA MERJEME WE ‘INNI ‘U’IDHUHA BIKE WE DHURRIJETEHA MINE ESH-SHEJTANI RAXHIM
3.37: FETEKABBELEHA RABBUHA BIKABULIN HESENIN WE ‘ENBETEHA NEBATËN HESENËN WE KEFFELEHA ZEKERIJA KUL-LEMA DEHALE ‘ALEJHA ZEKERIJAL-MIHRABE WEXHEDE ‘INDEHA RIZKËN KALE JA MERJEMU ‘ENNA LEKI HADHA KALET HUWE MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
3.38: HUNALIKE DA’A ZEKERIJA RABBEHU KALE RABBI HEB LI MIN LEDUNKE DHURRIJETEN TEJJIBETEN ‘INNEKE SEMI’U ED-DU’A’
3.39: FENADET/HUL-MELA’IKETU WE HUWE KA’IMUN JUSELLI FIL-MIHRABI ‘ENNEL-LAHE JUBESHSHIRUKE BIJEHJA MUSEDDIKËN BIKELIMETIN MINEL-LAHI WE SEJJIDËN WE HESURËN WE NEBIJËN MINE SALIHIN
3.40: KALE RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI GULAMUN WE KAD BELEGANIJEL-KIBERU WE EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRUN KALE KEDHALIKEL-LAHU JEF’ALU MA JESHA’
3.41: KALE RABBI EXH’AL LI ‘AJETEN KALE ‘AJETUKE ‘ELLA TUKELLIME NASE THELATHETE ‘EJJAMIN ‘IL-LA RAMZËN WE EDHKUR RABBEKE KETHIRËN WE SEBBIH BIL-’ASHIJI WEL-’IBKAR
3.42: WE ‘IDH KALETIL-MELA’IKETU JA MERJEMU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFAKI WE TEHHERAKI WE ESTEFAKI ‘ALA NISA’IL-’ALEMIN
3.43: JA MERJEMU EKNUTI LIRABBIKI WE ESXHUDI WE ERKA’I ME’A ER-RAKI’IN
3.44: DHALIKE MIN ‘NBA’IL-GAJBI NUHIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH JULKUNE ‘EKLAMEHUM ‘EJJUHUM JEKFULU MERJEME WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH JEHTESIMUN
3.45: ‘IDH KALETIL-MELA’IKETU JA MERJEMU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUBESHSHIRUKI BIKELIMETIN MINHU ESMUHUL-MESIHU ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME WEXHIHËN FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MINEL-MUKARRABIN
3.46: WE JUKELLIMU NASE FIL-MEHDI WE KEHLËN WE MINE SALIHIN
3.47: KALET RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI WELEDUN WE LEM JEMSESNI BESHERUN KALE KEDHALIKI ALLAHU JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U ‘IDHA KADA ‘EMRËN FE’INNEMA JEKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
3.49: WE RASULËN ‘ILA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ENNI KAD XHI’TUKUM BI’AJETIN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ENNI ‘EHLUKU LEKUM MINET-TINI KEHEJ’ETIT-TEJRI FE’ENFUHU FIHI FEJEKUNU TEJRËN BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE ‘UBRI’UL-’EKMEHE WEL-’EBRASE WE ‘UHJIL-MEWTA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA TE’KULUNE WE MA TEDDEHIRUNE FI BUJUTIKUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMINJN
3.50: WE MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJJE MINET-TEWRËTI WE LI’UHIL-LE LEKUM BA’DEL-LEDHI HURRIME ‘ALEJKUM WE XHI’TUKUM BI’AJETIN MIN RABBIKUM FE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’UN
3.51: ‘INNALL-LLAHE RABBI WE RABBUKUM FA’BUDUHU HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
3.52: FELEMMA ‘EHESSE ‘ISA MINHUMUL-KUFRA KALE MEN ‘ENSARI ‘ILA ALLAHI KALEL-HEWARIJUNE NEHNU ‘ENSARU ALLAHI ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE ESH/HED BI’ENNA MUSLIMUN
3.53: RABBENA ‘AMENNA BIMA ‘ENZELTE WE ETTEBA’NA RASULE FAKTUBNA ME’A ESH-SHAHIDIN
3.54: WE MEKERU WE MEKERAL-LAHU WEL-LAHU HAJRUL-MAKIRIN
3.55: ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA ‘INNI MUTEWEFFIKE WE RAFI’UKE ‘ILEJJE WE MUTEHHIRUKE MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE XHA’ILUL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’UKE FEWKAL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJA METI THUMME ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’EHKUMU BEJNEKUM FIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
3.56: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE KEFERU FE’U’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.57: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUWEFFIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
3.59: ‘INNE METHELE ‘ISA ‘INDEL-LAHI KEMETHELI ‘ADEME HALEKAHU MIN TURABIN THUMME KALE LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
3.60: EL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUN MINEL-MUMTERIN
3.61: FEMEN HAXHXHEKE FIHI MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI FEKUL TA’ALEW NED’U ‘EBNA’ENA WE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE NISA’ENA WE NISA’EKUM WE ‘ENFUSENA WE ‘ENFUSEKUM THUMME NEBTEHIL FENEXH’AL LA’NETEL-LAHI ‘ALEL-KADHIBIN
3.62: ‘INNE HADHA LEHUWEL-KASESUL-HEKKU WE MA MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IL-LALLAHU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.64: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI TA’ALEW ‘ILA KELIMETIN SEWA’IN BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUM ‘ELLA NA’BUDE ‘IL-LALLAHE WE LA NUSHRIKE BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JETTEHIDHE BA’DUNA BA’DËN ‘ERBABËN MIN DUNI ALLAHI FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKULU ESH/HEDU BI’ENNA MUSLIMUN
3.65: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LIME TUHAXHXHUNE FI ‘IBRAHIME WE MA ‘UNZILETIT-TEWRËTU WEL-’INXHILU ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DIHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
3.66: HA’ENTUM HA’UULA’ HAXHEXHTUM FIMA LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN FELIME TUHAXHXHUNE FIMA LEJSE LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
3.67: MA KANE ‘IBRAHIMU JEHUDIJËN WE LA NESRANIJËN WE LEKIN KANE HENIFËN MUSLIMËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
3.68: ‘INNE ‘EWLA NASI BI’IBRAHIME LELLEDHINE ETTEBA’UHU WE HEDHA NEBIJU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LAHU WE LIJUL-MU’UMININ
3.69: WEDDET TA’IFETUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEW JUDIL-LUNEKUM WE MA JUDIL-LUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSEHUM WE MA JESH’URU
3.70: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LIME TEKFURUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE ‘ENTUM TESH/HEDUN
3.71: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LIME TELBISUNEL-HEKKA BIL-BATILI WE TEKTUMUNEL-HEKKA WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
3.72: WE KALET TA’IFETUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘AMINU BIEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEXHHE NEHARI WE EKFURU ‘AHIRAHU LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
3.73: WE LA TU’UMINU ‘IL-LA LIMEN TEBI’A DINEKUM KUL ‘INNEL-HUDA HUDA ALLAHI ‘EN JU’UTA ‘EHEDUN MITHLE MA ‘UTITUM ‘EW JUHAXHXHUKUM ‘INDE RABBIKUM KUL ‘INNEL-FEDLE BIJEDI ALLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.74: JEHTESSU BIRAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
3.75: WE MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MEN ‘IN TE’MENHU BIKINTARIN JU’UEDDIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MINHUM MEN ‘IN TE’MENHU BIDINARIN LA JU’UEDDIHI ‘ILEJKE ‘IL-LA MA DUMTE ‘ALEJHI KA’IMËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LEJSE ‘ALEJNA FIL-’UMMIJINE SEBILUN WE JEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.76: BELA MEN ‘EWFA BI’AHDIHI WE ETTEKA FE’INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
3.77: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESHTERUNE BI’AHDI ALLAHI WE ‘EJMANIHIM THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULA’IKE LA HALAKA LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI WE LA JUKELLIMUHUMU ALLAHU WE LA JENDHURU ‘ILEJHIM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE LA JUZEKKIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.78: WE ‘INNE MINHUM LEFERIKËN JELWUNE ‘ELSINETEHUM BIL-KITABI LITEHSEBUHU MINEL-KITABI WE MA HUWE MINEL-KITABI WE JEKULUNE HUWE MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WE MA HUWE MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WE JEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.79: MA KANE LIBESHERIN ‘EN JU’UTIJEHU ALLAHUL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE THUMME JEKULE LILNNASI KUNU ‘IBADËN LI MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE LEKIN KUNU RABBANIJINE BIMA KUNTUM TU’ALLIMUNEL-KITABE WE BIMA KUNTUM TEDRUSUN
3.80: WE LA JE’MURAKUM ‘EN TETTEHIDHUL-MELA’IKETE WE NEBIJINE ‘ERBABËN ‘EJE’MURUKUM BIL-KUFRI BA’DE ‘IDH ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
3.81: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHEL-LAHU MITHAKA NEBIJINE LEMA ‘ATEJTUKUM MIN KITABIN WE HIKMETIN THUMME XHA’EKUM RASULUN MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AKUM LETU’UMINUNNE BIHI WE LETENSURUNNEHU KALE ‘E’EKRARTUM WE ‘EHADHTUM ‘ALA DHALIKUM ‘ISRI KALU ‘EKRARNA KALE FASH/HEDU WE ‘ENA ME’AKUM MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
3.82: FEMEN TEWELLA BA’DE DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-FASIKUN
3.83: ‘EFEGAJRA DINI ALLAHI JEBGUNE WE LEHU ‘ESLEME MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI TEW’ËN WE KERHËN WE ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UN
3.84: KUL ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBATI WE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA WE ‘ISA WE NEBIJUNE MIN RABBIHIM LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM WE NEHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
3.85: WE MEN JEBTEGI GAJRAL-’ISLAMI DINËN FELEN JUKBELE MINHU WE HUWE FIL-’AHIRATI MINEL-HASIRIN
3.86: KEJFE JEHDI ALLAHU KAWMËN KEFERU BA’DE ‘IMANIHIM WE SHEHIDU ‘ENNE RASULE HEKKUN WE XHA’EHUMUL-BEJJINATU WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
3.88: HALIDINE FIHA LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
3.89: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE TABU MIN BA’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.90: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BA’DE ‘IMANIHIM THUMME EZDADU KUFRËN LEN TUKBELE TEWBETUHUM WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMU ED-DALLUN
3.91: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE MATU WE HUM KUFFARUN FELEN JUKBELE MIN ‘EHEDIHIM MIL’UL-’ERDI DHEHEBËN WE LEW EFTEDA BIHI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMUN WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.92: LEN TENALUL-BIRRA HETTA TUNFIKU MIMMA TUHIBBUNE WE MA TUNFIKU MIN SHEJ’IN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
3.93: KUL-LUT-TA’AMI KANE HILLËN LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘IL-LA MA HERRAME ‘ISRA’ILU ‘ALA NEFSIHI MIN KABLI ‘EN TUNEZZELET-TEWRËTU KUL FE’TU BIT-TEWRËTI FATLUHA ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.94: FEMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE MIN BA’DI DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
3.95: KUL SEDEKAL-LAHU FE ETTEBI’U MILLETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
3.96: ‘INNE ‘EWWELE BEJTIN WUDI’A LILNNASI LELLEDHI BIBEKKETE MUBARAKËN WE HUDEN LIL’ALEMIN
3.97: FIHI ‘AJATUN BEJJINATUN MEKAMU ‘IBRAHIME WE MEN DEHALEHU KANE ‘AMINËN WE LIL-LEHI ‘ALA NASI HIXHXHUL-BEJTI MENI ESTETA’A ‘ILEJHI SEBILËN WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN ‘ANIL-’ALEMIN
3.98: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LIME TEKFURUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU SHEHIDUN ‘ALA MA TA’MELUN
3.99: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LIME TESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI MEN ‘AMENE TEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE ‘ENTUM SHUHEDA’U WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
3.100: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TUTI’U FERIKËN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE JERUDDUKUM BA’DE ‘IMANIKUM KAFIRIN
3.101: WE KEJFE TEKFURUNE WE ‘ENTUM TUTLA ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATU ALLAHI WE FIKUM RASULUHU WE MEN JA’TESIM BIL-LAHI FEKAD HUDIJE ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
3.102: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE HEKKA TUKATIHI WE LA TEMUTUNNE ‘IL-LA WE ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
3.103: WE A’TESIMU BIHEBLI ALLAHI XHEMI’ËN WE LA TEFERRAKU WE EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH KUNTUM ‘A’DA’EN FE’ELLEFE BEJNE KULUBIKUM FE’ESBEHTUM BINI’METIHI ‘IHWANËN WE KUNTUM ‘ALA SHEFA HUFRATIN MINE NARI FE’ENKADHEKUM MINHA KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
3.104: WE LTEKUN MINKUM ‘UMMETUN JED’UNE ‘ILAL-HAJRI WE JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
3.105: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE TEFERRAKU WE EHTELEFU MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-BEJJINATU WE ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
3.106: JEWME TEBJEDDU WUXHUHUN WE TESWEDDU WUXHUHUN FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ESWEDDET WUXHUHUHUM ‘EKEFERTUM BA’DE ‘IMANIKUM FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
3.107: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE EBJEDDET WUXHUHUHUM FEFI RAHMETI ALLAHI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
3.108: TILKE ‘AJATU ALLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HEKKI WE MALLAHU JURIDU DHULMËN LIL’ALEMIN
3.109: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
3.110: KUNTUM HAJRA ‘UMMETIN ‘UHRIXHET LILNNASI TE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE TENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LEW ‘AMENE ‘EHLUL-KITABI LEKANE HAJRËN LEHUM MINHUMUL-MU’UMINUNE WE ‘EKTHERUHUMUL-FASIKUN
3.111: LEN JEDURRUKUM ‘IL-LA ‘EDHEN WE ‘IN JUKATILUKUM JUWELLUKUMUL-’EDBARA THUMME LA JUNSERUN
3.112: DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMU EDH-DHILLETU ‘EJNE MA THUKIFU ‘IL-LA BIHEBLIN MINEL-LAHI WE HEBLIN MINE NASI WE BA’U BIGADEBIN MINEL-LAHI WE DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMUL-MESKENETU DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KANU JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE JEKTULUNEL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KANU JA’TEDUN
3.113: LEJSU SEWA’EN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘UMMETUN KA’IMETUN JETLUNE ‘AJATI ALLAHI ‘ANA’EL-LEJLI WE HUM JESXHUDUN
3.114: JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE ‘ULA’IKE MINE SALIHIN
3.115: WE MA JEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FELEN JUKFERUHU WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIL-MUTTEKIN
3.116: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWALUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
3.117: METHELU MA JUNFIKUNE FI HEDHIHIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA KEMETHELI RIHIN FIHA SIRRUN ‘ESABET HERTHE KAWMIN DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM FE’EHLEKET/HU WE MA DHELEMEHUMU ALLAHU WE LEKIN ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
3.118: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU BITANETEN MIN DUNIKUM LA JE’LUNEKUM HABALËN WE DDU MA ‘ANITTUM KAD BEDETIL-BEGDA’U MIN ‘EFWAHIHIM WE MA TUHFI SUDURUHUM ‘EKBERU KAD BEJJENNA LEKUMUL-’AJATI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’KILUN
3.119: HA’ENTUM ‘ULA’I TUHIBBUNEHUM WE LA JUHIBBUNEKUM WE TU’UMINUNE BIL-KITABI KUL-LIHI WE ‘IDHA LEKUKUM KALU ‘AMENNA WE ‘IDHA HALEW ‘ADDU ‘ALEJKUMUL-’ENAMILE MINEL-GAJDHI KUL MUTU BIGAJDHIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
3.120: ‘IN TEMSESKUM HESENETUN TESU’UHUM WE ‘IN TUSIBKUM SEJJI’ETUN JEFRAHU BIHA WE ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU LA JEDURRUKUM KEJDUHUM SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITU
3.121: WE ‘IDH GADEWTE MIN ‘EHLIKE TUBEWWI’UL-MU’UMININE MEKA’IDE LILKITALI WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.122: ‘IDH HEMMET TA’IFETANI MINKUM ‘EN TEFSHELA WEL-LAHU WELIJUHUMA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
3.123: WE LEKAD NESERAKUMU ALLAHU BIBEDRIN WE ‘ENTUM ‘EDHIL-LETUN FE ETTEKU ELLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
3.124: ‘IDH TEKULU LILMU’UMININE ‘ELEN JEKFIJEKUM ‘EN JUMIDDEKUM RABBUKUM BITHELATHETI ‘ALAFIN MINEL-MELA’IKETI MUNZELIN
3.125: BELA ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU WE JE’TUKUM MIN FEWRIHIM HADHA JUMDIDKUM RABBUKUM BIHAMSETI ‘ALAFIN MINEL-MELA’IKETI MUSEWWIMIN
3.126: WE MA XHE’ALEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA BUSHRA LEKUM WE LITETME’INNE KULUBUKUM BIHI WE MA NESRU ‘IL-LA MIN ‘INDI ALLAHIL-’AZIZIL-HEKIM
3.127: LIJEKTE’A TERAFËN MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EW JEKBITEHUM FEJENKALIBU HA’IBIN
3.128: LEJSE LEKE MINEL-’EMRI SHEJ’UN ‘EW JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘EW JU’ADHDHIBEHUM FE’INNEHUM DHALIMUN
3.129: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.130: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TE’KULU ER-RIBA ‘ED’AFËN MUDA’AFETEN WE ETTEKU ELLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
3.132: WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
3.133: WE SARI’U ‘ILA MEGFIRATIN MIN RABBIKUM WE XHENNETIN ‘ARDUHA SEMAWATU WEL-’ERDU ‘U’IDDET LILMUTTEKIN
3.134: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE FI SERRA’I WE ED-DERRA’I WEL-KADHIMINEL-GAJDHE WEL-’AFINE ‘ANI NASI WEL-LAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
3.135: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA FE’ALU FAHISHETEN ‘EW DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM DHEKERU ELLAHE FASTEGFERU LIDHUNUBIHIM WE MEN JEGFIRU EDH-DHUNUBE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE LEM JUSIRRU ‘ALA MA FE’ALU WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.136: ‘ULA’IKE XHEZA’UUHUM MEGFIRATUN MIN RABBIHIM WE XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE NI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
3.137: KAD HALET MIN KABLIKUM SUNENUN FESIRU FIL-’ERDI FANDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
3.138: HADHA BEJANUN LILNNASI WE HUDEN WE MEW’IDHETUN LILMUTTEKIN
3.139: WE LA TEHINU WE LA TEHZENU WE ‘ENTUMUL-’A’LEWNE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
3.140: ‘IN JEMSESKUM KARHUN FEKAD MESSEL-KAWME KARHUN MITHLUHU WE TILKEL-’EJJAMU NUDAWILUHA BEJNE NASI WE LIJA’LEMEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE JETTEHIDHE MINKUM SHUHEDA’E WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
3.142: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TEDHULUL-XHENNETE WE LEMMA JA’LEMI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU MINKUM WE JA’LEME SABIRIN
3.143: WE LEKAD KUNTUM TETEMENNEWNL-MEWTE MIN KABLI ‘EN TELKAWHU FEKAD RA’EJTUMUHU WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
3.144: WE MA MUHEMMEDUN ‘IL-LA RASULUN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHI ER-RUSULU ‘EFE’IN MATE ‘EW KUTILE ENKALEBTUM ‘ALA ‘A’KABIKUM WE MEN JENKALIB ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI FELEN JEDURRAL-LAHE SHEJ’ËN WE SEJEXHZI ALLAHU ESH-SHAKIRIN
3.145: WE MA KANE LINEFSIN ‘EN TEMUTE ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI KITABËN MU’UEXHXHELËN WE MEN JURID THEWABE ED-DUNJA NU’UTIHI MINHA WE MEN JURID THEWABEL-’AHIRATI NU’UTIHI MINHA WE SENEXHZI ESH-SHAKIRIN
3.146: WE KE’EJJIN MIN NEBIJIN KATELE ME’AHU RIBBIJUNE KETHIRUN FEMA WEHENU LIMA ‘ESABEHUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE MA DA’UFU WE MA ESTEKANU WEL-LAHU JUHIBBU SABIRIN
3.147: WE MA KANE KAWLEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU RABBENA EGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE ‘ISRAFENA FI ‘EMRINA WE THEBBIT ‘EKDAMENA WE ENSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KAFIRIN
3.148: FE’ATAHUMU ALLAHU THEWABE ED-DUNJA WE HUSNE THEWABIL-’AHIRATI WEL-LAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
3.149: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TUTI’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU JERUDDUKUM ‘ALA ‘A’KABIKUM FETENKALIBU HASIRIN
3.150: BELI ALLAHU MEWLAKUM WE HUWE HAJRU NASIRIN
3.151: SENULKI FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE KEFERU ER-RU’BE BIMA ‘ESHRAKU BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE ME’WAHUMU NARU WE BI’SE METHWA EDH-DHALIMIN
3.152: WE LEKAD SEDEKAKUMU ALLAHU WA’DEHU ‘IDH TEHUSSUNEHUM BI’IDHNIHI HETTA ‘IDHA FESHILTUM WE TENAZA’TUM FIL-’EMRI WE ‘ASEJTUM MIN BA’DI MA ‘ERAKUM MA TUHIBBUNE MINKUM MEN JURIDU ED-DUNJA WE MINKUM MEN JURIDUL-’AHIRATE THUMME SERAFEKUM ‘ANHUM LIJEBTELIJEKUM WE LEKAD ‘AFA ‘ANKUM WEL-LAHU DHU FEDLIN ‘ALEL-MU’UMININ
3.153: ‘IDH TUS’IDUNE WE LA TELWUNE ‘ALA ‘EHEDIN WE RASULU JED’UKUM FI ‘UHRAKUM FE’ETHABEKUM GAMMËN BIGAMMIN LIKEJLA TEHZENU ‘ALA MA FATEKUM WE LA MA ‘ESABEKUM WEL-LAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
3.154: THUMME ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKUM MIN BA’DIL-GAMMI ‘EMENETEN NU’ASËN JEGSHA TA’IFETEN MINKUM WE TA’IFETUN KAD ‘EHEMMET/HUM ‘ENFUSUHUM JEDHUNNUNE BIL-LAHI GAJRAL-HEKKI DHENNEL-XHAHILIJETI JEKULUNE HEL LENA MINEL-’EMRI MIN SHEJ’IN KUL ‘INNEL-’EMRA KUL-LEHU LIL-LAHI JUHFUNE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM MA LA JUBDUNE LEKE JEKULUNE LEW KANE LENA MINEL-’EMRI SHEJ’UN MA KUTILNA HAHUNA KUL LEW KUNTUM FI BUJUTIKUM LEBERAZEL-LEDHINE KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KATLU ‘ILA MEDAXHI’IHIM WE LIJEBTELIJEL-LAHU MA FI SUDURIKUM WE LIJUMEHHISE MA FI KULUBIKUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
3.155: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TEWEL-LEW MINKUM JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI ‘INNEMA ESTEZEL-LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU BIBA’DI MA KESEBU WE LEKAD ‘AFALLAHU ‘ANHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN HELIMU
3.156: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KALU LI’HWANIHIM ‘IDHA DERABU FIL-’ERDI ‘EW KANU GUZZEN LEW KANU ‘INDENA MA MATU WE MA KUTILU LIJEXH’ALEL-LAHU DHALIKE HESRATEN FI KULUBIHIM WEL-LAHU JUHJI WE JUMITU WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
3.157: WE LE’IN KUTILTUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘EW MUTTUM LEMEGFIRATUN MINEL-LAHI WE RAHMETUN HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
3.158: WE LE’IN MUTTUM ‘EW KUTILTUM LE’ILA ALLAHI TUHSHERUN
3.159: FEBIMA RAHMETIN MINEL-LAHI LINTE LEHUM WE LEW KUNTE FEDHDHËN GALIDHEL-KALBI LANFEDDU MIN HEWLIKE FA’FU ‘ANHUM WE ESTEGFIR LEHUM WE SHAWIRHUM FIL-’EMRI FE’IDHA ‘AZEMTE FETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTEWEKKILIN
3.160: ‘IN JENSURKUMU ALLAHU FELA GALIBE LEKUM WE ‘IN JEHDHULKUM FEMEN DHAL-LEDHI JENSURUKUM MIN BA’DIHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
3.161: WE MA KANE LINEBIJIN ‘EN JEGUL-LE WE MEN JEGLUL JE’TI BIMA GAL-LE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI THUMME TUWEFFA KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
3.162: ‘EFEMENI ETTEBE’A RIDWANEL-LAHI KEMEN BA’E BISEHATIN MINEL-LAHI WE ME’WAHU XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MESIR
3.163: HUM DERAXHATUN ‘INDEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
3.164: LEKAD MENNEL-LAHU ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE ‘IDH BE’ATHE FIHIM RASULËN MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIHI WE JUZEKKIHIM WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘IN KANU MIN KABLU LEFI DELALIN MUBINI
3.165: ‘EWELEMMA ‘ESABETKUM MUSIBETUN KAD ‘ESEBTUM MITHLEJHA KULTUM ‘ENNA HADHA KUL HUWE MIN ‘INDI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.166: WE MA ‘ESABEKUM JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI FEBI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE LIJA’LEMEL-MU’UMININ
3.167: WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE NAFEKU WE KILE LEHUM TA’ALEW KATILU FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘EW EDFA’U KALU LEW NA’LEMU KITALËN LATTEBA’NAKUM HUM LILKUFRI JEWME’IDHIN ‘EKRABU MINHUM LIL’IMANI JEKULUNE BI’EFWHIHIM MA LEJSE FI KULUBIHIM WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JEKTUMUN
3.168: EL-LEDHINE KALU LI’HWANIHIM WE KA’ADU LEW ‘ETA’UNA MA KUTILU KUL FADRA’U ‘AN ‘ENFUSIKUMUL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.169: WE LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KUTILU FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘EMWATËN BEL ‘EHJA’UN ‘INDE RABBIHIM JURZEKUN
3.170: FERIHINE BIMA ‘ATAHUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE JESTEBSHIRUNE BIEL-LEDHINE LEM JELHEKU BIHIM MIN HALFIHIM ‘ELLA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
3.171: JESTEBSHIRUNE BINI’METIN MINEL-LAHI WE FEDLIN WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MU’UMININ
3.172: EL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIL-LAHI WE RASULI MIN BA’DI MA ‘ESABEHUMUL-KARHU LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU MINHUM WE ETTEKAW ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
3.173: EL-LEDHINE KALE LEHUMU NASU ‘INNE NASE KAD XHEMA’U LEKUM FAHSHEWHUM FEZADEHUM ‘IMANËN WE KALU HESBUNALLAHU WE NI’MEL-WEKIL
3.174: FANKALEBU BINI’METIN MINEL-LAHI WE FEDLIN LEM JEMSES/HUM SU’UN WE ETTEBA’U RIDWANEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU DHU FEDLIN ‘ADHIMI
3.175: ‘INNEMA DHELIKUMU ESH-SHEJTANU JUHAWWIFU ‘EWLIJA’EHU FELA TEHAFUHUM WE HAFUNI ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
3.176: WE LA JEHZUNKEL-LEDHINE JUSARI’UNE FIL-KUFRI ‘INNEHUM LEN JEDURRU ELLAHE SHEJ’ËN JURIDU ALLAHU ‘ELLA JEXH’ALE LEHUM HEDHDHËN FIL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
3.177: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ESHTERAWL-KUFRA BIL-’IMANI LEN JEDURRU ELLAHE SHEJ’ËN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.178: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEMA NUMLI LEHUM HAJRUN LI’ENFUSIHIM ‘INNEMA NUMLI LEHUM LIJEZDADU ‘ITHMËN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
3.179: MA KANEL-LAHU LIJEDHERAL-MU’UMININE ‘ALA MA ‘ENTUM ‘ALEJHI HETTA JEMIZEL-HABITHE MINET-TEJJIBI WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJUTLI’AKUM ‘ALEL-GAJBI WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JEXHTEBI MIN RUSULIHI MEN JESHA’U FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE ‘IN TU’UMINU WE TETTEKU FELEKUM ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
3.180: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE BIMA ‘ATAHUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI HUWE HAJRËN LEHUM BEL HUWE SHERRUN LEHUM SEJUTEWWEKUNE MA BEHILU BIHI JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE LIL-LEHI MIRATHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
3.181: LEKAD SEMI’ALLAHU KAWLEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE FEKIRUN WE NEHNU ‘EGNIJA’U SENEKTUBU MA KALU WE KATLEHUMUL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE NEKULU DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
3.182: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIKUM WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LEJSE BIDHEL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
3.183: EL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AHIDE ‘ILEJNA ‘ELLA NU’UMINE LIRASULIN HETTA JE’TIJENA BIKURBANIN TE’KULUHU NARU KUL KAD XHA’EKUM RUSULUN MIN KABLI BIL-BEJJINATI WE BIEL-LEDHI KULTUM FELIME KATELTUMUHUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.184: FE’IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKAD KUDHDHIBE RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE XHA’U BIL-BEJJINATI WE EZ-ZUBURI WEL-KITABIL-MUNIR
3.185: KUL-LU NEFSIN DHA’IKATUL-MEWTI WE ‘INNEMA TUWEFFEWNE ‘UXHURAKUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FEMEN ZUHZIHE ‘ANI NARI WE ‘UDHILEL-XHENNETE FEKAD FAZE WE MAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA ‘IL-LA META’UL-GURUR
3.186: LETUBLEWUNNE FI ‘EMWALIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM WE LETESMA’UNNE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘EDHEN KETHIRËN WE ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU FE’INNE DHALIKE MIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
3.187: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHEL-LAHU MITHAKAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE LETUBEJJINUNNEHU LILNNASI WE LA TEKTUMUNEHU FENEBEDHUHU WERA’E DHUHURIHIM WE ESHTERAW BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN FEBI’SE MA JESHTERUN
3.188: LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE JEFRAHUNE BIMA ‘ETEW WE JUHIBBUNE ‘EN JUHMEDU BIMA LEM JEF’ALU FELA TEHSEBENNEHUM BIMEFAZETIN MINEL-’ADHABI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.189: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.190: ‘INNE FI HALKI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI LE’AJATIN LI’WLIL-’ELBAB
3.191: EL-LEDHINE JEDHKURUNEL-LAHE KIJAMËN WE KU’UDËN WE ‘ALA XHUNUBIHIM WE JETEFEKKERUNE FI HALKI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI RABBENA MA HALEKTE HADHA BATILËN SUBHANEKE FEKINA ‘ADHABE NAR
3.192: RABBENA ‘INNEKE MEN TUDHILI NARA FEKAD ‘EHZEJTEHU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
3.193: RABBENA ‘INNENA SEMI’NA MUNADIËN JUNADI LIL’IMANI ‘EN ‘AMINU BIRABBIKUM FE’AMENNA RABBENA FAGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE KEFFIR ‘ANNA SEJJI’ATINA WE TEWEFFENA ME’AL-’EBRAR
3.194: RABBENA WE ‘ATINA MA WE’ADTENA ‘ALA RUSULIKE WE LA TUHZINA JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘INNEKE LA TUHLIFUL-MI’AD
3.195: FASTEXHABE LEHUM RABBUHUM ‘ENNI LA ‘UDI’U ‘AMELE ‘AMILIN MINKUM MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA BA’DUKUM MIN BA’DIN FE-EL-LEDHINE HAXHERU WE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIJARIHIM WE ‘UDHU FI SEBILI WE KATELU WE KUTILU LE’UKEFFIRANNE ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LE’UDHILENNEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU THEWABËN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU ‘INDEHU HUSNU ETH-THEWAB
3.197: META’UN KALILUN THUMME ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MIHAD
3.198: LEKINIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM LEHUM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA NUZULËN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WE MA ‘INDEL-LAHI HAJRUN LIL’EBRAR
3.199: WE ‘INNE MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEMEN JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHIM HASHI’INE LIL-LAHI LA JESHTERUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
3.200: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESBIRU WE SABIRU WE RABITU WE ETTEKU ELLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN

4.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUMUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WAHIDETIN WE HALEKA MINHA ZEWXHEHA WE BETHTHE MINHUMA RIXHALËN KETHIRËN WE NISA’EN WE ETTEKU ELLAHEL-LEDHI TETESA’ELUNE BIHI WEL-’ERHAME ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALEJKUM RAKIBË
4.2: WE ‘ATUL-JETAMA ‘EMWALEHUM WE LA TETEBEDDELUL-HABITHE BIT-TEJJIBI WE LA TE’KULU ‘EMWALEHUM ‘ILA ‘EMWALIKUM ‘INNEHU KANE HUBËN KEBIRË
4.3: WE ‘IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA TUKSITU FIL-JETAMA FANKIHU MA TABE LEKUM MINE NISA’ METHNA WE THULATHE WE RUBA’A FE’IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA TA’DILU FEWAHIDETEN ‘EW MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘ELLA TA’UL
4.4: WE ‘ATU NISA’ SEDUKATIHINNE NIHLETEN FE’IN TIBNE LEKUM ‘AN SHEJ’IN MINHU NEFSËN FEKULUHU HENI’ËN MERI’Ë
4.5: WE LA TU’UTU SUFEHA’E ‘EMWALEKUMU EL-LETI XHE’ALEL-LAHU LEKUM KIJAMËN WE ERZUKUHUM FIHA WE EKSUHUM WE KULU LEHUM KAWLËN MA’RUFË
4.6: WE EBTELUL-JETAMA HETTA ‘IDHA BELEGU NIKAHE FE’IN ‘ANESTUM MINHUM RUSHDËN FADFA’U ‘ILEJHIM ‘EMWALEHUM WE LA TE’KULUHA ‘ISRAFËN WE BIDARËN ‘EN JEKBERU WE MEN KANE GANIJËN FELJESTA’FIF WE MEN KANE FEKIRËN FELJE’KUL BIL-MA’RUFI FE’IDHA DEFA’TUM ‘ILEJHIM ‘EMWALEHUM FE’ESH/HIDU ‘ALEJHIM WE KEFA BIL-LAHI HESIBË
4.7: LILRRIXHALI NESIBUN MIMMA TERAKEL-WALIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE WE LILNNISA’I NESIBUN MIMMA TERAKEL-WALIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE MIMMA KAL-LE MINHU ‘EW KETHURA NESIBËN MEFRUDË
4.8: WE ‘IDHA HEDERAL-KISMETE ‘ULUL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINU FARZUKUHUM MINHU WE KULU LEHUM KAWLËN MA’RUFË
4.9: WE LIEHSHEL-LEDHINE LEW TERAKU MIN HALFIHIM DHURRIJETEN DI’AFËN HAFU ‘ALEJHIM FELJETTEKU ELLAHE WE LIEKULU KAWLËN SEDIDË
4.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JE’KULUNE ‘EMWALEL-JETAMA DHULMËN ‘INNEMA JE’KULUNE FI BUTUNIHIM NARËN WE SEJESLEWNE SA’IRË
4.11: JUSIKUMU ALLAHU FI ‘EWLADIKUM LILDHDHEKERI MITHLU HEDHDHIL-’UNTHEJEJNI FE’IN KUNNE NISA’EN FEWKA ETHNETEJNI FELEHUNNE THULUTHA MA TERAKE WE ‘IN KANET WAHIDETEN FELEHA NISFU WE LI’EBEWEJHI LIKUL-LI WAHIDIN MINHUMA SUDUSU MIMMA TERAKE ‘IN KANE LEHU WELEDUN FE’IN LEM JEKUN LEHU WELEDUN WE WERITHEHU ‘EBEWAHU FELI’EMMIHI ETH-THULUTHU FE’IN KANE LEHU ‘IHWETUN FELI’EMMIHI SUDUSU MIN BA’DI WESIJETIN JUSI BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN ‘ABA’UUKUM WE ‘EBNA’UUKUM LA TEDRUNE ‘EJJUHUM ‘EKRABU LEKUM NEF’ËN FERIDETEN MINEL-LAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.12: WE LEKUM NISFU MA TERAKE ‘EZWAXHUKUM ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEHUNNE WELEDUN FE’IN KANE LEHUNNE WELEDUN FELEKUMU ER-RUBU’U MIMMA TERAKNE MIN BA’DI WESIJETIN JUSINE BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN WE LEHUNNE ER-RUBU’U MIMMA TERAKTUM ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEKUM WELEDUN FE’IN KANE LEKUM WELEDUN FELEHUNNE ETH-THUMUNU MIMMA TERAKTUM MIN BA’DI WESIJETIN TUSUNE BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN WE ‘IN KANE RAXHULUN JURATHU KELALETEN ‘EW EMRA’ETUN WE LEHU ‘EHUN ‘EW ‘UHTUN FELIKUL-LI WAHIDIN MINHUMA SUDUSU FE’IN KANU ‘EKTHERA MIN DHALIKE FEHUM SHURAKA’U FI ETH-THULUTHI MIN BA’DI WESIJETIN JUSA BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN GAJRA MUDARRIN WESIJETEN MINEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HELIMU
4.13: TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI WE MEN JUTI’I ELLAHE WE RASULEHU JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
