4.14: WE MEN JA’SI ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE JETE’ADDE HUDUDEHU JUDHILHU NARËN HALIDËN FIHA WE LEHU ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
4.15: WEL-LATI JE’TINEL-FAHISHETE MIN NISA’IKUM FASTESH/HIDU ‘ALEJHINNE ‘ERBE’ATEN MINKUM FE’IN SHEHIDU FE’EMSIKUHUNNE FIL-BUJUTI HETTA JETEWEFFAHUNNEL-MEWTU ‘EW JEXH’ALEL-LAHU LEHUNNE SEBILË
4.16: WEL-LEDHANI JE’TIJANIHA MINKUM FE’ADHUHUMA FE’IN TABA WE ‘ESLEHA FE’A’RIDU ‘ANHUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE TEWWABËN RAHIMË
4.17: ‘INNEMAT-TEWBETU ‘ALA ALLAHI LIL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SU’E BIXHEHALETIN THUMME JETUBUNE MIN KARIBIN FE’ULA’IKE JETUBU ALLAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.18: WE LEJSETIT-TEWBETU LIL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI HETTA ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEHUMUL-MEWTU KALE ‘INNI TUBTUL-’ANE WE LAL-LEDHINE JEMUTUNE WE HUM KUFFARUN ‘ULA’IKE ‘A’TEDNA LEHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
4.19: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA JEHIL-LU LEKUM ‘EN TERITHU NISA’ KERHËN WE LA TA’DULUHUNNE LITEDH/HEBU BIBA’DI MA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TINE BIFAHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN WE ‘ASHIRUHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI FE’IN KERIHTUMUHUNNE FE’ASA ‘EN TEKRAHU SHEJ’ËN WE JEXH’ALEL-LAHU FIHI HAJRËN KETHIRË
4.20: WE ‘IN ‘ERADTUMU ESTIBDALE ZEWXHIN MEKANE ZEWXHIN WE ‘ATEJTUM ‘IHDAHUNNE KINTARËN FELA TE’HUDHU MINHU SHEJ’ËN ‘ETE’HUDHUNEHU BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.21: WE KEJFE TE’HUDHUNEHU WE KAD ‘EFDA BA’DUKUM ‘ILA BA’DIN WE ‘EHADHNE MINKUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
4.22: WE LA TENKIHU MA NEKEHE ‘ABA’UUKUM MINE NISA’ ‘IL-LA MA KAD SELEFE ‘INNEHU KANE FAHISHETEN WE MEKTËN WE SA’E SEBILË
4.23: HURRIMET ‘ALEJKUM ‘UMMEHATUKUM WE BENATUKUM WE ‘EHAWATUKUM WE ‘AMMATUKUM WE HALATUKUM WE BENATUL-’EHI WE BENATUL-’UHTI WE ‘UMMEHATUKUMUL-LATI ‘ERDA’NEKUM WE ‘EHAWATUKUM MINE RADA’ATI WE ‘UMMEHATU NISA’IKUM WE RABA’IBUKUMUL-LATI FI HUXHURIKUM MIN NISA’IKUMUL-LATI DEHALTUM BIHINNE FE’IN LEM TEKUNU DEHALTUM BIHINNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM WE HELA’ILU ‘EBNA’IKUMUL-LEDHINE MIN ‘ESLABIKUM WE ‘EN TEXHMA’U BEJNEL-’UHTEJNI ‘IL-LA MA KAD SELEFE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.24: WEL-MUHSENATU MINE NISA’ ‘IL-LA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM KITABEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM MA WERA’E DHALIKUM ‘EN TEBTEGU BI’EMWALIKUM MUHSININE GAJRA MUSAFIHINE FEMA ESTEMTA’TUM BIHI MINHUNNE FE’ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE FERIDETEN WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA TERADEJTUM BIHI MIN BA’DIL-FERIDETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.25: WE MEN LEM JESTETI’ MINKUM TEWLËN ‘EN JENKIHEL-MUHSENATIL-MU’UMINATI FEMIN MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM MIN FETEJATIKUMUL-MU’UMINATI WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’IMANIKUM BA’DUKUM MIN BA’DIN FANKIHUHUNNE BI’IDHNI ‘EHLIHINNE WE ‘ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI MUHSENATIN GAJRA MUSAFIHATIN WE LA MUTTEHIDHATI ‘EHDANIN FE’IDHA ‘UHSINNE FE’IN ‘ETEJNE BIFAHISHETIN FE’ALEJHINNE NISFU MA ‘ALEL-MUHSENATI MINEL-’ADHABI DHALIKE LIMEN HASHIJEL-’ANETE MINKUM WE ‘EN TESBIRU HAJRUN LEKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
4.26: JURIDU ALLAHU LIJUBEJJINE LEKUM WE JEHDIJEKUM SUNENEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM WE JETUBE ‘ALEJKUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
4.27: WEL-LAHU JURIDU ‘EN JETUBE ‘ALEJKUM WE JURIDUL-LEDHINE JETTEBI’UNE ESH-SHEHEWATI ‘EN TEMILU MEJLËN ‘ADHIMË
4.28: JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUHAFFIFE ‘ANKUM WE HULIKAL-’INSANU DA’IFË
4.29: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TE’KULU ‘EMWALEKUM BEJNEKUM BIL-BATILI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE TIXHARATEN ‘AN TERADIN MINKUM WE LA TEKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUM RAHIMË
4.30: WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE ‘UDWANËN WE DHULMËN FESEWFE NUSLIHI NARËN WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRË
4.31: ‘IN TEXHTENIBU KEBA’IRA MA TUNHEWNE ‘ANHU NUKEFFIR ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE NUDHILKUM MUDHALËN KERIMË
4.32: WE LA TETEMENNEW MA FEDDELEL-LAHU BIHI BA’DEKUM ‘ALA BA’DIN LILRRIXHALI NESIBUN MIMMA EKTESEBU WE LILNNISA’I NESIBUN MIMMA EKTESEBNE WE ES’ELU ELLAHE MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
4.33: WE LIKUL-LIN XHE’ALNA MEWALIJE MIMMA TERAKEL-WALIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AKADET ‘EJMANUKUM FE’ATUHUM NESIBEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDË
4.34: ER-RIXHALU KAWWAMUNE ‘ALA NISA’ BIMA FEDDELEL-LAHU BA’DEHUM ‘ALA BA’DIN WE BIMA ‘ENFEKU MIN ‘EMWALIHIM FALSSALIHATU KANITATUN HAFIDHATUN LILGAJBI BIMA HEFIDHEL-LAHU WEL-LATI TEHAFUNE NUSHUZEHUNNE FA’IDHUHUNNE WE EHXHURUHUNNE FIL-MEDAXHI’I WE EDRIBUHUNNE FE’IN ‘ETA’NEKUM FELA TEBGU ‘ALEJHINNE SEBILËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIJËN KEBIRË
4.35: WE ‘IN HIFTUM SHIKAKA BEJNIHIMA FAB’ATHU HEKEMËN MIN ‘EHLIHI WE HEKEMËN MIN ‘EHLIHA ‘IN JURIDA ‘ISLAHËN JUWEFFIKI ALLAHU BEJNEHUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HABIRË
4.36: WE A’BUDU ELLAHE WE LA TUSHRIKU BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE BIL-WALIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE BIDHIL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WEL-XHARI DHIL-KURBA WEL-XHARIL-XHUNUBI WE SAHIBI BIL-XHENBI WE EBNI SEBILI WE MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU MEN KANE MUHTALËN FEHURË
4.37: EL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE WE JE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BUHLI WE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ATAHUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE ‘A’TEDNA LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
4.38: WEL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUM RI’A’E NASI WE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LA BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MEN JEKUNI ESH-SHEJTANU LEHU KARINËN FESA’E KARINË
4.39: WE MADHA ‘ALEJHIM LEW ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKAHUMU ALLAHU WE KANEL-LAHU BIHIM ‘ALIMË
4.40: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEDHLIMU MITHKALE DHERRATIN WE ‘IN TEKU HESENETEN JUDA’IFHA WE JU’UTI MIN LEDUNHU ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.41: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA XHI’NA MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN BISHEHIDIN WE XHI’NA BIKE ‘ALA HA’UULA’ SHEHIDË
4.42: JEWME’IDHIN JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE ‘ASEW RASULE LEW TUSEWWA BIHIMUL-’ERDU WE LA JEKTUMUNEL-LAHE HEDITHË
4.43: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKRABU SELËTE WE ‘ENTUM SUKARA HETTA TA’LEMU MA TEKULUNE WE LA XHUNUBËN ‘IL-LA ‘ABIRI SEBILIN HETTA TEGTESILU WE ‘IN KUNTUM MERDA ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN ‘EW XHA’E ‘EHEDUN MINKUM MINEL-GA’ITI ‘EW LAMESTUMU NISA’ FELEM TEXHIDU MA’EN FETEJEMMEMU SA’IDËN TEJJIBËN FAMSEHU BIWUXHUHIKUM WE ‘EJDIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AFUWËN GAFURË
4.44: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JESHTERUNE ED-DELALETE WE JURIDUNE ‘EN TEDIL-LU SEBIL
4.45: WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’A’DA’IKUM WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WELIJËN WE KEFA BIL-LAHI NESIRË
4.46: MINEL-LEDHINE HADU JUHERRIFUNEL-KELIME ‘AN MEWADI’IHI WE JEKULUNE SEMI’NA WE ‘ASEJNA WE ESMA’ GAJRA MUSMA’IN WE RA’INA LEJJËN BI’ELSINETIHIM WE TA’NËN FI ED-DINI WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ESMA’ WE ENDHURNA LEKANE HAJRËN LEHUM WE ‘EKWEME WE LEKIN LE’ANEHUMU ALLAHU BIKUFRIHIM FELA JU’UMINUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.47: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE ‘AMINU BIMA NEZZELNA MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN NETMISE WUXHUHËN FENERUDDEHA ‘ALA ‘EDBARIHA ‘EW NEL’ANEHUM KEMA LE’ANNA ‘ESHABE SEBTI WE KANE ‘EMRU ALLAHI MEF’ULË
4.48: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEGFIRU ‘EN JUSHRAKE BIHI WE JEGFIRU MA DUNE DHALIKE LIMEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKADI EFTERA ‘ITHMËN ‘ADHIMË
4.49: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE JUZEKKUNE ‘ENFUSEHUM BELI ALLAHU JUZEKKI MEN JESHA’U WE LA JUDHLEMUNE FETILË
4.50: ENDHUR KEJFE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE KEFA BIHI ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.51: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JU’UMINUNE BIL-XHIBTI WET-TAGUTI WE JEKULUNE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU HA’UULA’ ‘EHDA MINEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SEBILË
4.52: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE LE’ANEHUMU ALLAHU WE MEN JEL’ANI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU NESIRË
4.53: ‘EM LEHUM NESIBUN MINEL-MULKI FE’IDHËN LA JU’UTUNE NASE NEKIRË
4.54: ‘EM JEHSUDUNE NASE ‘ALA MA ‘ATAHUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI FEKAD ‘ATEJNA ‘ALE ‘IBRAHIMEL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘ATEJNAHUM MULKËN ‘ADHIMË
4.55: FEMINHUM MEN ‘AMENE BIHI WE MINHUM MEN SEDDE ‘ANHU WE KEFA BIXHEHENNEME SA’IRË
4.56: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATINA SEWFE NUSLIHIM NARËN KUL-LEMA NEDIXHET XHULUDUHUM BEDDELNAHUM XHULUDËN GAJRAHA LIJEDHUKUL-’ADHABE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.57: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SENUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN LEHUM FIHA ‘EZWAXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE NUDHILUHUM DHIL-LA DHELILË
4.58: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURUKUM ‘EN TU’UEDDUL-’EMANATI ‘ILA ‘EHLIHA WE ‘IDHA HEKEMTUM BEJNE NASI ‘EN TEHKUMU BIL-’ADLI ‘INNALL-LLAHE NI’IMMA JA’IDHUKUM BIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE SEMI’ËN BESIRË
4.59: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE ‘ULIL-’EMRI MINKUM FE’IN TENAZA’TUM FI SHEJ’IN FERUDDUHU ‘ILA ALLAHI WE RASULI ‘IN KUNTUM TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI DHALIKE HAJRUN WE ‘EHSENU TE’WILË
4.60: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE JEZ’UMUNE ‘ENNEHUM ‘AMENU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE JURIDUNE ‘EN JETEHAKEMU ‘ILAT-TAGUTI WE KAD ‘UMIRU ‘EN JEKFURU BIHI WE JURIDU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘EN JUDIL-LEHUM DELALËN BA’IDË
4.61: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM TA’ALEW ‘ILA MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU WE ‘ILA RASULI RA’EJTEL-MUNAFIKINE JESUDDUNE ‘ANKE SUDUDË
4.62: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA ‘ESABET/HUM MUSIBETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM THUMME XHA’UKE JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI ‘IN ‘ERADNA ‘IL-LA ‘IHSANËN WE TEWFIKË
4.63: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE JA’LEMU ALLAHU MA FI KULUBIHIM FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM WE ‘IDHHUM WE KUL LEHUM FI ‘ENFUSIHIM KAWLËN BELIGË
4.64: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA LIJUTA’A BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘IDH DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM XHA’UKE FASTEGFERU ELLAHE WE ESTEGFERA LEHUMU RASULU LEWEXHEDU ELLAHE TEWWABËN RAHIMË
4.65: FELA WE RABBIKE LA JU’UMINUNE HETTA JUHEKKIMUKE FIMA SHEXHERA BEJNEHUM THUMME LA JEXHIDU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM HERAXHËN MIMMA KADEJTE WE JUSEL-LIMU TESLIMË
4.66: WE LEW ‘ENNA KETEBNA ‘ALEJHIM ‘ENI EKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘EW EHRUXHU MIN DIJARIKUM MA FE’ALUHU ‘IL-LA KALILUN MINHUM WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM FE’ALU MA JU’ADHUNE BIHI LEKANE HAJRËN LEHUM WE ‘ESHEDDE TETHBITË
4.69: WE MEN JUTI’I ELLAHE WE RASULE FE’ULA’IKE ME’AL-LEDHINE ‘EN’AMEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MINE NEBIJINE WE SIDDIKINE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’I WE SALIHINE WE HESUNE ‘ULA’IKE RAFIKË
4.71: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU HUDHU HIDHRAKUM FANFIRU THUBATIN ‘EW ENFIRU XHEMI’Ë
4.72: WE ‘INNE MINKUM LEMEN LEJUBETTI’ENNE FE’IN ‘ESABETKUM MUSIBETUN KALE KAD ‘EN’AMEL-LAHU ‘ALEJJE ‘IDH LEM ‘EKUN ME’AHUM SHEHIDË
4.73: WE LE’IN ‘ESABEKUM FEDLUN MINEL-LAHI LEJEKULENNE KE’EN LEM TEKUN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHU MEWEDDETUN JA LEJTENI KUNTU ME’AHUM FE’EFUZE FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
4.74: FELJUKATIL FI SEBILI ALLAHIL-LEDHINE JESHRUNEL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA BIL-’AHIRATI WE MEN JUKATIL FI SEBILI ALLAHI FEJUKTEL ‘EW JEGLIB FESEWFE NU’UTIHI ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.75: WE MA LEKUM LA TUKATILUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-MUSTED’AFINE MINE ER-RIXHALI WE NISA’ WEL-WILDANIL-LEDHINE JEKULUNE RABBENA ‘EHRIXHNA MIN HEDHIHIL-KARJETI EDH-DHALIMI ‘EHLUHA WE EXH’AL LENA MIN LEDUNKE WELIJËN WE EXH’AL LENA MIN LEDUNKE NESIRË
4.76: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUKATILUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUKATILUNE FI SEBILIT-TAGUTI FEKATILU ‘EWLIJA’E ESH-SHEJTANI ‘INNE KEJDE ESH-SHEJTANI KANE DA’IFË
4.77: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE KILE LEHUM KUFFU ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE FELEMMA KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KITALU ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM JEHSHEWNE NASE KEHASHJETI ALLAHI ‘EW ‘ESHEDDE HASHJETEN WE KALU RABBENA LIME KETEBTE ‘ALEJNAL-KITALE LEWLA ‘EHHARTENA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN KUL META’U ED-DUNJA KALILUN WEL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIMENI ETTEKA WE LA TUDHLEMUNE FETILË
4.78: ‘EJNEMA TEKUNU JUDRIKKUMUL-MEWTU WE LEW KUNTUM FI BURUXHIN MUSHEJJEDETIN WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM HESENETUN JEKULU HEDHIHI MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN JEKULU HEDHIHI MIN ‘INDIKE KUL KUL-LUN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI FEMALI HA’UULA’L-KAWMI LA JEKADUNE JEFKAHUNE HEDITHË
4.79: MA ‘ESABEKE MIN HESENETIN FEMINEL-LAHI WE MA ‘ESABEKE MIN SEJJI’ETIN FEMIN NEFSIKE WE ‘ERSELNAKE LILNNASI RASULËN WE KEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
4.80: MEN JUTI’I RASULE FEKAD ‘ETA’A ELLAHE WE MEN TEWELLA FEMA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHË
4.81: WE JEKULUNE TA’ATUN FE’IDHA BERAZU MIN ‘INDIKE BEJJETE TA’IFETUN MINHUM GAJRAL-LEDHI TEKULU WEL-LAHU JEKTUBU MA JUBEJJITUNE FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.82: ‘EFELA JETEDEBBERUNEL-KUR’ANE WE LEW KANE MIN ‘INDI GAJRI ALLAHI LEWEXHEDU FIHI EHTILAFËN KETHIRË
4.83: WE ‘IDHA XHA’EHUM ‘EMRUN MINEL-’EMNI ‘EWIL-HAWFI ‘EDHA’U BIHI WE LEW RADDUHU ‘ILA RASULI WE ‘ILA ‘ULIL-’EMRI MINHUM LE’ALIMEHUL-LEDHINE JESTENBITUNEHU MINHUM WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU LATTEBA’TUMU ESH-SHEJTANE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.84: FEKATIL FI SEBILI ALLAHI LA TUKELLEFU ‘IL-LA NEFSEKE WE HERRIDIL-MU’UMININE ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JEKUFFE BE’SEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WEL-LAHU ‘ESHEDDU BE’SËN WE ‘ESHEDDU TENKILË
4.85: MEN JESHFA’ SHEFA’ATEN HESENETEN JEKUN LEHU NESIBUN MINHA WE MEN JESHFA’ SHEFA’ATEN SEJJI’ETEN JEKUN LEHU KIFLUN MINHA WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUKITË
4.86: WE ‘IDHA HUJJITUM BITEHIJETIN FEHEJJU BI’EHSENE MINHA ‘EW RUDDUHA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HESIBË
4.87: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE LEJEXHME’ANNEKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHI WE MEN ‘ESDEKU MINEL-LAHI HEDITHË
4.88: FEMA LEKUM FIL-MUNAFIKINE FI’ETEJNI WEL-LAHU ‘ERKESEHUM BIMA KESEBU ‘ETURIDUNE ‘EN TEHDU MEN ‘EDEL-LEL-LAHU WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU SEBILË
4.89: WE DDU LEW TEKFURUNE KEMA KEFERU FETEKUNUNE SEWA’EN FELA TETTEHIDHU MINHUM ‘EWLIJA’E HETTA JUHAXHIRU FI SEBILI ALLAHI FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEHUDHUHUM WAKTULUHUM HEJTHU WEXHEDTUMUHUM WE LA TETTEHIDHU MINHUM WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
4.90: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE JESILUNE ‘ILA KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN ‘EW XHA’UKUM HESIRAT SUDURUHUM ‘EN JUKATILUKUM ‘EW JUKATILU KAWMEHUM WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LESELLETEHUM ‘ALEJKUM FELEKATELUKUM FE’INI A’TEZELUKUM FELEM JUKATILUKUM WE ‘ELKAW ‘ILEJKUMU SELEME FEMA XHE’ALEL-LAHU LEKUM ‘ALEJHIM SEBILË
4.91: SETEXHIDUNE ‘AHARINE JURIDUNE ‘EN JE’MENUKUM WE JE’MENU KAWMEHUM KUL-LE MA RUDDU ‘ILAL-FITNETI ‘URKISU FIHA FE’IN LEM JA’TEZILUKUM WE JULKU ‘ILEJKUMU SELEME WE JEKUFFU ‘EJDIJEHUM FEHUDHUHUM WAKTULUHUM HEJTHU THEKIFTUMUHUM WE ‘ULE’IKUM XHE’ALNA LEKUM ‘ALEJHIM SULTANËN MUBINË
4.92: WE MA KANE LIMU’UMININ ‘EN JEKTULE MU’UMINËN ‘IL-LA HATE’EN WE MEN KATELE MU’UMINËN HATE’EN FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN WE DIJETUN MUSEL-LEMETUN ‘ILA ‘EHLIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESSEDDEKU FE’IN KANE MIN KAWMIN ‘ADUWIN LEKUM WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN WE ‘IN KANE MIN KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN FEDIJETUN MUSEL-LEMETUN ‘ILA ‘EHLIHI WE TEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU SHEHRAJNI MUTETABI’AJNI TEWBETEN MINEL-LAHI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.93: WE MEN JEKTUL MU’UMINËN MUTE’AMMIDËN FEXHEZA’UUHU XHEHENNEMU HALIDËN FIHA WE GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI WE LE’ANEHU WE ‘E’ADDE LEHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ADHIMË
4.94: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA DERABTUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI FETEBEJJENU WE LA TEKULU LIMEN ‘ELKA ‘ILEJKUMU SELAME LESTE MU’UMINËN TEBTEGUNE ‘ARADEL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA FA’INDEL-LAHI MEGANIMU KETHIRATUN KEDHALIKE KUNTUM MIN KABLU FEMENNEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM FETEBEJJENU ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRË
4.95: LA JESTEWIL-KA’IDUNE MINEL-MU’UMININE GAJRU ‘ULI ED-DERARI WEL-MUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FEDDELEL-LAHUL-MUXHAHIDINE BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ALEL-KA’IDINE DERAXHETEN WE KULLËN WE’ADEL-LAHUL-HUSNA WE FEDDELEL-LAHUL-MUXHAHIDINE ‘ALEL-KA’IDINE ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.96: DERAXHATIN MINHU WE MEGFIRATEN WE RAHMETEN WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.97: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TEWEFFAHUMUL-MELA’IKETU DHALIMI ‘ENFUSIHIM KALU FIME KUNTUM KALU KUNNA MUSTED’AFINE FIL-’ERDI KALU ‘ELEM TEKUN ‘ERDU ALLAHI WASI’ATEN FETUHAXHIRU FIHA FE’ULA’IKE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE SA’ET MESIRË
4.98: ‘IL-LAL-MUSTED’AFINE MINE ER-RIXHALI WE NISA’ WEL-WILDANI LA JESTETI’UNE HILETEN WE LA JEHTEDUNE SEBILË
4.100: WE MEN JUHAXHIR FI SEBILI ALLAHI JEXHID FIL-’ERDI MURAGAMËN KETHIRËN WE SE’ATEN WE MEN JEHRUXH MIN BEJTIHI MUHAXHIRËN ‘ILA ALLAHI WE RASULIHI THUMME JUDRIK/HUL-MEWTU FEKAD WEKA’A ‘EXHRUHU ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.101: WE ‘IDHA DERABTUM FIL-’ERDI FELEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEKSURU MINE SELËTI ‘IN HIFTUM ‘EN JEFTINEKUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘INNEL-KAFIRINE KANU LEKUM ‘ADUWËN MUBINË
4.102: WE ‘IDHA KUNTE FIHIM FE’EKAMTE LEHUMU SELËTE FELTEKUM TA’IFETUN MINHUM ME’AKE WE LIE’HUDHU ‘ESLIHETEHUM FE’IDHA SEXHEDU FELJEKUNU MIN WERA’IKUM WE LTE’TI TA’IFETUN ‘UHRA LEM JUSELLU FELJUSELLU ME’AKE WE LIE’HUDHU HIDHRAHUM WE ‘ESLIHETEHUM WEDDEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW TEGFULUNE ‘AN ‘ESLIHETIKUM WE ‘EMTI’ATIKUM FEJEMILUNE ‘ALEJKUM MEJLETEN WAHIDETEN WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IN KANE BIKUM ‘EDHEN MIN METERIN ‘EW KUNTUM MERDA ‘EN TEDA’U ‘ESLIHETEKUM WE HUDHU HIDHRAKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘E’ADDE LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
4.103: FE’IDHA KADEJTUMU SELËTE FADHKURU ELLAHE KIJAMËN WE KU’UDËN WE ‘ALA XHUNUBIKUM FE’IDHA ETME’NENTUM FE’EKIMU SELËTE ‘INNE SELËTE KANET ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE KITABËN MEWKUTË
4.104: WE LA TEHINU FI EBTIGA’IL-KAWMI ‘IN TEKUNU TE’LEMUNE FE’INNEHUM JE’LEMUNE KEMA TE’LEMUNE WE TERXHUNE MINEL-LAHI MA LA JERXHUNE WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.105: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI LITEHKUME BEJNE NASI BIMA ‘ERAKEL-LAHU WE LA TEKUN LILHA’ININE HASIMË
4.106: WE ESTEGFIRI ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.107: WE LA TUXHADIL ‘ANIL-LEDHINE JEHTANUNE ‘ENFUSEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU MEN KANE HAWWANËN ‘ETHIMË
4.108: JESTEHFUNE MINE NASI WE LA JESTEHFUNE MINEL-LAHI WE HUWE ME’AHUM ‘IDH JUBEJJITUNE MA LA JERDA MINEL-KAWLI WE KANEL-LAHU BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITË
4.109: HA’ENTUM HA’UULA’ XHADELTUM ‘ANHUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA FEMEN JUXHADILU ELLAHE ‘ANHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘EM MEN JEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM WE KILË
4.110: WE MEN JA’MEL SU’ËN ‘EW JEDHLIM NEFSEHU THUMME JESTEGFIRI ELLAHE JEXHIDI ELLAHE GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.111: WE MEN JEKSIB ‘ITHMËN FE’INNEMA JEKSIBUHU ‘ALA NEFSIHI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.112: WE MEN JEKSIB HATI’ETEN ‘EW ‘ITHMËN THUMME JERMI BIHI BERI’ËN FEKADI EHTEMELE BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.113: WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKE WE RAHMETUHU LEHEMMET TA’IFETUN MINHUM ‘EN JUDIL-LUKE WE MA JUDIL-LUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSEHUM WE MA JEDURRUNEKE MIN SHEJ’IN WE ‘ENZELEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘AL-LEMEKE MA LEM TEKUN TA’LEMU WE KANE FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKE ‘ADHIMË
4.114: LA HAJRA FI KETHIRIN MIN NEXHWAHUM ‘IL-LA MEN ‘EMERA BISEDEKATIN ‘EW MA’RUFIN ‘EW ‘ISLAHIN BEJNE NASI WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE EBTIGA’E MERDËTI ALLAHI FESEWFE NU’UTIHI ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.115: WE MEN JUSHAKIKI RASULE MIN BA’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUL-HUDA WE JETTEBI’ GAJRA SEBILIL-MU’UMININE NUWELLIHI MA TEWELLA WE NUSLIHI XHEHENNEME WE SA’ET MESIRË
4.116: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEGFIRU ‘EN JUSHRAKE BIHI WE JEGFIRU MA DUNE DHALIKE LIMEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKAD DEL-LE DELALËN BA’IDË
4.117: ‘IN JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI ‘IL-LA ‘INATHËN WE ‘IN JED’UNE ‘IL-LA SHEJTANËN MERIDË
4.118: LE’ANEHU ALLAHU WE KALE LE’ETTEHIDHENNE MIN ‘IBADIKE NESIBËN MEFRUDË
4.119: WE LE’UDILLENNEHUM WE LE’UMENNIJENNEHUM WE LE’AMURANNEHUM FELEJUBETTIKUNNE ‘ADHANEL-’EN’AM WE LE’AMURANNEHUM FELEJUGAJJIRUNNE HALKAL-LAHI WE MEN JETTEHIDHI ESH-SHEJTANE WELIJËN MIN DUNI ALLAHI FEKAD HASIRA HUSRANËN MUBINË
4.120: JA’IDUHUM WE JUMENNIHIM WE MA JA’IDUHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘IL-LA GURURË
4.121: ‘ULA’IKE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE LA JEXHIDUNE ‘ANHA MEHISË
4.122: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SENUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKËN WE MEN ‘ESDEKU MINEL-LAHI KILË
4.123: LEJSE BI’EMANIJIKUM WE LA ‘EMANIJI ‘EHLIL-KITABI MEN JA’MEL SU’ËN JUXHZE BIHI WE LA JEXHID LEHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
4.124: WE MEN JA’MEL MINE SALIHATI MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULA’IKE JEDHULUNEL-XHENNETE WE LA JUDHLEMUNE NEKIRË
4.125: WE MEN ‘EHSENU DINËN MIMMEN ‘ESLEME WEXHHEHU LIL-LAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN WE ETTEBE’A MILLETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE ETTEHADHEL-LAHU ‘IBRAHIME HALILË
4.126: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE KANEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUHITË
4.127: WE JESTEFTUNEKE FI NISA’ KULI ALLAHU JUFTIKUM FIHINNE WE MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FIL-KITABI FI JETAMA NISA’L-LATI LA TU’UTUNEHUNNE MA KUTIBE LEHUNNE WE TERGABUNE ‘EN TENKIHUHUNNE WEL-MUSTED’AFINE MINEL-WILDANI WE ‘EN TEKUMU LILJETAMA BIL-KISTI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIHI ‘ALIMË
4.128: WE ‘INI EMRA’ETUN HAFET MIN BA’LIHA NUSHUZËN ‘EW ‘I’RADËN FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA ‘EN JUSLIHA BEJNEHUMA SULHËN WE SULHU HAJRUN WE ‘UHDIRATIL-’ENFUSU ESH-SHUHHE WE ‘IN TUHSINU WE TETTEKU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRË
4.129: WE LEN TESTETI’U ‘EN TA’DILU BEJNE NISA’ WE LEW HERASTUM FELA TEMILU KUL-LEL-MEJLI FETEDHERUHA KALMU’ALLEKATI WE ‘IN TUSLIHU WE TETTEKU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.130: WE ‘IN JETEFERRAKA JUGNI ALLAHU KULLA MIN SE’ATIHI WE KANEL-LAHU WASI’ËN HEKIMË
4.131: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE LEKAD WESSEJNAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WE ‘IJAKUM ‘ENI ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE KANEL-LAHU GANIJËN HEMIDË
4.132: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.133: ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM ‘EJJUHA NASU WE JE’TI BI’AHARINE WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA DHALIKE KADIRË
4.134: MEN KANE JURIDU THEWABE ED-DUNJA FA’INDEL-LAHI THEWABU ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE KANEL-LAHU SEMI’ËN BESIRË
4.135: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUNU KAWWAMINE BIL-KISTI SHUHEDA’E LIL-LAHI WE LEW ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EWIL-WALIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE ‘IN JEKUN GANIJËN ‘EW FEKIRËN FE-ALLAHU ‘EWLA BIHIMA FELA TETTEBI’UL-HEWA ‘EN TA’DILU WE ‘IN TELWU ‘EW TU’RIDU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRË
4.136: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WEL-KITABIL-LEDHI NEZZELE ‘ALA RASULIHI WEL-KITABIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MIN KABLU WE MEN JEKFUR BIL-LAHI WE MELA’IKETIHI WE KUTUBIHI WE RUSULIHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI FEKAD DEL-LE DELALËN BA’IDË
4.137: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU THUMME ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU THUMME EZDADU KUFRËN LEM JEKUNI ALLAHU LIJEGFIRA LEHUM WE LA LIJEHDIJEHUM SEBILË
4.139: EL-LEDHINE JETTEHIDHUNEL-KAFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE ‘EJEBTEGUNE ‘INDEHUMUL-’IZZETE FE’INNEL-’IZZETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’Ë
4.140: WE KAD NEZZELE ‘ALEJKUM FIL-KITABI ‘EN ‘IDHA SEMI’TUM ‘AJATI ALLAHI JUKFERU BIHA WE JUSTEHZE’U BIHA FELA TEK’UDU ME’AHUM HETTA JEHUDU FI HEDITHIN GAJRIHI ‘INNEKUM ‘IDHËN MITHLUHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE XHAMI’UL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-KAFIRINE FI XHEHENNEME XHEMI’Ë
4.141: EL-LEDHINE JETERABBESUNE BIKUM FE’IN KANE LEKUM FETHUN MINEL-LAHI KALU ‘ELEM NEKUN ME’AKUM WE ‘IN KANE LILKAFIRINE NESIBUN KALU ‘ELEM NESTEHWIDH ‘ALEJKUM WE NEMNA’KUM MINEL-MU’UMININE FE-ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE LEN JEXH’ALEL-LAHU LILKAFIRINE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE SEBILË
4.142: ‘INNEL-MUNAFIKINE JUHADI’UNEL-LAHE WE HUWE HADI’UHUM WE ‘IDHA KAMU ‘ILA SELËTI KAMU KUSALA JURA’UNE NASE WE LA JEDHKURUNEL-LAHE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.143: MUDHEBDHEBINE BEJNE DHALIKE LA ‘ILA HA’UULA’ WE LA ‘ILA HA’UULA’ WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU SEBILË
4.144: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-KAFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE ‘ETURIDUNE ‘EN TEXH’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM SULTANËN MUBINË
4.145: ‘INNEL-MUNAFIKINE FI ED-DERKIL-’ESFELI MINE NARI WE LEN TEXHIDE LEHUM NESIRË
4.146: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE TABU WE ‘ESLEHU WE A’TESEMU BIL-LAHI WE ‘EHLESU DINEHUM LIL-LAHI FE’ULA’IKE ME’AL-MU’UMININE WE SEWFE JU’UTI ALLAHUL-MU’UMININE ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.147: MA JEF’ALU ALLAHU BI’ADHABIKUM ‘IN SHEKERTUM WE ‘AMENTUM WE KANEL-LAHU SHAKIRËN ‘ALIMË
4.148: LA JUHIBBU ALLAHUL-XHEHRA BIS-SU’I MINEL-KAWLI ‘IL-LA MEN DHULIME WE KANEL-LAHU SEMI’ËN ‘ALIMË
4.149: ‘IN TUBDU HAJRËN ‘EW TUHFUHU ‘EW TA’FU ‘AN SU’IN FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AFUWËN KADIRË
4.150: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKFURUNE BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE JURIDUNE ‘EN JUFERRIKU BEJNEL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE JEKULUNE NU’UMINU BIBA’DIN WE NEKFURU BIBA’DIN WE JURIDUNE ‘EN JETTEHIDHU BEJNE DHALIKE SEBILË
4.152: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE LEM JUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM ‘ULA’IKE SEWFE JU’UTIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
4.153: JES’ELUKE ‘EHLUL-KITABI ‘EN TUNEZZILE ‘ALEJHIM KITABËN MINE SEMA’I FEKAD SE’ELU MUSA ‘EKBERA MIN DHALIKE FEKALU ‘ERINA ELLAHE XHEHRATEN FE’EHADHET/HUMU SA’IKATU BIDHULMIHIM THUMME ETTEHADHUL-’IXHLE MIN BA’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU FE’AFEWNA ‘AN DHALIKE WE ‘ATEJNA MUSA SULTANËN MUBINË
4.154: WE RAFA’NA FEWKAHUMUT-TURA BIMITHAKIHIM WE KULNA LEHUM EDHULUL-BABE SUXHXHEDËN WE KULNA LEHUMU LA TA’DU FI SEBTI WE ‘EHADHNA MINHUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
4.155: FEBIMA NEKDIHIM MITHAKAHUM WE KUFRIHIM BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE KATLIHIMUL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE KAWLIHIM KULUBUNA GULFUN BEL TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALEJHA BIKUFRIHIM FELA JU’UMINUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.156: WE BIKUFRIHIM WE KAWLIHIM ‘ALA MERJEME BUHTANËN ‘ADHIMË
4.157: WE KAWLIHIM ‘INNA KATELNAL-MESIHE ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME RASULEL-LAHI WE MA KATELUHU WE MA SELEBUHU WE LEKIN SHUBBIHE LEHUM WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIHI LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IL-LA ETTIBA’A EDH-DHENNI WE MA KATELUHU JEKINË
4.158: BEL RAFE’AHU ALLAHU ‘ILEJHI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.159: WE ‘IN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘IL-LA LEJU’UMINENNE BIHI KABLE MEWTIHI WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM SHEHIDË
4.160: FEBIDHULMIN MINEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIM TEJJIBATIN ‘UHIL-LET LEHUM WE BISEDDIHIM ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI KETHIRË
4.161: WE ‘EHDHIHIMU ER-RIBA WE KAD NUHU ‘ANHU WE ‘EKLIHIM ‘EMWALE NASI BIL-BATILI WE ‘A’TEDNA LILKAFIRINE MINHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
4.162: LEKINI ER-RASIHUNE FIL-’ILMI MINHUM WEL-MU’UMINUNE JU’UMINUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE WEL-MUKIMINE SELËTE WEL-MU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-MU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI ‘ULA’IKE SENU’UTIHIM ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
4.163: ‘INNA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE KEMA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA NUHIN WE NEBIJINE MIN BA’DIHI WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBATI WE ‘ISA WE ‘EJJUBE WE JUNUS WE HARUNE WE SULEJMANE WE ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE ZEBURË
4.164: WE RUSULËN KAD KASESNAHUM ‘ALEJKE MIN KABLU WE RUSULËN LEM NEKSUSHUM ‘ALEJKE WE KELLEMEL-LAHU MUSA TEKLIMË
4.165: RUSULËN MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE LI’LLA JEKUNE LILNNASI ‘ALA ALLAHI HUXHXHETUN BA’DE ER-RUSULI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.166: LEKINI ALLAHU JESH/HEDU BIMA ‘ENZELE ‘ILEJKE ‘ENZELEHU BI’ILMIHI WEL-MELA’IKETU JESH/HEDUNE WE KEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
4.167: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI KAD DELLU DELALËN BA’IDË
4.168: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE DHELEMU LEM JEKUNI ALLAHU LIJEGFIRA LEHUM WE LA LIJEHDIJEHUM TERIKË
4.169: ‘IL-LA TERIKA XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRË
4.170: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUMU RASULU BIL-HEKKI MIN RABBIKUM FE’AMINU HAJRËN LEKUM WE ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.171: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LA TEGLU FI DINIKUM WE LA TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HEKKA ‘INNEMAL-MESIHU ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME RASULU ALLAHI WE KELIMETUHU ‘ELKAHA ‘ILA MERJEME WE RUHUN MINHU FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE LA TEKULU THELATHETUN ENTEHU HAJRËN LEKUM ‘INNEMALLAHU ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN SUBHANEHU ‘EN JEKUNE LEHU WELEDUN LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.172: LEN JESTENKIFEL-MESIHU ‘EN JEKUNE ‘ABDËN LIL-LAHI WE LAL-MELA’IKETUL-MUKARRABUNE WE MEN JESTENKIF ‘AN ‘IBADETIHI WE JESTEKBIR FESEJEHSHURUHUM ‘ILEJHI XHEMI’Ë
4.173: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUWEFFIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WE JEZIDUHUM MIN FEDLIHI WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE ESTENKEFU WE ESTEKBERU FEJU’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN WE LA JEXHIDUNE LEHUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
4.174: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUM BURHANUN MIN RABBIKUM WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKUM NURËN MUBINË
4.175: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE A’TESEMU BIHI FESEJUDHILUHUM FI RAHMETIN MINHU WE FEDLIN WE JEHDIHIM ‘ILEJHI SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
4.176: JESTEFTUNEKE KULI ALLAHU JUFTIKUM FIL-KELALETI ‘INI EMRU’UUN HELEKE LEJSE LEHU WELEDUN WE LEHU ‘UHTUN FELEHA NISFU MA TERAKE WE HUWE JERITHUHA ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEHA WELEDUN FE’IN KANETA ETHNETEJNI FELEHUMA ETH-THULUTHANI MIMMA TERAKE WE ‘IN KANU ‘IHWETEN RIXHALËN WE NISA’EN FELILDHDHEKERI MITHLU HEDHDHIL-’UNTHEJEJNI JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘EN TEDIL-LU WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

5.1: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EWFU BIL-’UKUDI ‘UHIL-LET LEKUM BEHIMETUL-’EN’AMI ‘IL-LA MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM GAJRA MUHILLI SEJDI WE ‘ENTUM HURUMUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEHKUMU MA JURID
5.2: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUHILLU SHA’A’IRAL-LAHI WE LA ESH-SHEHRAL-HERAME WE LAL-HEDJE WE LAL-KALA’IDE WE LA ‘AMMINEL-BEJTEL-HERAME JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MIN RABBIHIM WE RIDWANËN WE ‘IDHA HELELTUM FASTADU WE LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHENE’ANU KAWMIN ‘EN SEDDUKUM ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI ‘EN TA’TEDU WE TA’AWENU ‘ALEL-BIRRI WET-TEKWA WE LA TA’AWENU ‘ALEL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWANI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
5.3: HURRIMET ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETU WE ED-DEMU WE LEHMUL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI ALLAHI BIHI WEL-MUNHANIKATU WEL-MEWKUDHETU WEL-MUTERADDIJETU WE NETIHETU WE MA ‘EKELE SEBU’U ‘IL-LA MA DHEKKEJTUM WE MA DHUBIHE ‘ALA NUSUBI WE ‘EN TESTEKSIMU BIL-’EZLAMI DHALIKUM FISKUNL-JEWME JE’ISEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN DINIKUM FELA TEHSHEWHUM WE EHSHEWNIL-JEWME ‘EKMELTU LEKUM DINEKUM WE ‘ETMEMTU ‘ALEJKUM NI’METI WE RADITU LEKUMUL-’ISLAME DINËN FEMENI EDTURRA FI MEHMESETIN GAJRA MUTEXHANIFIN L’ITHMIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.4: JES’ELUNEKE MADHA ‘UHIL-LE LEHUM KUL ‘UHIL-LE LEKUMUT-TEJJIBATU WE MA ‘ALLEMTUM MINEL-XHEWARIHI MUKELLIBINE TU’ALLIMUNEHUNNE MIMMA ‘AL-LEMEKUMU ALLAHU FEKULU MIMMA ‘EMSEKNE ‘ALEJKUM WE EDHKURU ESMEL-LAHI ‘ALEJHI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
5.5: EL-JEWME ‘UHIL-LE LEKUMUT-TEJJIBATU WE TA’AMUL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE HILLUN LEKUM WE TA’AMUKUM HILLUN LEHUM WEL-MUHSENATU MINEL-MU’UMINATI WEL-MUHSENATU MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM ‘IDHA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE MUHSININE GAJRA MUSAFIHINE WE LA MUTTEHIDHI ‘EHDANIN WE MEN JEKFUR BIL-’IMANI FEKAD HEBITE ‘AMELUHU WE HUWE FIL-’AHIRATI MINEL-HASIRIN
5.6: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA KUMTUM ‘ILA SELËTI FAGSILU WUXHUHEKUM WE ‘EJDIJEKUM ‘ILAL-MERAFIKI WE EMSEHU BIRU’USIKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM ‘ILAL-KA’BEJNI WE ‘IN KUNTUM XHUNUBËN FE ETTEHHERU WE ‘IN KUNTUM MERDA ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN ‘EW XHA’E ‘EHEDUN MINKUM MINEL-GA’ITI ‘EW LAMESTUMU NISA’ FELEM TEXHIDU MA’EN FETEJEMMEMU SA’IDËN TEJJIBËN FAMSEHU BIWUXHUHIKUM WE ‘EJDIKUM MINHU MA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJEXH’ALE ‘ALEJKUM MIN HERAXHIN WE LEKIN JURIDU LIJUTEHHIRAKUM WELIJUTIMME NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
5.7: WE EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE MITHAKAHUL-LEDHI WE ETHEKAKUM BIHI ‘IDH KULTUM SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
5.8: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUNU KAWWAMINE LIL-LAHI SHUHEDA’E BIL-KISTI WE LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHENE’ANU KAWMIN ‘ALA ‘ELLA TA’DILU A’DILU HUWE ‘EKRABU LILTTEKWA WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
5.9: WE’ADEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
5.11: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH HEMME KAWMUN ‘EN JEBSUTU ‘ILEJKUM ‘EJDIJEHUM FEKEFFE ‘EJDIJEHUM ‘ANKUM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
5.12: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHEL-LAHU MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE BE’ATHNA MINHUMU ETHNEJ ‘ASHERA NEKIBËN WE KALEL-LAHU ‘INNI ME’AKUM LE’IN ‘EKAMTUMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEJTUMU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘AMENTUM BIRUSULI WE ‘AZZERTUMUHUM WE ‘EKRADTUMU ELLAHE KARDËN HESENËN LE’UKEFFIRANNE ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE LE’UDHILENNEKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU FEMEN KEFERA BA’DE DHALIKE MINKUM FEKAD DEL-LE SEWA’E SEBIL
5.13: FEBIMA NEKDIHIM MITHAKAHUM LE’ANNAHUM WE XHE’ALNA KULUBEHUM KASIJETEN JUHERRIFUNEL-KELIME ‘AN MEWADI’IHI WE NESU HEDHDHËN MIMMA DHUKKIRU BIHI WE LA TEZALU TETTELI’U ‘ALA HA’INETIN MINHUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM FA’FU ‘ANHUM WE ESFEH ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
5.14: WE MINEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNA NESARA ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAHUM FENESU HEDHDHËN MIMMA DHUKKIRU BIHI FE’EGRAJNA BEJNEHUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI WE SEWFE JUNEBBI’UHUMU ALLAHU BIMA KANU JESNA’UN
5.15: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI KAD XHA’EKUM RASULUNA JUBEJJINU LEKUM KETHIRËN MIMMA KUNTUM TUHFUNE MINEL-KITABI WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRIN KAD XHA’EKUM MINEL-LAHI NURUN WE KITABUN MUBINU
5.16: JEHDI BIHI ALLAHU MENI ETTEBE’A RIDWANEHU SUBULE SELAMI WE JUHRIXHUHUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI BI’IDHNIHI WE JEHDIHIM ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
5.17: LEKAD KEFERAL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME KUL FEMEN JEMLIKU MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘IN ‘ERADE ‘EN JUHLIKEL-MESIHE EBNE MERJEME WE ‘UMMEHU WE MEN FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA JHLUKU MA JESHA’U WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.18: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU WE NESARA NEHNU ‘EBNA’U ALLAHI WE ‘EHIBBA’UUHU KUL FELIME JU’ADHDHIBUKUM BIDHUNUBIKUM BEL ‘ENTUM BESHERUN MIMMEN HALEKA JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
5.19: JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI KAD XHA’EKUM RASULUNA JUBEJJINU LEKUM ‘ALA FETRATIN MINE ER-RUSULI ‘EN TEKULU MA XHA’ENA MIN BESHIRIN WE LA NEDHIRIN FEKAD XHA’EKUM BESHIRUN WE NEDHIRUN WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.20: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH XHE’ALE FIKUM ‘ENBIJA’E WE XHE’ALEKUM MULUKËN WE ‘ATAKUM MA LEM JU’UTI ‘EHEDËN MINEL-’ALEMIN
5.21: JA KAWMI EDHULUL-’ERDEL-MUKADDESETEL-LETI KETEBEL-LAHU LEKUM WE LA TERTEDDU ‘ALA ‘EDBARIKUM FETENKALIBU HASIRIN
5.22: KALU JA MUSA ‘INNE FIHA KAWMËN XHEBBARINE WE ‘INNA LEN NEDHULEHA HETTA JEHRUXHU MINHA FE’IN JEHRUXHU MINHA FE’INNA DAHILUN
5.23: KALE RAXHULANI MINEL-LEDHINE JEHAFUNE ‘EN’AMEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIMA EDHULU ‘ALEJHIMUL-BABE FE’IDHA DEHALTUMUHU FE’INNEKUM GALIBUNE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FETEWEKKELU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.24: KALU JA MUSA ‘INNA LEN NEDHULEHA ‘EBEDËN MA DAMU FIHA FADH/HEB ‘ENTE WE RABBUKE FEKATILA ‘INNA HAHUNA KA’IDUN
5.25: KALE RABBI ‘INNI LA ‘EMLIKU ‘IL-LA NEFSI WE ‘EHI FAFRUK BEJNENA WE BEJNEL-KAWMIL-FASIKIN
5.26: KALE FE’INNEHA MUHERRAMETUN ‘ALEJHIM ‘ERBA’INE SENETEN JETIHUNE FIL-’ERDI FELA TE’SE ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-FASIKIN
5.27: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’E EBNEJ ‘ADEME BIL-HEKKI ‘IDH KARRABA KURBANËN FETUKUBBILE MIN ‘EHEDIHIMA WE LEM JUTEKABBEL MINEL-’AHARI KALE LE’EKTULENNEKE KALE ‘INNEMA JETEKABBELU ALLAHU MINEL-MUTTEKIN
5.28: LE’IN BESETTE ‘ILEJJE JEDEKE LITEKTULENI MA ‘ENA BIBASITIN JEDIJE ‘ILEJKE LI’KTULEKE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ELLAHE RABBEL-’ALEMIN
5.29: ‘INNI ‘URIDU ‘EN TEBU’E BI’ITHMI WE ‘ITHMIKE FETEKUNE MIN ‘ES'HABI NARI WE DHELIKE XHEZA’U EDH-DHALIMIN
5.30: FETEWWE’AT LEHU NEFSUHU KATLE ‘EHIHI FEKATELEHU FE’ESBEHE MINEL-HASIRIN
5.31: FEBE’ATHEL-LAHU GURABËN JEBHETHU FIL-’ERDI LIJURIJEHU KEJFE JUWARI SEW’ETE ‘EHIHI KALE JA WEJLETA ‘E’AXHEZTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MITHLE HADHAL-GURABI FE’UWARIJE SEW’ETE ‘EHI FE’ESBEHE MINE NADIMIN
5.32: MIN ‘EXHLI DHALIKE KETEBNA ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ENNEHU MEN KATELE NEFSËN BIGAJRI NEFSIN ‘EW FESADIN FIL-’ERDI FEKE’ENNEMA KATELE NASE XHEMI’ËN WE MEN ‘EHJAHA FEKE’ENNEMA ‘EHJA NASE XHEMI’ËN WE LEKAD XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUNA BIL-BEJJINATI THUMME ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINHUM BA’DE DHALIKE FIL-’ERDI LEMUSRIFUN
5.33: ‘INNEMA XHEZA’UL-LEDHINE JUHARIBUNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU WE JES’AWNE FIL-’ERDI FESADËN ‘EN JUKATTELU ‘EW JUSELLEBU ‘EW TUKATTE’A ‘EJDIHIM WE ‘ERXHULUHUM MIN HILAFIN ‘EW JUNFEW MINEL-’ERDI DHALIKE LEHUM HIZJUN FI ED-DUNJA WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
5.34: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE TABU MIN KABLI ‘EN TEKDIRU ‘ALEJHIM FA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.35: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE EBTEGU ‘ILEJHIL-WESILETE WE XHAHIDU FI SEBILIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.36: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW ‘ENNE LEHUM MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LIJEFTEDU BIHI MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MA TUKUBBILE MINHUM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.37: JURIDUNE ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINE NARI WE MA HUM BIHARIXHINE MINHA WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
5.38: WE SARIKU WE SARIKATU FAKTA’U ‘EJDIJEHUMA XHEZA’EN BIMA KESEBA NEKALËN MINEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
5.39: FEMEN TABE MIN BA’DI DHULMIHI WE ‘ESLEHE FE’INNALL-LLAHE JETUBU ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.40: ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.41: JA ‘EJJUHA RASULU LA JEHZUNKEL-LEDHINE JUSARI’UNE FIL-KUFRI MINEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘AMENNA BI’EFWAHIHIM WE LEM TU’UMIN KULUBUHUM WE MINEL-LEDHINE HADU SEMMA’UNE LILKEDHIBI SEMMA’UNE LIKAWMIN ‘AHARINE LEM JE’TUKE JUHERRIFUNEL-KELIME MIN BA’DI MEWADI’IHI JEKULUNE ‘IN ‘UTITUM HADHA FEHUDHUHU WE ‘IN LEM TU’UTEWHU FAHDHERU WE MEN JURIDI ALLAHU FITNETEHU FELEN TEMLIKE LEHU MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE LEM JURIDI ALLAHU ‘EN JUTEHHIRA KULUBEHUM LEHUM FI ED-DUNJA HIZJUN WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
5.42: SEMMA’UNE LILKEDHIBI ‘EKKALUNE LILSSUHTI FE’IN XHA’UKE FAHKUM BEJNEHUM ‘EW ‘A’RID ‘ANHUM WE ‘IN TU’RID ‘ANHUM FELEN JEDURRUKE SHEJ’ËN WE ‘IN HEKEMTE FAHKUM BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
5.43: WE KEJFE JUHEKKIMUNEKE WE ‘INDEHUMUT-TEWRËTU FIHA HUKMU ALLAHI THUMME JETEWEL-LEWNE MIN BA’DI DHALIKE WE MA ‘ULA’IKE BIL-MU’UMININ
5.44: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNAT-TEWRËTE FIHA HUDEN WE NURUN JEHKUMU BIHA NEBIJUNEL-LEDHINE ‘ESLEMU LIL-LEDHINE HADU WE RABBANIJUNE WEL-’EHBARU BIMA ESTUHFIDHU MIN KITABI ALLAHI WE KANU ‘ALEJHI SHUHEDA’E FELA TEHSHEW NASE WE EHSHEWNI WE LA TESHTERU BI’AJATI THEMENËN KALILËN WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-KAFIRUN
5.45: WE KETEBNA ‘ALEJHIM FIHA ‘ENNE NEFSE BIN-NEFSI WEL-’AJNE BIL-’AJNI WEL-’ENFE BIL-’ENFI WEL-’UDHUNE BIL-’UDHUNI WE SINNE BIS-SINNI WEL-XHURUHE KISASUN FEMEN TESEDDEKA BIHI FEHUWE KEFFARATUN LEHU WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
5.46: WE KAFFEJNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM BI’ISA EBNI MERJEME MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINET-TEWRËTI WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-’INXHILE FIHI HUDEN WE NURUN WE MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINET-TEWRËTI WE HUDEN WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTEKIN
5.47: WE LIEHKUM ‘EHLUL-’INXHILI BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU FIHI WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-FASIKUN
5.48: WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINEL-KITABI WE MUHEJMINËN ‘ALEJHI FAHKUM BEJNEHUM BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWA’EHUM ‘AMMA XHA’EKE MINEL-HEKKI LIKUL-LIN XHE’ALNA MINKUM SHIR’ATEN WE MINHAXHËN WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LEXHE’ALEKUM ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN WE LEKIN LIJEBLUWEKUM FI MA ‘ATAKUM FASTEBIKUL-HAJRATI ‘ILA ALLAHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
5.49: WE ‘ENI EHKUM BEJNEHUM BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWA’EHUM WE EHDHERHUM ‘EN JEFTINUKE ‘AN BA’DI MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU ‘ILEJKE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FA’LEM ‘ENNEMA JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUSIBEHUM BIBA’DI DHUNUBIHIM WE ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINE NASI LEFASIKUN
5.50: ‘EFEHUKMEL-XHAHILIJETI JEBGUNE WE MEN ‘EHSENU MINEL-LAHI HUKMËN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
5.51: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-JEHUDE WE NESARA ‘EWLIJA’E BA’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BA’DIN WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM MINKUM FE’INNEHU MINHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
5.52: FETERAL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN JUSARI’UNE FIHIM JEKULUNE NEHSHA ‘EN TUSIBENA DA’IRATUN FE’ASALLAHU ‘EN JE’TIJE BIL-FETHI ‘EW ‘EMRIN MIN ‘INDIHI FEJUSBIHU ‘ALA MA ‘ESERRU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM NADIMIN
5.53: WE JEKULUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EHA’UULA’L-LEDHINE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM ‘INNEHUM LEME’AKUM HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FE’ESBEHU HASIRIN
5.54: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MEN JERTEDDE MINKUM ‘AN DINIHI FESEWFE JE’TI ALLAHU BIKAWMIN JUHIBBUHUM WE JUHIBBUNEHU ‘EDHILLETIN ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE ‘A’IZZETIN ‘ALEL-KAFIRINE JUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE LA JEHAFUNE LEWMETE LA’IMIN DHALIKE FEDLU ALLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
5.55: ‘INNEMA WE LIJUKUMU ALLAHU WE RASULUHU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM RAKI’UN
5.56: WE MEN JETEWELLEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FE’INNE HIZBEL-LAHI HUMUL-GALIBUN
5.57: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEKUM HUZUEN WE LA’IBËN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WEL-KUFFARA ‘EWLIJA’E WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.58: WE ‘IDHA NADEJTUM ‘ILA SELËTI ETTEHADHUHA HUZUEN WE LA’IBËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’KILUN
5.59: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI HEL TENKIMUNE MINNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLU WE ‘ENNE ‘EKTHERAKUM FASIKUN
5.60: KUL HEL ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BISHERRIN MIN DHALIKE METHUBETEN ‘INDEL-LAHI MEN LE’ANEHU ALLAHU WE GADIBE ‘ALEJHI WE XHE’ALE MINHUMUL-KIRADETE WEL-HANAZIRA WE ‘ABEDET-TAGUTE ‘ULA’IKE SHERRUN MEKANËN WE ‘EDELLU ‘AN SEWA’I SEBIL
5.61: WE ‘IDHA XHA’UKUM KALU ‘AMENNA WE KAD DEHALU BIL-KUFRI WE HUM KAD HARAXHU BIHI WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA KANU JEKTUMUN
5.62: WE TERA KETHIRËN MINHUM JUSARI’UNE FIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWANI WE ‘EKLIHIMU SUHTE LEBI’SE MA KANU JA’MELUN
5.63: LEWLA JENHAHUMU RABBANIJUNE WEL-’EHBARU ‘AN KAWLIHIMUL-’ITHME WE ‘EKLIHIMU SUHTE LEBI’SE MA KANU JESNA’UN
5.64: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU JEDU ALLAHI MEGLULETUN GULLET ‘EJDIHIM WE LU’INU BIMA KALU BEL JEDAHU MEBSUTETANI JUNFIKU KEJFE JESHA’U WE LEJEZIDENNE KETHIRËN MINHUM MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE TUGJANËN WE KUFRËN WE ‘ELKAJNA BEJNEHUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI KUL-LEMA ‘EWKADU NARËN LILHERBI ‘ETFE’EHALLAHU WE JES’AWNE FIL-’ERDI FESADËN WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUFSIDIN
5.65: WE LEW ‘ENNE ‘EHLEL-KITABI ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEKEFFERNA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LE’EDHALNAHUM XHENNATI NA’IM
5.66: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘EKAMUT-TEWRËTE WEL-’INXHILE WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHIM MIN RABBIHIM LE’EKELU MIN FEWKIHIM WE MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIHIM MINHUM ‘UMMETUN MUKTESIDETUN WE KETHIRUN MINHUM SA’E MA JA’MELUN
5.67: JA ‘EJJUHA RASULU BELLIG MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE WE ‘IN LEM TEF’AL FEMA BELLEGTE RISALETEHU WEL-LAHU JA’SIMUKE MINE NASI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-KAFIRIN
5.68: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LESTUM ‘ALA SHEJ’IN HETTA TUKIMUT-TEWRËTE WEL-’INXHILE WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM WE LEJEZIDENNE KETHIRËN MINHUM MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE TUGJANËN WE KUFRËN FELA TE’SE ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KAFIRIN
5.69: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE SABI’UNE WE NESARA MEN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
5.70: LEKAD ‘EHADHNA MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIM RUSULËN KUL-LEMA XHA’EHUM RASULUN BIMA LA TEHWA ‘ENFUSUHUM FERIKËN KEDHDHEBU WE FERIKËN JEKTULUN
5.71: WE HESIBU ‘ELLA TEKUNE FITNETUN FE’AMU WE SEMMU THUMME TABEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM THUMME ‘AMU WE SEMMU KETHIRUN MINHUM WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
5.72: LEKAD KEFERAL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME WE KALEL-MESIHU JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE A’BUDU ELLAHE RABBI WE RABBEKUM ‘INNEHU MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKAD HERRAMEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIL-XHENNETE WE ME’WAHU NARU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
5.73: LEKAD KEFERAL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE THALITHU THELATHETIN WE MA MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IL-LA ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN WE ‘IN LEM JENTEHU ‘AMMA JEKULUNE LEJEMESSENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.74: ‘EFELA JETUBUNE ‘ILA ALLAHI WE JESTEGFIRUNEHU WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.75: MAL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME ‘IL-LA RASULUN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHI ER-RUSULU WE ‘UMMUHU SIDDIKATUN KANA JE’KULANIT-TA’AME ENDHUR KEJFE NUBEJJINU LEHUMUL-’AJATI THUMME ENDHUR ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
5.76: KUL ‘ETA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JEMLIKU LEKUM DERRËN WE LA NEF’ËN WEL-LAHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
5.77: KUL JA ‘EHLEL-KITABI LA TEGLU FI DINIKUM GAJRAL-HEKKI WE LA TETTEBI’U ‘EHWA’E KAWMIN KAD DELLU MIN KABLU WE ‘EDELLU KETHIRËN WE DELLU ‘AN SEWA’I SEBIL
5.78: LU’INEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ALA LISANI DAWUDE WE ‘ISA EBNI MERJEME DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KANU JA’TEDUN
5.79: KANU LA JETENAHEWNE ‘AN MUNKERIN FE’ALUHU LEBI’SE MA KANU JEF’ALUN
5.80: TERA KETHIRËN MINHUM JETEWEL-LEWNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEBI’SE MA KADDEMET LEHUM ‘ENFUSUHUM ‘EN SEHITEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE FIL-’ADHABI HUM HALIDUN
5.81: WE LEW KANU JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE NEBIJI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MA ETTEHADHUHUM ‘EWLIJA’E WE LEKINNE KETHIRËN MINHUM FASIKUN
5.82: LETEXHIDENNE ‘ESHEDDE NASI ‘ADAWETEN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-JEHUDE WEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU WE LETEXHIDENNE ‘EKRABEHUM MEWEDDETEN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNA NESARA DHALIKE BI’ENNE MINHUM KISSISINE WE RUHBANËN WE ‘ENNEHUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
5.83: WE ‘IDHA SEMI’U MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILA RASULI TERA ‘A’JUNEHUM TEFIDU MINE ED-DEM’I MIMMA ‘ARAFU MINEL-HEKKI JEKULUNE RABBENA ‘AMENNA FAKTUBNA ME’A ESH-SHAHIDIN
5.84: WE MA LENA LA NU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE MA XHA’ENA MINEL-HEKKI WE NETMA’U ‘EN JUDHILENA RABBUNA ME’AL-KAWMI SALIHIN
5.85: FE’ETHABEHUMU ALLAHU BIMA KALU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE DHELIKE XHEZA’UL-MUHSININ
5.87: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUHERRIMU TEJJIBATI MA ‘EHELLEL-LAHU LEKUM WE LA TA’TEDU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
5.88: WE KULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU ALLAHU HELALËN TEJJIBËN WE ETTEKU ELLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ENTUM BIHI MU’UMINUN
5.89: LA JU’UAHIDHUKUMU ALLAHU BIL-LEGWI FI ‘EJMANIKUM WE LEKIN JU’UAHIDHUKUM BIMA ‘AKKADTUMUL-’IMANE FEKEFFARATUHU ‘IT’AMU ‘ASHERATI MESAKINE MIN ‘EWSETI MA TUT’IMUNE ‘EHLIKUM ‘EW KISWETUHUM ‘EW TEHRIRU RAKABETIN FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU THELATHETI ‘EJJAMIN DHALIKE KEFFARATU ‘EJMANIKUM ‘IDHA HELEFTUM WE EHFEDHU ‘EJMANEKUM KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
5.90: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNEMAL-HAMRU WEL-MEJSIRU WEL-’ENSABU WEL-’EZLAMU RIXHSUN MIN ‘AMELI ESH-SHEJTANI FAXHTENIBUHU LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.91: ‘INNEMA JURIDU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘EN JUKI’A BEJNEKUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E FIL-HAMRI WEL-MEJSIRI WE JESUDDEKUM ‘AN DHIKRI ALLAHI WE ‘ANI SELËTI FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUNTEHUN
5.92: WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE EHDHERU FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘ALA RASULINAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
5.93: LEJSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHUNAHUN FIMA TA’IMU ‘IDHA MA ETTEKAW WE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI THUMME ETTEKAW WE ‘AMENU THUMME ETTEKAW WE ‘EHSENU WEL-LAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
5.94: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEJEBLUWENNEKUMU ALLAHU BISHEJ’IN MINE SEJDI TENALUHU ‘EJDIKUM WE RIMAHUKUM LIJA’LEMEL-LAHU MEN JEHAFUHU BIL-GAJBI FEMENI A’TEDA BA’DE DHALIKE FELEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.95: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKTULU SEJDE WE ‘ENTUM HURUMUN WE MEN KATELEHU MINKUM MUTE’AMMIDËN FEXHEZA’UN MITHLU MA KATELE MINE NE’AMI JEHKUMU BIHI DHEWA ‘ADLIN MINKUM HEDJËN BALIGAL-KA’BETI ‘EW KEFFARATUN TA’AMU MESAKINE ‘EW ‘ADLU DHALIKE SIJAMËN LIJEDHUKA WEBALE ‘EMRIHI ‘AFALLAHU ‘AMMA SELEFE WE MEN ‘ADE FEJENTEKIMU ALLAHU MINHU WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
5.96: ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM SEJDUL-BEHRI WE TA’AMUHU META’ËN LEKUM WE LILSSEJJARATI WE HURRIME ‘ALEJKUM SEJDUL-BERRI MA DUMTUM HURUMËN WE ETTEKU ELLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
5.97: XHE’ALEL-LAHUL-KA’BETEL-BEJTEL-HERAME KIJAMËN LILNNASI WE ESH-SHEHRAL-HERAME WEL-HEDJE WEL-KALA’IDE DHALIKE LITA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
5.99: MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGU WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA TEKTUMUN
5.100: KUL LA JESTEWIL-HABITHU WET-TEJJIBU WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKE KETHRATUL-HABITHI FE ETTEKU ELLAHE JA ‘ULIL-’ELBABI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.101: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TES’ELU ‘AN ‘ESHJA’E ‘IN TUBDE LEKUM TESU’UKUM WE ‘IN TES’ELU ‘ANHA HINE JUNEZZELUL-KUR’ANU TUBDE LEKUM ‘AFALLAHU ‘ANHA WEL-LAHU GAFURUN HELIMU
5.102: KAD SE’ELEHA KAWMUN MIN KABLIKUM THUMME ‘ESBEHU BIHA KAFIRIN
5.103: MA XHE’ALEL-LAHU MIN BEHIRATIN WE LA SA’IBETIN WE LA WESILETIN WE LA HAMIN WE LEKINNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’KILUN
5.104: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM TA’ALEW ‘ILA MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU WE ‘ILA RASULI KALU HESBUNA MA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABA’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE ‘ABA’UUHUM LA JA’LEMUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEHTEDUN
5.105: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM LA JEDURRUKUM MEN DEL-LE ‘IDHA EHTEDEJTUM ‘ILA ALLAHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
5.106: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SHEHADETU BEJNIKUM ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU HINEL-WESIJETI ETHNANI DHEWA ‘ADLIN MINKUM ‘EW ‘AHARANI MIN GAJRIKUM ‘IN ‘ENTUM DERABTUM FIL-’ERDI FE’ESABETKUM MUSIBETUL-MEWTI TEHBISUNEHUMA MIN BA’DI SELËTI FEJUKSIMANI BIL-LAHI ‘INI ERTEBTUM LA NESHTERI BIHI THEMENËN WE LEW KANE DHA KURBA WE LA NEKTUMU SHEHADETEL-LAHI ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEMINEL-’ATHIMIN
5.107: FE’IN ‘UTHIRA ‘ALA ‘ENNEHUMA ESTEHEKKA ‘ITHMËN FE’AHARANI JEKUMANI MEKAMEHUMA MINEL-LEDHINE ESTEHEKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-’EWLEJANI FEJUKSIMANI BIL-LAHI LESHEHADETUNA ‘EHEKKU MIN SHEHADETIHIMA WE MA A’TEDEJNA ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
5.108: DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN JE’TU BISH-SHEHADETI ‘ALA WEXHHIHA ‘EW JEHAFU ‘EN TURADDE ‘EJMANUN BA’DE ‘EJMANIHIM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ESMA’U WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-FASIKIN
5.109: JEWME JEXHMA’U ALLAHU ER-RUSULE FEJEKULU MADHA ‘UXHIBTUM KALU LA ‘ILME LENA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
5.110: ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME EDHKUR NI’METI ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA WE E-DETIKE ‘IDH ‘EJJEDTTUKE BIRUHIL-KUDUSI TUKELLIMU NASE FIL-MEHDI WE KEHLËN WE ‘IDH ‘ALLEMTUKEL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WET-TEWRËTE WEL-’INXHILE WE ‘IDH TEHLUKU MINET-TINI KEHEJ’ETIT-TEJRI BI’IDHNI FETENFUHU FIHA FETEKUNU TEJRËN BI’IDHNI WE TUBRI’UL-’EKMEHE WEL-’EBRASE BI’IDHNI WE ‘IDH TUHRIXHUL-MEWTA BI’IDHNI WE ‘IDH KEFEFTU BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ANKE ‘IDH XHI’TEHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEKALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
5.111: WE ‘IDH ‘EWHEJTU ‘ILAL-HEWARIJINE ‘EN ‘AMINU BI WE BIRASULI KALU ‘AMENNA WE ESH/HED BI’ENNENA MUSLIMUN
5.112: ‘IDH KALEL-HEWARIJUNE JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME HEL JESTETI’U RABBUKE ‘EN JUNEZZILE ‘ALEJNA MA’IDETEN MINE SEMA’I KALE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.113: KALU NURIDU ‘EN NE’KULE MINHA WE TETME’INNE KULUBUNA WE NA’LEME ‘EN KAD SEDEKTENA WE NEKUNE ‘ALEJHA MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
5.114: KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEMEL-LEHUMME RABBENA ‘ENZIL ‘ALEJNA MA’IDETEN MINE SEMA’I TEKUNU LENA ‘IDËN LI’WWELINA WE ‘AHIRINA WE ‘AJETEN MINKE WE ERZUKNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRU ER-RAZIKIN
5.115: KALEL-LAHU ‘INNI MUNEZZILUHA ‘ALEJKUM FEMEN JEKFUR BA’DU MINKUM FE’INNI ‘U’ADHDHIBUHU ‘ADHABËN LA ‘U’ADHDHIBUHU ‘EHEDËN MINEL-’ALEMIN
5.116: WE ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME ‘E’ENTE KULTE LILNNASI ETTEHIDHUNI WE ‘UMMIJE ‘ILEHEJNI MIN DUNI ALLAHI KALE SUBHANEKE MA JEKUNU LI ‘EN ‘EKULE MA LEJSE LI BIHEKKIN ‘IN KUNTU KULTUHU FEKAD ‘ALIMTEHU TA’LEMU MA FI NEFSI WE LA ‘A’LEMU MA FI NEFSIKE ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
5.117: MA KULTU LEHUM ‘IL-LA MA ‘EMERTENI BIHI ‘ENI A’BUDU ELLAHE RABBI WE RABBEKUM WE KUNTU ‘ALEJHIM SHEHIDËN MA DUMTU FIHIM FELEMMA TEWEFFEJTENI KUNTE ‘ENTE RAKIBE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ENTE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
5.118: ‘IN TU’ADHDHIBHUM FE’INNEHUM ‘IBADUKE WE ‘IN TEGFIR LEHUM FE’INNEKE ‘ENTEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
5.119: KALEL-LAHU HADHA JEWMU JENFA’U SADIKINE SIDKUHUM LEHUM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN RADIJEL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU DHALIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
5.120: LIL-LAHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA FIHINNE WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU

6.1: EL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE XHE’ALE EDH-DHULUMATI WE NURA THUMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM JA’DILUN
6.2: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN TININ THUMME KADA ‘EXHELËN WE ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN ‘INDEHU THUMME ‘ENTUM TEMTERUN
6.3: WE HUWEL-LAHU FI SEMAWATI WE FIL-’ERDI JA’LEMU SIRRAKUM WE XHEHRAKUM WE JA’LEMU MA TEKSIBUN
6.4: WE MA TE’TIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN MIN ‘AJATI RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA KANU ‘ANHA MU’RIDIN
6.5: FEKAD KEDHDHEBU BIL-HEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM FESEWFE JE’TIHIM ‘ENBA’U MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
6.6: ‘ELEM JERAW KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MIN KARNIN MEKKENNAHUM FIL-’ERDI MA LEM NUMEKKIN LEKUM WE ‘ERSELNA SEMA’E ‘ALEJHIM MIDRARËN WE XHE’ALNAL-’ENHARA TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIM FE’EHLEKNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE ‘ENSHE’NA MIN BA’DIHIM KARNËN ‘AHARIN
6.7: WE LEW NEZZELNA ‘ALEJKE KITABËN FI KIRTASIN FELEMESUHU BI’EJDIHIM LEKALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
6.8: WE KALU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI MELEKUN WE LEW ‘ENZELNA MELEKËN LEKUDIJEL-’EMRU THUMME LA JUNDHERUN
6.9: WE LEW XHE’ALNAHU MELEKËN LEXHE’ALNAHU RAXHULËN WE LELEBESNA ‘ALEJHIM MA JELBISUN
6.10: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FEHAKA BIEL-LEDHINE SEHIRU MINHUM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
6.11: KUL SIRU FIL-’ERDI THUMME ENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
6.12: KUL LIMEN MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KUL LIL-LAHI KETEBE ‘ALA NEFSIHI RAHMETE LEJEXHME’ANNEKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHIL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
6.13: WE LEHU MA SEKENE FIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
6.14: KUL ‘EGAJRAL-LAHI ‘ETTEHIDHU WELIJËN FATIRI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE HUWE JUT’IMU WE LA JUT’AMU KUL ‘INNI ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE ‘EWWELE MEN ‘ESLEME WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.16: MEN JUSRAF ‘ANHU JEWME’IDHIN FEKAD RAHIMEHU WE DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-MUBIN
6.17: WE ‘IN JEMSESKEL-LAHU BIDURRIN FELA KASHIFE LEHU ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘IN JEMSESKE BIHAJRIN FEHUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
6.19: KUL ‘EJJU SHEJ’IN ‘EKBERU SHEHADETEN KULI ALLAHU SHEHIDUN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE HADHAL-KUR’ANU LI’NDHIRAKUM BIHI WE MEN BELEGA ‘E’INNEKUM LETESH/HEDUNE ‘ENNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ALIHETEN ‘UHRA KUL LA ‘ESH/HEDU KUL ‘INNEMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN WE ‘INNENI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
6.20: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’RIFUNEHU KEMA JA’RIFUNE ‘EBNA’EHUMUL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
6.21: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.22: WE JEWME NEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’UUKUMUL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
6.23: THUMME LEM TEKUN FITNETUHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU WEL-LEHI RABBINA MA KUNNA MUSHRIKIN
6.24: ENDHUR KEJFE KEDHEBU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
6.25: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’U ‘ILEJKE WE XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRËN WE ‘IN JERAW KUL-LE ‘AJETIN LA JU’UMINU BIHA HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’UKE JUXHADILUNEKE JEKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
6.26: WE HUM JENHEWNE ‘ANHU WE JEN’EWNE ‘ANHU WE ‘IN JUHLIKUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSEHUM WE MA JESH’URUN
6.27: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH WUKIFU ‘ALA NARI FEKALU JA LEJTENA NURADDU WE LA NUKEDHDHIBE BI’AJATI RABBINA WE NEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
6.28: BEL BEDA LEHUM MA KANU JUHFUNE MIN KABLU WE LEW RUDDU LA’ADU LIMA NUHU ‘ANHU WE ‘INNEHUM LEKADHIBUN
6.29: WE KALU ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA ED-DUNJA WE MA NEHNU BIMEB’UTHIN
6.30: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH WUKIFU ‘ALA RABBIHIM KALE ‘ELEJSE HADHA BIL-HEKKI KALU BELA WE RABBINA KALE FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
6.31: KAD HASIRAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’I ALLAHI HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’ET/HUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN KALU JA HESRATENA ‘ALA MA FERRATNA FIHA WE HUM JEHMILUNE ‘EWZARAHUM ‘ALA DHUHURIHIM ‘ELA SA’E MA JEZIRUN
6.32: WE MAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA ‘IL-LA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE LELDDARUL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
6.33: KAD NA’LEMU ‘INNEHU LEJEHZUNUKEL-LEDHI JEKULUNE FE’INNEHUM LA JUKEDHDHIBUNEKE WE LEKINNE EDH-DHALIMINE BI’AJATI ALLAHI JEXHHEDUN
6.34: WE LEKAD KUDHDHIBET RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE FESEBERU ‘ALA MA KUDHDHIBU WE ‘UDHU HETTA ‘ETAHUM NESRUNA WE LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATI ALLAHI WE LEKAD XHA’EKE MIN NEBE’IL-MURSELIN
6.35: WE ‘IN KANE KEBURA ‘ALEJKE ‘I’RADUHUM FE’INI ESTETA’TE ‘EN TEBTEGIJE NEFEKËN FIL-’ERDI ‘EW SULLEMËN FI SEMA’I FETE’TIJEHUM BI’AJETIN WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LEXHEME’AHUM ‘ALEL-HUDA FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-XHAHILIN
6.36: ‘INNEMA JESTEXHIBUL-LEDHINE JESMA’UNE WEL-MEWTA JEB’ATHUHUMU ALLAHU THUMME ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UN
6.37: WE KALU LEWLA NUZZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE KADIRUN ‘ALA ‘EN JUNEZZILE ‘AJETEN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
6.38: WE MA MIN DABBETIN FIL-’ERDI WE LA TA’IRIN JETIRU BIXHENAHEJHI ‘IL-LA ‘UMEMUN ‘EMTHALUKUM MA FERRATNA FIL-KITABI MIN SHEJ’IN THUMME ‘ILA RABBIHIM JUHSHERUN
6.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA SUMMUN WE BUKMUN FI EDH-DHULUMATI MEN JESHE’I ALLAHU JUDLILHU WE MEN JESHE’ JEXH’ALHU ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
6.40: KUL ‘ERA’EJTEKUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABU ALLAHI ‘EW ‘ETETKUMU SA’ATU ‘EGAJRAL-LAHI TED’UNE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
6.41: BEL ‘IJAHU TED’UNE FEJEKSHIFU MA TED’UNE ‘ILEJHI ‘IN SHA’E WE TENSEWNE MA TUSHRIKUN
6.42: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA ‘UMEMIN MIN KABLIKE FE’EHADHNAHUM BIL-BE’SA’I WE ED-DERRA’I LE’ALLEHUM JETEDERRA’UN
6.43: FELEWLA ‘IDH XHA’EHUM BE’SUNA TEDERRA’U WE LEKIN KASET KULUBUHUM WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU MA KANU JA’MELU
6.44: FELEMMA NESU MA DHUKKIRU BIHI FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM ‘EBWABE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HETTA ‘IDHA FERIHU BIMA ‘UTU ‘EHADHNAHUM BEGTETEN FE’IDHA HUM MUBLISUN
6.45: FEKUTI’A DABIRUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WEL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.46: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘EHADHEL-LAHU SEM’AKUM WE ‘EBSARAKUM WE HATEME ‘ALA KULUBIKUM MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU ALLAHI JE’TIKUM BIHI ENDHUR KEJFE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI THUMME HUM JESDIFUN
6.47: KUL ‘ERA’EJTEKUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABU ALLAHI BEGTETEN ‘EW XHEHRATEN HEL JUHLEKU ‘IL-LAL-KAWMU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.48: WE MA NURSILUL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE FEMEN ‘AMENE WE ‘ESLEHE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
6.49: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA JEMESSUHUMUL-’ADHABU BIMA KANU JEFSUKUN
6.50: KUL LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INDI HAZA’INU ALLAHI WE LA ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE WE LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INNI MELEKUN ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE KUL HEL JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU ‘EFELA TETEFEKKERUN
6.51: WE ‘ENDHIR BIHIL-LEDHINE JEHAFUNE ‘EN JUHSHERU ‘ILA RABBIHIM LEJSE LEHUM MIN DUNIHI WE LIJUN WE LA SHEFI’UN LE’ALLEHUM JETTEKUN
6.52: WE LA TETRUDIL-LEDHINE JED’UNE RABBEHUM BIL-GADËTI WEL-’ASHIJI JURIDUNE WEXHHEHU MA ‘ALEJKE MIN HISABIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN WE MA MIN HISABIKE ‘ALEJHIM MIN SHEJ’IN FETETRUDEHUM FETEKUNE MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
6.53: WE KEDHELIKE FETENNA BA’DEHUM BIBA’DIN LIJEKULU ‘EHA’UULA’ MENNEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MIN BEJNINA ‘ELEJSEL-LAHU BI’A’LEME BISH-SHAKIRIN
6.54: WE ‘IDHA XHA’EKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATINA FEKUL SELAMUN ‘ALEJKUM KETEBE RABBUKUM ‘ALA NEFSIHI RAHMETE ‘ENNEHU MEN ‘AMILE MINKUM SU’ËN BIXHEHALETIN THUMME TABE MIN BA’DIHI WE ‘ESLEHE FE’ENNEHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
6.55: WE KEDHELIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI WE LITESTEBINE SEBILUL-MUXHRIMIN
6.56: KUL ‘INNI NUHITU ‘EN ‘A’BUDEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI KUL LA ‘ETTEBI’U ‘EHWA’EKUM KAD DELELTU ‘IDHËN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUHTEDIN
6.57: KUL ‘INNI ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE KEDHDHEBTUM BIHI MA ‘INDI MA TESTA’XHILUNE BIHI ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI JEKUSSUL-HEKKA WE HUWE HAJRUL-FASILIN
6.58: KUL LEW ‘ENNE ‘INDI MA TESTA’XHILUNE BIHI LEKUDIJEL-’EMRU BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIDH-DHALIMIN
6.59: WE ‘INDEHU MEFATIHUL-GAJBI LA JA’LEMUHA ‘IL-LA HUWE WE JA’LEMU MA FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE MA TESKUTU MIN WERAKATIN ‘IL-LA JA’LEMUHA WE LA HEBBETIN FI DHULUMATIL-’ERDI WE LA RATBIN WE LA JA BISIN ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
6.60: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JETEWEFFAKUM BIL-LEJLI WE JA’LEMU MA XHERAHTUM BIN-NEHARI THUMME JEB’ATHUKUM FIHI LIJUKDA ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN THUMME ‘ILEJHI MERXHI’UKUM THUMME JUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
6.61: WE HUWEL-KAHIRU FEWKA ‘IBADIHI WE JURSILU ‘ALEJKUM HEFEDHETEN HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’E ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU TEWEFFET/HU RUSULUNA WE HUM LA JUFERRITUN
6.62: THUMME RUDDU ‘ILA ALLAHI MEWLAHUMUL-HEKKI ‘ELA LEHUL-HUKMU WE HUWE ‘ESRA’UL-HASIBIN
6.63: KUL MEN JUNEXHXHIKUM MIN DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI TED’UNEHU TEDERRU’ËN WE HUFJETEN LE’IN ‘ENXHANA MIN HEDHIHI LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
6.64: KULI ALLAHU JUNEXHXHIKUM MINHA WE MIN KUL-LI KERBIN THUMME ‘ENTUM TUSHRIKUN
6.65: KUL HUWEL-KADIRU ‘ALA ‘EN JEB’ATHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABËN MIN FEWKIKUM ‘EW MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIKUM ‘EW JELBISEKUM SHIJA’ËN WE JUDHIKA BA’DEKUM BE’SE BA’DIN ENDHUR KEJFE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI LE’ALLEHUM JEFKAHUN
6.66: WE KEDHDHEBE BIHI KAWMUKE WE HUWEL-HEKKU KUL LESTU ‘ALEJKUM BIWEKILI
6.67: LIKUL-LI NEBE’IIN MUSTEKARRUN WE SEWFE TA’LEMUN
6.68: WE ‘IDHA RA’EJTEL-LEDHINE JEHUDUNE FI ‘AJATINA FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM HETTA JEHUDU FI HEDITHIN GAJRIHI WE ‘IMMA JUNSIJENNEKE ESH-SHEJTANU FELA TEK’UD BA’DE EDH-DHIKRA ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
6.69: WE MA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE MIN HISABIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN WE LEKIN DHIKRA LE’ALLEHUM JETTEKUN
6.70: WE DHERIL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEHUM LA’IBËN WE LEHWEN WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA WE DHEKKIR BIHI ‘EN TUBSELE NEFSUN BIMA KESEBET LEJSE LEHA MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE LIJUN WE LA SHEFI’UN WE ‘IN TA’DIL KUL-LE ‘ADLIN LA JU’UHADH MINHA ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE ‘UBSILU BIMA KESEBU LEHUM SHERABUN MIN HEMIMIN WE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMUN BIMA KANU JEKFURUN
6.71: KUL ‘ENED’U MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JENFA’UNA WE LA JEDURRUNA WE NURADDU ‘ALA ‘A’KABINA BA’DE ‘IDH HEDANALLAHU KAL-LEDHI ESTEHWET/HU ESH-SHEJATINU FIL-’ERDI HEJRANE LEHU ‘ESHABUN JED’UNEHU ‘ILAL-HUDA E’TINA KUL ‘INNE HUDA ALLAHI HUWEL-HUDA WE ‘UMIRNA LINUSLIME LIRABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.72: WE ‘EN ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ETTEKUHU WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
6.73: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI WE JEWME JEKULU KUN FEJEKUNU KAWLUHUL-HEKKU WE LEHUL-MULKU JEWME JUNFEHU FI SURI ‘ALIMUL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-HABI
6.74: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU LI’EBIHI ‘AZERA ‘ETETTEHIDHU ‘ESNAMËN ‘ALIHETEN ‘INNI ‘ERAKE WE KAWMEKE FI DELALIN MUBINI
6.75: WE KEDHELIKE NURI ‘IBRAHIME MELEKUTE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LIJEKUNE MINEL-MUKININ
6.76: FELEMMA XHENNE ‘ALEJHIL-LEJLU RA’A KEWKEBËN KALE HADHA RABBI FELEMMA ‘EFELE KALE LA ‘UHIBBUL-’AFILIN
6.77: FELEMMA RA’AL-KAMERA BAZIGËN KALE HADHA RABBI FELEMMA ‘EFELE KALE LE’IN LEM JEHDINI RABBI LE’EKUNENNE MINEL-KAWMI ED-DALLIN
6.78: FELEMMA RA’A ESH-SHEMSE BAZIGATEN KALE HADHA RABBI HADHA ‘EKBERU FELEMMA ‘EFELET KALE JA KAWMI ‘INNI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
6.79: ‘INNI WEXHXHEHTU WEXHHIJE LILLEDHI FETERA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE HENIFËN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.80: WE HAXHXHEHU KAWMUHU KALE ‘ETUHAXHXHUNI FI ALLAHI WE KAD HEDANI WE LA ‘EHAFU MA TUSHRIKUNE BIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’E RABBI SHEJ’ËN WESI’A RABBI KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘ILMËN ‘EFELA TETEDHEKKERUN
6.81: WE KEJFE ‘EHAFU MA ‘ESHRAKTUM WE LA TEHAFUNE ‘ENNEKUM ‘ESHRAKTUM BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI ‘ALEJKUM SULTANËN FE’EJJUL-FERIKAJNI ‘EHEKKU BIL-’EMNI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
6.82: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEM JELBISU ‘IMANEHUM BIDHULMIN ‘ULA’IKE LEHUMUL-’EMNU WE HUM MUHTEDUN
6.83: WE TILKE HUXHXHETUNA ‘ATEJNAHA ‘IBRAHIME ‘ALA KAWMIHI NERFA’U DERAXHATIN MEN NESHA’U ‘INNE RABBEKE HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.84: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE KULLËN HEDEJNA WE NUHËN HEDEJNA MIN KABLU WE MIN DHURRIJETIHI DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE WE ‘EJJUBE WE JUSUFE WE MUSA WE HARUNE WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
6.85: WE ZEKERIJA WE JEHJA WE ‘ISA WE ‘ILJASE KUL-LUN MINE SALIHIN
6.86: WE ‘ISMA’ILE WEL-JESE’A WE JUNUS WE LUTËN WE KULLËN FEDDELNA ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
6.87: WE MIN ‘ABA’IHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM WE ‘IHWANIHIM WE EXHTEBEJNAHUM WE HEDEJNAHUM ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
6.88: DHALIKE HUDA ALLAHI JEHDI BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE LEW ‘ESHRAKU LEHEBITE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JA’MELUN
6.89: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE FE’IN JEKFUR BIHA HA’UULA’ FEKAD WE KKELNA BIHA KAWMËN LEJSU BIHA BIKAFIRIN
6.90: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HEDALLAHU FEBIHUDAHUMU EKTEDIHI KUL LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRËN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRA LIL’ALEMIN
6.91: WE MA KADERU ELLAHE HEKKA KADRIHI ‘IDH KALU MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU ‘ALA BESHERIN MIN SHEJ’IN KUL MEN ‘ENZELEL-KITABEL-LEDHI XHA’E BIHI MUSA NURËN WE HUDEN LILNNASI TEXH’ALUNEHU KARATISE TUBDUNEHA WE TUHFUNE KETHIRËN WE ‘ULLIMTUM MA LEM TA’LEMU ‘ENTUM WE LA ‘ABA’UUKUM KULI ALLAHU THUMME DHERHUM FI HAWDIHIM JEL’ABUN
6.92: WE HEDHA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU MUBARAKUN MUSEDDIKUL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE LITUNDHIRA ‘UMMEL-KURA WE MEN HEWLEHA WEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE HUM ‘ALA SELATIHIM JUHAFIDHUN
6.93: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KALE ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE WE LEM JUHE ‘ILEJHI SHEJ’UN WE MEN KALE SE’UNZILU MITHLE MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU WE LEW TERA ‘IDHI EDH-DHALIMUNE FI GAMERATIL-MEWTI WEL-MELA’IKETU BASITU ‘EJDIHIM ‘EHRIXHU ‘ENFUSEKUMUL-JEWME TUXHZEWNE ‘ADHABEL-HUNI BIMA KUNTUM TEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI GAJRAL-HEKKI WE KUNTUM ‘AN ‘AJATIHI TESTEKBIRUN
6.94: WE LEKAD XHI’TUMUNA FURADA KEMA HALEKNAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE TERAKTUM MA HAWWELNAKUM WERA’E DHUHURIKUM WE MA NERA ME’AKUM SHUFA’A’EKUMUL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM ‘ENNEHUM FIKUM SHURAKA’U LEKAD TEKATTE’A BEJNEKUM WE DEL-LE ‘ANKUM MA KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
6.95: ‘INNALL-LLAHE FALIKUL-HEBBI WE NEWA JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE MUHRIXHUL-MEJJITI MINEL-HEJJI DHELIKUMU ALLAHU FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
6.96: FALIKUL-’ISBAHI WE XHE’ALEL-LEJLE SEKENËN WE ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA HUSBANËN DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
6.97: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMU NUXHUME LITEHTEDU BIHA FI DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
6.98: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EKUM MIN NEFSIN WAHIDETIN FEMUSTEKARRUN WE MUSTEWDA’UN KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JEFKAHU
6.99: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI NEBATE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN FE’EHRAXHNA MINHU HADIRËN NUHRIXHU MINHU HEBBËN MUTERAKIBËN WE MINE NEHLI MIN TEL’IHA KINWANUN DANIJETUN WE XHENNATIN MIN ‘A’NABIN WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE ER-RUMMANE MUSHTEBIHËN WE GAJRA MUTES'HABIHIN ENDHURU ‘ILA THEMERIHI ‘IDHA ‘ETHMERA WE JEN’IHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKUM LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
6.100: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’EL-XHINNE WE HALEKAHUM WE HARAKU LEHU BENINE WE BENATIN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JESIFUN
6.101: BEDI’U SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LEHU WELEDUN WE LEM TEKUN LEHU SAHIBETUN WE HALEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
6.102: DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN FA’BUDUHU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
6.103: LA TUDRIKUHUL-’EBSARU WE HUWE JUDRIKUL-’EBSARA WE HUWEL-LETIFUL-HABI
6.104: KAD XHA’EKUM BESA’IRU MIN RABBIKUM FEMEN ‘EBSERA FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘AMIJE FE’ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIHEFIDHI
6.105: WE KEDHELIKE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI WE LIJEKULU DERASTE WE LINUBEJJINEHU LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
6.106: ETTEBI’ MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘A’RID ‘ANIL-MUSHRIKIN
6.107: WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA ‘ESHRAKU WE MA XHE’ALNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHËN WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
6.108: WE LA TESUBBUL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI FEJESUBBU ELLAHE ‘ADWEN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN KEDHALIKE ZEJJENNA LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘AMELEHUM THUMME ‘ILA RABBIHIM MERXHI’UHUM FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
6.109: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN XHA’ET/HUM ‘AJETUN LEJU’UMINUNNE BIHA KUL ‘INNEMAL-’AJATU ‘INDEL-LAHI WE MA JUSH’IRUKUM ‘ENNEHA ‘IDHA XHA’ET LA JU’UMINUN
6.110: WE NUKALLIBU ‘EF’IDETEHUM WE ‘EBSARAHUM KEMA LEM JU’UMINU BIHI ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE NEDHERUHUM FI TUGJANIHIM JA’MEHUN
6.111: WE LEW ‘ENNENA NEZZELNA ‘ILEJHIMUL-MELA’IKETE WE KELLEMEHUMUL-MEWTA WE HESHERNA ‘ALEJHIM KUL-LE SHEJ’IN KUBULËN MA KANU LIJU’UMINU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’EL-LAHU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM JEXHHELUN
6.112: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA LIKUL-LI NEBIJIN ‘ADUWËN SHEJATINEL-’INSI WEL-XHINNI JUHI BA’DUHUM ‘ILA BA’DIN ZUHRUFEL-KAWLI GURURËN WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE MA FE’ALUHU FEDHERHUM WE MA JEFTERUN
6.113: WE LITESGA ‘ILEJHI ‘EF’IDETUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE LIJERDEWHU WE LIJEKTERIFU MA HUM MUKTERIFUN
6.114: ‘EFEGAJRAL-LAHI ‘EBTEGI HEKEMËN WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ILEJKUMUL-KITABE MUFESSELËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHU MUNEZZELUN MIN RABBIKE BIL-HEKKI FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
6.115: WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKE SIDKËN WE ‘ADLËN LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATIHI WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
6.116: WE ‘IN TUTI’ ‘EKTHERA MEN FIL-’ERDI JUDIL-LUKE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
6.117: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU MEN JEDILLU ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTEDIN
6.118: FEKULU MIMMA DHUKIRA ESMU ALLAHI ‘ALEJHI ‘IN KUNTUM BI’AJATIHI MU’UMININ
6.119: WE MA LEKUM ‘ELLA TE’KULU MIMMA DHUKIRA ESMU ALLAHI ‘ALEJHI WE KAD FESSELE LEKUM MA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUM ‘IL-LA MA EDTURIRTUM ‘ILEJHI WE ‘INNE KETHIRËN LEJUDIL-LUNE BI’EHWA’IHIM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MU’TEDIN
6.120: WE DHERU DHAHIRAL-’ITHMI WE BATINEHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKSIBUNEL-’ITHME SEJUXHZEWNE BIMA KANU JEKTERIFUN
6.121: WE LA TE’KULU MIMMA LEM JUDHKERI ESMU ALLAHI ‘ALEJHI WE ‘INNEHU LEFISKUN WE ‘INNE ESH-SHEJATINE LEJUHUNE ‘ILA ‘EWLIJA’IHIM LIJUXHADILUKUM WE ‘IN ‘ETA’TUMUHUM ‘INNEKUM LEMUSHRIKUN
6.122: ‘EWEMEN KANE MEJTËN FE’EHJEJNAHU WE XHE’ALNA LEHU NURËN JEMSHI BIHI FI NASI KEMEN METHELUHU FI EDH-DHULUMATI LEJSE BIHARIXHIN MINHA KEDHALIKE ZUJJINE LILKAFIRINE MA KANU JA’MELUN
6.123: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA FI KUL-LI KARJETIN ‘EKABIRA MUXHRIMIHA LIJEMKURU FIHA WE MA JEMKURUNE ‘IL-LA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE MA JESH’URUN
6.124: WE ‘IDHA XHA’ET/HUM ‘AJETUN KALU LEN NU’UMINE HETTA NU’UTA MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE RUSULU ALLAHI ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU HEJTHU JEXH’ALU RISALETEHU SEJUSIBUL-LEDHINE ‘EXHRAMU SEGARUN ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN BIMA KANU JEMKURUN
6.125: FEMEN JURIDI ALLAHU ‘EN JEHDIJEHU JESHRAH SEDRAHU LIL’ISLAMI WE MEN JURID ‘EN JUDILLEHU JEXH’AL SEDRAHU DEJJIKËN HERAXHËN KE’ENNEMA JESSA’’ADU FI SEMA’I KEDHALIKE JEXH’ALU ALLAHU ER-RIXHSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUN
6.126: WE HEDHA SIRATU RABBIKE MUSTEKIMËN KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JEDHDHEKKERUN
6.127: LEHUM DARU SELAMI ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE HUWE WELIJUHUM BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
6.128: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI KADI ESTEKTHERTUM MINEL-’INSI WE KALE ‘EWLIJA’UUHUM MINEL-’INSI RABBENA ESTEMTE’A BA’DUNA BIBA’DIN WE BELEGNA ‘EXHELENAL-LEDHI ‘EXHXHELTE LENA KALE NARU METHWAKUM HALIDINE FIHA ‘IL-LA MA SHA’EL-LAHU ‘INNE RABBEKE HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.129: WE KEDHELIKE NUWELLI BA’DE EDH-DHALIMINE BA’DËN BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
6.130: JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JEKUSSUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJA TI WE JUNDHIRUNEKUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA KALU SHEHIDNA ‘ALA ‘ENFUSINA WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJA ETU ED-DUNJA WE SHEHIDU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ENNEHUM KANU KAFIRIN
6.131: DHALIKE ‘EN LEM JEKUN RABBUKE MUHLIKEL-KURA BIDHULMIN WE ‘EHLUHA GAFILUN
6.132: WE LIKUL-LIN DERAXHATUN MIMMA ‘AMILU WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA JA’MELUN
6.133: WE RABBUKEL-GANIJU DHU RAHMETI ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JESTEHLIF MIN BA’DIKUM MA JESHA’U KEMA ‘ENSHE’EKUM MIN DHURRIJETI KAWMIN ‘AHARIN
6.134: ‘INNE MA TU’ADUNE LE’ATIN WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
6.135: KUL JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN FESEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN TEKUNU LEHU ‘AKIBETU ED-DARI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.136: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI MIMMA DHERA’E MINEL-HERTHI WEL-’EN’AM NESIBËN FEKALU HADHA LIL-LAHI BIZA’MIHIM WE HEDHA LISHURAKA’INA FEMA KANE LISHURAKA’IHIM FELA JESILU ‘ILA ALLAHI WE MA KANE LIL-LAHI FEHUWE JESILU ‘ILA SHURAKA’IHIM SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
6.137: WE KEDHELIKE ZEJJENE LIKETHIRIN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE KATLE ‘EWLADIHIM SHURAKA’UUHUM LIJURDUHUM WE LIJELBISU ‘ALEJHIM DINEHUM WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA FE’ALUHU FEDHERHUM WE MA JEFTERUN
6.138: WE KALU HEDHIHI ‘EN’AMUN WE HERTHUN HIXHRUN LA JET’AMUHA ‘IL-LA MEN NESHA’U BIZA’MIHIM WE ‘EN’AMUN HURRIMET DHUHURUHA WE ‘EN’AMUN LA JEDHKURUNE ESMEL-LAHI ‘ALEJHA EFTIRA’EN ‘ALEJHI SEJEXHZIHIM BIMA KANU JEFTERUN
6.139: WE KALU MA FI BUTUNI HEDHIHIL-’EN’AMI HALISETUN LIDHUKURINA WE MUHERRAMUN ‘ALA ‘EZWAXHINA WE ‘IN JEKUN MEJTETEN FEHUM FIHI SHURAKA’U SEJEXHZIHIM WESFEHUM ‘INNEHU HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.140: KAD HASIRAL-LEDHINE KATELU ‘EWLADEHUM SEFEHËN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE HERRAMU MA RAZEKAHUMU ALLAHU EFTIRA’EN ‘ALA ALLAHI KAD DELLU WE MA KANU MUHTEDIN
6.141: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’E XHENNATIN MA’RUSHATIN WE GAJRA MA’RUSHATIN WE NEHLE WE EZ-ZER’A MUHTELIFËN ‘UKULUHU WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE ER-RUMMANE MUTES'HABIHËN WE GAJRA MUTES'HABIHIN KULU MIN THEMERIHI ‘IDHA ‘ETHMERA WE ‘ATU HEKKAHU JEWME HESADIHI WE LA TUSRIFU ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSRIFIN
6.142: WE MINEL-’EN’AMI HEMULETEN WE FERSHËN KULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU ALLAHU WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWATI ESH-SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
6.143: THEMANIJETE ‘EZWAXHIN MINE ED-DE’NI ETHNEJNI WE MINEL-MA’ZI ETHNEJNI KUL ‘ALDHDHEKERAJNI HERRAME ‘EMIL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EMMA ESHTEMELET ‘ALEJHI ‘ERHAMUL-’UNTHEJEJNI NEBBI’UNI BI’ILMIN ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
6.144: WE MINEL-’IBILI ETHNEJNI WE MINEL-BEKARI ETHNEJNI KUL ‘ALDHDHEKERAJNI HERRAME ‘EMIL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EMMA ESHTEMELET ‘ALEJHI ‘ERHAMUL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EM KUNTUM SHUHEDA’E ‘IDH WESSAKUMU ALLAHU BIHEDHA FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN LIJUDILLE NASE BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
6.145: KUL LA ‘EXHIDU FI MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE MUHERRAMËN ‘ALA TA’IMIN JET’AMUHU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JEKUNE MEJTETEN ‘EW DEMËN MESFUHËN ‘EW LEHME HINZIRIN FE’INNEHU RIXHSUN ‘EW FISKËN ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI ALLAHI BIHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BAGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FE’INNE RABBEKE GAFURUN RAHIMU
6.146: WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA KUL-LE DHI DHUFURIN WE MINEL-BEKARI WEL-GANEMI HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIM SHUHUMEHUMA ‘IL-LA MA HEMELET DHUHURUHUMA ‘EWIL-HEWAJA ‘EW MA EHTELETE BI’ADHMIN DHALIKE XHEZEJNAHUM BIBEGJIHIM WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
6.147: FE’IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKUL RABBUKUM DHU RAHMETIN WASI’ATIN WE LA JURADDU BE’SUHU ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-MUXHRIMIN
6.148: SEJEKULUL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA ‘ESHRAKNA WE LA ‘ABA’UUNA WE LA HERRAMNA MIN SHEJ’IN KEDHALIKE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM HETTA DHAKU BE’SENA KUL HEL ‘INDEKUM MIN ‘ILMIN FETUHRIXHUHU LENA ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA TEHRUSUN
6.150: KUL HELUMME SHUHEDA’EKUMUL-LEDHINE JESH/HEDUNE ‘ENNEL-LAHE HERRAME HADHA FE’IN SHEHIDU FELA TESH/HED ME’AHUM WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWA’EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE HUM BIRABBIHIM JA’DILUN
6.151: KUL TA’ALEW ‘ETLU MA HERRAME RABBUKUM ‘ALEJKUM ‘ELLA TUSHRIKU BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE BIL-WALIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE LA TEKTULU ‘EWLADEKUM MIN ‘IMLAKIN NEHNU NERZUKUKUM WE ‘IJAHUM WE LA TEKRABUL-FEWAHISHE MA DHEHERA MINHA WE MA BETENE WE LA TEKTULU NEFSEL-LETI HERRAMEL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
6.152: WE LA TEKRABU MALEL-JETIMI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU HETTA JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ‘EWFUL-KEJLE WEL-MIZANE BIL-KISTI LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA WE ‘IDHA KULTUM FA’DILU WE LEW KANE DHA KURBA WE BI’AHDI ALLAHI ‘EWFU DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
6.153: WE ‘ENNE HADHA SIRATI MUSTEKIMËN FE ETTEBI’UHU WE LA TETTEBI’U SUBULE FETEFERRAKA BIKUM ‘AN SEBILIHI DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
6.154: THUMME ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE TEMAMËN ‘ALEL-LEDHI ‘EHSENE WE TEFSILËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDEN WE RAHMETEN LE’ALLEHUM BILIKA’I RABBIHIM JU’UMINUN
6.155: WE HEDHA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU MUBARAKUN FE ETTEBI’UHU WE ETTEKU LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
6.156: ‘EN TEKULU ‘INNEMA ‘UNZILEL-KITABU ‘ALA TA’IFETEJNI MIN KABLINA WE ‘IN KUNNA ‘AN DIRASETIHIM LEGAFILIN
6.157: ‘EW TEKULU LEW ‘ENNA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNAL-KITABU LEKUNNA ‘EHDA MINHUM FEKAD XHA’EKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE HUDEN WE RAHMETUN FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE SEDEFE ‘ANHA SENEXHZIL-LEDHINE JESDIFUNE ‘AN ‘AJATINA SU’EL-’ADHABI BIMA KANU JESDIFUN
6.158: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUMUL-MELA’IKETU ‘EW JE’TIJE RABBUKE ‘EW JE’TIJE BA’DU ‘AJATI RABBIKE JEWME JE’TI BA’DU ‘AJATI RABBIKE LA JENFA’U NEFSËN ‘IMANUHA LEM TEKUN ‘AMENET MIN KABLU ‘EW KESEBET FI ‘IMANIHA HAJRËN KUL ENTEDHIRU ‘INNA MUNTEDHIRUN
6.159: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE FERRAKU DINEHUM WE KANU SHIJA’ËN LESTE MINHUM FI SHEJ’IN ‘INNEMA ‘EMRUHUM ‘ILA ALLAHI THUMME JUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA KANU JEF’ALUN
6.160: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU ‘ASHRU ‘EMTHALIHA WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FELA JUXHZA ‘IL-LA MITHLEHA WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
6.161: KUL ‘INNENI HEDANI RABBI ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMIN DINËN KIJEMËN MILLETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.162: KUL ‘INNE SELATI WE NUSUKI WE MEHJAJE WE MEMATI LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.163: LA SHERIKE LEHU WE BIDHELIKE ‘UMIRTU WE ‘ENA ‘EWWELUL-MUSLIMIN
6.164: KUL ‘EGAJRAL-LAHI ‘EBGI RABBËN WE HUWE RABBU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE LA TEKSIBU KUL-LU NEFSIN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEJHA WE LA TEZIRU WAZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM MERXHI’UKUM FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
6.165: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEKUM HALA’IFEL-’ERDI WE RAFE’A BA’DEKUM FEWKA BA’DIN DERAXHATIN LIJEBLUWEKUM FI MA ‘ATAKUM ‘INNE RABBEKE SERI’UL-’IKABI WE ‘INNEHU LEGAFURUN RAHIMU

7.2: KITABUN ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE FELA JEKUN FI SEDRIKE HERAXHUN MINHU LITUNDHIRA BIHI WE DHIKRA LILMU’UMININ
7.3: ETTEBI’U MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM WE LA TETTEBI’U MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN
7.4: WE KEM MIN KARJETIN ‘EHLEKNAHA FEXHA’EHA BE’SUNA BEJATËN ‘EW HUM KA’ILUN
7.5: FEMA KANE DA’WAHUM ‘IDH XHA’EHUM BE’SUNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘INNA KUNNA DHALIMIN
7.7: FELENEKUSSENNE ‘ALEJHIM BI’ILMIN WE MA KUNNA GA’IBIN
7.8: WEL-WEZNU JEWME’IDHINL-HEKKU FEMEN THEKULET MEWAZINUHU FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
7.9: WE MEN HAFFET MEWAZINUHU FE’ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM BIMA KANU BI’AJATINA JEDHLIMUN
7.10: WE LEKAD MEKKENNAKUM FIL-’ERDI WE XHE’ALNA LEKUM FIHA MA’AJISHE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
7.11: WE LEKAD HALEKNAKUM THUMME SEWWERNAKUM THUMME KULNA LILMELA’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE LEM JEKUN MINE SAXHIDIN
7.12: KALE MA MENE’AKE ‘ELLA TESXHUDE ‘IDH ‘EMERTUKE KALE ‘ENA HAJRUN MINHU HALEKTENI MIN NARIN WE HALEKTEHU MIN TINI
7.13: KALE FAHBIT MINHA FEMA JEKUNU LEKE ‘EN TETEKEBBERA FIHA FAHRUXH ‘INNEKE MINE SAGIRIN
7.17: THUMME LE’ATIJENNEHUM MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM WE MIN HALFIHIM WE ‘AN ‘EJMANIHIM WE ‘AN SHEMA’ILIHIM WE LA TEXHIDU ‘EKTHERAHUM SHAKIRIN
7.18: KALE EHRUXH MINHA MEDH’UMËN MEDHURËN LEMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
7.19: WE JA’ADEMU ESKUN ‘ENTE WE ZEWXHUKEL-XHENNETE FEKULA MIN HEJTHU SHI’TUMA WE LA TEKRABA HEDHIHI ESH-SHEXHERATE FETEKUNA MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
7.20: FEWESWESE LEHUMA ESH-SHEJTANU LIJUBDIJE LEHUMA MA WURIJE ‘ANHUMA MIN SEW’ATIHIMA WE KALE MA NEHAKUMA RABBUKUMA ‘AN HEDHIHI ESH-SHEXHERATI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNA MELEKEJNI ‘EW TEKUNA MINEL-HALIDIN
7.22: FEDALLAHUMA BIGURURIN FELEMMA DHAKA ESH-SHEXHERATE BEDET LEHUMA SEW’ATUHUMA WE TEFIKA JEHSIFANI ‘ALEJHIMA MIN WERAKIL-XHENNETI WE NADAHUMA RABBUHUMA ‘ELEM ‘ENHEKUMA ‘AN TILKUMA ESH-SHEXHERATI WE ‘EKUL LEKUMA ‘INNE ESH-SHEJTANE LEKUMA ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
7.23: KALA RABBENA DHELEMNA ‘ENFUSENA WE ‘IN LEM TEGFIR LENA WE TERHEMNA LENEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
7.24: KALE EHBITU BA’DUKUM LIBA’DIN ‘ADUWUN WE LEKUM FIL-’ERDI MUSTEKARRUN WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
7.25: KALE FIHA TEHJEWNE WE FIHA TEMUTUNE WE MINHA TUHRAXHUN
7.26: JA BENI ‘ADEME KAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKUM LIBASËN JUWARI SEW’’ATIKUM WE RISHËN WE LIBASUT-TEKWA DHALIKE HAJRUN DHALIKE MIN ‘AJA TI ALLAHI LE’ALLEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
7.27: JA BENI ‘ADEME LA JEFTINENNEKUMU ESH-SHEJTANU KEMA ‘EHRAXHE ‘EBEWEJKUM MINEL-XHENNETI JENZI’U ‘ANHUMA LIBASEHUMA LIJURIJEHUMA SEW’’ATIHIMA ‘INNEHU JERAKUM HUWE WE KABILUHU MIN HEJTHU LA TERAWNEHUM ‘INNA XHE’ALNA ESH-SHEJA TINE ‘EWLIJA ‘E LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUN
7.28: WE ‘IDHA FE’ALU FAHISHETEN KALU WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHA ‘ABA’ENA WEL-LAHU ‘EMERANA BIHA KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JE’MURU BIL-FEHSHA’I ‘ETEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.29: KUL ‘EMERA RABBI BIL-KISTI WE ‘EKIMU WUXHUHEKUM ‘INDE KUL-LI MESXHIDIN WE ED’UHU MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINE KEMA BEDE’EKUM TA’UDUN
7.30: FERIKËN HEDA WE FERIKËN HEKKA ‘ALEJHIMU ED-DELALETU ‘INNEHUMU ETTEHADHU ESH-SHEJATINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM MUHTEDUN
7.31: JA BENI ‘ADEME HUDHU ZINETEKUM ‘INDE KUL-LI MESXHIDIN WE KULU WE ESHRABU WE LA TUSRIFU ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSRIFIN
7.32: KUL MEN HERRAME ZINETEL-LAHI EL-LETI ‘EHRAXHE LI’IBADIHI WET-TEJJIBATI MINE ER-RIZKI KUL HIJE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA HALISETEN JEWMEL-KIJAMETI KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
7.33: KUL ‘INNEMA HERRAME RABBIJEL-FEWAHISHE MA DHEHERA MINHA WE MA BETENE WEL-’ITHME WEL-BEGJE BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE ‘EN TUSHRIKU BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE ‘EN TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.34: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELUN FE’IDHA XHA’E ‘EXHELUHUM LA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
7.35: JA BENI ‘ADEME ‘IMMA JE’TIJENNEKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JEKUSSUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJA TI FEMENI ETTEKA WE ‘ESLEHE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
7.36: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ESTEKBERU ‘ANHA ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
7.37: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘ULA’IKE JENALUHUM NESIBUHUM MINEL-KITABI HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUNA JETEWEFFEWNEHUM KALU ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI KALU DELLU ‘ANNA WE SHEHIDU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ENNEHUM KANU KAFIRIN
7.38: KALE EDHULU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIKUM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI FI NARI KUL-LEMA DEHALET ‘UMMETUN LE’ANET ‘UHTEHA HETTA ‘IDHA EDDARAKU FIHA XHEMI’ËN KALET ‘UHRAHUM LI’WLAHUM RABBENA HA’UULA’ ‘EDELLUNA FE’ATIHIM ‘ADHABËN DI’FËN MINE NARI KALE LIKUL-LIN DI’FUN WE LEKIN LA TA’LEMUN
7.39: WE KALET ‘ULAHUM LI’HRAHUM FEMA KANE LEKUM ‘ALEJNA MIN FEDLIN FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
7.40: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ESTEKBERU ‘ANHA LA TUFETTEHU LEHUM ‘EBWABU SEMA’I WE LA JEDHULUNEL-XHENNETE HETTA JELIXHEL-XHEMELU FI SEMMIL-HIJATI WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUXHRIMIN
7.41: LEHUM MIN XHEHENNEME MIHADUN WE MIN FEWKIHIM GAWASHIN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.42: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
7.43: WE NEZA’NA MA FI SUDURIHIM MIN GILLIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU WE KALUL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HEDANA LIHEDHA WE MA KUNNA LINEHTEDIJE LEWLA ‘EN HEDANALLAHU LEKAD XHA’ET RUSULU RABBINA BIL-HEKKI WE NUDU ‘EN TILKUMUL-XHENNETU ‘URITHTUMUHA BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
7.44: WE NADA ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI ‘ESHABE NARI ‘EN KAD WEXHEDNA MA WE’ADENA RABBUNA HEKKËN FEHEL WEXHEDTUM MA WE’ADE RABBUKUM HEKKËN KALU NE’AM FE’EDHDHENE MU’UEDHDHINUN BEJNEHUM ‘EN LA’NETU ALLAHI ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
7.45: EL-LEDHINE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI KAFIRUN
7.46: WE BEJNEHUMA HIXHABUN WE ‘ALEL-’A’RAFI RIXHALUN JA’RIFUNE KULLËN BISIMAHUM WE NADEW ‘ESHABEL-XHENNETI ‘EN SELAMUN ‘ALEJKUM LEM JEDHULUHA WE HUM JETMA’UN
