7.47: WE ‘IDHA SURIFET ‘EBSARUHUM TILKA’E ‘ES'HABI NARI KALU RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.48: WE NADA ‘ESHABUL-’A’RAFI RIXHALËN JA’RIFUNEHUM BISIMAHUM KALU MA ‘EGNA ‘ANKUM XHEM’UKUM WE MA KUNTUM TESTEKBIRUN
7.49: ‘EHA’UULA’L-LEDHINE ‘EKSEMTUM LA JENALUHUMU ALLAHU BIRAHMETIN EDHULUL-XHENNETE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘ENTUM TEHZENUN
7.50: WE NADA ‘ESHABU NARI ‘ESHABEL-XHENNETI ‘EN ‘EFIDU ‘ALEJNA MINEL-MA’I ‘EW MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU ALLAHU KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HERRAMEHUMA ‘ALEL-KAFIRIN
7.51: EL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEHUM LEHWEN WE LA’IBËN WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA FALJEWME NENSAHUM KEMA NESU LIKA’E JEWMIHIM HADHA WE MA KANU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
7.52: WE LEKAD XHI’NAHUM BIKITABIN FESSELNAHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN HUDEN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
7.53: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA TE’WILEHU JEWME JE’TI TE’WILUHU JEKULUL-LEDHINE NESUHU MIN KABLU KAD XHA’ET RUSULU RABBINA BIL-HEKKI FEHEL LENA MIN SHUFA’A’E FEJESHFA’U LENA ‘EW NURADDU FENA’MELE GAJRAL-LEDHI KUNNA NA’MELU KAD HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
7.54: ‘INNE RABBEKUMU ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JUGSHIL-LEJLE NEHARA JETLUBUHU HETHITHËN WE ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA WE NUXHUME MUSEHHARATIN BI’EMRIHI ‘ELA LEHUL-HALKU WEL-’EMRU TEBARAKEL-LAHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
7.55: ED’U RABBEKUM TEDERRU’ËN WE HUFJETEN ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
7.56: WE LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ERDI BA’DE ‘ISLAHIHA WE ED’UHU HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN ‘INNE RAHMETEL-LAHI KARIBUN MINEL-MUHSININ
7.57: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JURSILU ER-RIJAHE BUSHRËN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI HETTA ‘IDHA ‘EKAL-LET SEHABËN THIKALËN SUKNAHU LIBELEDIN MEJJITIN FE’ENZELNA BIHIL-MA’E FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI KEDHALIKE NUHRIXHUL-MEWTA LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
7.58: WEL-BELEDUT-TEJJIBU JEHRUXHU NEBATUHU BI’IDHNI RABBIHI WEL-LEDHI HABUTHE LA JEHRUXHU ‘IL-LA NEKIDËN KEDHALIKE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JESHKURUN
7.59: LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
7.60: KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMIHI ‘INNA LENERAKE FI DELALIN MUBINI
7.61: KALE JA KAWMI LEJSE BI DELALETUN WE LEKINNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.62: ‘UBELLIGUKUM RISALATI RABBI WE ‘ENSEHU LEKUM WE ‘A’LEMU MINEL-LAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.63: ‘EWE’AXHIBTUM ‘EN XHA’EKUM DHIKRUN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINKUM LIJUNDHIRAKUM WE LITETTEKU WE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
7.64: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’ENXHEJNAHU WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU FIL-FULKI WE ‘EGRAKNAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWMËN ‘AMIN
7.65: WE ‘ILA ‘ADIN ‘EHAHUM HUDËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
7.66: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI ‘INNA LENERAKE FI SEFAHETIN WE ‘INNA LENEDHUNNUKE MINEL-KADHIBIN
7.67: KALE JA KAWMI LEJSE BI SEFAHETUN WE LEKINNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.69: ‘EWE’AXHIBTUM ‘EN XHA’EKUM DHIKRUN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINKUM LIJUNDHIRAKUM WE EDHKURU ‘IDH XHE’ALEKUM HULEFA’E MIN BA’DI KAWMI NUHIN WE ZADEKUM FIL-HALKI BESTETEN FADHKURU ‘ALA’EL-LAHI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
7.70: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LINA’BUDEL-LAHE WEHDEHU WE NEDHERA MA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUNA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
7.71: KALE KAD WEKA’A ‘ALEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM RIXHSUN WE GADEBUN ‘ETUXHADILUNENI FI ‘ESMA’IN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABA’UUKUM MA NEZZELEL-LAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN FANTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
7.72: FE’ENXHEJNAHU WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE KATA’NA DABIRAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE MA KANU MU’UMININ
7.73: WE ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU KAD XHA’ETKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM HEDHIHI NAKATU ALLAHI LEKUM ‘AJETEN FEDHERUHA TE’KUL FI ‘ERDI ALLAHI WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
7.74: WE EDHKURU ‘IDH XHE’ALEKUM HULEFA’E MIN BA’DI ‘ADIN WE BEWWE’EKUM FIL-’ERDI TETTEHIDHUNE MIN SUHULIHA KUSURËN WE TENHITUNEL-XHIBALE BUJUTËN FADHKURU ‘ALA’EL-LAHI WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ERDI MUFSIDIN
7.75: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU MIN KAWMIHI LIL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIMEN ‘AMENE MINHUM ‘ETA’LEMUNE ‘ENNE SALIHËN MURSELUN MIN RABBIHI KALU ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILE BIHI MU’UMINUN
7.77: FE’AKARU NAKATE WE ‘ATEW ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHIM WE KALU JA SALIHU E’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINEL-MURSELIN
7.78: FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
7.79: FETEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA KAWMI LEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM RISALETE RABBI WE NESEHTU LEKUM WE LEKIN LA TUHIBBUNE NASIHIN
7.80: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘ETE’TUNEL-FAHISHETE MA SEBEKAKUM BIHA MIN ‘EHEDIN MINEL-’ALEMIN
7.81: ‘INNEKUM LETE’TUNE ER-RIXHALE SHEHWETEN MIN DUNI NISA’ BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN MUSRIFUN
7.82: WE MA KANE XHEWABE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EHRIXHUHUM MIN KARJETIKUM ‘INNEHUM ‘UNASUN JETETEHHERU
7.85: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU KAD XHA’ETKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM FE’EWFUL-KEJLE WEL-MIZANE WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA ‘EHUM WE LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ERDI BA’DE ‘ISLAHIHA DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
7.86: WE LA TEK’UDU BIKUL-LI SIRATIN TU’IDUNE WE TESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI MEN ‘AMENE BIHI WE TEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE EDHKURU ‘IDH KUNTUM KALILËN FEKETHTHERAKUM WE ENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
7.87: WE ‘IN KANE TA’IFETUN MINKUM ‘AMENU BIEL-LEDHI ‘URSILTU BIHI WE TA’IFETUN LEM JU’UMINU FASBIRU HETTA JEHKUMEL-LAHU BEJNENA WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN
7.88: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU MIN KAWMIHI LENUHRIXHENNEKE JA SHU’AJBU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AKE MIN KARJETINA ‘EW LETA’UDUNNE FI MILLETINA KALE ‘EWELEW KUNNA KARIHIN
7.89: KADI EFTERAJNA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘IN ‘UDNA FI MILLETIKUM BA’DE ‘IDH NEXHXHANALLAHU MINHA WE MA JEKUNU LENA ‘EN NA’UDE FIHA ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’EL-LAHU RABBUNA WESI’A RABBUNA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘ILMËN ‘ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELNA RABBENA EFTEH BEJNENA WE BEJNE KAWMINA BIL-HEKKI WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-FATIHIN
7.90: WE KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI LE’INI ETTEBA’TUM SHU’AJBËN ‘INNEKUM ‘IDHËN LEHASIRUN
7.91: FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
7.92: EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU SHU’AJBËN KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU SHU’AJBËN KANU HUMUL-HASIRIN
7.93: FETEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA KAWMI LEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM RISALATI RABBI WE NESEHTU LEKUM FEKEJFE ‘ASA ‘ALA KAWMIN KAFIRIN
7.94: WE MA ‘ERSELNA FI KARJETIN MIN NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA ‘EHADHNA ‘EHLEHA BIL-BE’SA’I WE ED-DERRA’I LE’ALLEHUM JEDDERRA’UN
7.95: THUMME BEDDELNA MEKANE SEJJI’ETIL-HESENETE HETTA ‘AFEW WE KALU KAD MESSE ‘ABA’ENA ED-DERRA’U WE SERRA’U FE’EHADHNAHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
7.96: WE LEW ‘ENNE ‘EHLEL-KURA ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEFETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BERAKATIN MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI WE LEKIN KEDHDHEBU FE’EHADHNAHUM BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
7.97: ‘EFE’EMINE ‘EHLUL-KURA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM BE’SUNA BEJATËN WE HUM NA’IMUN
7.98: ‘EWE ‘EMINE ‘EHLUL-KURA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM BE’SUNA DUHEN WE HUM JEL’ABUN
7.100: ‘EWELEM JEHDI LIL-LEDHINE JERITHUNEL-’ERDE MIN BA’DI ‘EHLIHA ‘EN LEW NESHA’U ‘ESEBNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE NETBA’U ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JESMA’UN
7.101: TILKEL-KURA NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE MIN ‘ENBA’IHA WE LEKAD XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEMA KANU LIJU’UMINU BIMA KEDHDHEBU MIN KABLU KEDHALIKE JETBA’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIL-KAFIRIN
7.102: WE MA WEXHEDNA LI’KTHERIHIM MIN ‘AHDIN WE ‘IN WEXHEDNA ‘EKTHERAHUM LEFASIKIN
7.103: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BA’DIHIM MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FEDHELEMU BIHA FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
7.104: WE KALE MUSA JA FIR’AWNU ‘INNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.105: HEKIKUN ‘ALA ‘EN LA ‘EKULE ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HEKKA KAD XHI’TUKUM BIBEJJINETIN MIN RABBIKUM FE’ERSIL MA’I BENI ‘ISRA’IL
7.106: KALE ‘IN KUNTE XHI’TE BI’AJETIN FE’TI BIHA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
7.108: WE NEZE’A JEDEHU FE’IDHA HIJE BEJDA’U LILNNADHIRIN
7.109: KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMI FIR’AWNE ‘INNE HADHA LESAHIRUN ‘ALIMU
7.113: WE XHA’E SEHERATU FIR’AWNE KALU ‘INNE LENA LE’EXHRËN ‘IN KUNNA NEHNUL-GALIBIN
7.115: KALU JA MUSA ‘IMMA ‘EN TULKIJE WE ‘IMMA ‘EN NEKUNE NEHNUL-MULKIN
7.116: KALE ‘ELKU FELEMMA ‘ELKAW SEHERU ‘A’JUNE NASI WE ESTERHEBUHUM WE XHA’U BISIHRIN ‘ADHIMI
7.117: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘EN ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FE’IDHA HIJE TELKAFU MA JE’FIKUN
7.118: FEWEKA’AL-HEKKU WE BETELE MA KANU JA’MELUN
7.123: KALE FIR’AWNU ‘AMENTUM BIHI KABLE ‘EN ‘ADHENE LEKUM ‘INNE HADHA LEMEKRUN MEKERTUMUHU FIL-MEDINETI LITUHRIXHU MINHA ‘EHLEHA FESEWFE TA’LEMUN
7.124: LE’UKATTI’ANNE ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM MIN HILAFIN THUMME LE’USELLIBENNEKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
7.126: WE MA TENKIMU MINNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘AMENNA BI’AJATI RABBINA LEMMA XHA’ETNA RABBENA ‘EFRIG ‘ALEJNA SEBRËN WE TEWEFFENA MUSLIMIN
7.127: WE KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMI FIR’AWNE ‘ETEDHERU MUSA WE KAWMEHU LIJUFSIDU FIL-’ERDI WE JEDHERAKE WE ‘ALIHETEKE KALE SENUKATTILU ‘EBNA’EHUM WE NESTEHJI NISA’EHUM WE ‘INNA FEWKAHUM KAHIRUN
7.128: KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI ESTA’INU BIL-LAHI WE ESBIRU ‘INNEL-’ERDE LIL-LAHI JURITHUHA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WEL-’AKIBETU LILMUTTEKIN
7.129: KALU ‘UDHINA MIN KABLI ‘EN TE’TIJENA WE MIN BA’DI MA XHI’TENA KALE ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JUHLIKE ‘ADUWEKUM WE JESTEHLIFEKUM FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURA KEJFE TA’MELUN
7.130: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE BIS-SININE WE NEKSIN MINE ETH-THEMERATI LE’ALLEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
7.131: FE’IDHA XHA’ET/HUMUL-HESENETU KALU LENA HEDHIHI WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN JETTEJJERU BIMUSA WE MEN ME’AHU ‘ELA ‘INNEMA TA’IRUHUM ‘INDEL-LAHI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
7.132: WE KALU MEHMA TE’TINA BIHI MIN ‘AJETIN LITESHERANA BIHA FEMA NEHNU LEKE BIMU’UMININ
7.133: FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIMUT-TUFANE WEL-XHERADE WEL-KUMMELE WE ED-DEFADI’A WE ED-DEME ‘AJATIN MUFESSELATIN FASTEKBERU WE KANU KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
7.134: WE LEMMA WEKA’A ‘ALEJHIMU ER-RIXHZU KALU JA MUSA ED’U LENA RABBEKE BIMA ‘AHIDE ‘INDEKE LE’IN KESHEFTE ‘ANNA ER-RIXHZE LENU’UMINENNE LEKE WE LENURSILENNE ME’AKE BENI ‘ISRA’IL
7.135: FELEMMA KESHEFNA ‘ANHUMU ER-RIXHZE ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN HUM BALIGUHU ‘IDHA HUM JENKUTHUN
7.136: FANTEKAMNA MINHUM FE’EGRAKNAHUM FIL-JEMMI BI’ENNEHUM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE KANU ‘ANHA GAFILIN
7.137: WE ‘EWRATHNAL-KAWMEL-LEDHINE KANU JUSTED’AFUNE MESHARIKAL-’ERDI WE MEGARIBEHA EL-LETI BARAKNA FIHA WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKEL-HUSNA ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE BIMA SEBERU WE DEMMERNA MA KANE JESNA’U FIR’AWNU WE KAWMUHU WE MA KANU JA’RISHUN
7.138: WE XHAWEZNA BIBENI ‘ISRA’ILEL-BEHRA FE’ETEW ‘ALA KAWMIN JA’KUFUNE ‘ALA ‘ESNAMIN LEHUM KALU JA MUSA EXH’AL LENA ‘ILEHËN KEMA LEHUM ‘ALIHETUN KALE ‘INNEKUM KAWMUN TEXHHELUN
7.139: ‘INNE HA’UULA’ MUTEBBERUN MA HUM FIHI WE BATILUN MA KANU JA’MELUN
7.141: WE ‘IDH ‘ENXHEJNAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’EL-’ADHABI JUKATTILUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
7.142: WE WA’ADNA MUSA THELATHINE LEJLETEN WE ‘ETMEMNAHA BI’ASHRIN FETEMME MIKATU RABBIHI ‘ERBA’INE LEJLETEN WE KALE MUSA LI’HIHI HARUNE EHLUFNI FI KAWMI WE ‘ESLIH WE LA TETTEBI’ SEBILEL-MUFSIDIN
7.143: WE LEMMA XHA’E MUSA LIMIKATINA WE KELLEMEHU RABBUHU KALE RABBI ‘ERINI ‘ENDHUR ‘ILEJKE KALE LEN TERANI WE LEKINI ENDHUR ‘ILAL-XHEBELI FE’INI ESTEKARRA MEKANEHU FESEWFE TERANI FELEMMA TEXHELLA RABBUHU LILXHEBELI XHE’ALEHU DEKKËN WE HARRA MUSA SA’IKËN FELEMMA ‘EFAKA KALE SUBHANEKE TUBTU ‘ILEJKE WE ‘ENA ‘EWWELUL-MU’UMININ
7.144: KALE JA MUSA ‘INNI ESTEFEJTUKE ‘ALA NASI BIRISALATI WE BIKELAMI FEHUDH MA ‘ATEJTUKE WE KUN MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
7.145: WE KETEBNA LEHU FIL-’ELWAHI MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MEW’IDHETEN WE TEFSILËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN FEHUDH/HA BIKUWETIN WE ‘MUR KAWMEKE JE’HUDHU BI’EHSENIHA SE’URIKUM DARAL-FASIKIN
7.146: SE’ESRIFU ‘AN ‘AJATIJEL-LEDHINE JETEKEBBERUNE FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE ‘IN JERAW KUL-LE ‘AJETIN LA JU’UMINU BIHA WE ‘IN JERAW SEBILE ER-RUSHDI LA JETTEHIDHUHU SEBILËN WE ‘IN JERAW SEBILEL-GAJJI JETTEHIDHUHU SEBILËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE KANU ‘ANHA GAFILIN
7.147: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE LIKA’IL-’AHIRATI HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM HEL JUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KANU JA’MELUN
7.148: WE ETTEHADHE KAWMU MUSA MIN BA’DIHI MIN HULIJIHIM ‘IXHLËN XHESEDËN LEHU HUWARUN ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ENNEHU LA JUKELLIMUHUM WE LA JEHDIHIM SEBILËN ETTEHADHUHU WE KANU DHALIMIN
7.149: WE LEMMA SUKITE FI ‘EJDIHIM WE RA’EW ‘ENNEHUM KAD DELLU KALU LE’IN LEM JERHEMNA RABBUNA WE JEGFIR LENA LENEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
7.150: WE LEMMA RAXHE’A MUSA ‘ILA KAWMIHI GADBANE ‘ESIFËN KALE BI’SEMA HALEFTUMUNI MIN BA’DI ‘E’AXHILTUM ‘EMRA RABBIKUM WE ‘ELKAL-’ELWAHE WE ‘EHADHE BIRA’SI ‘EHIHI JEXHURRUHU ‘ILEJHI KALE EBNE ‘UMME ‘INNEL-KAWME ESTED’AFUNI WE KADU JEKTULUNENI FELA TUSHMIT BIJEL-’A’DA’E WE LA TEXH’ALNI ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.151: KALE RABBI EGFIR LI WE LI’EHI WE ‘EDHILNA FI RAHMETIKE WE ‘ENTE ‘ERHEMU ER-RAHIMIN
7.152: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHUL-’IXHLE SEJENALUHUM GADEBUN MIN RABBIHIM WE DHIL-LETUN FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUFTERIN
7.153: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SEJJI’ATI THUMME TABU MIN BA’DIHA WE ‘AMENU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BA’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
7.154: WE LEMMA SEKETE ‘AN MUSAL-GADEBU ‘EHADHEL-’ELWAHE WE FI NUSHATIHA HUDEN WE RAHMETUN LIL-LEDHINE HUM LIRABBIHIM JERHEBUN
7.155: WE EHTARA MUSA KAWMEHU SEB’INE RAXHULËN LIMIKATINA FELEMMA ‘EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU KALE RABBI LEW SHI’TE ‘EHLEKTEHUM MIN KABLU WE ‘IJAJE ‘ETUHLIKUNA BIMA FE’ALE SUFEHA’U MINNA ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA FITNETUKE TUDILLU BIHA MEN TESHA’U WE TEHDI MEN TESHA’U ‘ENTE WELIJUNA FAGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-GAFIRIN
7.156: WE EKTUB LENA FI HEDHIHI ED-DUNJA HESENETEN WE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘INNA HUDNA ‘ILEJKE KALE ‘ADHABI ‘USIBU BIHI MEN ‘ESHA’U WE RAHMETI WESI’AT KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FESE’EKTUBUHA LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-LEDHINE HUM BI’AJATINA JU’UMINUN
7.157: EL-LEDHINE JETTEBI’UNE RASULE NEBIJEL-’UMMIJEL-LEDHI JEXHIDUNEHU MEKTUBËN ‘INDEHUM FIT-TEWRËTI WEL-’INXHILI JE’MURUHUM BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHAHUM ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUHILLU LEHUMUT-TEJJIBATI WE JUHERRIMU ‘ALEJHIMUL-HABA’ITHE WE JEDA’U ‘ANHUM ‘ISRAHUM WEL-’EGLALEL-LETI KANET ‘ALEJHIM FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIHI WE ‘AZZERUHU WE NESERUHU WE ETTEBA’U NURAL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ME’AHU ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
7.158: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNI RASULU ALLAHI ‘ILEJKUM XHEMI’ËNL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI NEBIJIL-’UMMIJIL-LEDHI JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE KELIMATIHI WE ETTEBI’UHU LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
7.159: WE MIN KAWMI MUSA ‘UMMETUN JEHDUNE BIL-HEKKI WE BIHI JA’DILUN
7.160: WE KATTA’NAHUMU ETHNETEJ ‘ASHRATE ‘ESBATËN ‘UMEMËN WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘IDH ESTESKAHU KAWMUHU ‘ENI EDRIB BI’ASAKEL-HEXHERA FANBEXHESET MINHU ETHNETA ‘ASHRATE ‘AJNËN KAD ‘ALIME KUL-LU ‘UNASIN MESHRABEHUM WE DHEL-LELNA ‘ALEJHIMUL-GAMAME WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHIMUL-MENNE WE SELWA KULU MIN TEJJIBATI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE MA DHELEMUNA WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
7.161: WE ‘IDH KILE LEHUMU ESKUNU HEDHIHIL-KARJETE WE KULU MINHA HEJTHU SHI’TUM WE KULU HITTETUN WE EDHULUL-BABE SUXHXHEDËN NEGFIR LEKUM HATI’ATIKUM SENEZIDUL-MUHSININ
7.162: FEBEDDELEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM KAWLËN GAJRAL-LEDHI KILE LEHUM FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KANU JEDHLIMUN
7.163: WE ES’ELHUM ‘ANIL-KARJETI EL-LETI KANET HADIRATEL-BEHRI ‘IDH JA’DUNE FI SEBTI ‘IDH TE’TIHIM HITANUHUM JEWME SEBTIHIM SHURRA’ËN WE JEWME LA JESBITUNE LA TE’TIHIM KEDHALIKE NEBLUHUM BIMA KANU JEFSUKUN
7.164: WE ‘IDH KALET ‘UMMETUN MINHUM LIME TA’IDHUNE KAWMËN ALLAHU MUHLIKUHUM ‘EW MU’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN KALU MA’DHIRATEN ‘ILA RABBIKUM WE LE’ALLEHUM JETTEKUN
7.165: FELEMMA NESU MA DHUKKIRU BIHI ‘ENXHEJNAL-LEDHINE JENHEWNE ‘ANI SU’I WE ‘EHADHNAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU BI’ADHABIN BE’ISIN BIMA KANU JEFSUKUN
7.166: FELEMMA ‘ATEW ‘AN MA NUHU ‘ANHU KULNA LEHUM KUNU KIRADETEN HASI’IN
7.167: WE ‘IDH TE’EDHDHENE RABBUKE LEJEB’ATHENNE ‘ALEJHIM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN JESUMUHUM SU’EL-’ADHABI ‘INNE RABBEKE LESERI’UL-’IKABI WE ‘INNEHU LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
7.168: WE KATTA’NAHUM FIL-’ERDI ‘UMEMËN MINHUMU SALIHUNE WE MINHUM DUNE DHALIKE WE BELEWNAHUM BIL-HESENATI WE SEJJI’ATI LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
7.169: FEHALEFE MIN BA’DIHIM HALFUN WERITHUL-KITABE JE’HUDHUNE ‘ARADE HADHAL-’EDNA WE JEKULUNE SEJUGFERU LENA WE ‘IN JE’TIHIM ‘ARADUN MITHLUHU JE’HUDHUHU ‘ELEM JU’UHADH ‘ALEJHIM MITHAKUL-KITABI ‘EN LA JEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HEKKA WE DERASU MA FIHI WE ED-DARUL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
7.170: WEL-LEDHINE JUMESSIKUNE BIL-KITABI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE ‘INNA LA NUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUSLIHIN
7.171: WE ‘IDH NETEKNAL-XHEBELE FEWKAHUM KE’ENNEHU DHULLETUN WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHU WAKI’UN BIHIM HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE EDHKURU MA FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
7.172: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHE RABBUKE MIN BENI ‘ADEME MIN DHUHURIHIM DHURRIJETEHUM WE ‘ESH/HEDEHUM ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ELESTU BIRABBIKUM KALU BELA SHEHIDNA ‘EN TEKULU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘INNA KUNNA ‘AN HADHA GAFILIN
7.173: ‘EW TEKULU ‘INNEMA ‘ESHRAKE ‘ABA’UUNA MIN KABLU WE KUNNA DHURRIJETEN MIN BA’DIHIM ‘EFETUHLIKUNA BIMA FE’ALEL-MUBTILUN
7.174: WE KEDHELIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI WE LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
7.175: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’EL-LEDHI ‘ATEJNAHU ‘AJATINA FANSELEHA MINHA FE’ETBE’AHU ESH-SHEJTANU FEKANE MINEL-GAWIN
7.176: WE LEW SHI’NA LERAFA’NAHU BIHA WE LEKINNEHU ‘EHLEDE ‘ILAL-’ERDI WE ETTEBE’A HEWAHU FEMETHELUHU KEMETHELIL-KELBI ‘IN TEHMIL ‘ALEJHI JELHETH ‘EW TETRUK/HU JELHETH DHALIKE METHELUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FAKSUSIL-KASESE LE’ALLEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
7.177: SA’E METHELËNL-KAWMUL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ‘ENFUSEHUM KANU JEDHLIMUN
7.178: MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
7.179: WE LEKAD DHERA’NA LIXHEHENNEME KETHIRËN MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI LEHUM KULUBUN LA JEFKAHUNE BIHA WE LEHUM ‘A’JUNUN LA JUBSIRUNE BIHA WE LEHUM ‘ADHANUN LA JESMA’UNE BIHA ‘ULA’IKE KAL’EN’AMI BEL HUM ‘EDELLU ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-GAFILUN
7.180: WE LIL-LEHIL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA FAD’UHU BIHA WE DHERUL-LEDHINE JULHIDUNE FI ‘ESMA’IHI SEJUXHZEWNE MA KANU JA’MELUN
7.181: WE MIMMEN HALEKNA ‘UMMETUN JEHDUNE BIL-HEKKI WE BIHI JA’DILUN
7.182: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA SENESTEDRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU LA JA’LEMUN
7.184: ‘EWELEM JETEFEKKERU MA BISAHIBIHIM MIN XHINNETIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
7.185: ‘EWELEM JENDHURU FI MELEKUTI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA HALEKAL-LAHU MIN SHEJ’IN WE ‘EN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE KADI EKTERABE ‘EXHELUHUM FEBI’EJJI HEDITHIN BA’DEHU JU’UMINUN
7.186: MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELA HADIJE LEHU WE JEDHERUHUM FI TUGJANIHIM JA’MEHUN
7.187: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI SA’ATI ‘EJJANE MURSAHA KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ILMUHA ‘INDE RABBI LA JUXHELLIHA LIWEKTIHA ‘IL-LA HUWE THEKULET FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI LA TE’TIKUM ‘IL-LA BEGTETEN JES’ELUNEKE KE’ENNEKE HEFIJUN ‘ANHA KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ILMUHA ‘INDEL-LAHI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
7.188: KUL LA ‘EMLIKU LINEFSI NEF’ËN WE LA DERRËN ‘IL-LA MA SHA’EL-LAHU WE LEW KUNTU ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE LASTEKTHERTU MINEL-HAJRI WE MA MESSENIJE SU’U ‘IN ‘ENA ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN WE BESHIRUN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
7.189: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WAHIDETIN WE XHE’ALE MINHA ZEWXHEHA LIJESKUNE ‘ILEJHA FELEMMA TEGASHSHAHA HEMELET HEMLËN HAFIFËN FEMERRAT BIHI FELEMMA ‘ETHKALET DE’AWA ELLAHE RABBEHUMA LE’IN ‘ATEJTENA SALIHËN LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
7.190: FELEMMA ‘ATAHUMA SALIHËN XHE’ALA LEHU SHURAKA’E FIMA ‘ATAHUMA FETA’ALALLAHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
7.191: ‘EJUSHRIKUNE MA LA JEHLUKU SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUN
7.192: WE LA JESTETI’UNE LEHUM NESRËN WE LA ‘ENFUSEHUM JENSURUN
7.193: WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA LA JETTEBI’UKUM SEWA’UN ‘ALEJKUM ‘EDE’AWTUMUHUM ‘EM ‘ENTUM SAMITUN
7.194: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘IBADUN ‘EMTHALUKUM FAD’UHUM FELJESTEXHIBU LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
7.195: ‘ELEHUM ‘ERXHULUN JEMSHUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘EJDIN JEBTISHUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘A’JUNUN JUBSIRUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘ADHANUN JESMA’UNE BIHA KULI ED’U SHURAKA’EKUM THUMME KIDUNI FELA TUNDHIRUN
7.196: ‘INNE WELIJIJEL-LAHUL-LEDHI NEZZELEL-KITABE WE HUWE JETEWELLA SALIHIN
7.197: WEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JESTETI’UNE NESRAKUM WE LA ‘ENFUSEHUM JENSURUN
7.198: WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA LA JESMA’U WE TERAHUM JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE WE HUM LA JUBSIRUN
7.200: WE ‘IMMA JENZEGANNEKE MINE ESH-SHEJTANI NEZGUN FASTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
7.201: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘IDHA MESSEHUM TA’IFUN MINE ESH-SHEJTANI TEDHEKKERU FE’IDHA HUM MUBSIRUN
7.202: WE ‘IHWANUHUM JEMUDDUNEHUM FIL-GAJJI THUMME LA JUKSIRUN
7.203: WE ‘IDHA LEM TE’TIHIM BI’AJETIN KALU LEWLA EXHTEBEJTEHA KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ETTEBI’U MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE MIN RABBI HADHA BESA’IRU MIN RABBIKUM WE HUDEN WE RAHMETUN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
7.204: WE ‘IDHA KURI’EL-KUR’ANU FASTEMI’U LEHU WE ‘ENSITU LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
7.205: WE EDHKUR RABBEKE FI NEFSIKE TEDERRU’ËN WE HIFETEN WE DUNEL-XHEHRI MINEL-KAWLI BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASALI WE LA TEKUN MINEL-GAFILIN
7.206: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘INDE RABBIKE LA JESTEKBIRUNE ‘AN ‘IBADETIHI WE JUSEBBIHUNEHU WE LEHU JESXHUDUN

8.1: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-’ENFAL KULIL-’ENFALI LIL-LAHI WE RASULI FE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘ESLIHU DHATE BEJNIKUM WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULEHU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
8.2: ‘INNEMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEXHILET KULUBUHUM WE ‘IDHA TULIJET ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUHU ZADET/HUM ‘IMANËN WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
8.3: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
8.4: ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MU’UMINUNE HEKKËN LEHUM DERAXHATUN ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
8.5: KEMA ‘EHRAXHEKE RABBUKE MIN BEJTIKE BIL-HEKKI WE ‘INNE FERIKËN MINEL-MU’UMININE LEKARIHUN
8.6: JUXHADILUNEKE FIL-HEKKI BA’DEMA TEBEJJENE KE’ENNEMA JUSAKUNE ‘ILAL-MEWTI WE HUM JENDHURUN
8.7: WE ‘IDH JA’IDUKUMU ALLAHU ‘IHDAT-TA’IFETEJNI ‘ENNEHA LEKUM WE TEWEDDUNE ‘ENNE GAJRA DHATI ESH-SHEWKETI TEKUNU LEKUM WE JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUHIKKAL-HEKKA BIKELIMATIHI WE JEKTE’A DABIRAL-KAFIRIN
8.8: LIJUHIKKAL-HEKKA WE JUBTILEL-BATILE WE LEW KERIHEL-MUXHRIMUN
8.9: ‘IDH TESTEGITHUNE RABBEKUM FASTEXHABE LEKUM ‘ENNI MUMIDDUKUM BI’ELFIN MINEL-MELA’IKETI MURDIFIN
8.10: WE MA XHE’ALEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA BUSHRA WE LITETME’INNE BIHI KULUBUKUM WE MA NESRU ‘IL-LA MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.11: ‘IDH JUGASHSHIKUMU NU’ASE ‘EMENETEN MINHU WE JUNEZZILU ‘ALEJKUM MINE SEMA’I MA’EN LIJUTEHHIRAKUM BIHI WE JUDH/HIBE ‘ANKUM RIXHZE ESH-SHEJTANI WE LIJERBITE ‘ALA KULUBIKUM WE JUTHEBBITE BIHIL-’EKDAM
8.12: ‘IDH JUHI RABBUKE ‘ILAL-MELA’IKETI ‘ENNI ME’AKUM FETHEBBITUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SE’ULKI FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE KEFERU ER-RU’BE FADRIBU FEWKAL-’A’NAKI WE EDRIBU MINHUM KUL-LE BENANI
8.13: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM SHAKKU ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE MEN JUSHAKIKI ELLAHE WE RASULEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.15: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA LEKITUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ZEHFËN FELA TUWELLUHUMUL-’EDBAR
8.16: WE MEN JUWELLIHIM JEWME’IDHIN DUBURAHU ‘IL-LA MUTEHERRIFËN LIKITALIN ‘EW MUTEHEJJIZËN ‘ILA FI’ETIN FEKAD BA’E BIGADEBIN MINEL-LAHI WE ME’WAHU XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MESIR
8.17: FELEM TEKTULUHUM WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE KATELEHUM WE MA RAMEJTE ‘IDH RAMEJTE WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE RAMA WE LIJUBLIJEL-MU’UMININE MINHU BELA’EN HESENËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.19: ‘IN TESTEFTIHU FEKAD XHA’EKUMUL-FETHU WE ‘IN TENTEHU FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘IN TA’UDU NA’UD WE LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANKUM FI’ETUKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LEW KETHURAT WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE ME’AL-MU’UMININ
8.20: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE LA TEWEL-LEW ‘ANHU WE ‘ENTUM TESMA’UN
8.21: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE KALU SEMI’NA WE HUM LA JESMA’UN
8.23: WE LEW ‘ALIMEL-LAHU FIHIM HAJRËN LE’ESME’AHUM WE LEW ‘ESME’AHUM LETEWEL-LEW WE HUM MU’RIDUN
8.24: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESTEXHIBU LIL-LAHI WE LILRRASULI ‘IDHA DA’AKUM LIMA JUHJIKUM WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JEHULU BEJNEL-MER’I WE KALBIHI WE ‘ENNEHU ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
8.25: WE ETTEKU FITNETEN LA TUSIBENNEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINKUM HASSETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.26: WE EDHKURU ‘IDH ‘ENTUM KALILUN MUSTED’AFUNE FIL-’ERDI TEHAFUNE ‘EN JETEHATTEFEKUMU NASU FE’AWAKUM WE ‘EJJEDEKUM BINESRIHI WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBATI LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
8.27: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEHUNU ELLAHE WE RASULE WE TEHUNU ‘EMANATIKUM WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
8.29: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TETTEKU ELLAHE JEXH’AL LEKUM FURKANËN WE JUKEFFIR ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
8.30: WE ‘IDH JEMKURU BIKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIJUTHBITUKE ‘EW JEKTULUKE ‘EW JUHRIXHUKE WE JEMKURUNE WE JEMKURU ALLAHU WEL-LAHU HAJRUL-MAKIRIN
8.31: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA KALU KAD SEMI’NA LEW NESHA’U LEKULNA MITHLE HADHA ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
8.32: WE ‘IDH KALUL-LEHUMME ‘IN KANE HADHA HUWEL-HEKKA MIN ‘INDIKE FE’EMTIR ‘ALEJNA HIXHARATEN MINE SEMA’I ‘EW E’TINA BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
8.33: WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJU’ADHDHIBEHUM WE ‘ENTE FIHIM WE MA KANEL-LAHU MU’ADHDHIBEHUM WE HUM JESTEGFIRUN
8.34: WE MA LEHUM ‘ELLA JU’ADHDHIBEHUMU ALLAHU WE HUM JESUDDUNE ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WE MA KANU ‘EWLIJA’EHU ‘IN ‘EWLIJA’UUHU ‘IL-LAL-MUTTEKUNE WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
8.35: WE MA KANE SELATUHUM ‘INDEL-BEJTI ‘IL-LA MUKA’EN WE TESDIJETEN FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
8.36: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWALEHUM LIJESUDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI FESEJUNFIKUNEHA THUMME TEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM HESRATEN THUMME JUGLEBUNE WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA XHEHENNEME JUHSHERUN
8.37: LIJEMIZEL-LAHUL-HABITHE MINET-TEJJIBI WE JEXH’ALEL-HABITHE BA’DEHU ‘ALA BA’DIN FEJERKUMEHU XHEMI’ËN FEJEXH’ALEHU FI XHEHENNEME ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
8.38: KUL LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN JENTEHU JUGFER LEHUM MA KAD SELEFE WE ‘IN JA’UDU FEKAD MEDET SUNNETUL-’EWWELIN
8.39: WE KATILUHUM HETTA LA TEKUNE FITNETUN WE JEKUNE ED-DINU KUL-LUHU LIL-LAHI FE’INI ENTEHEW FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIMA JA’MELUNE BESIRU
8.40: WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE MEWLAKUM NI’MEL-MEWLA WE NI’ME NESIR
8.41: WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEMA GANIMTUM MIN SHEJ’IN FE’ENNE LIL-LAHI HUMUSEHU WE LILRRASULI WE LIDHIL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘AMENTUM BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALA ‘ABDINA JEWMEL-FURKANI JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
8.42: ‘IDH ‘ENTUM BIL-’UDWETI ED-DUNJA WE HUM BIL-’UDWETIL-KUSWA WE RAKBU ‘ESFELE MINKUM WE LEW TEWA’ADTTUM LAHTELEFTUM FIL-MI’ADI WE LEKIN LIJEKDIJEL-LAHU ‘EMRËN KANE MEF’ULËN LIJEHLIKE MEN HELEKE ‘AN BEJJINETIN WE JEHJA MEN HEJJE ‘AN BEJJINETIN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LESEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.43: ‘IDH JURIKEHUMU ALLAHU FI MENAMIKE KALILËN WE LEW ‘ERAKEHUM KETHIRËN LEFESHILTUM WE LETENAZA’TUM FIL-’EMRI WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE SELLEME ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
8.44: WE ‘IDH JURIKUMUHUM ‘IDHIT-TEKAJTUM FI ‘A’JUNIKUM KALILËN WE JUKALLILUKUM FI ‘A’JUNIHIM LIJEKDIJEL-LAHU ‘EMRËN KANE MEF’ULËN WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
8.45: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA LEKITUM FI’ETEN FATHBUTU WE EDHKURU ELLAHE KETHIRËN LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
8.46: WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE LA TENAZA’U FETEFSHELU WE TEDH/HEBE RIHUKUM WE ESBIRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’A SABIRIN
8.47: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE HARAXHU MIN DIJARIHIM BETERËN WE RI’A’E NASI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITU
8.48: WE ‘IDH ZEJJENE LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM WE KALE LA GALIBE LEKUMUL-JEWME MINE NASI WE ‘INNI XHARUN LEKUM FELEMMA TERA’ETIL-FI’ETANI NEKESE ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI WE KALE ‘INNI BERI’UN MINKUM ‘INNI ‘ERA MA LA TERAWNE ‘INNIJI ‘EHAFU ELLAHE WEL-LAHU SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.49: ‘IDH JEKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN GARRA HA’UULA’ DINUHUM WE MEN JETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.50: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH JETEWEFFAL-LEDHINE KEFERUL-MELA’IKETU JEDRIBUNE WUXHUHEHUM WE ‘EDBARAHUM WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
8.51: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIKUM WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LEJSE BIDHEL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
8.52: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEFERU BI’AJATI ALLAHI FE’EHADHEHUMU ALLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAWIJUN SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.53: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE LEM JEKU MUGAJJIRËN NI’METEN ‘EN’AMEHA ‘ALA KAWMIN HETTA JUGAJJIRU MA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.54: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM FE’EHLEKNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE ‘EGRAKNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE WE KUL-LUN KANU DHALIMIN
8.55: ‘INNE SHERRA ED-DEWABBI ‘INDEL-LAHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
8.56: EL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTE MINHUM THUMME JENKUDUNE ‘AHDEHUM FI KUL-LI MERRATIN WE HUM LA JETTEKUN
8.57: FE’IMMA TETHKAFENNEHUM FIL-HERBI FESHERRID BIHIM MEN HALFEHUM LE’ALLEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
8.58: WE ‘IMMA TEHAFENNE MIN KAWMIN HIJANETEN FANBIDH ‘ILEJHIM ‘ALA SEWA’IN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-HA’ININ
8.59: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SEBEKU ‘INNEHUM LA JU’XHIZUN
8.60: WE ‘A’IDDU LEHUM MA ESTETA’TUM MIN KUWETIN WE MIN RIBATIL-HAJLI TURHIBUNE BIHI ‘ADUWEL-LAHI WE ‘ADUWEKUM WE ‘AHARINE MIN DUNIHIM LA TA’LEMUNEHUMU ALLAHU JA’LEMUHUM WE MA TUNFIKU MIN SHEJ’IN FI SEBILI ALLAHI JUWEFFE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TUDHLEMUN
8.61: WE ‘IN XHENEHU LILSSELMI FAXHNEH LEHA WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
8.62: WE ‘IN JURIDU ‘EN JEHDA’UKE FE’INNE HESBEKEL-LAHU HUWEL-LEDHI ‘EJJEDEKE BINESRIHI WE BIL-MU’UMININ
8.63: WE ‘ELLEFE BEJNE KULUBIHIM LEW ‘ENFEKTE MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN MA ‘ELLEFTE BEJNE KULUBIHIM WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE ‘ELLEFE BEJNEHUM ‘INNEHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.64: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU HESBUKEL-LAHU WE MENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-MU’UMININ
8.65: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU HERRIDIL-MU’UMININE ‘ALEL-KITALI ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM ‘ISHRUNE SABIRUNE JEGLIBU MIA’ETEJNI WE ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM MIA’ETUN JEGLIBU ‘ELFËN MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
8.66: EL-’ANE HAFFEFEL-LAHU ‘ANKUM WE ‘ALIME ‘ENNE FIKUM DA’FËN FE’IN JEKUN MINKUM MIA’ETUN SABIRATUN JEGLIBU MIA’ETEJNI WE ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM ‘ELFUN JEGLIBU ‘ELFEJNI BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU ME’A SABIRIN
8.67: MA KANE LINEBIJIN ‘EN JEKUNE LEHU ‘ESRA HETTA JUTHHINE FIL-’ERDI TURIDUNE ‘ARADE ED-DUNJA WEL-LAHU JURIDUL-’AHIRATE WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.68: LEWLA KITABUN MINEL-LAHI SEBEKA LEMESSEKUM FIMA ‘EHADHTUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
8.69: FEKULU MIMMA GANIMTUM HELALËN TEJJIBËN WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
8.70: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LIMEN FI ‘EJDIKUM MINEL-’ESRA ‘IN JA’LEMI ALLAHU FI KULUBIKUM HAJRËN JU’UTIKUM HAJRËN MIMMA ‘UHIDHE MINKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
8.71: WE ‘IN JURIDU HIJANETEKE FEKAD HANU ELLAHE MIN KABLU FE’EMKENE MINHUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
8.72: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AWEW WE NESERU ‘ULA’IKE BA’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BA’DIN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEM JUHAXHERU MA LEKUM MIN WELAJETIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN HETTA JUHAXHIRU WE ‘INI ESTENSERUKUM FI ED-DINI FE’ALEJKUMU NESRU ‘IL-LA ‘ALA KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
8.73: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BA’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BA’DIN ‘IL-LA TEF’ALUHU TEKUN FITNETUN FIL-’ERDI WE FESADUN KEBIRU
8.74: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AWEW WE NESERU ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MU’UMINUNE HEKKËN LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
8.75: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MIN BA’DU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU ME’AKUM FE’ULA’IKE MINKUM WE ‘ULUL-’ERHAMI BA’DUHUM ‘EWLA BIBA’DIN FI KITABI ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

9.2: FESIHU FIL-’ERDI ‘ERBE’ATE ‘ESH/HURIN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM GAJRU MU’XHIZI ALLAHI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE MUHZIL-KAFIRIN
9.3: WE ‘EDHANUN MINEL-LAHI WE RASULIHI ‘ILA NASI JEWMEL-HEXHXHIL-’EKBERI ‘ENNEL-LAHE BERI’UN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE WE RASULUHU FE’IN TUBTUM FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FA’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM GAJRU MU’XHIZI ALLAHI WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
9.4: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTTUM MINEL-MUSHRIKINE THUMME LEM JENKUSUKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LEM JUDHAHIRU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EHEDËN FE’ETIMMU ‘ILEJHIM ‘AHDEHUM ‘ILA MUDDETIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
9.5: FE’IDHA ENSELEHAL-’ESH/HURUL-HURUMU FAKTULUL-MUSHRIKINE HEJTHU WEXHEDTUMUHUM WE HUDHUHUM WE EHSURUHUM WAK’UDU LEHUM KUL-LE MERSEDIN FE’IN TABU WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE FEHALLU SEBILEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.6: WE ‘IN ‘EHEDUN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE ESTEXHARAKE FE’EXHIRHU HETTA JESME’A KELAMEL-LAHI THUMME ‘EBLIG/HU ME’MENEHU DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’LEMUN
9.7: KEJFE JEKUNU LILMUSHRIKINE ‘AHDUN ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘INDE RASULIHI ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTUM ‘INDEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI FEMA ESTEKAMU LEKUM FASTEKIMU LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
9.8: KEJFE WE ‘IN JEDHHERU ‘ALEJKUM LA JERKUBU FIKUM ‘ILLËN WE LA DHIMMETEN JURDUNEKUM BI’EFWAHIHIM WE TE’BA KULUBUHUM WE ‘EKTHERUHUM FASIKUN
9.9: ESHTERAW BI’AJATI ALLAHI THEMENËN KALILËN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILIHI ‘INNEHUM SA’E MA KANU JA’MELUN
9.10: LA JERKUBUNE FI MU’UMININ ‘ILLËN WE LA DHIMMETEN WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MU’TEDUN
9.11: FE’IN TABU WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE FE’IHWANUKUM FI ED-DINI WE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
9.12: WE ‘IN NEKETHU ‘EJMANEHUM MIN BA’DI ‘AHDIHIM WE TE’ANU FI DINIKUM FEKATILU ‘E’IMMETEL-KUFRI ‘INNEHUM LA ‘EJMANE LEHUM LE’ALLEHUM JENTEHUN
9.13: ‘ELA TUKATILUNE KAWMËN NEKETHU ‘EJMANEHUM WE HEMMU BI’IHRAXHI RASULI WE HUM BEDE’UKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN ‘ETEHSHEWNEHUM FE-ALLAHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEHSHEWHU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
9.14: KATILUHUM JU’ADHDHIBHUMU ALLAHU BI’EJDIKUM WE JUHZIHIM WE JENSURKUM ‘ALEJHIM WE JESHFI SUDURA KAWMIN MU’UMININ
9.15: WE JUDH/HIB GAJDHE KULUBIHIM WE JETUBU ALLAHU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.16: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TUTRAKU WE LEMMA JA’LEMI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU MINKUM WE LEM JETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE LA RASULIHI WE LAL-MU’UMININE WELIXHETEN WEL-LAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
9.17: MA KANE LILMUSHRIKINE ‘EN JA’MURU MESAXHIDEL-LAHI SHAHIDINE ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM BIL-KUFRI ‘ULA’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM WE FI NARI HUM HALIDUN
9.18: ‘INNEMA JA’MURU MESAXHIDEL-LAHI MEN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘EKAME SELËTE WE ‘ATA EZ-ZEKËTE WE LEM JEHSHE ‘IL-LALLAHE FE’ASA ‘ULA’IKE ‘EN JEKUNU MINEL-MUHTEDIN
9.19: ‘EXHE’ALTUM SIKAJETEL-HAXHXHI WE ‘IMARATEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI KEMEN ‘AMENE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE XHAHEDE FI SEBILI ALLAHI LA JESTEWUNE ‘INDEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
9.20: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI ALLAHI BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘A’DHEMU DERAXHETEN ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-FA’IZUN
9.21: JUBESHSHIRUHUM RABBUHUM BIRAHMETIN MINHU WE RIDWANIN WE XHENNATIN LEHUM FIHA NA’IMUN MUKIMU
9.23: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ABA’EKUM WE ‘IHWANEKUM ‘EWLIJA’E ‘INI ESTEHEBBUL-KUFRA ‘ALEL-’IMANI WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM MINKUM FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
9.24: KUL ‘IN KANE ‘ABA’UUKUM WE ‘EBNA’UUKUM WE ‘IHWANUKUM WE ‘EZWAXHUKUM WE ‘ASHIRATUKUM WE ‘EMWALUN EKTERAFTUMUHA WE TIXHARATUN TEHSHEWNE KESADEHA WE MESAKINU TERDEWNEHA ‘EHEBBE ‘ILEJKUM MINEL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE XHIHADIN FI SEBILIHI FETERABBESU HETTA JE’TIJEL-LAHU BI’EMRIHI WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-FASIKIN
9.25: LEKAD NESERAKUMU ALLAHU FI MEWATINE KETHIRATIN WE JEWME HUNEJNIN ‘IDH ‘A’XHEBETKUM KETHRATUKUM FELEM TUGNI ‘ANKUM SHEJ’ËN WE DAKAT ‘ALEJKUMUL-’ERDU BIMA RAHUBET THUMME WELLEJTUM MUDBIRIN
9.26: THUMME ‘ENZELEL-LAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WE ‘ENZELE XHUNUDËN LEM TERAWHA WE ‘ADHDHEBEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE DHELIKE XHEZA’UL-KAFIRIN
9.27: THUMME JETUBU ALLAHU MIN BA’DI DHALIKE ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.28: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNEMAL-MUSHRIKUNE NEXHESUN FELA JEKRABUL-MESXHIDEL-HERAME BA’DE ‘AMIHIM HADHA WE ‘IN HIFTUM ‘AJLETEN FESEWFE JUGNIKUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI ‘IN SHA’E ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.29: KATILUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LA BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE LA JUHERRIMUNE MA HERRAMEL-LAHU WE RASULUHU WE LA JEDINUNE DINEL-HEKKI MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE HETTA JU’TUL-XHIZJETE ‘AN JEDIN WE HUM SAGIRUN
9.30: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU ‘UZEJRUN EBNU ALLAHI WE KALETI NESARAL-MESIHU EBNU ALLAHI DHALIKE KAWLUHUM BI’EFWAHIHIM JUDAHI’UNE KAWLEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KABLU KATELEHUMU ALLAHU ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
9.31: ETTEHADHU ‘EHBARAHUM WE RUHBANEHUM ‘ERBABËN MIN DUNI ALLAHI WEL-MESIHE EBNE MERJEME WE MA ‘UMIRU ‘IL-LA LIJA’BUDU ‘ILEHËN WAHIDËN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE SUBHANEHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
9.32: JURIDUNE ‘EN JUTFI’U NURAL-LAHI BI’EFWAHIHIM WE JE’BALLAHU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUTIMME NURAHU WE LEW KERIHEL-KAFIRUN
9.33: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA ED-DINI KUL-LIHI WE LEW KERIHEL-MUSHRIKUN
9.34: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINEL-’EHBARI WE ER-RUHBANI LEJE’KULUNE ‘EMWALE NASI BIL-BATILI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE JEKNIZUNE EDH-DHEHEBE WEL-FIDDETE WE LA JUNFIKUNEHA FI SEBILI ALLAHI FEBESHSHIRHUM BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
9.35: JEWME JUHMA ‘ALEJHA FI NARI XHEHENNEME FETUKWA BIHA XHIBAHUHUM WE XHUNUBUHUM WE DHUHURUHUM HADHA MA KENEZTUM LI’NFUSIKUM FEDHUKU MA KUNTUM TEKNIZUN
9.36: ‘INNE ‘IDDETE ESH-SHUHURI ‘INDEL-LAHI ETHNA ‘ASHERA SHEHRËN FI KITABI ALLAHI JEWME HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE MINHA ‘ERBE’ATUN HURUMUN DHALIKE ED-DINUL-KAJJIMU FELA TEDHLIMU FIHINNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE KATILUL-MUSHRIKINE KAFFETEN KEMA JUKATILUNEKUM KAFFETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
9.37: ‘INNEMA NESI’U ZIJADETUN FIL-KUFRI JUDELLU BIHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUHILLUNEHU ‘AMËN WE JUHERRIMUNEHU ‘AMËN LIJUWATI’U ‘IDDETE MA HERRAMEL-LAHU FEJUHILLU MA HERRAMEL-LAHU ZUJJINE LEHUM SU’U ‘A’MALIHIM WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-KAFIRIN
9.38: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MA LEKUM ‘IDHA KILE LEKUM ENFIRU FI SEBILI ALLAHI ETHTHAKALTUM ‘ILAL-’ERDI ‘ERADITUM BIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA MINEL-’AHIRATI FEMA META’UL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA KALILU
9.39: ‘IL-LA TENFIRU JU’ADHDHIBKUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN WE JESTEBDIL KAWMËN GAJRAKUM WE LA TEDURRUHU SHEJ’ËN WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
9.40: ‘IL-LA TENSURUHU FEKAD NESERAHU ALLAHU ‘IDH ‘EHRAXHEHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU THANIJE ETHNEJNI ‘IDH HUMA FIL-GARI ‘IDH JEKULU LISAHIBIHI LA TEHZEN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’ANA FE’ENZELEL-LAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALEJHI WE ‘EJJEDEHU BIXHUNUDIN LEM TERAWHA WE XHE’ALE KELIMETEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SUFLA WE KELIMETU ALLAHI HIJEL-’ULJA WEL-LAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
9.41: ENFIRU HIFAFËN WE THIKALËN WE XHAHIDU BI’EMWALIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM FI SEBILI ALLAHI DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
9.42: LEW KANE ‘ARADËN KARIBËN WE SEFERËN KASIDËN LATTEBA’UKE WE LEKIN BA’UDET ‘ALEJHIMU ESH-SHUKKATU WE SEJEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEW ESTETA’NA LEHARAXHNA ME’AKUM JUHLIKUNE ‘ENFUSEHUM WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU ‘INNEHUM LEKADHIBUN
9.43: ‘AFALLAHU ‘ANKE LIME ‘EDHINTE LEHUM HETTA JETEBEJJENE LEKEL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE TA’LEMEL-KADHIBIN
9.44: LA JESTE’DHINUKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI ‘EN JUXHAHIDU BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIL-MUTTEKIN
9.45: ‘INNEMA JESTE’DHINUKEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ERTABET KULUBUHUM FEHUM FI RAJBIHIM JETERADDEDUN
9.46: WE LEW ‘ERADUL-HURUXHE LE’E’ADDU LEHU ‘UDDETEN WE LEKIN KERIHEL-LAHU ENBI’ATHEHUM FETHEBBETEHUM WE KILE EK’UDU ME’AL-KA’IDIN
9.47: LEW HARAXHU FIKUM MA ZADUKUM ‘IL-LA HABALËN WE LE’EWDA’U HILALEKUM JEBGUNEKUMUL-FITNETE WE FIKUM SEMMA’UNE LEHUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
9.48: LEKADI EBTEGAWL-FITNETE MIN KABLU WE KAL-LEBU LEKEL-’UMURA HETTA XHA’EL-HEKKU WE DHEHERA ‘EMRU ALLAHI WE HUM KARIHUN
9.49: WE MINHUM MEN JEKULU E’DHEN LI WE LA TEFTINNI ‘ELA FIL-FITNETI SEKATU WE ‘INNE XHEHENNEME LEMUHITETUN BIL-KAFIRIN
9.50: ‘IN TUSIBKE HESENETUN TESU’UHUM WE ‘IN TUSIBKE MUSIBETUN JEKULU KAD ‘EHADHNA ‘EMRANA MIN KABLU WE JETEWEL-LEW WE HUM FERIHUN
9.51: KUL LEN JUSIBENA ‘IL-LA MA KETEBEL-LAHU LENA HUWE MEWLANA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
9.52: KUL HEL TERABBESUNE BINA ‘IL-LA ‘IHDAL-HUSNEJEJNI WE NEHNU NETERABBESU BIKUM ‘EN JUSIBEKUMU ALLAHU BI’ADHABIN MIN ‘INDIHI ‘EW BI’EJDINA FETERABBESU ‘INNA ME’AKUM MUTERABBISUN
9.53: KUL ‘ENFIKU TEW’ËN ‘EW KERHËN LEN JUTEKABBELE MINKUM ‘INNEKUM KUNTUM KAWMËN FASIKIN
9.54: WE MA MENE’AHUM ‘EN TUKBELE MINHUM NEFEKATUHUM ‘IL-LA ‘ENNEHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE BIRASULIHI WE LA JE’TUNE SELËTE ‘IL-LA WE HUM KUSALA WE LA JUNFIKUNE ‘IL-LA WE HUM KARIHUN
9.55: FELA TU’XHIBKE ‘EMWALUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM ‘INNEMA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJU’ADHDHIBEHUM BIHA FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE TEZHEKA ‘ENFUSUHUM WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.56: WE JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHUM LEMINKUM WE MA HUM MINKUM WE LEKINNEHUM KAWMUN JEFRAKUN
9.57: LEW JEXHIDUNE MELXHE’EN ‘EW MEGARATIN ‘EW MUDDEHALËN LEWELLEW ‘ILEJHI WE HUM JEXHMEHUN
9.58: WE MINHUM MEN JELMIZUKE FI SEDEKATI FE’IN ‘U’TU MINHA RADU WE ‘IN LEM JU’TEW MINHA ‘IDHA HUM JESHATUN
9.59: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM RADU MA ‘ATAHUMU ALLAHU WE RASULUHU WE KALU HESBUNALLAHU SEJU’UTINALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE RASULUHU ‘INNA ‘ILA ALLAHI RAGIBUN
9.60: ‘INNEMA SEDEKATU LILFUKARA’I WEL-MESAKINI WEL-’AMILINE ‘ALEJHA WEL-MU’UELLEFETI KULUBUHUM WE FI ER-RIKABI WEL-GARIMINE WE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE EIBNI SEBILI FERIDETEN MINEL-LAHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.61: WE MINHUMUL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNE NEBIJE WE JEKULUNE HUWE ‘UDHUNUN KUL ‘UDHUNU HAJRIN LEKUM JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE JU’UMINU LILMU’UMININE WE RAHMETUN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNE RASULEL-LAHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.62: JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEKUM LIJURDUKUM WEL-LAHU WE RASULUHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN JURDUHU ‘IN KANU MU’UMININ
9.63: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNEHU MEN JUHADIDI ELLAHE WE RASULEHU FE’ENNE LEHU NARA XHEHENNEME HALIDËN FIHA DHALIKEL-HIZJUL-’ADHIM
9.64: JEHDHERUL-MUNAFIKUNE ‘EN TUNEZZELE ‘ALEJHIM SURATUN TUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA FI KULUBIHIM KULI ESTEHZI’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE MUHRIXHUN MA TEHDHERUN
9.65: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM LEJEKULUNNE ‘INNEMA KUNNA NEHUDU WE NEL’ABU KUL ‘EBIALLLEHI WE ‘AJATIHI WE RASULIHI KUNTUM TESTEHZI’UN
9.66: LA TA’TEDHIRU KAD KEFERTUM BA’DE ‘IMANIKUM ‘IN NA’FU ‘AN TA’IFETIN MINKUM NU’ADHDHIB TA’IFETEN BI’ENNEHUM KANU MUXHRIMIN
9.67: EL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-MUNAFIKATU BA’DUHUM MIN BA’DIN JE’MURUNE BIL-MUNKERI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MA’RUFI WE JEKBIDUNE ‘EJDIJEHUM NESU ELLAHE FENESIJEHUM ‘INNEL-MUNAFIKINE HUMUL-FASIKUN
9.68: WE’ADEL-LAHUL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-KUFFARA NARA XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHA HIJE HESBUHUM WE LE’ANEHUMU ALLAHU WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
9.69: KAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM KANU ‘ESHEDDE MINKUM KUWETEN WE ‘EKTHERA ‘EMWALËN WE ‘EWLADËN FASTEMTA’U BIHALAKIHIM FASTEMTA’TUM BIHALAKIKUM KEMA ESTEMTE’AL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM BIHALAKIHIM WE HUDTUM KAL-LEDHI HADU ‘ULA’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
9.70: ‘ELEM JE’TIHIM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WE KAWMI ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ES'HABI MEDJENE WEL-MU’UTEFIKATI ‘ETET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEMA KANEL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
9.71: WEL-MU’UMINUNE WEL-MU’UMINATU BA’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BA’DIN JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE JUTI’UNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU ‘ULA’IKE SEJERHEMUHUMU ALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
9.72: WE’ADEL-LAHUL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE MESAKINE TEJJIBETEN FI XHENNATI ‘ADNIN WE RIDWANUN MINEL-LAHI ‘EKBERU DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.73: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU XHAHIDIL-KUFFARA WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE EGLUDH ‘ALEJHIM WE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MESIR
9.74: JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI MA KALU WE LEKAD KALU KELIMETEL-KUFRI WE KEFERU BA’DE ‘ISLAMIHIM WE HEMMU BIMA LEM JENALU WE MA NEKAMU ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘EGNAHUMU ALLAHU WE RASULUHU MIN FEDLIHI FE’IN JETUBU JEKU HAJRËN LEHUM WE ‘IN JETEWEL-LEW JU’ADHDHIBHUMU ALLAHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM FIL-’ERDI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
9.75: WE MINHUM MEN ‘AHEDEL-LAHE LE’IN ‘ATANA MIN FEDLIHI LENESSEDDEKANNE WE LENEKUNENNE MINE SALIHIN
9.76: FELEMMA ‘ATAHUM MIN FEDLIHI BEHILU BIHI WE TEWEL-LEW WE HUM MU’RIDUN
9.77: FE’A’KABEHUM NIFAKËN FI KULUBIHIM ‘ILA JEWMI JELKAWNEHU BIMA ‘EHLEFU ELLAHE MA WE’ADUHU WE BIMA KANU JEKDHIBUN
9.78: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU SIRRAHUM WE NEXHWAHUM WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
9.79: EL-LEDHINE JELMIZUNEL-MUTTEWWI’INE MINEL-MU’UMININE FI SEDEKATI WEL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE ‘IL-LA XHUHDEHUM FEJESHARUNE MINHUM SEHIRAL-LAHU MINHUM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.80: ESTEGFIR LEHUM ‘EW LA TESTEGFIR LEHUM ‘IN TESTEGFIR LEHUM SEB’INE MERRATEN FELEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHUM DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-FASIKIN
9.81: FERIHEL-MUHALLEFUNE BIMEK’ADIHIM HILAFE RASULI ALLAHI WE KERIHU ‘EN JUXHAHIDU BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE KALU LA TENFIRU FIL-HERRI KUL NARU XHEHENNEME ‘ESHEDDU HERRËN LEW KANU JEFKAHUN
9.82: FELJEDHEKU KALILËN WE LIEBKU KETHIRËN XHEZA’EN BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
9.83: FE’IN RAXHE’AKEL-LAHU ‘ILA TA’IFETIN MINHUM FASTE’DHENUKE LILHURUXHI FEKUL LEN TEHRUXHU MA’IJE ‘EBEDËN WE LEN TUKATILU MA’IJE ‘ADUWËN ‘INNEKUM RADITUM BIL-KU’UDI ‘EWWELE MERRATIN FAK’UDU ME’AL-HALIFIN
9.84: WE LA TUSELLI ‘ALA ‘EHEDIN MINHUM MATE ‘EBEDËN WE LA TEKUM ‘ALA KABRIHI ‘INNEHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE MATU WE HUM FASIKUN
9.85: WE LA TU’XHIBKE ‘EMWALUHUM WE ‘EWLADUHUM ‘INNEMA JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JU’ADHDHIBEHUM BIHA FI ED-DUNJA WE TEZHEKA ‘ENFUSUHUM WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.86: WE ‘IDHA ‘UNZILET SURATUN ‘EN ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE XHAHIDU ME’A RASULIHI ESTE’DHENEKE ‘ULUT-TEWLI MINHUM WE KALU DHERNA NEKUN ME’AL-KA’IDIN
9.87: RADU BI’EN JEKUNU ME’AL-HAWALIFI WE TUBI’A ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JEFKAHUN
9.88: LEKINI RASULU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU XHAHEDU BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ULA’IKE LEHUMUL-HAJRATU WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
9.89: ‘E’ADDEL-LAHU LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA DHALIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.90: WE XHA’EL-MU’ADHDHIRUNE MINEL-’A’RABI LIJU’UDHENE LEHUM WE KA’ADEL-LEDHINE KEDHEBU ELLAHE WE RASULEHU SEJUSIBUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.91: LEJSE ‘ALA ED-DU’AFA’I WE LA ‘ALEL-MERDA WE LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE MA JUNFIKUNE HERAXHUN ‘IDHA NESEHU LIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI MA ‘ALEL-MUHSININE MIN SEBILIN WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.92: WE LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA MA ‘ETEWKE LITEHMILEHUM KULTE LA ‘EXHIDU MA ‘EHMILUKUM ‘ALEJHI TEWEL-LEW WE ‘A’JUNUHUM TEFIDU MINE ED-DEM’I HEZENËN ‘ELLA JEXHIDU MA JUNFIKUN
9.93: ‘INNEMA SEBILU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JESTE’DHINUNEKE WE HUM ‘EGNIJA’U RADU BI’EN JEKUNU ME’AL-HAWALIFI WE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JA’LEMUN
9.94: JA’TEDHIRUNE ‘ILEJKUM ‘IDHA RAXHA’TUM ‘ILEJHIM KUL LA TA’TEDHIRU LEN NU’UMINE LEKUM KAD NEBBE’ENALLAHU MIN ‘EHBARIKUM WE SEJERALLAHU ‘AMELEKUM WE RASULUHU THUMME TURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
9.95: SEJEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEKUM ‘IDHA ENKALEBTUM ‘ILEJHIM LITU’RIDU ‘ANHUM FE’A’RIDU ‘ANHUM ‘INNEHUM RIXHSUN WE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU XHEZA’EN BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
9.96: JEHLIFUNE LEKUM LITERDEW ‘ANHUM FE’IN TERDEW ‘ANHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JERDA ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-FASIKIN
9.97: EL-’A’RABU ‘ESHEDDU KUFRËN WE NIFAKËN WE ‘EXHDERU ‘ELLA JA’LEMU HUDUDE MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.98: WE MINEL-’A’RABI MEN JETTEHIDHU MA JUNFIKU MEGRAMËN WE JETERABBESU BIKUMU ED-DEWA’IRA ‘ALEJHIM DA’IRATU SEW’I WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
9.99: WE MINEL-’A’RABI MEN JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE JETTEHIDHU MA JUNFIKU KURUBATIN ‘INDEL-LAHI WE SELEWATI RASULI ‘ELA ‘INNEHA KURBETUN LEHUM SEJUDHILUHUMU ALLAHU FI RAHMETIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.100: WE SABIKUNEL-’EWWELUNE MINEL-MUHAXHIRINE WEL-’ENSARI WEL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’UHUM BI’IHSANIN RADIJEL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI TEHTEHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN DHALIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.101: WE MIMMEN HEWLEKUM MINEL-’A’RABI MUNAFIKUNE WE MIN ‘EHLIL-MEDINETI MERADU ‘ALA NIFAKI LA TA’LEMUHUM NEHNU NA’LEMUHUM SENU’ADHDHIBUHUM MERRATEJNI THUMME JURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ADHABIN ‘ADHIMI
9.102: WE ‘AHARUNE A’TERAFU BIDHUNUBIHIM HALETU ‘AMELËN SALIHËN WE ‘AHARA SEJJI’ËN ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.103: HUDH MIN ‘EMWALIHIM SEDEKATEN TUTEHHIRUHUM WE TUZEKKIHIM BIHA WE SELLI ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNE SELATEKE SEKENUN LEHUM WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
9.104: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE HUWE JEKBELUT-TEWBETE ‘AN ‘IBADIHI WE JE’HUDHU SEDEKATI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE HUWET-TEWWABU RAHIM
9.105: WE KULI A’MELU FESEJERALLAHU ‘AMELEKUM WE RASULUHU WEL-MU’UMINUNE WE SETURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
9.106: WE ‘AHARUNE MURXHEWNE LI’EMRI ALLAHI ‘IMMA JU’ADHDHIBUHUM WE ‘IMMA JETUBU ‘ALEJHIM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.107: WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MESXHIDËN DIRARËN WE KUFRËN WE TEFRIKËN BEJNEL-MU’UMININE WE ‘IRSADËN LIMEN HARABEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU MIN KABLU WE LEJEHLIFUNNE ‘IN ‘ERADNA ‘IL-LAL-HUSNA WEL-LAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNEHUM LEKADHIBUN
9.108: LA TEKUM FIHI ‘EBEDËN LEMESXHIDUN ‘USSISE ‘ALAT-TEKWA MIN ‘EWWELI JEWMIN ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEKUME FIHI FIHI RIXHALUN JUHIBBUNE ‘EN JETETEHHERU WEL-LAHU JUHIBBUL-MUTTEHHIRIN
9.109: ‘EFEMEN ‘ESSESE BUNJANEHU ‘ALA TEKWA MINEL-LAHI WE RIDWANIN HAJRUN ‘EM MEN ‘ESSESE BUNJANEHU ‘ALA SHEFA XHURUFIN HARIN FANHARA BIHI FI NARI XHEHENNEME WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
9.110: LA JEZALU BUNJANUHUMUL-LEDHI BENEW RIBETEN FI KULUBIHIM ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKATTE’A KULUBUHUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.111: ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESHTERA MINEL-MU’UMININE ‘ENFUSEHUM WE ‘EMWALEHUM BI’ENNE LEHUMUL-XHENNETE JUKATILUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI FEJEKTULUNE WE JUKTELUNE WA’DËN ‘ALEJHI HEKKËN FIT-TEWRËTI WEL-’INXHILI WEL-KUR’ANI WE MEN ‘EWFA BI’AHDIHI MINEL-LAHI FASTEBSHIRU BIBEJ’IKUMUL-LEDHI BAJA’TUM BIHI WE DHELIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.112: ET-TA’IBUNEL-’ABIDUNEL-HAMIDUNE SA’IHUNE ER-RAKI’UNE SAXHIDUNEL-’AMIRUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE NAHUNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WEL-HAFIDHUNE LIHUDUDI ALLAHI WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
9.113: MA KANE LILNNEBIJI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN JESTEGFIRU LILMUSHRIKINE WE LEW KANU ‘ULI KURBA MIN BA’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUM ‘ENNEHUM ‘ESHABUL-XHEHIM
9.114: WE MA KANE ESTIGFARU ‘IBRAHIME LI’EBIHI ‘IL-LA ‘AN MEW’IDETIN WE’ADEHA ‘IJAHU FELEMMA TEBEJJENE LEHU ‘ENNEHU ‘ADUWUN LIL-LAHI TEBERRA’E MINHU ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME LE’EWWAHUN HELIMU
9.115: WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJUDILLE KAWMËN BA’DE ‘IDH HEDAHUM HETTA JUBEJJINE LEHUM MA JETTEKUNE ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
9.116: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
9.117: LEKAD TABEL-LAHU ‘ALA NEBIJI WEL-MUHAXHIRINE WEL-’ENSARIL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’UHU FI SA’ATIL-’USRATI MIN BA’DI MA KADE JEZIGU KULUBU FERIKIN MINHUM THUMME TABE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNEHU BIHIM RA’UFUN RAHIMU
9.118: WE ‘ALA ETH-THELATHETIL-LEDHINE HULLIFU HETTA ‘IDHA DAKAT ‘ALEJHIMUL-’ERDU BIMA RAHUBET WE DAKAT ‘ALEJHIM ‘ENFUSUHUM WE DHENNU ‘EN LA MELXHE’E MINEL-LAHI ‘IL-LA ‘ILEJHI THUMME TABE ‘ALEJHIM LIJETUBU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWET-TEWWABU RAHIM
9.119: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE KUNU ME’A SADIKIN
9.120: MA KANE LI’HLIL-MEDINETI WE MEN HEWLEHUM MINEL-’A’RABI ‘EN JETEHALLEFU ‘AN RASULI ALLAHI WE LA JERGABU BI’ENFUSIHIM ‘AN NEFSIHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM LA JUSIBUHUM DHEME’UN WE LA NESEBUN WE LA MEHMESETUN FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE LA JETE’UNE MEWTI’ËN JEGIDHUL-KUFFARA WE LA JENALUNE MIN ‘ADUWIN NEJLËN ‘IL-LA KUTIBE LEHUM BIHI ‘AMELUN SALIHUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
9.121: WE LA JUNFIKUNE NEFEKATEN SEGIRATEN WE LA KEBIRATEN WE LA JEKTA’UNE WE EDIËN ‘IL-LA KUTIBE LEHUM LIJEXHZIJEHUMU ALLAHU ‘EHSENE MA KANU JA’MELUN
9.122: WE MA KANEL-MU’UMINUNE LIJENFIRU KAFFETEN FELEWLA NEFERA MIN KUL-LI FIRKATIN MINHUM TA’IFETUN LIJETEFEKKAHU FI ED-DINI WE LIJUNDHIRU KAWMEHUM ‘IDHA RAXHA’U ‘ILEJHIM LE’ALLEHUM JEHDHERUN
9.123: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KATILUL-LEDHINE JELUNEKUM MINEL-KUFFARI WE LIEXHIDU FIKUM GILDHETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
9.124: WE ‘IDHA MA ‘UNZILET SURATUN FEMINHUM MEN JEKULU ‘EJJUKUM ZADET/HU HEDHIHI ‘IMANËN FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FEZADET/HUM ‘IMANËN WE HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
9.125: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN FEZADET/HUM RIXHSËN ‘ILA RIXHSIHIM WE MATU WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.126: ‘EWELA JERAWNE ‘ENNEHUM JUFTENUNE FI KUL-LI ‘AMIN MERRATEN ‘EW MERRATEJNI THUMME LA JETUBUNE WE LA HUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
9.127: WE ‘IDHA MA ‘UNZILET SURATUN NEDHERA BA’DUHUM ‘ILA BA’DIN HEL JERAKUM MIN ‘EHEDIN THUMME ENSERAFU SERAFEL-LAHU KULUBEHUM BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
9.128: LEKAD XHA’EKUM RASULUN MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘AZIZUN ‘ALEJHI MA ‘ANITTUM HERISUN ‘ALEJKUM BIL-MU’UMININE RA’UFUN RAHIMU
9.129: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKUL HESBI ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE HUWE RABBUL-’ARSHIL-’ADHIM

10.2: ‘EKANE LILNNASI ‘AXHEBËN ‘EN ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA RAXHULIN MINHUM ‘EN ‘ENDHIRI NASE WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENNE LEHUM KADEME SIDKIN ‘INDE RABBIHIM KALEL-KAFIRUNE ‘INNE HADHA LESAHIRUN MUBINU
10.3: ‘INNE RABBEKUMU ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA MA MIN SHEFI’IN ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DI ‘IDHNIHI DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM FA’BUDUHU ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
10.4: ‘ILEJHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKËN ‘INNEHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI BIL-KISTI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM SHERABUN MIN HEMIMIN WE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMUN BIMA KANU JEKFURUN
10.5: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE ESH-SHEMSE DIJA’EN WEL-KAMERA NURËN WE KADDERAHU MENAZILE LITA’LEMU ‘ADEDE SININE WEL-HISABE MA HALEKAL-LAHU DHALIKE ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI JUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
10.6: ‘INNE FI EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE MA HALEKAL-LAHU FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETTEKUN
10.7: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA WE RADU BIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE ETME’ENNU BIHA WEL-LEDHINE HUM ‘AN ‘AJATINA GAFILUN
10.9: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI JEHDIHIM RABBUHUM BI’IMANIHIM TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU FI XHENNATI NA’IM
10.10: DA’WAHUM FIHA SUBHANEKEL-LEHUMME WE TEHIJETUHUM FIHA SELAMUN WE ‘AHIRU DA’WAHUM ‘ENIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
10.11: WE LEW JU’AXHXHILU ALLAHU LILNNASI ESH-SHERRA ESTI’XHALEHUM BIL-HAJRI LEKUDIJE ‘ILEJHIM ‘EXHELUHUM FENEDHERUL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA FI TUGJANIHIM JA’MEHUN
10.12: WE ‘IDHA MESSEL-’INSANE ED-DURRU DA’ANA LIXHENBIHI ‘EW KA’IDËN ‘EW KA’IMËN FELEMMA KESHEFNA ‘ANHU DURRAHU MERRA KE’EN LEM JED’UNA ‘ILA DURRIN MESSEHU KEDHALIKE ZUJJINE LILMUSRIFINE MA KANU JA’MELUN
10.13: WE LEKAD ‘EHLEKNAL-KURUNE MIN KABLIKUM LEMMA DHELEMU WE XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI WE MA KANU LIJU’UMINU KEDHALIKE NEXHZIL-KAWMEL-MUXHRIMIN
10.14: THUMME XHE’ALNAKUM HALA’IFE FIL-’ERDI MIN BA’DIHIM LINENDHURA KEJFE TA’MELUN
10.15: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINATIN KALEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA E’TI BIKUR’ANIN GAJRI HADHA ‘EW BEDDILHU KUL MA JEKUNU LI ‘EN ‘UBEDDILEHU MIN TILKA’I NEFSI ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘IN ‘ASEJTU RABBI ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
10.16: KUL LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA TELEWTUHU ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘EDRAKUM BIHI FEKAD LEBITHTU FIKUM ‘UMURËN MIN KABLIHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
10.17: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-MUXHRIMUN
10.18: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JEDURRUHUM WE LA JENFA’UHUM WE JEKULUNE HA’UULA’ SHUFA’A’UUNA ‘INDEL-LAHI KUL ‘ETUNEBBI’UNEL-LAHE BIMA LA JA’LEMU FI SEMAWATI WE LA FIL-’ERDI SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
10.19: WE MA KANE NASU ‘IL-LA ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN FAHTELEFU WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM FIMA FIHI JEHTELIFUN
10.20: WE JEKULUNE LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI FEKUL ‘INNEMAL-GAJBU LIL-LAHI FANTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
10.21: WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNA NASE RAHMETEN MIN BA’DI DERRA’E MESSET/HUM ‘IDHA LEHUM MEKRUN FI ‘AJATINA KULI ALLAHU ‘ESRA’U MEKRËN ‘INNE RUSULENA JEKTUBUNE MA TEMKURU
10.22: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSEJJIRUKUM FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI HETTA ‘IDHA KUNTUM FIL-FULKI WE XHERAJNE BIHIM BIRIHIN TEJJIBETIN WE FERIHU BIHA XHA’ET/HA RIHUN ‘ASIFUN WE XHA’EHUMUL-MEWXHU MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM ‘UHITE BIHIM DE’AW ELLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINE LE’IN ‘ENXHEJTENA MIN HEDHIHI LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
10.23: FELEMMA ‘ENXHAHUM ‘IDHA HUM JEBGUNE FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNEMA BEGJUKUM ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM META’AL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA THUMME ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UKUM FENUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
10.24: ‘INNEMA METHELUL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA KEMA’IN ‘ENZELNAHU MINE SEMA’I FAHTELETE BIHI NEBATUL-’ERDI MIMMA JE’KULU NASU WEL-’EN’AM HETTA ‘IDHA ‘EHADHETIL-’ERDU ZUHRUFEHA WE EZZEJJENET WE DHENNE ‘EHLUHA ‘ENNEHUM KADIRUNE ‘ALEJHA ‘ETAHA ‘EMRUNA LEJLËN ‘EW NEHARËN FEXHE’ALNAHA HESIDËN KE’EN LEM TEGNE BIL-’EMSI KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
10.25: WEL-LAHU JED’U ‘ILA DARI SELAMI WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
10.26: LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENUL-HUSNA WE ZIJADETUN WE LA JERHEKU WUXHUHEHUM KATERUN WE LA DHIL-LETUN ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
10.27: WEL-LEDHINE KESEBU SEJJI’ATI XHEZA’U SEJJI’ETIN BIMITHLIHA WE TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN MA LEHUM MINEL-LAHI MIN ‘ASIMIN KE’ENNEMA ‘UGSHIJET WUXHUHUHUM KITA’ËN MINEL-LEJLI MUDHLIMËN ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
10.28: WE JEWME NEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU MEKANEKUM ‘ENTUM WE SHURAKA’UUKUM FEZEJJELNA BEJNEHUM WE KALE SHURAKA’UUHUM MA KUNTUM ‘IJANA TA’BUDUN
10.29: FEKEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUM ‘IN KUNNA ‘AN ‘IBADETIKUM LEGAFILIN
10.30: HUNALIKE TEBLU KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘ESLEFET WE RUDDU ‘ILA ALLAHI MEWLAHUMUL-HEKKI WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
10.31: KUL MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘EMMEN JEMLIKU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WE MEN JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE JUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE MEN JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA FESEJEKULUNEL-LAHU FEKUL ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
10.32: FEDHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUMUL-HEKKU FEMADHA BA’DEL-HEKKI ‘IL-LA ED-DELALU FE’ENNA TUSRAFUN
10.33: KEDHALIKE HEKKAT KELIMETU RABBIKE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE FESEKU ‘ENNEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
10.34: KUL HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU KULI ALLAHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
10.35: KUL HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI KULI ALLAHU JEHDI LILHEKKI ‘EFEMEN JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI ‘EHEKKU ‘EN JUTTEBE’A ‘EMMEN LA JEHIDDI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUHDA FEMA LEKUM KEJFE TEHKUMUN
10.36: WE MA JETTEBI’U ‘EKTHERUHUM ‘IL-LA DHENNËN ‘INNE EDH-DHENNE LA JUGNI MINEL-HEKKI SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA JEF’ALUN
10.37: WE MA KANE HADHAL-KUR’ANU ‘EN JUFTERA MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE LEKIN TESDIKAL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE TEFSILEL-KITABI LA RAJBE FIHI MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
10.38: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL FE’TU BISURATIN MITHLIHI WE ED’U MENI ESTETA’TUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
10.39: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIMA LEM JUHITU BI’ILMIHI WE LEMMA JE’TIHIM TE’WILUHU KEDHALIKE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU EDH-DHALIMIN
10.40: WE MINHUM MEN JU’UMINU BIHI WE MINHUM MEN LA JU’UMINU BIHI WE RABBUKE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUFSIDIN
10.41: WE ‘IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKUL LI ‘AMELI WE LEKUM ‘AMELUKUM ‘ENTUM BERI’UNE MIMMA ‘A’MELU WE ‘ENA BERI’UN MIMMA TA’MELUN
10.42: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’UNE ‘ILEJKE ‘EFE’ENTE TUSMI’U SUMME WE LEW KANU LA JA’KILUN
10.43: WE MINHUM MEN JENDHURU ‘ILEJKE ‘EFE’ENTE TEHDIL-’UMJE WE LEW KANU LA JUBSIRUN
10.44: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEDHLIMU NASE SHEJ’ËN WE LEKINNE NASE ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
10.45: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM KE’EN LEM JELBETHU ‘IL-LA SA’ATEN MINE NEHARI JETA’ARAFUNE BEJNEHUM KAD HASIRAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’I ALLAHI WE MA KANU MUHTEDIN
10.46: WE ‘IMMA NURIJENNEKE BA’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM THUMMEL-LAHU SHEHIDUN ‘ALA MA JEF’ALUN
10.47: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN RASULUN FE’IDHA XHA’E RASULUHUM KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
10.48: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
10.49: KUL LA ‘EMLIKU LINEFSI DERRËN WE LA NEF’ËN ‘IL-LA MA SHA’EL-LAHU LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELUN ‘IDHA XHA’E ‘EXHELUHUM FELA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
10.50: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABUHU BEJATËN ‘EW NEHARËN MADHA JESTA’XHILU MINHUL-MUXHRIMUN
10.51: ‘ETHUMME ‘IDHA MA WEKA’A ‘AMENTUM BIHI ‘AL’ANE WE KAD KUNTUM BIHI TESTA’XHILUN
10.52: THUMME KILE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HULDI HEL TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA BIMA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
10.53: WE JESTENBI’UNEKE ‘EHEKKUN HUWE KUL ‘I WE RABBI ‘INNEHU LEHEKKUN WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
10.54: WE LEW ‘ENNE LIKUL-LI NEFSIN DHELEMET MA FIL-’ERDI LAFTEDET BIHI WE ‘ESERRU NEDAMETE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
10.55: ‘ELA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘ELA ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
10.56: HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
10.57: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’ETKUM MEW’IDHETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE SHIFA’UN LIMA FI SUDURI WE HUDEN WE RAHMETUN LILMU’UMININ
10.58: KUL BIFEDLI ALLAHI WE BIRAHMETIHI FEBIDHALIKE FELJEFRAHU HUWE HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
10.59: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU LEKUM MIN RIZKIN FEXHE’ALTUM MINHU HERAMËN WE HELALËN KUL ‘ALLLEHU ‘EDHINE LEKUM ‘EM ‘ALA ALLAHI TEFTERUN
10.60: WE MA DHENNUL-LEDHINE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JESHKURUN
10.61: WE MA TEKUNU FI SHE’NIN WE MA TETLU MINHU MIN KUR’ANIN WE LA TA’MELUNE MIN ‘AMELIN ‘IL-LA KUNNA ‘ALEJKUM SHUHUDËN ‘IDH TUFIDUNE FIHI WE MA JA’ZUBU ‘AN RABBIKE MIN MITHKALI DHERRATIN FIL-’ERDI WE LA FI SEMA’I WE LA ‘ESGARA MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKBERA ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
10.62: ‘ELA ‘INNE ‘EWLIJA’EL-LAHI LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
10.64: LEHUMUL-BUSHRA FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE FIL-’AHIRATI LA TEBDILE LIKELIMATI ALLAHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
10.65: WE LA JEHZUNKE KAWLUHUM ‘INNEL-’IZZETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
10.66: ‘ELA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MEN FI SEMAWATI WE MEN FIL-’ERDI WE MA JETTEBI’UL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI SHURAKA’E ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
10.67: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LITESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
10.68: KALU ETTEHADHEL-LAHU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU HUWEL-GANIJU LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI ‘IN ‘INDEKUM MIN SULTANIN BIHEDHA ‘ETEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
10.70: META’UN FI ED-DUNJA THUMME ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM THUMME NUDHIKUHUMUL-’ADHABE ESH-SHEDIDE BIMA KANU JEKFURUN
10.71: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’E NUHIN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI ‘IN KANE KEBURA ‘ALEJKUM MEKAMI WE TEDHKIRI BI’AJA TI ALLAHI FE’ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELTU FE’EXHMI’U ‘EMRAKUM WE SHURAKA’EKUM THUMME LA JEKUN ‘EMRUKUM ‘ALEJKUM GUMMETEN THUMME EKDU ‘ILEJJE WE LA TUNDHIRUN
10.72: FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FEMA SE’ELTUKUM MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IN ‘EXHRI ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MUSLIMIN
10.73: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FENEXHXHEJNAHU WE MEN ME’AHU FIL-FULKI WE XHE’ALNAHUM HALA’IFE WE ‘EGRAKNAL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUNDHERIN
10.74: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BA’DIHI RUSULËN ‘ILA KAWMIHIM FEXHA’UHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEMA KANU LIJU’UMINU BIMA KEDHDHEBU BIHI MIN KABLU KEDHALIKE NETBA’U ‘ALA KULUBIL-MU’TEDIN
10.75: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BA’DIHIM MUSA WE HARUNE ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI BI’AJATINA FASTEKBERU WE KANU KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
10.76: FELEMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU MIN ‘INDINA KALU ‘INNE HADHA LESIHRUN MUBINU
10.77: KALE MUSA ‘ETEKULUNE LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EKUM ‘ESIHRUN HADHA WE LA JUFLIHU SAHIRUN
10.78: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LITELFITENA ‘AMMA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABA’ENA WE TEKUNE LEKUMAL-KIBRIJA’U FIL-’ERDI WE MA NEHNU LEKUMA BIMU’UMININ
10.79: WE KALE FIR’AWNU E’TUNI BIKUL-LI SAHIRIN ‘ALIMI
10.80: FELEMMA XHA’E SEHERATU KALE LEHUM MUSA ‘ELKU MA ‘ENTUM MULKUN
10.81: FELEMMA ‘ELKAW KALE MUSA MA XHI’TUM BIHI SIHRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEJUBTILUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUSLIHU ‘AMELEL-MUFSIDIN
10.82: WE JUHIKKU ALLAHUL-HEKKA BIKELIMATIHI WE LEW KERIHEL-MUXHRIMUN
10.83: FEMA ‘AMENE LIMUSA ‘IL-LA DHURRIJETUN MIN KAWMIHI ‘ALA HAWFIN MIN FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHIM ‘EN JEFTINEHUM WE ‘INNE FIR’AWNE LA’ALIN FIL-’ERDI WE ‘INNEHU LEMINEL-MUSRIFIN
10.84: WE KALE MUSA JA KAWMI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘AMENTUM BIL-LAHI FE’ALEJHI TEWEKKELU ‘IN KUNTUM MUSLIMIN
10.85: FEKALU ‘ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELNA RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA FITNETEN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
10.87: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA WE ‘EHIHI ‘EN TEBEWWE’A LIKAWMIKUMA BIMISRA BUJUTËN WE EXH’ALU BUJUTEKUM KIBLETEN WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
10.88: WE KALE MUSA RABBENA ‘INNEKE ‘ATEJTE FIR’AWNE WE MELE’EHU ZINETEN WE ‘EMWALËN FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA RABBENA LIJUDIL-LU ‘AN SEBILIKE RABBENA ETMIS ‘ALA ‘EMWALIHIM WE ESHDUD ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FELA JU’UMINU HETTA JERAWL-’ADHABEL-’ELIM
10.89: KALE KAD ‘UXHIBET DA’WETUKUMA FASTEKIMA WE LA TETTEBI’ANI SEBILEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
10.90: WE XHAWEZNA BIBENI ‘ISRA’ILEL-BEHRA FE’ETBE’AHUM FIR’AWNU WE XHUNUDUHU BEGJËN WE’ADWEN HETTA ‘IDHA ‘EDRAKEHUL-GARAKU KALE ‘AMENTU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LAL-LEDHI ‘AMENET BIHI BENU ‘ISRA’ILE WE ‘ENA MINEL-MUSLIMIN
10.91: ‘AL’ANE WE KAD ‘ASEJTE KABLU WE KUNTE MINEL-MUFSIDIN
10.92: FALJEWME NUNEXHXHIKE BIBEDENIKE LITEKUNE LIMEN HALFEKE ‘AJETEN WE ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINE NASI ‘AN ‘AJATINA LEGAFILUN
10.93: WE LEKAD BEWWE’NA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE MUBEWWE’E SIDKIN WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBATI FEMA EHTELEFU HETTA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
10.94: FE’IN KUNTE FI SHEKKIN MIMMA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE FAS’ELIL-LEDHINE JEKRA’UNEL-KITABE MIN KABLIKE LEKAD XHA’EKEL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
10.95: WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI ALLAHI FETEKUNE MINEL-HASIRIN
10.97: WE LEW XHA’ET/HUM KUL-LU ‘AJETIN HETTA JERAWL-’ADHABEL-’ELIM
10.98: FELEWLA KANET KARJETUN ‘AMENET FENEFE’AHA ‘IMANUHA ‘IL-LA KAWME JUNIS LEMMA ‘AMENU KESHEFNA ‘ANHUM ‘ADHABEL-HIZJI FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE METTA’NAHUM ‘ILA HINI
10.99: WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE LE’AMENE MEN FIL-’ERDI KUL-LUHUM XHEMI’ËN ‘EFE’ENTE TUKRIHU NASE HETTA JEKUNU MU’UMININ
10.100: WE MA KANE LINEFSIN ‘EN TU’UMINE ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE JEXH’ALU ER-RIXHSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’KILUN
10.101: KUL ENDHURU MADHA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA TUGNIL-’AJATU WE NUDHURU ‘AN KAWMIN LA JU’UMINUN
10.102: FEHEL JENTEDHIRUNE ‘IL-LA MITHLE ‘EJJAMIL-LEDHINE HALEW MIN KABLIHIM KUL FANTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
10.103: THUMME NUNEXHXHI RUSULENA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KEDHALIKE HEKKËN ‘ALEJNA NUNXHIL-MU’UMININ
10.104: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘IN KUNTUM FI SHEKKIN MIN DINI FELA ‘A’BUDUL-LEDHINE TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE LEKIN ‘A’BUDU ELLAHEL-LEDHI JETEWEFFAKUM WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
10.105: WE ‘EN ‘EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINI HENIFËN WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
10.106: WE LA TED’U MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JENFA’UKE WE LA JEDURRUKE FE’IN FE’ALTE FE’INNEKE ‘IDHËN MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
10.107: WE ‘IN JEMSESKEL-LAHU BIDURRIN FELA KASHIFE LEHU ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘IN JURIDKE BIHAJRIN FELA RADDE LIFEDLIHI JUSIBU BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
10.108: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUMUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKUM FEMENI EHTEDA FE’INNEMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DEL-LE FE’INNEMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIWEKILI
10.109: WE ETTEBI’ MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE WE ESBIR HETTA JEHKUMEL-LAHU WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN

11.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-RA KITABUN ‘UHKIMET ‘AJATUHU THUMME FUSSILET MIN LEDUN HEKIMIN HABIRI
11.2: ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE ‘INNENI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN WE BESHIRU
11.3: WE ‘ENI ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI JUMETTI’KUM META’ËN HESENËN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE JU’UTI KUL-LE DHI FEDLIN FEDLEHU WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN KEBIRI
11.4: ‘ILA ALLAHI MERXHI’UKUM WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
11.5: ‘ELA ‘INNEHUM JETHNUNE SUDURAHUM LIJESTEHFU MINHU ‘ELA HINE JESTEGSHUNE THIJABEHUM JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUNE ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
11.6: WE MA MIN DABBETIN FIL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI RIZKUHA WE JA’LEMU MUSTEKARRAHA WE MUSTEWDE’AHA KUL-LUN FI KITABIN MUBINI
11.7: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN WE KANE ‘ARSHUHU ‘ALEL-MA’I LIJEBLUWEKUM ‘EJJUKUM ‘EHSENU ‘AMELËN WE LE’IN KULTE ‘INNEKUM MEB’UTHUNE MIN BA’DIL-MEWTI LEJEKULENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
11.8: WE LE’IN ‘EHHARNA ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABE ‘ILA ‘UMMETIN MA’DUDETIN LEJEKULUNNE MA JEHBISUHU ‘ELA JEWME JE’TIHIM LEJSE MESRUFËN ‘ANHUM WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
11.9: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAL-’INSANE MINNA RAHMETEN THUMME NEZA’NAHA MINHU ‘INNEHU LEJE’USUN KEFURU
11.10: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAHU NA’MA’E BA’DE DERRA’E MESSET/HU LEJEKULENNE DHEHEBE SEJJI’ATU ‘ANNI ‘INNEHU LEFERIHUN FEHURU
11.11: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE SEBERU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
11.12: FELE’ALLEKE TARIKUN BA’DE MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE WE DA’IKUN BIHI SEDRUKE ‘EN JEKULU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI KENZUN ‘EW XHA’E ME’AHU MELEKUN ‘INNEMA ‘ENTE NEDHIRUN WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
11.13: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL FE’TU BI’ASHRI SUWERIN MITHLIHI MUFTERAJATIN WE ED’U MENI ESTETA’TUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
11.14: FE’ILLEM JESTEXHIBU LEKUM FA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘UNZILE BI’ILMI ALLAHI WE ‘EN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
11.15: MEN KANE JURIDUL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA WE ZINETEHA NUWEFFI ‘ILEJHIM ‘A’MALEHUM FIHA WE HUM FIHA LA JUBHASUN
11.16: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE LEJSE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA NARU WE HEBITE MA SENA’U FIHA WE BATILUN MA KANU JA’MELUN
11.17: ‘EFEMEN KANE ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBIHI WE JETLUHU SHAHIDUN MINHU WE MIN KABLIHI KITABU MUSA ‘IMAMËN WE RAHMETEN ‘ULA’IKE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MEN JEKFUR BIHI MINEL-’EHZABI FALNNARU MEW’IDUHU FELA TEKUN FI MIRJETIN MINHU ‘INNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
11.18: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘ULA’IKE JU’RADUNE ‘ALA RABBIHIM WE JEKULUL-’ESH/HADU HA’UULA’L-LEDHINE KEDHEBU ‘ALA RABBIHIM ‘ELA LA’NETU ALLAHI ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
11.19: EL-LEDHINE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
11.20: ‘ULA’IKE LEM JEKUNU MU’XHIZINE FIL-’ERDI WE MA KANE LEHUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN ‘EWLIJA’E JUDA’AFU LEHUMUL-’ADHABU MA KANU JESTETI’UNE SEM’A WE MA KANU JUBSIRUN
11.21: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
11.23: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘EHBETU ‘ILA RABBIHIM ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
11.24: METHELUL-FERIKAJNI KAL’A’MA WEL-’ESEMMI WEL-BESIRI WE SEMI’I HEL JESTEWIJANI METHELËN ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
11.25: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI ‘INNI LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
11.27: FEKALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI MA NERAKE ‘IL-LA BESHERËN MITHLENA WE MA NERAKE ETTEBE’AKE ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE HUM ‘ERADHILUNA BADIJE RA’JI WE MA NERA LEKUM ‘ALEJNA MIN FEDLIN BEL NEDHUNNUKUM KADHIBIN
11.28: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE ‘ATANI RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDIHI FA’UMMIJET ‘ALEJKUM ‘ENULZIMUKUMUHA WE ‘ENTUM LEHA KARIHUN
11.29: WE JAKAWMI LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MALËN ‘IN ‘EXHRIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE MA ‘ENA BITARIDIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNEHUM MULAKU RABBIHIM WE LEKINNI ‘ERAKUM KAWMËN TEXHHELUN
11.30: WE JAKAWMI MEN JENSURUNI MINEL-LAHI ‘IN TERADTUHUM ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
11.31: WE LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INDI HAZA’INU ALLAHI WE LA ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE WE LA ‘EKULU ‘INNI MELEKUN WE LA ‘EKULU LIL-LEDHINE TEZDERI ‘A’JUNUKUM LEN JU’UTIJEHUMU ALLAHU HAJRËN ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA FI ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘INNI ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
11.32: KALU JA NUHU KAD XHADELTENA FE’EKTHERTE XHIDALENA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
11.33: KALE ‘INNEMA JE’TIKUM BIHI ALLAHU ‘IN SHA’E WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
11.34: WE LA JENFA’UKUM NUSHI ‘IN ‘ERADTU ‘EN ‘ENSEHE LEKUM ‘IN KANEL-LAHU JURIDU ‘EN JUGWIJEKUM HUWE RABBUKUM WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
11.35: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL ‘INI EFTERAJTUHU FE’ALEJJE ‘IXHRAMI WE ‘ENA BERI’UN MIMMA TUXHRIMUN
11.36: WE ‘UHIJE ‘ILA NUHIN ‘ENNEHU LEN JU’UMINE MIN KAWMIKE ‘IL-LA MEN KAD ‘AMENE FELA TEBTE’IS BIMA KANU JEF’ALUN
11.37: WE ESNA’IL-FULKE BI’A’JUNINA WE WEHJINA WE LA TUHATIBNI FIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘INNEHUM MUGRAKUN
11.38: WE JESNA’UL-FULKE WE KUL-LEMA MERRA ‘ALEJHI MELE’UN MIN KAWMIHI SEHIRU MINHU KALE ‘IN TESHARU MINNA FE’INNA NESHARU MINKUM KEMA TESHARUN
11.39: FESEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE JEHIL-LU ‘ALEJHI ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
11.40: HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA WE FARAT-TENNURU KULNA EHMIL FIHA MIN KUL-LIN ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA MEN SEBEKA ‘ALEJHIL-KAWLU WE MEN ‘AMENE WE MA ‘AMENE ME’AHU ‘IL-LA KALILU
11.41: WE KALE ERKEBU FIHA BISMI ALLAHI MEXHRAHA WE MURSAHA ‘INNE RABBI LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
11.42: WE HIJE TEXHRI BIHIM FI MEWXHIN KALXHIBALI WE NADA NUHUN EBNEHU WE KANE FI MA’ZILIN JA BUNEJJE ERKEB ME’ANA WE LA TEKUN ME’AL-KAFIRIN
11.43: KALE SE’AWI ‘ILA XHEBELIN JA’SIMUNI MINEL-MA’I KALE LA ‘ASIMEL-JEWME MIN ‘EMRI ALLAHI ‘IL-LA MEN RAHIME WE HALE BEJNEHUMAL-MEWXHU FEKANE MINEL-MUGRAKIN
11.44: WE KILE JA ‘ERDU EBLA’I MA’EKI WE JA SEMA’U ‘EKLI’I WE GIDEL-MA’U WE KUDIJEL-’EMRU WE ESTEWET ‘ALEL-XHUDIJI WE KILE BU’DËN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
11.45: WE NADA NUHUN RABBEHU FEKALE RABBI ‘INNE EBNI MIN ‘EHLI WE ‘INNE WA’DEKEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENTE ‘EHKEMUL-HAKIMIN
11.46: KALE JA NUHU ‘INNEHU LEJSE MIN ‘EHLIKE ‘INNEHU ‘AMELUN GAJRU SALIHIN FELA TES’ELNI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN ‘INNI ‘A’IDHUKE ‘EN TEKUNE MINEL-XHAHILIN
11.47: KALE RABBI ‘INNI ‘A’UDHU BIKE ‘EN ‘ES’ELEKE MA LEJSE LI BIHI ‘ILMUN WE ‘IL-LA TEGFIR LI WE TERHEMNI ‘EKUN MINEL-HASIRIN
11.48: KILE JA NUHU EHBIT BISELAMIN MINNA WE BERAKATIN ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA ‘UMEMIN MIMMEN ME’AKE WE ‘UMEMUN SENUMETTI’UHUM THUMME JEMESSUHUM MINNA ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
11.49: TILKE MIN ‘ENBA’IL-GAJBI NUHIHA ‘ILEJKE MA KUNTE TA’LEMUHA ‘ENTE WE LA KAWMUKE MIN KABLI HADHA FASBIR ‘INNEL-’AKIBETE LILMUTTEKIN
11.50: WE ‘ILA ‘ADIN ‘EHAHUM HUDËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA MUFTERUN
11.52: WE JA KAWMI ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI JURSILI SEMA’E ‘ALEJKUM MIDRARËN WE JEZIDKUM KUWETEN ‘ILA KUWETIKUM WE LA TETEWEL-LEW MUXHRIMIN
11.53: KALU JA HUDU MA XHI’TENA BIBEJJINETIN WE MA NEHNU BITARIKI ‘ALIHETINA ‘AN KAWLIKE WE MA NEHNU LEKE BIMU’UMININ
11.54: ‘IN NEKULU ‘IL-LA A’TERAKE BA’DU ‘ALIHETINA BISU’IN KALE ‘INNI ‘USH/HIDU ELLAHE WE ESH/HEDU ‘ENNI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
11.55: MIN DUNIHI FEKIDUNI XHEMI’ËN THUMME LA TUNDHIRUN
11.56: ‘INNI TEWEKKELTU ‘ALA ALLAHI RABBI WE RABBIKUM MA MIN DABBETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘AHIDHUN BINASIJETIHA ‘INNE RABBI ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
11.57: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM MA ‘URSILTU BIHI ‘ILEJKUM WE JESTEHLIFU RABBI KAWMËN GAJRAKUM WE LA TEDURRUNEHU SHEJ’ËN ‘INNE RABBI ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HEFIDHU
11.58: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA HUDËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE NEXHXHEJNAHUM MIN ‘ADHABIN GALIDHI
11.59: WE TILKE ‘ADUN XHEHEDU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM WE ‘ASEW RUSULEHU WE ETTEBA’U ‘EMRA KUL-LI XHEBBARIN ‘ANIDI
11.60: WE ‘UTBI’U FI HEDHIHI ED-DUNJA LA’NETEN WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘ELA ‘INNE ‘ADËN KEFERU RABBEHUM ‘ELA BU’DËN LI’ADIN KAWMI HUDI
11.61: WE ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU HUWE ‘ENSHE’EKUM MINEL-’ERDI WE ESTA’MERAKUM FIHA FASTEGFIRUHU THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI ‘INNE RABBI KARIBUN MUXHIBU
11.62: KALU JA SALIHU KAD KUNTE FINA MERXHUWËN KABLE HADHA ‘ETENHANA ‘EN NA’BUDE MA JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUNA WE ‘INNENA LEFI SHEKKIN MIMMA TED’UNA ‘ILEJHI MURIBI
11.63: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE ‘ATANI MINHU RAHMETEN FEMEN JENSURUNI MINEL-LAHI ‘IN ‘ASEJTUHU FEMA TEZIDUNENI GAJRA TEHSIRI
11.64: WE JA KAWMI HEDHIHI NAKATU ALLAHI LEKUM ‘AJETEN FEDHERUHA TE’KUL FI ‘ERDI ALLAHI WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABUN KARIBU
11.65: FE’AKARUHA FEKALE TEMETTA’U FI DARIKUM THELATHETE ‘EJJAMIN DHALIKE WA’DUN GAJRU MEKDHUBI
11.66: FELEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA SALIHËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE MIN HIZJI JEWMI’IDHIN ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWEL-KAWIJUL-’AZIZ
11.67: WE ‘EHADHEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU SEJHETU FE’ESBEHU FI DIJARIHIM XHATHIMIN
11.68: KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHA ‘ELA ‘INNE THEMUDE KEFERU RABBEHUM ‘ELA BU’DËN LITHEMUD
11.69: WE LEKAD XHA’ET RUSULUNA ‘IBRAHIME BIL-BUSHRA KALU SELAMËN KALE SELAMUN FEMA LEBITHE ‘EN XHA’E BI’IXHLIN HENIDHI
11.70: FELEMMA RA’A ‘EJDIJEHUM LA TESILU ‘ILEJHI NEKIRAHUM WE ‘EWXHESE MINHUM HIFETEN KALU LA TEHAF ‘INNA ‘URSILNA ‘ILA KAWMI LUTI
11.71: WE EMRA’ETUHU KA’IMETUN FEDEHIKET FEBESHSHERNAHA BI’ISHAKA WE MIN WERA’I ‘ISHAKA JA’KUB
11.72: KALET JA WEJLETA ‘E’ELIDU WE ‘ENA ‘AXHUZUN WE HEDHA BA’LI SHEJHËN ‘INNE HADHA LESHEJ’UN ‘AXHIBU
11.73: KALU ‘ETA’XHEBINE MIN ‘EMRI ALLAHI RAHMETU ALLAHI WE BERAKATUHU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EHLEL-BEJTI ‘INNEHU HEMIDUN MEXHIDU
11.74: FELEMMA DHEHEBE ‘AN ‘IBRAHIME RAW’U WE XHA’ET/HUL-BUSHRA JUXHADILUNA FI KAWMI LUTI
11.76: JA ‘IBRAHIMU ‘A’RID ‘AN HADHA ‘INNEHU KAD XHA’E ‘EMRU RABBIKE WE ‘INNEHUM ‘ATIHIM ‘ADHABUN GAJRU MERDUDI
11.77: WE LEMMA XHA’ET RUSULUNA LUTËN SI’E BIHIM WE DAKA BIHIM DHER’ËN WE KALE HADHA JEWMUN ‘ASIBU
11.78: WE XHA’EHU KAWMUHU JUHRA’UNE ‘ILEJHI WE MIN KABLU KANU JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI KALE JA KAWMI HA’UULA’ BENATI HUNNE ‘ETHERU LEKUM FE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE LA TUHZUNI FI DEJFI ‘ELEJSE MINKUM RAXHULUN RASHIDU
11.79: KALU LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA LENA FI BENATIKE MIN HEKKIN WE ‘INNEKE LETA’LEMU MA NURID
11.80: KALE LEW ‘ENNE LI BIKUM KUWETEN ‘EW ‘AWI ‘ILA RUKNIN SHEDIDI
11.81: KALU JA LUTU ‘INNA RUSULU RABBIKE LEN JESILU ‘ILEJKE FE’ESRI BI’EHLIKE BIKIT’IN MINEL-LEJLI WE LA JELTEFIT MINKUM ‘EHEDUN ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEKE ‘INNEHU MUSIBUHA MA ‘ESABEHUM ‘INNE MEW’IDEHUMU SUBHU ‘ELEJSE SUBHU BIKARIBI
11.82: FELEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA XHE’ALNA ‘ALIJEHA SAFILEHA WE ‘EMTERNA ‘ALEJHA HIXHARATEN MIN SIXHXHILIN MENDUDI
11.83: MUSEWWEMETEN ‘INDE RABBIKE WE MA HIJE MINE EDH-DHALIMINE BIBA’IDI
11.84: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU WE LA TENKUSUL-MIKJA LE WEL-MIZANE ‘INNI ‘ERAKUM BIHAJRIN WE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN MUHITI
11.85: WE JA KAWMI ‘EWFUL-MIKJALE WEL-MIZANE BIL-KISTI WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA’EHUM WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ERDI MUFSIDIN
11.86: BEKIJETU ALLAHI HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININE WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIHEFIDHI
11.87: KALU JA SHU’AJBU ‘ESELATUKE TE’MURUKE ‘EN NETRUKE MA JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUNA ‘EW ‘EN NEF’ALE FI ‘EMWALINA MA NESHA’U ‘INNEKE LE’ENTEL-HELIMU RASHID
11.88: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE RAZEKANI MINHU RIZKËN HESENËN WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘UHALIFEKUM ‘ILA MA ‘ENHAKUM ‘ANHU ‘IN ‘URIDU ‘IL-LAL-’ISLAHE MA ESTETA’TU WE MA TEWFIKI ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI ‘UNIB
11.89: WE JA KAWMI LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHIKAKI ‘EN JUSIBEKUM MITHLU MA ‘ESABE KAWME NUHIN ‘EW KAWME HUDIN ‘EW KAWME SALIHIN WE MA KAWMU LUTIN MINKUM BIBA’IDI
11.90: WE ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI ‘INNE RABBI RAHIMUN WEDUDU
11.91: KALU JA SHU’AJBU MA NEFKAHU KETHIRËN MIMMA TEKULU WE ‘INNA LENERAKE FINA DA’IFËN WE LEWLA RAHTUKE LERAXHEMNAKE WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJNA BI’AZIZI
11.92: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERAHTI ‘E’AZZU ‘ALEJKUM MINEL-LAHI WE ETTEHADHTUMUHU WERA’EKUM DHIHRIJËN ‘INNE RABBI BIMA TA’MELUNE MUHITU
11.93: WE JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN SEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE MEN HUWE KADHIBUN WE ERTEKIBU ‘INNI ME’AKUM RAKIBU
11.94: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA SHU’AJBËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE ‘EHADHETIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU SEJHETU FE’ESBEHU FI DIJARIHIM XHATHIMIN
11.95: KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHA ‘ELA BU’DËN LIMEDJENE KEMA BA’IDET THEMUD
11.96: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
11.97: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FE ETTEBA’U ‘EMRA FIR’AWNE WE MA ‘EMRU FIR’AWNE BIRASHIDI
11.98: JEKDUMU KAWMEHU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FE’EWRADEHUMU NARA WE BI’SEL-WIRDUL-MEWRUD
11.99: WE ‘UTBI’U FI HEDHIHI LA’NETEN WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI BI’SE ER-RIFDUL-MERFUD
11.100: DHALIKE MIN ‘ENBA’IL-KURA NEKUSSUHU ‘ALEJKE MINHA KA’IMUN WE HESIDU
11.101: WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LEKIN DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM FEMA ‘EGNET ‘ANHUM ‘ALIHETUHUMU EL-LETI JED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRU RABBIKE WE MA ZADUHUM GAJRA TETBIBI
11.102: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EHDHU RABBIKE ‘IDHA ‘EHADHEL-KURA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN ‘INNE ‘EHDHEHU ‘ELIMUN SHEDIDU
11.103: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIMEN HAFE ‘ADHABEL-’AHIRATI DHALIKE JEWMUN MEXHMU’UN LEHU NASU WE DHELIKE JEWMUN MESH/HUDU
11.105: JEWME JE’TI LA TEKELLEMU NEFSUN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI FEMINHUM SHEKIJUN WE SA’IDU
11.106: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE SHEKU FEFI NARI LEHUM FIHA ZEFIRUN WE SHEHIKU
11.107: HALIDINE FIHA MA DAMETI SEMAWATU WEL-’ERDU ‘IL-LA MA SHA’E RABBUKE ‘INNE RABBEKE FA’’ALUN LIMA JURID
11.108: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE SU’IDU FEFIL-XHENNETI HALIDINE FIHA MA DAMETI SEMAWATU WEL-’ERDU ‘IL-LA MA SHA’E RABBUKE ‘ATA’EN GAJRA MEXHDHUDHI
11.109: FELA TEKU FI MIRJETIN MIMMA JA’BUDU HA’UULA’ MA JA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LA KEMA JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUHUM MIN KABLU WE ‘INNA LEMUWEFFUHUM NESIBEHUM GAJRA MENKUSI
11.110: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FAHTULIFE FIHI WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNEHUM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
11.111: WE ‘INNE KULLA LEMMA LEJUWEFFIJENNEHUM RABBUKE ‘A’MALEHUM ‘INNEHU BIMA JA’MELUNE HABIRU
11.112: FASTEKIM KEMA ‘UMIRTE WE MEN TABE ME’AKE WE LA TETGAW ‘INNEHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
11.113: WE LA TERKENU ‘ILAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU FETEMESSEKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN ‘EWLIJA’E THUMME LA TUNSERUN
11.114: WE ‘EKIMI SELËTE TERAFEJI NEHARI WE ZULEFËN MINEL-LEJLI ‘INNEL-HESENATI JUDH/HIBNE SEJJI’ATI DHALIKE DHIKRA LILDHDHAKIRIN
11.116: FELEWLA KANE MINEL-KURUNI MIN KABLIKUM ‘ULU BEKIJETIN JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-FESADI FIL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMEN ‘ENXHEJNA MINHUM WE ETTEBE’AL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA ‘UTRIFU FIHI WE KANU MUXHRIMIN
11.117: WE MA KANE RABBUKE LIJUHLIKEL-KURA BIDHULMIN WE ‘EHLUHA MUSLIHUN
11.118: WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE LEXHE’ALE NASE ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN WE LA JEZALUNE MUHTELIFIN
11.119: ‘IL-LA MEN RAHIME RABBUKE WE LIDHELIKE HALEKAHUM WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKE LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINEL-XHINNETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
