11.120: WE KULLËN NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE MIN ‘ENBA’I ER-RUSULI MA NUTHEBBITU BIHI FU’UADEKE WE XHA’EKE FI HEDHIHIL-HEKKU WE MEW’IDHETUN WE DHIKRA LILMU’UMININ
11.121: WE KUL LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNA ‘AMILUN
11.123: WE LIL-LEHI GAJBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UL-’EMRU KUL-LUHU FA’BUD/HU WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALEJHI WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN

12.3: NEHNU NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE ‘EHSENEL-KASESI BIMA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE HADHAL-KUR’ANE WE ‘IN KUNTE MIN KABLIHI LEMINEL-GAFILIN
12.4: ‘IDH KALE JUSUFU LI’EBIHI JA ‘EBETI ‘INNI RA’EJTU ‘EHEDE ‘ASHERA KEWKEBËN WE ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA RA’EJTUHUM LI SAXHIDIN
12.5: KALE JA BUNEJJE LA TEKSUS RU’UJA KE ‘ALA ‘IHWETIKE FEJEKIDU LEKE KEJDËN ‘INNE ESH-SHEJTANE LIL’INSANI ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
12.6: WE KEDHELIKE JEXHTEBIKE RABBUKE WE JU’ALLIMUKE MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI WE JUTIMMU NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA ‘ALI JA’KUBE KEMA ‘ETEMMEHA ‘ALA ‘EBEWEJKE MIN KABLU ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA ‘INNE RABBEKE ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
12.7: LEKAD KANE FI JUSUFE WE ‘IHWETIHI ‘AJATUN LILSSA’ILIN
12.8: ‘IDH KALU LEJUSUFU WE ‘EHUHU ‘EHEBBU ‘ILA ‘EBINA MINNA WE NEHNU ‘USBETUN ‘INNE ‘EBANA LEFI DELALIN MUBINI
12.9: EKTULU JUSUFE ‘EWI ETRAHUHU ‘ERDËN JEHLU LEKUM WEXHHU ‘EBIKUM WE TEKUNU MIN BA’DIHI KAWMËN SALIHIN
12.10: KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM LA TEKTULU JUSUFE WE ‘ELKUHU FI GAJABETIL-XHUBBI JELTEKITHU BA’DU SEJJARATI ‘IN KUNTUM FA’ILIN
12.11: KALU JA ‘EBANA MA LEKE LA TE’MENNA ‘ALA JUSUFE WE ‘INNA LEHU LENASIHUN
12.12: ‘ERSILHU ME’ANA GADËN JERTA’ WE JEL’AB WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
12.13: KALE ‘INNI LEJEHZUNUNI ‘EN TEDH/HEBU BIHI WE ‘EHAFU ‘EN JE’KULEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE ‘ENTUM ‘ANHU GAFILUN
12.14: KALU LE’IN ‘EKELEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE NEHNU ‘USBETUN ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEHASIRUN
12.15: FELEMMA DHEHEBU BIHI WE ‘EXHMA’U ‘EN JEXH’ALUHU FI GAJABETIL-XHUBBI WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHI LETUNEBBI’ENNEHUM BI’EMRIHIM HADHA WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
12.17: KALU JA ‘EBANA ‘INNA DHEHEBNA NESTEBIKU WE TERAKNA JUSUFE ‘INDE META’INA FE’EKELEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE MA ‘ENTE BIMU’UMININ LENA WE LEW KUNNA SADIKIN
12.18: WE XHA’U ‘ALA KAMISIHI BIDEMIN KEDHIBIN KALE BEL SEWWELET LEKUM ‘ENFUSUKUM ‘EMRËN FESEBRUN XHEMILUN WEL-LAHUL-MUSTA’ANU ‘ALA MA TESIFUN
12.19: WE XHA’ET SEJJARATUN FE’ERSELU WE ERIDEHUM FE’EDLA DELWEHU KALE JA BUSHRA HADHA GULAMUN WE ‘ESERRUHU BIDA’ATEN WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIMA JA’MELUN
12.20: WE SHERAWHU BITHEMENIN BEHSIN DERAHIME MA’DUDETIN WE KANU FIHI MINE EZ-ZAHIDIN
12.21: WE KALEL-LEDHI ESHTERAHU MIN MISRA LI’IMRA’ETIHI ‘EKRIMI METHWAHU ‘ASA ‘EN JENFE’ANA ‘EW NETTEHIDHEHU WELEDËN WE KEDHELIKE MEKKENNA LIJUSUFE FIL-’ERDI WE LINU’ALLIMEHU MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI WEL-LAHU GALIBUN ‘ALA ‘EMRIHI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.22: WE LEMMA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
12.23: WE RAWEDET/HU EL-LETI HUWE FI BEJTIHA ‘AN NEFSIHI WE GAL-LEKATIL-’EBWABE WE KALET HEJTE LEKE KALE MA’ADHEL-LAHI ‘INNEHU RABBI ‘EHSENE METHWAJE ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
12.24: WE LEKAD HEMMET BIHI WE HEMME BIHA LEWLA ‘EN RA’A BURHANE RABBIHI KEDHALIKE LINESRIFE ‘ANHU SU’E WEL-FEHSHA’E ‘INNEHU MIN ‘IBADINAL-MUHLESIN
12.25: WE ESTEBEKAL-BABE WE KADDET KAMISEHU MIN DUBURIN WE ‘ELFEJA SEJJIDEHA LEDAL-BABI KALET MA XHEZA’U MEN ‘ERADE BI’EHLIKE SU’ËN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUSXHENE ‘EW ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
12.26: KALE HIJE RAWEDETNI ‘AN NEFSI WE SHEHIDE SHAHIDUN MIN ‘EHLIHA ‘IN KANE KAMISUHU KUDDE MIN KUBULIN FESEDEKAT WE HUWE MINEL-KADHIBIN
12.27: WE ‘IN KANE KAMISUHU KUDDE MIN DUBURIN FEKEDHEBET WE HUWE MINE SADIKIN
12.28: FELEMMA RA’A KAMISEHU KUDDE MIN DUBURIN KALE ‘INNEHU MIN KEJDIKUNNE ‘INNE KEJDEKUNNE ‘ADHIMU
12.29: JUSUFU ‘A’RID ‘AN HADHA WE ESTEGFIRI LIDHENBIKI ‘INNEKI KUNTI MINEL-HATI’IN
12.30: WE KALE NISWETUN FIL-MEDINETI EMRA’ETUL-’AZIZI TURAWIDU FETAHA ‘AN NEFSIHI KAD SHEGAFEHA HUBBËN ‘INNA LENERAHA FI DELALIN MUBINI
12.31: FELEMMA SEMI’AT BIMEKRIHINNE ‘ERSELET ‘ILEJHINNE WE ‘A’TEDET LEHUNNE MUTTEKE’EN WE ‘ATET KUL-LE WAHIDETIN MINHUNNE SIKKINËN WE KALETI EHRUXH ‘ALEJHINNE FELEMMA RA’EJNEHU ‘EKBERNEHU WE KATTA’NE ‘EJDIJEHUNNE WE KULNE HASHE LIL-LAHI MA HADHA BESHERËN ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA MELEKUN KERIMU
12.32: KALET FEDHALIKUNNEL-LEDHI LUMTUNNENI FIHI WE LEKAD RAWEDTTUHU ‘AN NEFSIHI FASTA’SEME WE LE’IN LEM JEF’AL MA ‘AMURUHU LEJUSXHENENNE WE LEJEKUNËN MINE SAGIRIN
12.33: KALE RABBI SIXHNU ‘EHEBBU ‘ILEJJE MIMMA JED’UNENI ‘ILEJHI WE ‘IL-LA TESRIF ‘ANNI KEJDEHUNNE ‘ESBU ‘ILEJHINNE WE ‘EKUN MINEL-XHAHILIN
12.34: FASTEXHABE LEHU RABBUHU FESERAFE ‘ANHU KEJDEHUNNE ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
12.35: THUMME BEDA LEHUM MIN BA’DI MA RA’EWL-’AJATI LEJESXHUNUNNEHU HETTA HINI
12.36: WE DEHALE ME’AHU SIXHNE FETEJANI KALE ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘INNI ‘ERANI ‘A’SIRU HAMRËN WE KALEL-’AHARU ‘INNI ‘ERANI ‘EHMILU FEWKA RA’SI HUBZËN TE’KULUT-TEJRU MINHU NEBBI’NA BITE’WILIHI ‘INNA NERAKE MINEL-MUHSININ
12.37: KALE LA JE’TIKUMA TA’AMUN TURZEKANIHI ‘IL-LA NEBBE’TUKUMA BITE’WILIHI KABLE ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMA DHALIKUMA MIMMA ‘AL-LEMENI RABBI ‘INNI TERAKTU MILLETE KAWMIN LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
12.38: WE ETTEBA’TU MILLETE ‘ABA’I ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE MA KANE LENA ‘EN NUSHRIKE BIL-LAHI MIN SHEJ’IN DHALIKE MIN FEDLI ALLAHI ‘ALEJNA WE ‘ALA NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
12.39: JA SAHIBEJI SIXHNI ‘E’ERBABUN MUTEFERRIKUNE HAJRUN ‘EMI ALLAHUL-WAHIDUL-KAHHAR
12.40: MA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNIHI ‘IL-LA ‘ESMA’EN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABA’UUKUM MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI ‘EMERA ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU DHALIKE ED-DINUL-KAJJIMU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.41: JA SAHIBEJI SIXHNI ‘EMMA ‘EHEDUKUMA FEJESKI RABBEHU HAMRËN WE ‘EMMAL-’AHARU FEJUSLEBU FETE’KULUT-TEJRU MIN RA’SIHI KUDIJEL-’EMRUL-LEDHI FIHI TESTEFTIJAN
12.42: WE KALE LILLEDHI DHENNE ‘ENNEHU NAXHIN MINHUMA EDHKURNI ‘INDE RABBIKE FE’ENSAHU ESH-SHEJTANU DHIKRA RABBIHI FELEBITHE FI SIXHNI BID’A SININ
12.43: WE KALEL-MELIKU ‘INNI ‘ERA SEB’A BEKARATIN SIMANIN JE’KULUHUNNE SEB’UN ‘IXHAFUN WE SEB’A SUNBULATIN HUDRIN WE ‘UHARA JA BISATIN JA ‘EJJUHAL-MELE’U ‘EFTUNI FI RU’UJA JE ‘IN KUNTUM LILRRU’UJA TA’BURUN
12.44: KALU ‘EDGATHU ‘EHLAMIN WE MA NEHNU BITE’WILIL-’EHLAMI BI’ALIMIN
12.45: WE KALEL-LEDHI NEXHA MINHUMA WE EIDDEKERA BA’DE ‘UMMETIN ‘ENA ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BITE’WILIHI FE’ERSILUN
12.46: JUSUFU ‘EJJUHA SIDDIKU ‘EFTINA FI SEB’I BEKARATIN SIMANIN JE’KULUHUNNE SEB’UN ‘IXHAFUN WE SEB’I SUNBULATIN HUDRIN WE ‘UHARA JA BISATIN LE’ALLI ‘ERXHI’U ‘ILA NASI LE’ALLEHUM JA’LEMUN
12.47: KALE TEZRA’UNE SEB’A SININE DE’EBËN FEMA HESEDTUM FEDHERUHU FI SUNBULIHI ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMA TE’KULUN
12.48: THUMME JE’TI MIN BA’DI DHALIKE SEB’UN SHIDADUN JE’KULNE MA KADDEMTUM LEHUNNE ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMA TUHSINUN
12.49: THUMME JE’TI MIN BA’DI DHALIKE ‘AMUN FIHI JUGATHU NASU WE FIHI JA’SIRUN
12.50: WE KALEL-MELIKU E’TUNI BIHI FELEMMA XHA’EHU RASULU KALE ERXHI’ ‘ILA RABBIKE FAS’ELHU MA BALU NISWETIL-LATI KATTA’NE ‘EJDIJEHUNNE ‘INNE RABBI BIKEJDIHINNE ‘ALIMU
12.51: KALE MA HATBUKUNNE ‘IDH RAWEDTTUNNE JUSUFE ‘AN NEFSIHI KULNE HASHE LIL-LAHI MA ‘ALIMNA ‘ALEJHI MIN SU’IN KALETI EMRA’ETUL-’AZIZIL-’ANE HESHESEL-HEKKU ‘ENA RAWEDTTUHU ‘AN NEFSIHI WE ‘INNEHU LEMINE SADIKIN
12.52: DHALIKE LIJA’LEME ‘ENNI LEM ‘EHUNHU BIL-GAJBI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LA JEHDI KEJDEL-HA’ININ
12.53: WE MA ‘UBERRI’U NEFSI ‘INNE NEFSE LE’EMMARATUN BIS-SU’I ‘IL-LA MA RAHIME RABBI ‘INNE RABBI GAFURUN RAHIMU
12.54: WE KALEL-MELIKU E’TUNI BIHI ‘ESTEHLISHU LINEFSI FELEMMA KELLEMEHU KALE ‘INNEKEL-JEWME LEDEJNA MEKINUN ‘EMINU
12.56: WE KEDHELIKE MEKKENNA LIJUSUFE FIL-’ERDI JETEBEWWE’U MINHA HEJTHU JESHA’U NUSIBU BIRAHMETINA MEN NESHA’U WE LA NUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
12.57: WE LE’EXHRUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE KANU JETTEKUN
12.58: WE XHA’E ‘IHWETU JUSUFE FEDEHALU ‘ALEJHI FE’ARAFEHUM WE HUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
12.59: WE LEMMA XHEHHEZEHUM BIXHEHAZIHIM KALE E’TUNI BI’EHIN LEKUM MIN ‘EBIKUM ‘ELA TERAWNE ‘ENNI ‘UFIL-KEJLE WE ‘ENA HAJRUL-MUNZILIN
12.60: FE’IN LEM TE’TUNI BIHI FELA KEJLE LEKUM ‘INDI WE LA TEKRABUN
12.62: WE KALE LIFITJANIHI EXH’ALU BIDA’ATEHUM FI RIHALIHIM LE’ALLEHUM JA’RIFUNEHA ‘IDHA ENKALEBU ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
12.63: FELEMMA RAXHA’U ‘ILA ‘EBIHIM KALU JA ‘EBANA MUNI’A MINNAL-KEJLU FE’ERSIL ME’ANA ‘EHANA NEKTEL WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
12.64: KALE HEL ‘AMENUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘IL-LA KEMA ‘EMINTUKUM ‘ALA ‘EHIHI MIN KABLU FE-ALLAHU HAJRUN HAFIDHËN WE HUWE ‘ERHEMU ER-RAHIMIN
12.65: WE LEMMA FETEHU META’AHUM WE XHEDU BIDA’ATEHUM RUDDET ‘ILEJHIM KALU JA ‘EBANA MA NEBGI HEDHIHI BIDA’ATUNA RUDDET ‘ILEJNA WE NEMIRU ‘EHLENA WE NEHFEDHU ‘EHANA WE NEZDADU KEJLE BA’IRIN DHALIKE KEJLUN JESIRU
12.66: KALE LEN ‘URSILEHU ME’AKUM HETTA TU’UTUNI MEWTHIKËN MINEL-LAHI LETE’TUNENI BIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUHATE BIKUM FELEMMA ‘ATEWHU MEWTHIKAHUM KALEL-LAHU ‘ALA MA NEKULU WE KILU
12.67: WE KALE JA BENIJE LA TEDHULU MIN BABIN WAHIDIN WE EDHULU MIN ‘EBWABIN MUTEFERRIKATIN WE MA ‘UGNI ‘ANKUM MINEL-LAHI MIN SHEJ’IN ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ALEJHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MUTEWEKKILUN
12.68: WE LEMMA DEHALU MIN HEJTHU ‘EMERAHUM ‘EBUHUM MMA KANE JUGNI ‘ANHUM MMINEL-LAHI MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA HAXHETEN FI NEFSI JA’KUBE KADAHA WE ‘INNEHU LEDHU ‘ILMIN LIMA ‘ALLEMNAHU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.69: WE LEMMA DEHALU ‘ALA JUSUFE ‘AWA ‘ILEJHI ‘EHAHU KALE ‘INNI ‘ENA ‘EHUKE FELA TEBTE’IS BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
12.70: FELEMMA XHEHHEZEHUM BIXHEHAZIHIM XHE’ALE SIKAJETE FI RAHLI ‘EHIHI THUMME ‘EDHDHENE MU’UEDHDHINUN ‘EJJETUHAL-’IRU ‘INNEKUM LESARIKUN
12.72: KALU NEFKIDU SUWA’AL-MELIKI WE LIMEN XHA’E BIHI HIMLU BA’IRIN WE ‘ENA BIHI ZA’IMU
12.73: KALU TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ALIMTUM MA XHI’NA LINUFSIDE FIL-’ERDI WE MA KUNNA SARIKIN
12.75: KALU XHEZA’UUHU MEN WUXHIDE FI RAHLIHI FEHUWE XHEZA’UUHU KEDHALIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
12.76: FEBEDE’E BI’EW’IJETIHIM KABLE WI’A’I ‘EHIHI THUMME ESTEHRAXHEHA MIN WI’A’I ‘EHIHI KEDHALIKE KIDNA LIJUSUFE MA KANE LIJE’HUDHE ‘EHAHU FI DINIL-MELIKI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’EL-LAHU NERFA’U DERAXHATIN MEN NESHA’U WE FEWKA KUL-LI DHI ‘ILMIN ‘ALIMU
12.77: KALU ‘IN JESRIK FEKAD SERAKA ‘EHUN LEHU MIN KABLU FE’ESERRAHA JUSUFU FI NEFSIHI WE LEM JUBDIHA LEHUM KALE ‘ENTUM SHERRUN MEKANËN WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA TESIFUN
12.78: KALU JA ‘EJJUHAL-’AZIZU ‘INNE LEHU ‘EBËN SHEJHËN KEBIRËN FEHUDH ‘EHEDENA MEKANEHU ‘INNA NERAKE MINEL-MUHSININ
12.79: KALE MA’ADHEL-LAHI ‘EN NE’HUDHE ‘IL-LA MEN WEXHEDNA META’ANA ‘INDEHU ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEDHALIMUN
12.80: FELEMMA ESTEJ’ESU MINHU HALESU NEXHIJËN KALE KEBIRUHUM ‘ELEM TA’LEMU ‘ENNE ‘EBAKUM KAD ‘EHADHE ‘ALEJKUM MEWTHIKËN MINEL-LAHI WE MIN KABLU MA FERRATTUM FI JUSUFE FELEN ‘EBRAHEL-’ERDE HETTA JE’DHENE LI ‘EBI ‘EW JEHKUMEL-LAHU LI WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN
12.81: ERXHI’U ‘ILA ‘EBIKUM FEKULU JA ‘EBANA ‘INNE EBNEKE SERAKA WE MA SHEHIDNA ‘IL-LA BIMA ‘ALIMNA WE MA KUNNA LILGAJBI HAFIDHIN
12.82: WE ES’ELIL-KARJETEL-LETI KUNNA FIHA WEL-’IRAL-LETI ‘EKBELNA FIHA WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
12.83: KALE BEL SEWWELET LEKUM ‘ENFUSUKUM ‘EMRËN FESEBRUN XHEMILUN ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JE’TIJENI BIHIM XHEMI’ËN ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
12.84: WE TEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA ‘ESEFA ‘ALA JUSUFE WE EBJEDDET ‘AJNAHU MINEL-HUZNI FEHUWE KEDHIMU
12.85: KALU TE-ALLAHI TEFTE’U TEDHKURU JUSUFE HETTA TEKUNE HERADËN ‘EW TEKUNE MINEL-HALIKIN
12.86: KALE ‘INNEMA ‘ESHKU BETHTHI WE HUZNI ‘ILA ALLAHI WE ‘A’LEMU MINEL-LAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
12.87: JA BENIJE EDH/HEBU FETEHESSESU MIN JUSUFE WE ‘EHIHI WE LA TEJ’ESU MIN RAWHI ALLAHI ‘INNEHU LA JEJ’ESU MIN RAWHI ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-KAWMUL-KAFIRUN
12.88: FELEMMA DEHALU ‘ALEJHI KALU JA ‘EJJUHAL-’AZIZU MESSENA WE ‘EHLENA ED-DURRU WE XHI’NA BIBIDA’ATIN MUZXHËTIN FE’EWFI LENAL-KEJLE WE TESEDDEK ‘ALEJNA ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEXHZIL-MUTESEDDIKIN
12.89: KALE HEL ‘ALIMTUM MA FE’ALTUM BIJUSUFE WE ‘EHIHI ‘IDH ‘ENTUM XHAHILUN
12.90: KALU ‘E’INNEKE LE’ENTE JUSUFU KALE ‘ENA JUSUFU WE HEDHA ‘EHI KAD MENNEL-LAHU ‘ALEJNA ‘INNEHU MEN JETTEKI WE JESBIR FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
12.91: KALU TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ATHERAKEL-LAHU ‘ALEJNA WE ‘IN KUNNA LEHATI’IN
12.92: KALE LA TETHRIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-JEWME JEGFIRU ALLAHU LEKUM WE HUWE ‘ERHEMU ER-RAHIMIN
12.93: EDH/HEBU BIKAMISI HADHA FE’ELKUHU ‘ALA WEXHHI ‘EBI JE’TI BESIRËN WE ‘TUNI BI’EHLIKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
12.94: WE LEMMA FESELETIL-’IRU KALE ‘EBUHUM ‘INNI LE’EXHIDU RIHE JUSUFE LEWLA ‘EN TUFENNIDUN
12.96: FELEMMA ‘EN XHA’EL-BESHIRU ‘ELKAHU ‘ALA WEXHHIHI FARTEDDE BESIRËN KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKUM ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU MINEL-LAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
12.97: KALU JA ‘EBANA ESTEGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA ‘INNA KUNNA HATI’IN
12.98: KALE SEWFE ‘ESTEGFIRU LEKUM RABBI ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
12.99: FELEMMA DEHALU ‘ALA JUSUFE ‘AWA ‘ILEJHI ‘EBEWEJHI WE KALE EDHULU MISRA ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU ‘AMININ
12.100: WE RAFE’A ‘EBEWEJHI ‘ALEL-’ARSHI WE HARRU LEHU SUXHXHEDËN WE KALE JA ‘EBETI HADHA TE’WILU RU’UJA J MIN KABLU KAD XHE’ALEHA RABBI HEKKËN WE KAD ‘EHSENE BI ‘IDH ‘EHRAXHENI MINE SIXHNI WE XHA’E BIKUM MINEL-BEDWI MIN BA’DI ‘EN NEZEGA ESH-SHEJTANU BEJNI WE BEJNE ‘IHWETI ‘INNE RABBI LETIFUN LIMA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
12.101: RABBI KAD ‘ATEJTENI MINEL-MULKI WE ‘ALLEMTENI MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI FATIRA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘ENTE WE LIJI FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI TEWEFFENI MUSLIMËN WE ‘ELHIKNI BIS-SALIHIN
12.102: DHALIKE MIN ‘ENBA’IL-GAJBI NUHIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH ‘EXHMA’U ‘EMRAHUM WE HUM JEMKURUN
12.103: WE MA ‘EKTHERU NASI WE LEW HERASTE BIMU’UMININ
12.104: WE MA TES’ELUHUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRUN LIL’ALEMIN
12.105: WE KE’EJJIN MIN ‘AJETIN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JEMURRUNE ‘ALEJHA WE HUM ‘ANHA MU’RIDUN
12.106: WE MA JU’UMINU ‘EKTHERUHUM BIL-LAHI ‘IL-LA WE HUM MUSHRIKUN
12.107: ‘EFE’EMINU ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM GASHIJETUN MIN ‘ADHABI ALLAHI ‘EW TE’TIJEHUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
12.108: KUL HEDHIHI SEBILI ‘ED’U ‘ILA ALLAHI ‘ALA BESIRATIN ‘ENA WE MENI ETTEBE’ANI WE SUBHANEL-LAHI WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
12.109: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE ‘IL-LA RIXHALËN NUHI ‘ILEJHIM MIN ‘EHLIL-KURA ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE LEDARUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
12.110: HETTA ‘IDHA ESTEJ’ESE ER-RUSULU WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM KAD KUDHIBU XHA’EHUM NESRUNA FENUXHXHIJE MEN NESHA’U WE LA JURADDU BE’SUNA ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-MUXHRIMIN
12.111: LEKAD KANE FI KASESIHIM ‘IBRATUN LI’WLIL-’ELBABI MA KANE HEDITHËN JUFTERA WE LEKIN TESDIKAL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE TEFSILE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDEN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN

13.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-MIM-RA TILKE ‘AJATUL-KITABI WEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKEL-HEKKU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
13.2: ALLAHUL-LEDHI RAFE’A SEMAWATI BIGAJRI ‘AMEDIN TERAWNEHA THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI WE SEHHARA ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA JUFESSILUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM BILIKA’I RABBIKUM TUKINUN
13.3: WE HUWEL-LEDHI MEDDEL-’ERDE WE XHE’ALE FIHA RAWASIJE WE ‘ENHARËN WE MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI XHE’ALE FIHA ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI JUGSHIL-LEJLE NEHARA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
13.4: WE FIL-’ERDI KITA’UN MUTEXHAWIRATUN WE XHENNATUN MIN ‘A’NABIN WE ZER’UN WE NEHILUN SINWANUN WE GAJRU SINWANIN JUSKA BIMA’IN WAHIDIN WE NUFEDDILU BA’DEHA ‘ALA BA’DIN FIL-’UKULI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
13.5: WE ‘IN TA’XHEB FE’AXHEBUN KAWLUHUM ‘E’IDHA KUNNA TURABËN ‘E’INNA LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDIN ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM WE ‘ULA’IKEL-’EGLALU FI ‘A’NAKIHIM WE ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
13.6: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIS-SEJJI’ETI KABLEL-HESENETI WE KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIMUL-METHULATU WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU MEGFIRATIN LILNNASI ‘ALA DHULMIHIM WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LESHEDIDUL-’IKAB
13.7: WE JEKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI ‘INNEMA ‘ENTE MUNDHIRUN WE LIKUL-LI KAWMIN HADI
13.8: ALLAHU JA’LEMU MA TEHMILU KUL-LU ‘UNTHA WE MA TEGIDUL-’ERHAMU WE MA TEZDADU WE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN ‘INDEHU BIMIKDARI
13.10: SEWA’UN MINKUM MEN ‘ESERRAL-KAWLE WE MEN XHEHERA BIHI WE MEN HUWE MUSTEHFIN BIL-LEJLI WE SARIBUN BIN-NEHAR
13.11: LEHU MU’AKKIBATUN MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE MIN HALFIHI JEHFEDHUNEHU MIN ‘EMRI ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUGAJJIRU MA BIKAWMIN HETTA JUGAJJIRU MA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE ‘IDHA ‘ERADEL-LAHU BIKAWMIN SU’ËN FELA MERADDE LEHU WE MA LEHUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE E
13.12: HUWEL-LEDHI JURIKUMUL-BERKA HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE JUNSHI’U SEHABE ETH-THIKAL
13.13: WE JUSEBBIHU ER-RA’DU BIHEMDIHI WEL-MELA’IKETU MIN HIFETIHI WE JURSILU SEWA’IKA FEJUSIBU BIHA MEN JESHA’U WE HUM JUXHADILUNE FI ALLAHI WE HUWE SHEDIDUL-MIHAL
13.14: LEHU DA’WETUL-HEKKI WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JESTEXHIBUNE LEHUM BISHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA KEBASITI KEFFEJHI ‘ILAL-MA’I LIJEBLUGA FAHU WE MA HUWE BIBALIGIHI WE MA DU’A’UL-KAFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DELALI
13.15: WE LIL-LEHI JESXHUDU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI TEW’ËN WE KERHËN WE DHILALUHUM BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASAL
13.16: KUL MEN RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KULI ALLAHU KUL ‘EFATTEHADHTUM MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E LA JEMLIKUNE LI’NFUSIHIM NEF’ËN WE LA DERRËN KUL HEL JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU ‘EM HEL TESTEWI EDH-DHULUMATU WE NUR ‘EM XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’E HALEKU KEHALKIHI FETESHABEHEL-HALKU ‘ALEJHIM KULI ALLAHU HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWEL-WAHIDUL-KAHHAR
13.17: ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FESALET ‘EWDIJETUN BIKADERIHA FAHTEMELE SEJLU ZEBEDËN RABIËN WE MIMMA JUKIDUNE ‘ALEJHI FI NARI EBTIGA’E HILJETIN ‘EW META’IN ZEBEDUN MITHLUHU KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-HEKKA WEL-BATILE FE’EMMA EZ-ZEBEDU FEJEDH/HEBU XHUFA’EN WE ‘EMMA MA JENFA’U NASE FEJEMKUTHU FIL-’ERDI KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHAL
13.18: LIL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIRABBIHIMUL-HUSNA WEL-LEDHINE LEM JESTEXHIBU LEHU LEW ‘ENNE LEHUM MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LAFTEDEW BIHI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM SU’UL-HISABI WE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MIHAD
13.19: ‘EFEMEN JA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKEL-HEKKU KEMEN HUWE ‘A’MA ‘INNEMA JETEDHEKKERU ‘ULUL-’ELBAB
13.20: EL-LEDHINE JUFUNE BI’AHDI ALLAHI WE LA JENKUDUNEL-MITHAK
13.21: WEL-LEDHINE JESILUNE MA ‘EMERAL-LAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM WE JEHAFUNE SU’EL-HISAB
13.22: WEL-LEDHINE SEBERU EBTIGA’E WEXHHI RABBIHIM WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRËN WE ‘ALANIJETEN WE JEDRA’UNE BIL-HESENETI SEJJI’ETE ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘UKBA ED-DAR
13.23: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA WE MEN SELEHE MIN ‘ABA’IHIM WE ‘EZWAXHIHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM WEL-MELA’IKETU JEDHULUNE ‘ALEJHIM MIN KUL-LI BABI
13.25: WEL-LEDHINE JENKUDUNE ‘AHDEL-LAHI MIN BA’DI MITHAKIHI WE JEKTA’UNE MA ‘EMERAL-LAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ERDI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUMUL-LA’NETU WE LEHUM SU’U ED-DAR
13.26: ALLAHU JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU WE FERIHU BIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE MAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA META’U
13.27: WE JEKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI ‘ILEJHI MEN ‘ENAB
13.28: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE TETME’INNU KULUBUHUM BIDHIKRI ALLAHI ‘ELA BIDHIKRI ALLAHI TETME’INNUL-KULUB
13.29: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI TUBA LEHUM WE HUSNU ME’ABI
13.30: KEDHALIKE ‘ERSELNAKE FI ‘UMMETIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHA ‘UMEMUN LITETLUWE ‘ALEJHIMUL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE WE HUM JEKFURUNE BIR-RAHMENI KUL HUWE RABBI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI METAB
13.31: WE LEW ‘ENNE KUR’ANËN SUJJIRAT BIHIL-XHIBALU ‘EW KUTTI’AT BIHIL-’ERDU ‘EW KUL-LIME BIHIL-MEWTA BEL LIL-LAHIL-’EMRU XHEMI’ËN ‘EFELEM JEJ’ESIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU LEHEDA NASE XHEMI’ËN WE LA JEZALUL-LEDHINE KEFERU TUSIBUHUM BIMA SENA’U KARI’ATUN ‘EW TEHULLU KARIBËN MIN DARIHIM HETTA JE’TIJE WA’DU ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHLIFUL-MI’AD
13.32: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FE’EMLEJTU LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU THUMME ‘EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE ‘IKAB
13.33: ‘EFEMEN HUWE KA’IMUN ‘ALA KUL-LI NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’E KUL SEMMUHUM ‘EM TUNEBBI’UNEHU BIMA LA JA’LEMU FIL-’ERDI ‘EM BIDHAHIRIN MINEL-KAWLI BEL ZUJJINE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MEKRUHUM WE SUDDU ‘ANI SEBILI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
13.34: LEHUM ‘ADHABUN FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘ESHEKKU WE MA LEHUM MINEL-LAHI MIN WAKI
13.35: METHELUL-XHENNETI EL-LETI WU’IDEL-MUTTEKUNE TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU ‘UKULUHA DA’IMUN WE DHILLUHA TILKE ‘UKBAL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW WE ‘UKBAL-KAFIRINE NAR
13.36: WEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JEFRAHUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MINEL-’EHZABI MEN JUNKIRU BA’DEHU KUL ‘INNEMA ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘A’BUDEL-LAHE WE LA ‘USHRIKE BIHI ‘ILEJHI ‘ED’U WE ‘ILEJHI ME’AB
13.37: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNAHU HUKMËN ‘ARABIJËN WE LE’INI ETTEBA’TE ‘EHWA’EHUM BA’DEMA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI MA LEKE MINEL-LAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA WAKI
13.38: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULËN MIN KABLIKE WE XHE’ALNA LEHUM ‘EZWAXHËN WE DHURRIJETEN WE MA KANE LIRASULIN ‘EN JE’TIJE BI’AJETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI LIKUL-LI ‘EXHELIN KITABU
13.39: JEMHU ALLAHU MA JESHA’U WE JUTHBITU WE ‘INDEHU ‘UMMUL-KITAB
13.40: WE ‘IN MA NURIJENNEKE BA’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’INNEMA ‘ALEJKEL-BELAGU WE ‘ALEJNAL-HISAB
13.41: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA NE’TIL-’ERDE NENKUSUHA MIN ‘ETRAFIHA WEL-LAHU JEHKUMU LA MU’AKKIBE LIHUKMIHI WE HUWE SERI’UL-HISAB
13.42: WE KAD MEKERAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FELIL-LAHIL-MEKRU XHEMI’ËN JA’LEMU MA TEKSIBU KUL-LU NEFSIN WE SEJA’LEMUL-KUFFARU LIMEN ‘UKBA ED-DAR
13.43: WE JEKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LESTE MURSELËN KUL KEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE MEN ‘INDEHU ‘ILMUL-KITAB

14.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-RA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU ‘ILEJKE LITUHRIXHE NASE MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NUR BI’IDHNI RABBIHIM ‘ILA SIRATIL-’AZIZIL-HEMID
14.2: ALLAHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE WEJLUN LILKAFIRINE MIN ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDI
14.3: EL-LEDHINE JESTEHIBBUNEL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA ‘ALEL-’AHIRATI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN ‘ULA’IKE FI DELALIN BA’IDI
14.4: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA BILISANI KAWMIHI LIJUBEJJINE LEHUM FEJUDIL-LU ALLAHU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
14.5: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘EN ‘EHRIXH KAWMEKE MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE DHEKKIRHUM BI’EJJAMI ALLAHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBARIN SHEKURI
14.6: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH ‘ENXHAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’EL-’ADHABI WE JUDHEBBIHUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
14.7: WE ‘IDH TE’EDHDHENE RABBUKUM LE’IN SHEKERTUM LE’EZIDENNEKUM WE LE’IN KEFERTUM ‘INNE ‘ADHABI LESHEDIDU
14.8: WE KALE MUSA ‘IN TEKFURU ‘ENTUM WE MEN FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN FE’INNALL-LLAHE LEGANIJUN HEMIDU
14.9: ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WEL-LEDHINE MIN BA’DIHIM LA JA’LEMUHUM ‘IL-LALLAHU XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FERADDU ‘EJDIJEHUM FI ‘EFWAHIHIM WE KALU ‘INNA KEFERNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI WE ‘INNA LEFI SHEKKIN MIMMA TED’UNENA ‘ILEJHI MURIBI
14.10: KALET RUSULUHUM ‘EFI ALLAHI SHEKKUN FATIRI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JED’UKUM LIJEGFIRA LEKUM MIN DHUNUBIKUM WE JU’UEHHIRAKUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN KALU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA TURIDUNE ‘EN TESUDDUNA ‘AMMA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUNA FE’TUNA BISULTANIN MUBINI
14.11: KALET LEHUM RUSULUHUM ‘IN NEHNU ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JEMUNNU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE MA KANE LENA ‘EN NE’TIJEKUM BISULTANIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
14.12: WE MA LENA ‘ELLA NETEWEKKELE ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KAD HEDANA SUBULENA WE LENESBIRANNE ‘ALA MA ‘ADHEJTUMUNA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MUTEWEKKILUN
14.13: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIRUSULIHIM LENUHRIXHENNEKUM MIN ‘ERDINA ‘EW LETA’UDUNNE FI MILLETINA FE’EWHA ‘ILEJHIM RABBUHUM LENUHLIKENNE EDH-DHALIMIN
14.14: WE LENUSKINENNEKUMUL-’ERDE MIN BA’DIHIM DHALIKE LIMEN HAFE MEKAMI WE HAFE WA’ID
14.15: WE ESTEFTEHU WE HABE KUL-LU XHEBBARIN ‘ANIDI
14.16: MIN WERA’IHI XHEHENNEMU WE JUSKA MIN MA’IN SEDIDI
14.17: JETEXHERRA’UHU WE LA JEKADU JUSIGUHU WE JE’TIHIL-MEWTU MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN WE MA HUWE BIMEJJITIN WE MIN WERA’IHI ‘ADHABUN GALIDHU
14.18: METHELUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM ‘A’MALUHUM KERAMADIN ESHTEDDET BIHI ER-RIHU FI JEWMIN ‘ASIFIN LA JEKDIRUNE MIMMA KESEBU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN DHALIKE HUWE ED-DELALUL-BA’ID
14.19: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JE’TI BIHALKIN XHEDIDI
14.21: WE BERAZU LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN FEKALE ED-DU’AFA’U LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUNNA LEKUM TEBA’ËN FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUGNUNE ‘ANNA MIN ‘ADHABI ALLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN KALU LEW HEDANALLAHU LEHEDEJNAKUM SEWA’UN ‘ALEJNA ‘EXHEZI’NA ‘EM SEBERNA MA LENA MIN MEHISI
14.22: WE KALE ESH-SHEJTANU LEMMA KUDIJEL-’EMRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE WE’ADEKUM WA’DEL-HEKKI WE WE’ADTUKUM FE’EHLEFTUKUM WE MA KANE LI ‘ALEJKUM MIN SULTANIN ‘IL-LA ‘EN DE’AWTUKUM FASTEXHEBTUM LI FELA TELUMUNI WE LUMU ‘ENFUSEKUM MA ‘ENA BIMUSRIHIKUM WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMUSRIHIJE ‘INNI KEFERTU BIMA ‘ESHRAKTUMUNI MIN KABLU ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
14.23: WE ‘UDHILEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA BI’IDHNI RABBIHIM TEHIJETUHUM FIHA SELAMU
14.24: ‘ELEM TERA KEJFE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN KELIMETEN TEJJIBETEN KESHEXHERATIN TEJJIBETIN ‘ESLUHA THABITUN WE FER’UHA FI SEMA’
14.25: TU’UTI ‘UKULEHA KUL-LE HININ BI’IDHNI RABBIHA WE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHALE LILNNASI LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
14.26: WE METHELU KELIMETIN HABITHETIN KESHEXHERATIN HABITHETIN EXHTUTHTHET MIN FEWKIL-’ERDI MA LEHA MIN KARARI
14.27: JUTHEBBITU ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-KAWLI ETH-THABITI FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE FIL-’AHIRATI WE JUDIL-LU ALLAHU EDH-DHALIMINE WE JEF’ALU ALLAHU MA JESHA’
14.28: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE BEDDELU NI’METEL-LAHI KUFRËN WE ‘EHELLU KAWMEHUM DARAL-BEWAR
14.30: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN LIJUDIL-LU ‘AN SEBILIHI KUL TEMETTA’U FE’INNE MESIRAKUM ‘ILA NAR
14.31: KUL LI’IBADIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUKIMU SELËTE WE JUNFIKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRËN WE ‘ALANIJETEN MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA BEJ’UN FIHI WE LA HILALU
14.32: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHE BIHI MINE ETH-THEMERATI RIZKËN LEKUM WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-FULKE LITEXHRIJE FIL-BEHRI BI’EMRIHI WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-’ENHAR
14.33: WE SEHHARA LEKUMU ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA DA’IBEJNI WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHA
14.34: WE ‘ATAKUM MIN KUL-LI MA SE’ELTUMUHU WE ‘IN TA’UDDU NI’METEL-LAHI LA TUHSUHA ‘INNEL-’INSANE LEDHELUMUN KEFFARU
14.35: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI EXH’AL HADHAL-BELEDE ‘AMINËN WE EXHNUBNI WE BENIJE ‘EN NA’BUDEL-’ESNAM
14.36: RABBI ‘INNEHUNNE ‘EDLELNE KETHIRËN MINE NASI FEMEN TEBI’ANI FE’INNEHU MINNI WE MEN ‘ASANI FE’INNEKE GAFURUN RAHIMU
14.37: RABBENA ‘INNI ‘ESKENTU MIN DHURRIJETI BIWADIN GAJRI DHI ZER’IN ‘INDE BEJTIKEL-MUHERRAMI RABBENA LIJUKIMU SELËTE FAXH’AL ‘EF’IDETEN MINE NASI TEHWI ‘ILEJHIM WE ERZUKHUM MINE ETH-THEMERATI LE’ALLEHUM JESHKURUN
14.38: RABBENA ‘INNEKE TA’LEMU MA NUHFI WE MA NU’LINU WE MA JEHFA ‘ALA ALLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN FIL-’ERDI WE LA FI SEMA’
14.39: EL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI WEHEBE LI ‘ALEL-KIBERI ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA ‘INNE RABBI LESEMI’U ED-DU’A’
14.40: RABBI EXH’ALNI MUKIME SELËTI WE MIN DHURRIJETI RABBENA WE TEKABBEL DU’A’
14.41: RABBENA EGFIR LI WE LIWALIDEJJE WE LILMU’UMININE JEWME JEKUMUL-HISAB
14.42: WE LA TEHSEBENNEL-LAHE GAFILËN ‘AMMA JA’MELU EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘INNEMA JU’UEHHIRUHUM LIJEWMIN TESHHASU FIHIL-’EBSAR
14.43: MUHTI’INE MUKNI’I RU’USIHIM LA JERTEDDU ‘ILEJHIM TERFUHUM WE ‘EF’IDETUHUM HEWA’U
14.44: WE ‘ENDHIRI NASE JEWME JE’TIHIMUL-’ADHABU FEJEKULUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU RABBENA ‘EHHIRNA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN NUXHIB DA’WETEKE WE NETTEBI’I ER-RUSULE ‘EWELEM TEKUNU ‘EKSEMTUM MIN KABLU MA LEKUM MIN ZEWALI
14.45: WE SEKENTUM FI MESAKINIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM WE TEBEJJENE LEKUM KEJFE FE’ALNA BIHIM WE DERABNA LEKUMUL-’EMTHAL
14.46: WE KAD MEKERU MEKRAHUM WE ‘INDEL-LAHI MEKRUHUM WE ‘IN KANE MEKRUHUM LITEZULE MINHUL-XHIBAL
14.47: FELA TEHSEBENNEL-LAHE MUHLIFE WA’DIHI RUSULEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
14.48: JEWME TUBEDDELUL-’ERDU GAJRAL-’ERDI WE SEMAWATU WE BERAZU LIL-LAHIL-WAHIDIL-KAHHAR
14.50: SERABILUHUM MIN KATIRANIN WE TEGSHA WUXHUHEHUMU NAR
14.51: LIJEXHZIJEL-LAHU KUL-LE NEFSIN MA KESEBET ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
14.52: HADHA BELAGUN LILNNASI WE LIJUNDHERU BIHI WE LIJA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN WE LIJEDHDHEKKERA ‘ULUL-’ELBAB

15.2: RUBEMA JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW KANU MUSLIMIN
15.3: DHERHUM JE’KULU WE JETEMETTA’U WE JULHIHIMUL-’EMELU FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
15.4: WE MA ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA WE LEHA KITABUN MA’LUMU
15.5: MA TESBIKU MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELEHA WE MA JESTE’HIRUN
15.6: WE KALU JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHI NUZZILE ‘ALEJHI EDH-DHIKRU ‘INNEKE LEMEXHNUNU
15.7: LEW MA TE’TINA BIL-MELA’IKETI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
15.8: MA NUNEZZILUL-MELA’IKETE ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE MA KANU ‘IDHËN MUNDHERIN
15.9: ‘INNA NEHNU NEZZELNA EDH-DHIKRA WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
15.10: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE FI SHIJA’IL-’EWWELIN
15.11: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’UN
15.13: LA JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE KAD HALET SUNNETUL-’EWWELIN
15.14: WE LEW FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BABËN MINE SEMA’I FEDHELLU FIHI JA’RUXHUN
15.15: LEKALU ‘INNEMA SUKKIRAT ‘EBSARUNA BEL NEHNU KAWMUN MESHURUN
15.16: WE LEKAD XHE’ALNA FI SEMA’I BURUXHËN WE ZEJJENNAHA LILNNADHIRIN
15.17: WE HEFIDHNAHA MIN KUL-LI SHEJTANIN RAXHIMI
15.18: ‘IL-LA MENI ESTERAKA SEM’A FE’ETBE’AHU SHIHABUN MUBINU
15.19: WEL-’ERDE MEDEDNAHA WE ‘ELKAJNA FIHA RAWASIJE WE ‘ENBETNA FIHA MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MEWZUNI
15.20: WE XHE’ALNA LEKUM FIHA MA’AJISHE WE MEN LESTUM LEHU BIRAZIKIN
15.21: WE ‘IN MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA ‘INDENA HAZA’INUHU WE MA NUNEZZILUHU ‘IL-LA BIKADERIN MA’LUMI
15.22: WE ‘ERSELNA ER-RIJAHE LEWAKIHE FE’ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ESKAJNAKUMUHU WE MA ‘ENTUM LEHU BIHAZININ
15.23: WE ‘INNA LENEHNU NUHJI WE NUMITU WE NEHNUL-WARITHUN
15.26: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.27: WEL-XHANNE HALEKNAHU MIN KABLU MIN NARI SEMUM
15.28: WE ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELA’IKETI ‘INNI HALIKUN BESHERËN MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.29: FE’IDHA SEWWEJTUHU WE NEFEHTU FIHI MIN RUHI FEKA’U LEHU SAXHIDIN
15.32: KALE JA ‘IBLISU MA LEKE ‘ELLA TEKUNE ME’A SAXHIDIN
15.33: KALE LEM ‘EKUN LI’SXHUDE LIBESHERIN HALEKTEHU MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.39: KALE RABBI BIMA ‘EGWEJTENI LE’UZEJJINENNE LEHUM FIL-’ERDI WE LE’UGWIJENNEHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
15.42: ‘INNE ‘IBADI LEJSE LEKE ‘ALEJHIM SULTANUN ‘IL-LA MENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-GAWIN
15.44: LEHA SEB’ATU ‘EBWABIN LIKUL-LI BABIN MINHUM XHUZ’UN MEKSUMU
15.47: WE NEZA’NA MA FI SUDURIHIM MIN GILLIN ‘IHWANËN ‘ALA SURURIN MUTEKABILIN
15.48: LA JEMESSUHUM FIHA NESEBUN WE MA HUM MINHA BIMUHRAXHIN
15.52: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALEJHI FEKALU SELAMËN KALE ‘INNA MINKUM WEXHILUN
15.55: KALU BESHSHERNAKE BIL-HEKKI FELA TEKUN MINEL-KANITIN
15.56: KALE WE MEN JEKNETU MIN RAHMETI RABBIHI ‘IL-LA ED-DALLUN
15.63: KALU BEL XHI’NAKE BIMA KANU FIHI JEMTERUN
15.65: FE’ESRI BI’EHLIKE BIKIT’IN MINEL-LEJLI WE ETTEBI’ ‘EDBARAHUM WE LA JELTEFIT MINKUM ‘EHEDUN WE EMDU HEJTHU TU’UMERUN
15.66: WE KADEJNA ‘ILEJHI DHALIKEL-’EMRA ‘ENNE DABIRA HA’UULA’ MEKTU’UN MUSBIHIN
15.69: WE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE LA TUHZUN
15.74: FEXHE’ALNA ‘ALIJEHA SAFILEHA WE ‘EMTERNA ‘ALEJHIM HIXHARATEN MIN SIXHXHILI
15.85: WE MA HALEKNA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE ‘INNE SA’ATE LE’ATIJETUN FASFEHI SEFHEL-XHEMIL
15.88: LA TEMUDDENNE ‘AJNEJKE ‘ILA MA METTA’NA BIHI ‘EZWAXHËN MINHUM WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE EHFID XHENAHEKE LILMU’UMININ
15.96: EL-LEDHINE JEXH’ALUNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
15.97: WE LEKAD NA’LEMU ‘ENNEKE JEDIKU SEDRUKE BIMA JEKULUN
15.98: FESEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE WE KUN MINE SAXHIDIN

16.1: ‘ETA ‘EMRU ALLAHI FELA TESTA’XHILUHU SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
16.2: JUNEZZILUL-MELA’IKETE BIR-RUHI MIN ‘EMRIHI ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI ‘EN ‘ENDHIRU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENA FE ETTEKUN
16.3: HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
16.4: HALEKAL-’INSANE MIN NUTFETIN FE’IDHA HUWE HASIMUN MUBINU
16.5: WEL-’EN’AME HALEKAHA LEKUM FIHA DIF’UN WE MENAFI’U WE MINHA TE’KULUN
16.6: WE LEKUM FIHA XHEMALUN HINE TURIHUNE WE HINE TESRAHUN
16.7: WE TEHMILU ‘ETHKALEKUM ‘ILA BELEDIN LEM TEKUNU BALIGIHI ‘IL-LA BISHIKKIL-’ENFUSI ‘INNE RABBEKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
16.8: WEL-HAJLE WEL-BIGALE WEL-HEMIRA LITERKEBUHA WE ZINETEN WE JEHLUKU MA LA TA’LEMUN
16.9: WE ‘ALA ALLAHI KASDU SEBILI WE MINHA XHA’IRUN WE LEW SHA’E LEHEDAKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
16.10: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN LEKUM MINHU SHERABUN WE MINHU SHEXHERUN FIHI TUSIMUN
16.11: JUNBITU LEKUM BIHI EZ-ZER’A WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE NEHILE WEL-’A’NABE WE MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
16.12: WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA WE ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA WE NUXHUMU MUSEHHARATUN BI’EMRIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
16.13: WE MA DHERA’E LEKUM FIL-’ERDI MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWANUHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JEDHDHEKKERUN
16.14: WE HUWEL-LEDHI SEHHARAL-BEHRA LITE’KULU MINHU LEHMËN TERIJËN WE TESTEHRIXHU MINHU HILJETEN TELBESUNEHA WE TERAL-FULKE MEWAHIRA FIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
16.15: WE ‘ELKA FIL-’ERDI RAWASIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIKUM WE ‘ENHARËN WE SUBULËN LLE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
16.18: WE ‘IN TA’UDDU NI’METEL-LAHI LA TUHSUHA ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.19: WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA TUSIRRUNE WE MA TU’LINUN
16.20: WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI LA JEHLUKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUN
16.22: ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN FE-EL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI KULUBUHUM MUNKIRATUN WE HUM MUSTEKBIRUN
16.23: LA XHERAME ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUNE ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSTEKBIRIN
16.24: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM MADHA ‘ENZELE RABBUKUM KALU ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
16.25: LIJEHMILU ‘EWZARAHUM KAMILETEN JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE MIN ‘EWZARIL-LEDHINE JUDIL-LUNEHUM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘ELA SA’E MA JEZIRUN
16.26: KAD MEKERAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FE’ETALLAHU BUNJANEHUM MINEL-KAWA’IDI FEHARRA ‘ALEJHIMU SEKFU MIN FEWKIHIM WE ‘ETAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
16.27: THUMME JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JUHZIHIM WE JEKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TUSHAKKUNE FIHIM KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME ‘INNEL-HIZJEL-JEWME WE SU’E ‘ALEL-KAFIRIN
16.28: EL-LEDHINE TETEWEFFAHUMUL-MELA’IKETU DHALIMI ‘ENFUSIHIM FE’ELKAW SELEME MA KUNNA NA’MELU MIN SU’IN BELA ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.29: FADHULU ‘EBWABE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHA FELEBI’SE METHWAL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
16.30: WE KILE LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW MADHA ‘ENZELE RABBUKUM KALU HAJRËN LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU FI HEDHIHI ED-DUNJA HESENETUN WE LEDARUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN WE LENI’ME DARUL-MUTTEKIN
16.31: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU LEHUM FIHA MA JESHA’UNE KEDHALIKE JEXHZI ALLAHUL-MUTTEKIN
16.32: EL-LEDHINE TETEWEFFAHUMUL-MELA’IKETU TEJJIBINE JEKULUNE SELAMUN ‘ALEJKUMU EDHULUL-XHENNETE BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.33: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUMUL-MELA’IKETU ‘EW JE’TIJE ‘EMRU RABBIKE KEDHALIKE FE’ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE MA DHELEMEHUMU ALLAHU WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
16.34: FE’ESABEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA ‘AMILU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
16.35: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU LEW SHA’EL-LAHU MA ‘ABEDNA MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN NEHNU WE LA ‘ABA’UUNA WE LA HERRAMNA MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN KEDHALIKE FE’ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEHEL ‘ALA ER-RUSULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
16.36: WE LEKAD BE’ATHNA FI KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN RASULËN ‘ENI EU’BUDU ELLAHE WE EXHTENIBUT-TAGUTE FEMINHUM MEN HEDALLAHU WE MINHUM MEN HEKKAT ‘ALEJHI ED-DELALETU FESIRU FIL-’ERDI FANDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
16.37: ‘IN TEHRIS ‘ALA HUDAHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN JUDIL-LU WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
16.38: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LA JEB’ATHU ALLAHU MEN JEMUTU BELA WA’DËN ‘ALEJHI HEKKËN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
16.39: LIJUBEJJINE LEHUMUL-LEDHI JEHTELIFUNE FIHI WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEHUM KANU KADHIBIN
16.40: ‘INNEMA KAWLUNA LISHEJ’IN ‘IDHA ‘ERADNAHU ‘EN NEKULE LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
16.41: WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU FI ALLAHI MIN BA’DI MA DHULIMU LENUBEWWI’ENNEHUM FI ED-DUNJA HESENETEN WE LE’EXHRUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
16.43: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE ‘IL-LA RIXHALËN NUHI ‘ILEJHIM FAS’ELU ‘EHLE EDH-DHIKRI ‘IN KUNTUM LA TA’LEMUN
16.44: BIL-BEJJINATI WE EZ-ZUBURI WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE EDH-DHIKRA LITUBEJJINE LILNNASI MA NUZZILE ‘ILEJHIM WE LE’ALLEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
16.45: ‘EFE’EMINEL-LEDHINE MEKERU SEJJI’ATI ‘EN JEHSIFEL-LAHU BIHIMUL-’ERDE ‘EW JE’TIJEHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
16.46: ‘EW JE’HUDHEHUM FI TEKALLUBIHIM FEMA HUM BIMU’XHIZIN
16.47: ‘EW JE’HUDHEHUM ‘ALA TEHAWWUFIN FE’INNE RABBEKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
16.48: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILA MA HALEKAL-LAHU MIN SHEJ’IN JETEFEJJE’U DHILALUHU ‘ANIL-JEMINI WE ESH-SHEMA’ILI SUXHXHEDËN LIL-LAHI WE HUM DAHIRUN
16.49: WE LIL-LEHI JESXHUDU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI MIN DABBETIN WEL-MELA’IKETU WE HUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
16.50: JEHAFUNE RABBEHUM MIN FEWKIHIM WE JEF’ALUNE MA JU’UMERUN
16.51: WE KALEL-LAHU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ILEHEJNI ETHNEJNI ‘INNEMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN FE’IJAJE FARHEBUN
16.52: WE LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LEHU ED-DINU WE ESIBËN ‘EFEGAJRAL-LAHI TETTEKUN
16.53: WE MA BIKUM MIN NI’METIN FEMINEL-LAHI THUMME ‘IDHA MESSEKUMU ED-DURRU FE’ILEJHI TEXH’ERUN
16.54: THUMME ‘IDHA KESHEFE ED-DURRA ‘ANKUM ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINKUM BIRABBIHIM JUSHRIKUN
16.56: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIMA LA JA’LEMUNE NESIBËN MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM TE-ALLAHI LETUS’ELUNNE ‘AMMA KUNTUM TEFTERUN
16.57: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIL-LAHIL-BENATI SUBHANEHU WE LEHUM MA JESHTEHUN
16.58: WE ‘IDHA BUSHSHIRA ‘EHEDUHUM BIL-’UNTHA DHELLE WEXHHUHU MUSWEDDËN WE HUWE KEDHIMU
16.59: JETEWARA MINEL-KAWMI MIN SU’I MA BUSHSHIRA BIHI ‘EJUMSIKUHU ‘ALA HUNIN ‘EM JEDUSSUHU FIT-TURABI ‘ELA SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
16.60: LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI METHELU SEW’I WE LIL-LEHIL-METHELUL-’A’LA WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
16.61: WE LEW JU’UAHIDHU ALLAHU NASE BIDHULMIHIM MA TERAKE ‘ALEJHA MIN DABBETIN WE LEKIN JU’UEHHIRUHUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FE’IDHA XHA’E ‘EXHELUHUM LA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
16.62: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIL-LAHI MA JEKRAHUNE WE TESIFU ‘ELSINETUHUMUL-KEDHIBE ‘ENNE LEHUMUL-HUSNA LA XHERAME ‘ENNE LEHUMU NARA WE ‘ENNEHUM MUFRATUN
16.63: TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA ‘UMEMIN MIN KABLIKE FEZEJJENE LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FEHUWE WELIJUHUMUL-JEWME WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
16.64: WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE ‘IL-LA LITUBEJJINE LEHUMUL-LEDHI EHTELEFU FIHI WE HUDEN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
16.65: WEL-LAHU ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
16.66: WE ‘INNE LEKUM FIL-’EN’AM LA’IBRATEN NUSKIKUM MIMMA FI BUTUNIHI MIN BEJNI FERTHIN WE DEMIN LEBENËN HALISËN SA’IGËN LILSHSHARIBIN
16.67: WE MIN THEMERATI NEHILI WEL-’A’NABI TETTEHIDHUNE MINHU SEKERËN WE RIZKËN HESENËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
16.68: WE ‘EWHA RABBUKE ‘ILA NEHLI ‘ENI ETTEHIDHI MINEL-XHIBALI BUJUTËN WE MINE ESH-SHEXHERI WE MIMMA JA’RISHUN
16.69: THUMME KULI MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI FASLUKI SUBULE RABBIKI DHULULËN JEHRUXHU MIN BUTUNIHA SHERABUN MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWANUHU FIHI SHIFA’UN LILNNASI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
16.70: WEL-LAHU HALEKAKUM THUMME JETEWEFFAKUM WE MINKUM MEN JURADDU ‘ILA ‘ERDHELIL-’UMURI LIKEJ LA JA’LEME BA’DE ‘ILMIN SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN KADIRU
16.71: WEL-LAHU FEDDELE BA’DEKUM ‘ALA BA’DIN FI ER-RIZKI FEMAL-LEDHINE FUDDILU BIRADDI RIZKIHIM ‘ALA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUM FEHUM FIHI SEWA’UN ‘EFEBINI’METI ALLAHI JEXHHEDUN
16.72: WEL-LAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWAXHËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘EZWAXHIKUM BENINE WE HEFEDETEN WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBATI ‘EFEBIALBATILI JU’UMINUNE WE BINI’METI ALLAHI HUM JEKFURUN
16.73: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JEMLIKU LEHUM RIZKËN MINE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JESTETI’UN
16.74: FELA TEDRIBU LIL-LAHIL-’EMTHALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
16.75: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN ‘ABDËN MEMLUKËN LA JEKDIRU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE MEN RAZEKNAHU MINNA RIZKËN HESENËN FEHUWE JUNFIKU MINHU SIRRËN WE XHEHRËN HEL JESTEWUNEL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
16.76: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN RAXHULEJNI ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘EBKEMU LA JEKDIRU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE HUWE KELLUN ‘ALA MEWLAHU ‘EJNEMA JUWEXHXHHHHU LA JE’TI BIHAJRIN HEL JESTEWI HUWE WE MEN JE’MURU BIL-’ADLI WE HUWE ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
16.77: WE LIL-LEHI GAJBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA ‘EMRU SA’ATI ‘IL-LA KELEMHIL-BESERI ‘EW HUWE ‘EKRABU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
16.78: WEL-LAHU ‘EHRAXHEKUM MIN BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM LA TA’LEMUNE SHEJ’ËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
16.79: ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ILAT-TEJRI MUSEHHARATIN FI XHEWWI SEMA’I MA JUMSIKUHUNNE ‘IL-LALLAHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
16.80: WEL-LAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN BUJUTIKUM SEKENËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN XHULUDIL-’EN’AMI BUJUTËN TESTEHIFFUNEHA JEWME DHA’NIKUM WE JEWME ‘IKAMETIKUM WE MIN ‘ESWAFIHA WE ‘EWBARIHA WE ‘ESH’ARIHA ‘ETHATHËN WE META’ËN ‘ILA HINI
16.81: WEL-LAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIMMA HALEKA DHILALËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MINEL-XHIBALI ‘EKNANËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM SERABILE TEKIKUMUL-HERRA WE SERABILE TEKIKUM BE’SEKUM KEDHALIKE JUTIMMU NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TUSLIMUN
16.84: WE JEWME NEB’ATHU MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN THUMME LA JU’UDHENU LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
16.85: WE ‘IDHA RA’AL-LEDHINE DHELEMUL-’ADHABE FELA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUM WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
16.86: WE ‘IDHA RA’AL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU SHURAKA’EHUM KALU RABBENA HA’UULA’ SHURAKA’UUNAL-LEDHINE KUNNA NED’U MIN DUNIKE FE’ELKAW ‘ILEJHIMUL-KAWLE ‘INNEKUM LEKADHIBUN
16.87: WE ‘ELKAW ‘ILA ALLAHI JEWME’IDHIN SELEME WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
16.88: EL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI ZIDNAHUM ‘ADHABËN FEWKAL-’ADHABI BIMA KANU JUFSIDUN
16.89: WE JEWME NEB’ATHU FI KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN ‘ALEJHIM MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE XHI’NA BIKE SHEHIDËN ‘ALA HA’UULA’ WE NEZZELNA ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE TIBJANËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDEN WE RAHMETEN WE BUSHRA LILMUSLIMIN
16.90: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURU BIL-’ADLI WEL-’IHSANI WE ‘ITA’I DHIL-KURBA WE JENHA ‘ANIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WEL-BEGJI JA’IDHUKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
16.91: WE ‘EWFU BI’AHDI ALLAHI ‘IDHA ‘AHEDTUM WE LA TENKUDUL-’EJMANE BA’DE TEWKIDIHA WE KAD XHE’ALTUMU ELLAHE ‘ALEJKUM KEFILËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA TEF’ALUN
16.92: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LETI NEKADET GAZLEHA MIN BA’DI KUWETIN ‘ENKATHËN TETTEHIDHUNE ‘EJMANEKUM DEHALËN BEJNEKUM ‘EN TEKUNE ‘UMMETUN HIJE ‘ERBA MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘INNEMA JEBLUKUMU ALLAHU BIHI WE LEJUBEJJINENNE LEKUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI MA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
16.93: WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LEXHE’ALEKUM ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN WE LEKIN JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE LETUS’ELUNNE ‘AMMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.94: WE LA TETTEHIDHU ‘EJMANEKUM DEHALËN BEJNEKUM FETEZILLE KADEMUN BA’DE THUBUTIHA WE TEDHUKU SU’E BIMA SEDEDTUM ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE LEKUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
16.95: WE LA TESHTERU BI’AHDI ALLAHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘INNEMA ‘INDEL-LAHI HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
16.96: MA ‘INDEKUM JENFEDU WE MA ‘INDEL-LAHI BAKIN WE LENEXHZIJENNEL-LEDHINE SEBERU ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENI MA KANU JA’MELUN
16.97: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FELENUHJIJENNEHU HEJËTEN TEJJIBETEN WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENI MA KANU JA’MELUN
16.98: FE’IDHA KARA’TEL-KUR’ANE FASTA’IDH BIL-LAHI MINE ESH-SHEJTANI RAXHIM
16.99: ‘INNEHU LEJSE LEHU SULTANUN ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
16.100: ‘INNEMA SULTANUHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JETEWEL-LEWNEHU WEL-LEDHINE HUM BIHI MUSHRIKUN
16.101: WE ‘IDHA BEDDELNA ‘AJETEN MEKANE ‘AJETIN WEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JUNEZZILU KALU ‘INNEMA ‘ENTE MUFTERIN BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
16.102: KUL NEZZELEHU RUHUL-KUDUSI MIN RABBIKE BIL-HEKKI LIJUTHEBBITEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HUDEN WE BUSHRA LILMUSLIMIN
16.103: WE LEKAD NA’LEMU ‘ENNEHUM JEKULUNE ‘INNEMA JU’ALLIMUHU BESHERUN LISANUL-LEDHI JULHIDUNE ‘ILEJHI ‘A’XHEMIJUN WE HEDHA LISANUN ‘ARABIJUN MUBINU
16.104: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI LA JEHDIHIMU ALLAHU WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
16.105: ‘INNEMA JEFTERIL-KEDHIBEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-KADHIBUN
16.106: MEN KEFERA BIL-LAHI MIN BA’DI ‘IMANIHI ‘IL-LA MEN ‘UKRIHE WE KALBUHU MUTME’INNUN BIL-’IMANI WE LEKIN MEN SHERAHE BIL-KUFRI SEDRËN FE’ALEJHIM GADEBUN MINEL-LAHI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
16.107: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUMU ESTEHEBBUL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA ‘ALEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-KAFIRIN
16.108: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE SEM’IHIM WE ‘EBSARIHIM WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-GAFILUN
16.110: THUMME ‘INNE RABBEKE LIL-LEDHINE HAXHERU MIN BA’DI MA FUTINU THUMME XHAHEDU WE SEBERU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BA’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.111: JEWME TE’TI KUL-LU NEFSIN TUXHADILU ‘AN NEFSIHA WE TUWEFFA KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
16.112: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN KARJETEN KANET ‘AMINETEN MUTME’INNETEN JE’TIHA RIZKUHA RAGADËN MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN FEKEFERAT BI’EN’UMI ALLAHI FE’EDHAKAHALLAHU LIBASEL-XHU’I WEL-HAWFI BIMA KANU JESNA’UN
16.113: WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM RASULUN MINHUM FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHEHUMUL-’ADHABU WE HUM DHALIMUN
16.114: FEKULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU ALLAHU HELALËN TEJJIBËN WE ESHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
16.115: ‘INNEMA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETE WE ED-DEME WE LEHMEL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI ALLAHI BIHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BAGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
16.116: WE LA TEKULU LIMA TESIFU ‘ELSINETUKUMUL-KEDHIBE HADHA HELALUN WE HEDHA HERAMUN LITEFTERU ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE LA JUFLIHUN
16.118: WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA MA KASESNA ‘ALEJKE MIN KABLU WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
16.119: THUMME ‘INNE RABBEKE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SU’E BIXHEHALETIN THUMME TABU MIN BA’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BA’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.120: ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME KANE ‘UMMETEN KANITËN LIL-LAHI HENIFËN WE LEM JEKU MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
16.121: SHAKIRËN LI’N’UMIHI EXHTEBAHU WE HEDAHU ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKI
16.122: WE ‘ATEJNAHU FI ED-DUNJA HESENETEN WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHIN
16.123: THUMME ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE ‘ENI ETTEBI’ MILLETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
16.124: ‘INNEMA XHU’ILE SEBTU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIHI WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEJEHKUMU BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
16.125: ED’U ‘ILA SEBILI RABBIKE BIL-HIKMETI WEL-MEW’IDHETIL-HESENETI WE XHADILHUM BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DEL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTEDIN
16.126: WE ‘IN ‘AKABTUM FA’AKIBU BIMITHLI MA ‘UKIBTUM BIHI WE LE’IN SEBERTUM LEHUWE HAJRUN LILSSABIRIN
16.127: WE ESBIR WE MA SEBRUKE ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA TEKU FI DEJKIN MIMMA JEMKURUN

17.1: SUBHANEL-LEDHI ‘ESRA BI’ABDIHI LEJLËN MINEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI ‘ILAL-MESXHIDIL-’EKSAL-LEDHI BARAKNA HEWLEHU LINURIJEHU MIN ‘AJATINA ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
17.2: WE ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE XHE’ALNAHU HUDEN LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ELLA TETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI WE KILË
17.3: DHURRIJETE MEN HEMELNA ME’A NUHIN ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ABDËN SHEKURË
17.4: WE KADEJNA ‘ILA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE FIL-KITABI LETUFSIDUNNE FIL-’ERDI MERRATEJNI WE LETA’LUNNE ‘ULUWËN KEBIRË
17.5: FE’IDHA XHA’E WA’DU ‘ULAHUMA BE’ATHNA ‘ALEJKUM ‘IBADËN LENA ‘ULI BE’SIN SHEDIDIN FEXHASU HILALE ED-DIJARI WE KANE WA’DËN MEF’ULË
17.6: THUMME RADEDNA LEKUMUL-KERRATE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘EMDEDNAKUM BI’EMWALIN WE BENINE WE XHE’ALNAKUM ‘EKTHERA NEFIRË
17.7: ‘IN ‘EHSENTUM ‘EHSENTUM LI’NFUSIKUM WE ‘IN ‘ESE’TUM FELEHA FE’IDHA XHA’E WA’DUL-’AHIRATI LIJESU’U WUXHUHEKUM WE LIJEDHULUL-MESXHIDE KEMA DEHALUHU ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE LIJUTEBBIRU MA ‘ALEW TETBIRË
17.8: ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JERHEMEKUM WE ‘IN ‘UDTUM ‘UDNA WE XHE’ALNA XHEHENNEME LILKAFIRINE HESIRË
17.9: ‘INNE HADHAL-KUR’ANE JEHDI LILLETI HIJE ‘EKWEMU WE JUBESHSHIRUL-MU’UMININEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM ‘EXHRËN KEBIRË
17.11: WE JED’UL-’INSANU BISH-SHERRI DU’A’EHU BIL-HAJRI WE KANEL-’INSANU ‘AXHULË
17.12: WE XHE’ALNAL-LEJLE WE NEHARA ‘AJETEJNI FEMEHEWNA ‘AJETEL-LEJLI WE XHE’ALNA ‘AJETE NEHARI MUBSIRATEN LITEBTEGU FEDLËN MIN RABBIKUM WE LITA’LEMU ‘ADEDE SININE WEL-HISABE WE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FESSELNAHU TEFSILË
17.13: WE KUL-LE ‘INSANIN ‘ELZEMNAHU TA’IRAHU FI ‘UNUKIHI WE NUHRIXHU LEHU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI KITABËN JELKAHU MENSHURË
17.15: MENI EHTEDA FE’INNEMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DEL-LE FE’INNEMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE LA TEZIRU WAZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA WE MA KUNNA MU’ADHDHIBINE HETTA NEB’ATHE RASULË
17.16: WE ‘IDHA ‘ERADNA ‘EN NUHLIKE KARJETEN ‘EMERNA MUTRAFIHA FEFESEKU FIHA FEHEKKA ‘ALEJHAL-KAWLU FEDEMMERNAHA TEDMIRË
17.17: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA MINEL-KURUNI MIN BA’DI NUHIN WE KEFA BIRABBIKE BIDHUNUBI ‘IBADIHI HABIRËN BESIRË
17.18: MEN KANE JURIDUL-’AXHILETE ‘AXHXHELNA LEHU FIHA MA NESHA’U LIMEN NURIDU THUMME XHE’ALNA LEHU XHEHENNEME JESLAHA MEDHMUMËN MEDHURË
17.19: WE MEN ‘ERADEL-’AHIRATE WE SA’A LEHA SA’JEHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULA’IKE KANE SA’JUHUM MESHKURË
17.20: KULLËN NUMIDDU HA’UULA’ WE HA’UULA’ MIN ‘ATA’I RABBIKE WE MA KANE ‘ATA’U RABBIKE MEHDHURË
17.21: ENDHUR KEJFE FEDDELNA BA’DEHUM ‘ALA BA’DIN WE LEL’AHIRATU ‘EKBERU DERAXHATIN WE ‘EKBERU TEFDILË
17.22: LA TEXH’AL ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETEK’UDE MEDHMUMËN MEHDHULË
17.23: WE KADA RABBUKE ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU WE BIL-WALIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN ‘IMMA JEBLUGANNE ‘INDEKEL-KIBERA ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘EW KILAHUMA FELA TEKUL LEHUMA ‘UFFIN WE LA TENHERHUMA WE KUL LEHUMA KAWLËN KERIMË
17.24: WE EHFID LEHUMA XHENAHE EDH-DHULLI MINE RAHMETI WE KUL RRABBI ERHEMHUMA KEMA RABBEJANI SEGIRË
17.25: RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMA FI NUFUSIKUM ‘IN TEKUNU SALIHINE FE’INNEHU KANE LIL’EWWABINE GAFURË
17.26: WE ‘ATI DHAL-KURBA HEKKAHU WEL-MISKINE WE EBNE SEBILI WE LA TUBEDHDHIR TEBDHIRË
17.27: ‘INNEL-MUBEDHDHIRINE KANU ‘IHWANE ESH-SHEJATINI WE KANE ESH-SHEJTANU LIRABBIHI KEFURË
17.28: WE ‘IMMA TU’RIDENNE ‘ANHUMU EBTIGA’E RAHMETIN MIN RABBIKE TERXHUHA FEKUL LEHUM KAWLËN MEJSURË
17.29: WE LA TEXH’AL JEDEKE MEGLULETEN ‘ILA ‘UNUKIKE WE LA TEBSUTHA KUL-LEL-BESTI FETEK’UDE MELUMËN MEHSURË
17.30: ‘INNE RABBEKE JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNEHU KANE BI’IBADIHI HABIRËN BESIRË
17.31: WE LA TEKTULU ‘EWLADEKUM HASHJETE ‘IMLAKIN NEHNU NERZUKUHUM WE ‘IJAKUM ‘INNE KATLEHUM KANE HIT’ËN KEBIRË
17.32: WE LA TEKRABU EZ-ZINA ‘INNEHU KANE FAHISHETEN WE SA’E SEBILË
17.33: WE LA TEKTULU NEFSEL-LETI HERRAMEL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE MEN KUTILE MEDHLUMËN FEKAD XHE’ALNA LIWELIJIHI SULTANËN FELA JUSRIF FIL-KATLI ‘INNEHU KANE MENSURË
17.34: WE LA TEKRABU MALEL-JETIMI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU HETTA JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ‘EWFU BIL-’AHDI ‘INNEL-’AHDE KANE MES’ULË
17.35: WE ‘EWFUL-KEJLE ‘IDHA KILTUM WE ZINU BIL-KISTASIL-MUSTEKIMI DHALIKE HAJRUN WE ‘EHSENU TE’WILË
17.36: WE LA TEKFU MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN ‘INNE SEM’A WEL-BESERA WEL-FU’UADE KUL-LU ‘ULA’IKE KANE ‘ANHU MES’ULË
17.37: WE LA TEMSHI FIL-’ERDI MERAHËN ‘INNEKE LEN TEHRIKAL-’ERDE WE LEN TEBLUGAL-XHIBALE TULË
17.38: KUL-LU DHALIKE KANE SEJJI’UHU ‘INDE RABBIKE MEKRUHË
17.39: DHALIKE MIMMA ‘EWHA ‘ILEJKE RABBUKE MINEL-HIKMETI WE LA TEXH’AL ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETULKA FI XHEHENNEME MELUMËN MEDHURË
17.40: ‘EFE’ESFAKUM RABBUKUM BIL-BENINE WE ETTEHADHE MINEL-MELA’IKETI ‘INATHËN ‘INNEKUM LETEKULUNE KAWLËN ‘ADHIMË
17.41: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LIJEDHDHEKKERU WE MA JEZIDUHUM ‘IL-LA NUFURË
17.42: KUL LEW KANE ME’AHU ‘ALIHETUN KEMA JEKULUNE ‘IDHËN LABTEGAW ‘ILA DHIL-’ARSHI SEBILË
17.44: TUSEBBIHU LEHU SEMAWATU SEB’U WEL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHINNE WE ‘IN MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA JUSEBBIHU BIHEMDIHI WE LEKIN LA TEFKAHUNE TESBIHEHUM ‘INNEHU KANE HELIMËN GAFURË
17.45: WE ‘IDHA KARA’TEL-KUR’ANE XHE’ALNA BEJNEKE WE BEJNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI HIXHABËN MESTURË
17.46: WE XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRËN WE ‘IDHA DHEKERTE RABBEKE FIL-KUR’ANI WEHDEHU WE LLEW ‘ALA ‘EDBARIHIM NUFURË
17.47: NEHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JESTEMI’UNE BIHI ‘IDH JESTEMI’UNE ‘ILEJKE WE ‘IDH HUM NEXHWA ‘IDH JEKULU EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA RAXHULËN MESHURË
17.48: ENDHUR KEJFE DERABU LEKEL-’EMTHALE FEDELLU FELA JESTETI’UNE SEBILË
17.49: WE KALU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA ‘IDHAMËN WE RUFATËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUNE HALKËN XHEDIDË
17.51: ‘EW HALKËN MIMMA JEKBURU FI SUDURIKUM FESEJEKULUNE MEN JU’IDUNA KULIL-LEDHI FETERAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN FESEJUNGIDUNE ‘ILEJKE RU’USEHUM WE JEKULUNE META HUWE KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE KARIBË
17.52: JEWME JED’UKUM FETESTEXHIBUNE BIHEMDIHI WE TEDHUNNUNE ‘IN LEBITHTUM ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.53: WE KUL LI’IBADI JEKULU EL-LETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘INNE ESH-SHEJTANE JENZEGU BEJNEHUM ‘INNE ESH-SHEJTANE KANE LIL’INSANI ‘ADUWËN MUBINË
17.54: RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIKUM ‘IN JESHE’ JERHEMKUM ‘EW ‘IN JESHE’ JU’ADHDHIBKUM WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM WE KILË
17.55: WE RABBUKE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LEKAD FEDDELNA BA’DE NEBIJINE ‘ALA BA’DIN WE ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE ZEBURË
17.56: KULI ED’UL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM MIN DUNIHI FELA JEMLIKUNE KESHFE ED-DURRI ‘ANKUM WE LA TEHWILË
17.57: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE JEBTEGUNE ‘ILA RABBIHIMUL-WESILETE ‘EJJUHUM ‘EKRABU WE JERXHUNE RAHMETEHU WE JEHAFUNE ‘ADHABEHU ‘INNE ‘ADHABE RABBIKE KANE MEHDHURË
17.58: WE ‘IN MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA NEHNU MUHLIKUHA KABLE JEWMIL-KIJAMETI ‘EW MU’ADHDHIBUHA ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN KANE DHALIKE FIL-KITABI MESTURË
17.59: WE MA MENE’ANA ‘EN NURSILE BIL-’AJATI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KEDHDHEBE BIHAL-’EWWELUNE WE ‘ATEJNA THEMUDE NAKATE MUBSIRATEN FEDHELEMU BIHA WE MA NURSILU BIL-’AJATI ‘IL-LA TEHWIFË
17.60: WE ‘IDH KULNA LEKE ‘INNE RABBEKE ‘EHATE BIN-NASI WE MA XHE’ALNA ER-RU’UJA EL-LETI ‘ERAJNAKE ‘IL-LA FITNETEN LILNNASI WE ESH-SHEXHERATEL-MEL’UNETE FIL-KUR’ANI WE NUHAWWIFUHUM FEMA JEZIDUHUM ‘IL-LA TUGJANËN KEBIRË
17.61: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELA’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE KALE ‘E’ESXHUDU LIMEN HALEKTE TINË
17.62: KALE ‘ERA’EJTEKE HADHAL-LEDHI KERRAMTE ‘ALEJJE LE’IN ‘EHHARTENI ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LE’EHTENIKENNE DHURRIJETEHU ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.63: KALE EDH/HEB FEMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM FE’INNE XHEHENNEME XHEZA’UUKUM XHEZA’EN MEWFURË
17.64: WE ESTEFZIZ MENI ESTETA’TE MINHUM BISEWTIKE WE ‘EXHLIB ‘ALEJHIM BIHAJLIKE WE RAXHILIKE WE SHARIK/HUM FIL-’EMWLI WEL-’EWLADI WE ‘ID/HUM WE MA JA’IDUHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘IL-LA GURURË
17.65: ‘INNE ‘IBADI LEJSE LEKE ‘ALEJHIM SULTANUN WE KEFA BIRABBIKE WE KILË
17.66: RABBUKUMUL-LEDHI JUZXHI LEKUMUL-FULKE FIL-BEHRI LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU KANE BIKUM RAHIMË
17.67: WE ‘IDHA MESSEKUMU ED-DURRU FIL-BEHRI DEL-LE MEN TED’UNE ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU FELEMMA NEXHXHAKUM ‘ILAL-BERRI ‘A’RADTUM WE KANEL-’INSANU KEFURË
17.68: ‘EFE’EMINTUM ‘EN JEHSIFE BIKUM XHANIBEL-BERRI ‘EW JURSILE ‘ALEJKUM HASIBËN THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKUM WE KILË
17.69: ‘EM ‘EMINTUM ‘EN JU’IDEKUM FIHI TARATEN ‘UHRA FEJURSILE ‘ALEJKUM KASIFËN MINE ER-RIHI FEJUGRIKAKUM BIMA KEFERTUM THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKUM ‘ALEJNA BIHI TEBI’Ë
17.70: WE LEKAD KERRAMNA BENI ‘ADEME WE HEMELNAHUM FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBATI WE FEDDELNAHUM ‘ALA KETHIRIN MIMMEN HALEKNA TEFDILË
17.71: JEWME NED’U KUL-LE ‘UNASIN BI’IMAMIHIM FEMEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BIJEMINIHI FE’ULA’IKE JEKRA’UNE KITABEHUM WE LA JUDHLEMUNE FETILË
17.72: WE MEN KANE FI HEDHIHI ‘A’MA FEHUWE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘A’MA WE ‘EDELLU SEBILË
17.73: WE ‘IN KADU LEJEFTINUNEKE ‘ANIL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE LITEFTERIJE ‘ALEJNA GAJRAHU WE ‘IDHËN LATTEHADHUKE HALILË
17.74: WE LEWLA ‘EN THEBBETNAKE LEKAD KIDTTE TERKENU ‘ILEJHIM SHEJ’ËN KALILË
17.75: ‘IDHËN LE’EDHEKNAKE DI’FEL-HEJËTI WE DI’FEL-MEMATI THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKE ‘ALEJNA NESIRË
17.76: WE ‘IN KADU LEJESTEFIZZUNEKE MINEL-’ERDI LIJUHRIXHUKE MINHA WE ‘IDHËN LA JELBETHUNE HILAFEKE ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.77: SUNNETE MEN KAD ‘ERSELNA KABLEKE MIN RUSULINA WE LA TEXHIDU LISUNNETINA TEHWILË
17.78: ‘EKIMI SELËTE LIDULUKI ESH-SHEMSI ‘ILA GASEKIL-LEJLI WE KUR’ANEL-FEXHRI ‘INNE KUR’ANEL-FEXHRI KANE MESH/HUDË
17.79: WE MINEL-LEJLI FETEHEXHXHED BIHI NAFILETEN LEKE ‘ASA ‘EN JEB’ATHEKE RABBUKE MEKAMËN MEHMUDË
17.80: WE KUL RABBI ‘EDHILNI MUDHALE SIDKIN WE ‘EHRIXHNI MUHRAXHE SIDKIN WE EXH’AL LI MIN LEDUNKE SULTANËN NESIRË
17.81: WE KUL XHA’EL-HEKKU WE ZEHEKAL-BATILU ‘INNEL-BATILE KANE ZEHUKË
17.82: WE NUNEZZILU MINEL-KUR’ANI MA HUWE SHIFA’UN WE RAHMETUN LILMU’UMININE WE LA JEZIDU EDH-DHALIMINE ‘IL-LA HASARË
17.83: WE ‘IDHA ‘EN’AMNA ‘ALEL-’INSANI ‘A’RADE WE NE’A BIXHANIBIHI WE ‘IDHA MESSEHU ESH-SHERRU KANE JE’USË
17.84: KUL KUL-LUN JA’MELU ‘ALA SHAKILETIHI FERABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMEN HUWE ‘EHDA SEBILË
17.85: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI ER-RUHI KULI ER-RUHU MIN ‘EMRI RABBI WE MA ‘UTITUM MINEL-’ILMI ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.86: WE LE’IN SHI’NA LENEDH/HEBENNE BIEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKE BIHI ‘ALEJNA WE KILË
17.87: ‘IL-LA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE ‘INNE FEDLEHU KANE ‘ALEJKE KEBIRË
17.88: KUL LE’INI EXHTEME’ATIL-’INSU WEL-XHINNU ‘ALA ‘EN JE’TU BIMITHLI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LA JE’TUNE BIMITHLIHI WE LEW KANE BA’DUHUM LIBA’DIN DHEHIRË
17.89: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN FE’EBA ‘EKTHERU NASI ‘IL-LA KUFURË
17.90: WE KALU LEN NU’UMINE LEKE HETTA TEFXHURA LENA MINEL-’ERDI JENBU’Ë
17.91: ‘EW TEKUNE LEKE XHENNETUN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘INEBIN FETUFEXHXHIRAL-’ENHARA HILALEHA TEFXHIRË
17.92: ‘EW TUSKITE SEMA’E KEMA ZE’AMTE ‘ALEJNA KISEFËN ‘EW TE’TIJE BIL-LAHI WEL-MELA’IKETI KABILË
17.93: ‘EW JEKUNE LEKE BEJTUN MIN ZUHRUFIN ‘EW TERKA FI SEMA’I WE LEN NU’UMINE LIRUKIJIKE HETTA TUNEZZILE ‘ALEJNA KITABËN NEKRA’UUHU KUL SUBHANE RABBI HEL KUNTU ‘IL-LA BESHERËN RASULË
17.94: WE MA MENE’A NASE ‘EN JU’UMINU ‘IDH XHA’EHUMUL-HUDA ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EBE’ATHEL-LAHU BESHERËN RASULË
17.95: KUL LEW KANE FIL-’ERDI MELA’IKETUN JEMSHUNE MUTME’INNINE LENEZZELNA ‘ALEJHIM MINE SEMA’I MELEKËN RASULË
17.96: KUL KEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM ‘INNEHU KANE BI’IBADIHI HABIRËN BESIRË
17.97: WE MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FELEN TEXHIDE LEHUM ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIHI WE NEHSHURUHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘ALA WEXHUHIHIM ‘UMJËN WE BUKMËN WE SUMMËN ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU KUL-LEMA HABET ZIDNAHUM SA’IRË
17.98: DHALIKE XHEZA’UUHUM BI’ENNEHUM KEFERU BI’AJATINA WE KALU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA ‘IDHAMËN WE RUFATËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUNE HALKËN XHEDIDË
17.99: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNEL-LAHEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE KADIRUN ‘ALA ‘EN JEHLUKA MITHLEHUM WE XHE’ALE LEHUM ‘EXHELËN LA RAJBE FIHI FE’EBA EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IL-LA KUFURË
17.100: KUL LEW ‘ENTUM TEMLIKUNE HAZA’INE RAHMETI RABBI ‘IDHËN LE’EMSEKTUM HASHJETEL-’INFAKI WE KANEL-’INSANU KATURË
17.101: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSA TIS’A ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN FAS’L BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘IDH XHA’EHUM FEKALE LEHU FIR’AWNU ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUKE JAMUSA MESHURË
17.102: KALE LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA ‘ENZELE HA’UULA’ ‘IL-LA RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI BESA’IRA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUKE JA FIR’AWNU METHBURË
17.103: FE’ERADE ‘EN JESTEFIZZEHUM MINEL-’ERDI FE’EGRAKNAHU WE MEN ME’AHU XHEMI’Ë
17.104: WE KULNA MIN BA’DIHI LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ESKUNUL-’ERDE FE’IDHA XHA’E WA’DUL-’AHIRATI XHI’NA BIKUM LEFIFË
17.105: WE BIL-HEKKI ‘ENZELNAHU WE BIL-HEKKI NEZELE WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRËN WE NEDHIRË
17.106: WE KUR’ANËN FERAKNAHU LITEKRA’EHU ‘ALA NASI ‘ALA MUKTHIN WE NEZZELNAHU TENZILË
17.107: KUL ‘AMINU BIHI ‘EW LA TU’UMINU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME MIN KABLIHI ‘IDHA JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM JEHIRRUNE LIL’EDHKANI SUXHXHEDË
17.108: WE JEKULUNE SUBHANE RABBINA ‘IN KANE WA’DU RABBINA LEMEF’ULË
17.109: WE JEHIRRUNE LIL’EDHKANI JEBKUNE WE JEZIDUHUM HUSHU’Ë
17.110: KUL ED’U ELLAHE ‘EW ED’U RAHMENE ‘EJJENEN MMA TED’U FELEHUL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA WE LA TEXHHER BISELATIKE WE LA TUHAFIT BIHA WE EBTEGI BEJNE DHALIKE SEBILË
17.111: WE KULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI LEM JETTEHIDH WELEDËN WE LEM JEKUN LEHU SHERIKUN FIL-MULKI WE LEM JEKUN LEHU WE LIJUN MINE EDH-DHULLI WE KEBBIRHU TEKBIRË

18.1: EL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ALA ‘ABDIHIL-KITABE WE LEM JEXH’AL LLEHU ‘IWEXH
18.2: KAJJIMËN LIJUNDHIRA BE’SËN SHEDIDËN MIN LEDUNHU WE JUBESHSHIRAL-MU’UMININEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM ‘EXHRËN HESENË
18.5: MMA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN WE LA LI’ABA’IHIM KEBURAT KELIMETEN TEHRUXHU MIN ‘EFWAHIHIM ‘IN JEKULUNE ‘IL-LA KEDHIBË
18.6: FELE’ALLEKE BAHI’UN NEFSEKE ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM ‘IN LEM JU’UMINU BIHEDHAL-HEDITHI ‘ESEFË
18.10: ‘IDH ‘EWAL-FITJETU ‘ILAL-KEHFI FEKALU RABBENA ‘ATINA MIN LEDUNKE RAHMETEN WE HEJJI’ LENA MIN ‘EMRINA RASHEDË
18.13: NEHNU NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE NEBE’EHUM BIL-HEKKI ‘INNEHUM FITJETUN ‘AMENU BIRABBIHIM WE ZIDNAHUM HUDE
18.14: WE RABETNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘IDH KAMU FEKALU RABBUNA RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI LEN NED’UWE MIN DUNIHI ‘ILEHËN LEKAD KULNA ‘IDHËN SHETETË
18.15: HA’UULA’ KAWMUNA ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN LEWLA JE’TUNE ‘ALEJHIM BISULTANIN BEJJININ FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBË
18.16: WE ‘IDH A’TEZELTUMUHUM WE MA JA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LALLAHE FE’WU ‘ILAL-KEHFI JENSHUR LEKUM RABBUKUM MIN RAHMETIHI WE JUHEJJI’ LEKUM MIN ‘EMRIKUM MIRFEKË
18.17: WE TERA ESH-SHEMSE ‘IDHA TELE’AT TEZAWERU ‘AN KEHFIHIM DHATEL-JEMINI WE ‘IDHA GARABET TEKRIDUHUM DHATE ESH-SHIMALI WE HUM FI FEXHWETIN MINHU DHALIKE MIN ‘AJATI ALLAHI MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU WELIJËN MURSHIDË
18.18: WE TEHSEBUHUM ‘EJKADHËN WE HUM RUKUDUN WE NUKALLIBUHUM DHATEL-JEMINI WE DHATE ESH-SHIMALI WE KELBUHUM BASITUN DHIRA’AJHI BIL-WESIDI LEWI ETTELA’TE ‘ALEJHIM LEWELLEJTE MINHUM FIRARËN WE LEMULI’TE MINHUM RU’BË
18.19: WE KEDHELIKE BE’ATHNAHUM LIJETESA’ELU BEJNEHUM KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM KEM LEBITHTUM KALU LEBITHNA JEWMËN ‘EW BA’DE JEWMIN KALU RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMA LEBITHTUM FAB’ATHU ‘EHEDEKUM BIWERIKIKUM HEDHIHI ‘ILAL-MEDINETI FELJENDHUR ‘EJJUHA ‘EZKA TA’AMËN FELJE’TIKUM BIRIZKIN MINHU WE LIETELETTEF WE LA JUSH’IRANNE BIKUM ‘EHEDË
18.20: ‘INNEHUM ‘IN JEDHHERU ‘ALEJKUM JERXHUMUKUM ‘EW JU’IDUKUM FI MILLETIHIM WE LEN TUFLIHU ‘IDHËN ‘EBEDË
18.21: WE KEDHELIKE ‘A’THERNA ‘ALEJHIM LIJA’LEMU ‘ENNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE ‘ENNE SA’ATE LA RAJBE FIHA ‘IDH JETENAZA’UNE BEJNEHUM ‘EMRAHUM FEKALU EBNU ‘ALEJHIM BUNJANËN RABBUHUM ‘A’LEMU BIHIM KALEL-LEDHINE GALEBU ‘ALA ‘EMRIHIM LENETTEHIDHENNE ‘ALEJHIM MESXHIDË
18.22: SEJEKULUNE THELATHETUN RABI’UHUM KELBUHUM WE JEKULUNE HAMSETUN SADISUHUM KELBUHUM RAXHMËN BIL-GAJBI WE JEKULUNE SEB’ATUN WE THAMINUHUM KELBUHUM KUL RABBI ‘A’LEMU BI’IDDETIHIM MA JA’LEMUHUM ‘IL-LA KALILUN FELA TUMARI FIHIM ‘IL-LA MIRA’EN DHAHIRËN WE LA TESTEFTI FIHIM MINHUM ‘EHEDË
18.23: WE LA TEKULENNE LISHEJ’IN ‘INNI FA’ILUN DHALIKE GADË
18.24: ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’EL-LAHU WE EDHKUR RABBEKE ‘IDHA NESITE WE KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEHDIJENI RABBI LI’KRABE MIN HADHA RASHEDË
18.25: WE LEBITHU FI KEHFIHIM THELATHE MIA’ETIN SININE WE EZDADU TIS’Ë
18.26: KULI ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA LEBITHU LEHU GAJBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘EBSIR BIHI WE ‘ESMI’ MA LEHUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA JUSHRIKU FI HUKMIHI ‘EHEDË
18.27: WE ETLU MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MIN KITABI RABBIKE LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATIHI WE LEN TEXHIDE MIN DUNIHI MULTEHEDË
18.28: WE ESBIR NEFSEKE ME’AL-LEDHINE JED’UNE RABBEHUM BIL-GADËTI WEL-’ASHIJI JURIDUNE WEXHHEHU WE LA TA’DU ‘AJNAKE ‘ANHUM TURIDU ZINETEL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE LA TUTI’ MEN ‘EGFELNA KALBEHU ‘AN DHIKRINA WE ETTEBE’A HEWAHU WE KANE ‘EMRUHU FURUTË
18.29: WE KULIL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKUM FEMEN SHA’E FELJU’UMIN WE MEN SHA’E FELJEKFUR ‘INNA ‘A’TEDNA LILDHDHALIMINE NARËN ‘EHATE BIHIM SURADIKUHA WE ‘IN JESTEGITHU JUGATHU BIMA’IN KALMUHLI JESHWIL-WUXHUHE BI’SE ESH-SHERABU WE SA’ET MURTEFEKË
18.31: ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM XHENNATU ‘ADNIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU JUHELLEWNE FIHA MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE JELBESUNE THIJABËN HUDRËN MIN SUNDUSIN WE ‘ISTEBRAKIN MUTTEKI’INE FIHA ‘ALEL-’ERA’IKI NI’ME ETH-THEWABU WE HESUNET MURTEFEKË
18.32: WE EDRIB LEHUM METHELËN RAXHULEJNI XHE’ALNA LI’HEDIHIMA XHENNETEJNI MIN ‘A’NABIN WE HEFEFNAHUMA BINEHLIN WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUMA ZER’Ë
18.33: KILTAL-XHENNETEJNI ‘ATET ‘UKULEHA WE LEM TEDHLIM MINHU SHEJ’ËN WE FEXHXHERNA HILALEHUMA NEHERË
18.34: WE KANE LEHU THEMERUN FEKALE LISAHIBIHI WE HUWE JUHAWIRUHU ‘ENA ‘EKTHERU MINKE MALËN WE ‘E’AZZU NEFERË
18.35: WE DEHALE XHENNETEHU WE HUWE DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI KALE MA ‘EDHUNNU ‘EN TEBIDE HEDHIHI ‘EBEDË
18.36: WE MA ‘EDHUNNU SA’ATE KA’IMETEN WE LE’IN RUDIDTU ‘ILA RABBI LE’EXHIDENNE HAJRËN MINHA MUNKALEBË
18.37: KALE LEHU SAHIBUHU WE HUWE JUHAWIRUHU ‘EKEFERTE BIEL-LEDHI HALEKAKE MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME SEWWAKE RAXHULË
18.38: LEKINNA HUWEL-LAHU RABBI WE LA ‘USHRIKU BIRABBI ‘EHEDË
18.39: WE LEWLA ‘IDH DEHALTE XHENNETEKE KULTE MA SHA’EL-LAHU LA KUWETE ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI ‘IN TERANI ‘ENA ‘EKAL-LE MINKE MALËN WE WELEDË
18.40: FE’ASA RABBI ‘EN JU’UTIJENI HAJRËN MIN XHENNETIKE WE JURSILE ‘ALEJHA HUSBANËN MINE SEMA’I FETUSBIHE SA’IDËN ZELEKË
18.41: ‘EW JUSBIHE MA’UUHA GAWRËN FELEN TESTETI’A LEHU TELEBË
18.42: WE ‘UHITE BITHEMERIHI FE’ESBEHE JUKALLIBU KEFFEJHI ‘ALA MA ‘ENFEKA FIHA WE HIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA WE JEKULU JA LEJTENI LEM ‘USHRIK BIRABBI ‘EHEDË
18.43: WE LEM TEKUN LEHU FI’ETUN JENSURUNEHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE MA KANE MUNTESIRË
18.44: HUNALIKEL-WELAJETU LIL-LAHIL-HEKKI HUWE HAJRUN THEWABËN WE HAJRUN ‘UKBË
18.45: WE EDRIB LEHUM METHELEL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA KEMA’IN ‘ENZELNAHU MINE SEMA’I FAHTELETE BIHI NEBATUL-’ERDI FE’ESBEHE HESHIMËN TEDHRUHU ER-RIJAHU WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUKTEDIRË
18.46: EL-MALU WEL-BENUNE ZINETUL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WEL-BAKIJATU SALIHATU HAJRUN ‘INDE RABBIKE THEWABËN WE HAJRUN ‘EMELË
18.47: WE JEWME NUSEJJIRUL-XHIBALE WE TERAL-’ERDE BARIZETEN WE HESHERNAHUM FELEM NUGADIR MINHUM ‘EHEDË
18.48: WE ‘URIDU ‘ALA RABBIKE SEFFËN LEKAD XHI’TUMUNA KEMA HALEKNAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN BEL ZE’AMTUM ‘ELLEN NEXH’ALE LEKUM MEW’IDË
18.49: WE WUDI’AL-KITABU FETERAL-MUXHRIMINE MUSHFIKINE MIMMA FIHI WE JEKULUNE JA WEJLETENA MALI HADHAL-KITABI LA JUGADIRU SEGIRATEN WE LA KEBIRATEN ‘IL-LA ‘EHSAHA WE WEXHEDU MA ‘AMILU HADIRËN WE LA JEDHLIMU RABBUKE ‘EHEDË
18.50: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELA’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE KANE MINEL-XHINNI FEFESEKA ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHI ‘EFETETTEHIDHUNEHU WE DHURRIJETEHU ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNI WE HUM LEKUM ‘ADUWUN BI’SE LILDHDHALIMINE BEDELË
18.51: MA ‘ESH/HEDTUHUM HALKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LA HALKA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE MA KUNTU MUTTEHIDHEL-MUDILLINE ‘ADUDË
18.52: WE JEWME JEKULU NADU SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM FEDE’AWHUM FELEM JESTEXHIBU LEHUM WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUM MEWBIKË
18.53: WE RA’AL-MUXHRIMUNE NARA FEDHENNU ‘ENNEHUM MUWAKI’UHA WE LEM JEXHIDU ‘ANHA MESRIFË
18.54: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LILNNASI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN WE KANEL-’INSANU ‘EKTHERA SHEJ’IN XHEDELË
18.55: WE MA MENE’A NASE ‘EN JU’UMINU ‘IDH XHA’EHUMUL-HUDA WE JESTEGFIRU RABBEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM SUNNETUL-’EWWELINE ‘EW JE’TIJEHUMUL-’ADHABU KUBULË
18.56: WE MA NURSILUL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE WE JUXHADILUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIL-BATILI LIJUDHIDU BIHIL-HEKKA WE ETTEHADHU ‘AJATI WE MA ‘UNDHIRU HUZUE
18.57: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN DHUKKIRA BI’AJATI RABBIHI FE’A’RADE ‘ANHA WE NESIJE MA KADDEMET JEDAHU ‘INNA XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRËN WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA FELEN JEHTEDU ‘IDHËN ‘EBEDË
18.58: WE RABBUKEL-GAFURU DHU RAHMETI LEW JU’UAHIDHUHUM BIMA KESEBU LE’AXHXHELE LEHUMUL-’ADHABE BEL LEHUM MEW’IDUN LEN JEXHIDU MIN DUNIHI MEW’ILË
18.59: WE TILKEL-KURA ‘EHLEKNAHUM LEMMA DHELEMU WE XHE’ALNA LIMEHLIKIHIM MEW’IDË
18.60: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIFETAHU LA ‘EBRAHU HETTA ‘EBLUGA MEXHME’AL-BEHRAJNI ‘EW ‘EMDIJE HUKUBË
18.61: FELEMMA BELEGA MEXHME’A BEJNIHIMA NESIJA HUTEHUMA FE ETTEHADHE SEBILEHU FIL-BEHRI SERABË
18.62: FELEMMA XHAWEZA KALE LIFETAHU ‘ATINA GADA’ENA LEKAD LEKINA MIN SEFERINA HADHA NESEBË
18.63: KALE ‘ERA’EJTE ‘IDH ‘EWEJNA ‘ILA SEHRATI FE’INNI NESITUL-HUTE WE MA ‘ENSANIHU ‘IL-LA ESH-SHEJTANU ‘EN ‘EDHKURAHU WE ETTEHADHE SEBILEHU FIL-BEHRI ‘AXHEBË
18.64: KALE DHALIKE MA KUNNA NEBGI FARTEDDA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIMA KASESË
18.65: FEWEXHEDA ‘ABDËN MIN ‘IBADINA ‘ATEJNAHU RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDINA WE ‘ALLEMNAHU MIN LEDUNNA ‘ILMË
18.66: KALE LEHU MUSA HEL ‘ETTEBI’UKE ‘ALA ‘EN TU’ALLIMENI MIMMA ‘ULLIMTE RUSHDË
18.68: WE KEJFE TESBIRU ‘ALA MA LEM TUHIT BIHI HUBRË
18.69: KALE SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU SABIRËN WE LA ‘A’SI LEKE ‘EMRË
18.70: KALE FE’INI ETTEBA’TENI FELA TES’ELNI ‘AN SHEJ’IN HETTA ‘UHDITHE LEKE MINHU DHIKRË
18.71: FANTELEKA HETTA ‘IDHA RAKIBA FI SEFINETI HARAKAHA KALE ‘EHARAKTEHA LITUGRIKA ‘EHLEHA LEKAD XHI’TE SHEJ’ËN ‘IMRË
18.73: KALE LA TU’UAHIDHNI BIMA NESITU WE LA TURHIKNI MIN ‘EMRI ‘USRË
18.74: FANTELEKA HETTA ‘IDHA LEKIJA GULAMËN FEKATELEHU KALE ‘EKATELTE NEFSËN ZEKIJETEN BIGAJRI NEFSIN LEKAD XHI’TE SHEJ’ËN NUKRË
18.75: KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKE ‘INNEKE LEN TESTETI’A MA’IJE SEBRË
18.76: KALE ‘IN SE’ELTUKE ‘AN SHEJ’IN BA’DEHA FELA TUSAHIBNI KAD BELEGTE MIN LEDUNNI ‘UDHRË
18.77: FANTELEKA HETTA ‘IDHA ‘ETEJA ‘EHLE KARJETIN ESTET’AMA ‘EHLEHA FE’EBEW ‘EN JUDEJJIFUHUMA FEWEXHEDA FIHA XHIDARËN JURIDU ‘EN JENKADDE FE’EKAMEHU KALE LEW SHI’TE LATTEHADHTE ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRË
18.78: KALE HADHA FIRAKU BEJNI WE BEJNIKE SE’UNEBBI’UKE BITE’WILI MA LEM TESTETI’ ‘ALEJHI SEBRË
18.79: ‘EMMA SEFINETU FEKANET LIMESAKINE JA’MELUNE FIL-BEHRI FE’ERADTU ‘EN ‘A’IBEHA WE KANE WERA’EHUM MELIKUN JE’HUDHU KUL-LE SEFINETIN GASBË
18.80: WE ‘EMMAL-GULAMU FEKANE ‘EBEWAHU MU’UMINEJNI FEHASHINA ‘EN JURHIKAHUMA TUGJANËN WE KUFRË
18.81: FE’ERADNA ‘EN JUBDILEHUMA RABBUHUMA HAJRËN MINHU ZEKËTEN WE ‘EKRABE RUHMË
18.82: WE ‘EMMAL-XHIDARU FEKANE LIGULAMEJNI JETIMEJNI FIL-MEDINETI WE KANE TEHTEHU KENZUN LEHUMA WE KANE ‘EBUHUMA SALIHËN FE’ERADE RABBUKE ‘EN JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHUMA WE JESTEHRIXHA KENZEHUMA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE WE MA FE’ALTUHU ‘AN ‘EMRI DHALIKE TE’WILU MA LEM TESTI’ ‘ALEJHI SEBRË
18.83: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘AN DHIL-KARNEJNI KUL SE’ETLU ‘ALEJKUM MINHU DHIKRË
18.84: ‘INNA MEKKENNA LEHU FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ATEJNAHU MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SEBEBË
18.86: HETTA ‘IDHA BELEGA MEGRIBE ESH-SHEMSI WEXHEDEHA TEGRUBU FI ‘AJNIN HEMI’ETIN WE WEXHEDE ‘INDEHA KAWMËN KULNA JA DHAL-KARNEJNI ‘IMMA ‘EN TU’ADHDHIBE WE ‘IMMA ‘EN TETTEHIDHE FIHIM HUSNË
18.87: KALE ‘EMMA MEN DHELEME FESEWFE NU’ADHDHIBUHU THUMME JURADDU ‘ILA RABBIHI FEJU’ADHDHIBUHU ‘ADHABËN NUKRË
18.88: WE ‘EMMA MEN ‘AMENE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELEHU XHEZA’ENL-HUSNA WE SENEKULU LEHU MIN ‘EMRINA JUSRË
18.90: HETTA ‘IDHA BELEGA METLI’A ESH-SHEMSI WEXHEDEHA TETLU’U ‘ALA KAWMIN LEM NEXH’AL LEHUM MIN DUNIHA SITRË
18.91: KEDHALIKE WE KAD ‘EHETNA BIMA LEDEJHI HUBRË
18.93: HETTA ‘IDHA BELEGA BEJNE SEDDEJNI WEXHEDE MIN DUNIHIMA KAWMËN LA JEKADUNE JEFKAHUNE KAWLË
18.94: KALU JA DHAL-KARNEJNI ‘INNE JE’XHUXHE WE ME’XHUXHE MUFSIDUNE FIL-’ERDI FEHEL NEXH’ALU LEKE HARXHËN ‘ALA ‘EN TEXH’ALE BEJNENA WE BEJNEHUM SEDDË
18.95: KALE MA MEKKENENI FIHI RABBI HAJRUN FE’A’INUNI BIKUWETIN ‘EXH’AL BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM RADMË
18.96: ‘ATUNI ZUBERAL-HEDIDI HETTA ‘IDHA SAWA BEJNE SEDEFEJNI KALE ENFUHU HETTA ‘IDHA XHE’ALEHU NARËN KALE ‘ATUNI ‘UFRIG ‘ALEJHI KITRË
18.97: FEMA ESTA’U ‘EN JEDHHERUHU WE MA ESTETA’U LEHU NEKBË
18.98: KALE HADHA RAHMETUN MIN RABBI FE’IDHA XHA’E WA’DU RABBI XHE’ALEHU DEKKA’E WE KANE WA’DU RABBI HEKKË
18.99: WE TERAKNA BA’DEHUM JEWME’IDHIN JEMUXHU FI BA’DIN WE NUFIHA FI SURI FEXHEMA’NAHUM XHEM’Ë
18.101: EL-LEDHINE KANET ‘A’JUNUHUM FI GITA’IN ‘AN DHIKRI WE KANU LA JESTETI’UNE SEM’Ë
18.102: ‘EFEHESIBEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EN JETTEHIDHU ‘IBADI MIN DUNI ‘EWLIJA’E ‘INNA ‘A’TEDNA XHEHENNEME LILKAFIRINE NUZULË
18.104: EL-LEDHINE DEL-LE SA’JUHUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE HUM JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM JUHSINUNE SUN’Ë
18.105: ‘ULE’IKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM WE LIKA’IHI FEHEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FELA NUKIMU LEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WEZNË
18.106: DHALIKE XHEZA’UUHUM XHEHENNEMU BIMA KEFERU WE ETTEHADHU ‘AJATI WE RUSULI HUZUE
18.107: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KANET LEHUM XHENNATUL-FIRDEWSI NUZULË
18.109: KUL LEW KANEL-BEHRU MIDADËN LIKELIMATI RABBI LENEFIDEL-BEHRU KABLE ‘EN TENFEDE KELIMATU RABBI WE LEW XHI’NA BIMITHLIHI MEDEDË
18.110: KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ENA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘ENNEMA ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN FEMEN KANE JERXHU LIKA’E RABBIHI FELJA’MEL ‘AMELËN SALIHËN WE LA JUSHRIK BI’IBADETI RABBIHI ‘EHEDË

19.4: KALE RABBI ‘INNI WEHENEL-’ADHMU MINNI WE ESHTE’ALE RA’SU SHEJBËN WE LEM ‘EKUN BIDU’A’IKE RABBI SHEKIJË
19.5: WE ‘INNI HIFTUL-MEWALIJE MIN WERA’I WE KANETI EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRËN FEHEB LI MIN LEDUNKE WELIJË
19.6: JERITHUNI WE JERITHU MIN ‘ALI JA’KUBE WE EXH’ALHU RABBI RADIJË
19.7: JA ZEKERIJA ‘INNA NUBESHSHIRUKE BIGULAMIN ESMUHU JEHJA LEM NEXH’AL LEHU MIN KABLU SEMIJË
19.8: KALE RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI GULAMUN WE KANET EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRËN WE KAD BELEGTU MINEL-KIBERI ‘ITIJË
19.9: KALE KEDHALIKE KALE RABBUKE HUWE ‘ALEJJE HEJJINUN WE KAD HALEKTUKE MIN KABLU WE LEM TEKU SHEJ’Ë
19.10: KALE RABBI EXH’AL LI ‘AJETEN KALE ‘AJETUKE ‘ELLA TUKELLIME NASE THELATHE LEJALIN SEWIJË
19.11: FEHARAXHE ‘ALA KAWMIHI MINEL-MIHRABI FE’EWHA ‘ILEJHIM ‘EN SEBBIHU BUKRATEN WE ‘ASHIJË
19.12: JA JEHJA HUDHIL-KITABE BIKUWETIN WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-HUKME SEBIJË
19.13: WE HENANËN MIN LEDUNNA WE ZEKËTEN WE KANE TEKIJË
19.14: WE BERRËN BIWALIDEJHI WE LEM JEKUN XHEBBARËN ‘ASIJË
19.15: WE SELAMUN ‘ALEJHI JEWME WULIDE WE JEWME JEMUTU WE JEWME JUB’ATHU HEJJË
19.16: WE EDHKUR FIL-KITABI MERJEME ‘IDH ENTEBEDHET MIN ‘EHLIHA MEKANËN SHERKIJË
19.17: FATTEHADHET MIN DUNIHIM HIXHABËN FE’ERSELNA ‘ILEJHA RUHENA FETEMETHTHELE LEHA BESHERËN SEWIJË
19.19: KALE ‘INNEMA ‘ENA RASULU RABBIKI LI’HEBE LEKI GULAMËN ZEKIJË

21.3: LAHIJETEN KULUBUHUM WE ‘ESERRU NEXHWAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU HEL HADHA ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM ‘EFETE’TUNE SIHRA WE ‘ENTUM TUBSIRUN
21.4: KALE RABBI JA’LEMUL-KAWLE FI SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
21.5: BEL KALU ‘EDGATHU ‘EHLAMIN BEL EFTERAHU BEL HUWE SHA’IRUN FELJE’TINA BI’AJETIN KEMA ‘URSILEL-’EWWELUN
21.7: WE MA ‘ERSELNA KABLEKE ‘IL-LA RIXHALËN NUHI ‘ILEJHIM FAS’ELU ‘EHLE EDH-DHIKRI ‘IN KUNTUM LA TA’LEMUN
21.8: WE MA XHE’ALNAHUM XHESEDËN LA JE’KULUNET-TA’AME WE MA KANU HALIDIN
21.9: THUMME SEDEKNAHUMUL-WA’DE FE’ENXHEJNAHUM WE MEN NESHA’U WE ‘EHLEKNAL-MUSRIFIN
21.11: WE KEM KASEMNA MIN KARJETIN KANET DHALIMETEN WE ‘ENSHE’NA BA’DEHA KAWMËN ‘AHARIN
21.13: LA TERKUDU WE ERXHI’U ‘ILA MA ‘UTRIFTUM FIHI WE MESAKINIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TUS’ELUN
21.15: FEMA ZALET TILKE DA’WAHUM HETTA XHE’ALNAHUM HESIDËN HAMIDIN
21.16: WE MA HALEKNA SEMA’E WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA LA’IBIN
21.17: LEW ‘ERADNA ‘EN NETTEHIDHE LEHWEN LATTEHADHNAHU MIN LEDUNNA ‘IN KUNNA FA’ILIN
21.18: BEL NEKDHIFU BIL-HEKKI ‘ALEL-BATILI FEJEDMEGUHU FE’IDHA HUWE ZAHIKUN WE LEKUMUL-WEJLU MIMMA TESIFUN
21.19: WE LEHU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MEN ‘INDEHU LA JESTEKBIRUNE ‘AN ‘IBADETIHI WE LA JESTEHSIRUN
21.22: LEW KANE FIHIMA ‘ALIHETUN ‘IL-LALLAHU LEFESEDETA FESUBHANEL-LAHI RABBIL-’ARSHI ‘AMMA JESIFUN
21.23: LA JUS’ELU ‘AMMA JEF’ALU WE HUM JUS’ELUN
21.24: ‘EM ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN KUL HATU BURHANEKUM HADHA DHIKRU MEN MA’IJE WE DHIKRU MEN KABLI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUNEL-HEKKA FEHUM MU’RIDUN
21.25: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RASUL IN’IL-LA NUHI ‘ILEJHI ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENA FA’BUDUN
21.26: WE KALU ETTEHADHE RAHMANU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU BEL ‘IBADUN MUKRAMUN
21.27: LA JESBIKUNEHU BIL-KAWLI WE HUM BI’EMRIHI JA’MELUN
21.28: JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE LA JESHFA’UNE ‘IL-LA LIMENI ERTEDA WE HUM MIN HASHJETIHI MUSHFIKUN
21.29: WE MEN JEKUL MINHUM ‘INNI ‘ILEHUN MIN DUNIHI FEDHALIKE NEXHZIHI XHEHENNEME KEDHALIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
21.30: ‘EWELEM JERAL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE KANETA RATKËN FEFETEKNAHUMA WE XHE’ALNA MINEL-MA’I KUL-LE SHEJ’IN HEJJIN ‘EFELA JU’UMINUN
21.31: WE XHE’ALNA FIL-’ERDI RAWASIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIHIM WE XHE’ALNA FIHA FIXHAXHËN SUBULËN LE’ALLEHUM JEHTEDUN
21.32: WE XHE’ALNA SEMA’E SEKFËN MEHFUDHËN WE HUM ‘AN ‘AJATIHA MU’RIDUN
21.33: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-LEJLE WE NEHARA WE ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN FI FELEKIN JESBEHUN
21.34: WE MA XHE’ALNA LIBESHERIN MIN KABLIKEL-HULDE ‘EFE’IN MITTE FEHUMUL-HALIDUN
21.35: KUL-LU NEFSIN DHA’IKATUL-MEWTI WE NEBLUKUM BISH-SHERRI WEL-HAJRI FITNETEN WE ‘ILEJNA TURXHA’UN
21.36: WE ‘IDHA RA’AKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN JETTEHIDHUNEKE ‘IL-LA HUZUEN ‘EHEDHAL-LEDHI JEDHKURU ‘ALIHETEKUM WE HUM BIDHIKRI RAHMANI HUM KAFIRUN
21.38: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
21.39: LEW JA’LEMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU HINE LA JEKUFFUNE ‘AN WUXHUHIHIMU NARA WE LA ‘AN DHUHURIHIM WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
21.40: BEL TE’TIHIM BEGTETEN FETEBHETUHUM FELA JESTETI’UNE RADDEHA WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
21.41: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FEHAKA BIEL-LEDHINE SEHIRU MINHUM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
21.42: KUL MEN JEKLE’UUKUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI MINE RAHMANI BEL HUM ‘AN DHIKRI RABBIHIM MU’RIDUN
21.43: ‘EM LEHUM ‘ALIHETUN TEMNA’UHUM MIN DUNINA LA JESTETI’UNE NESRA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE LA HUM MINNA JUSHEBUN
21.44: BEL METTA’NA HA’UULA’ WE ‘ABA’EHUM HETTA TALE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’UMURU ‘EFELA JERAWNE ‘ENNA NE’TIL-’ERDE NENKUSUHA MIN ‘ETRAFIHA ‘EFEHUMUL-GALIBUN
21.45: KUL ‘INNEMA ‘UNDHIRUKUM BIL-WEHJI WE LA JESMA’U SUMMU ED-DU’A’E ‘IDHA MA JUNDHERUN
21.46: WE LE’IN MESSET/HUM NEFHETUN MIN ‘ADHABI RABBIKE LEJEKULUNNE JA WEJLENA ‘INNA KUNNA DHALIMIN
21.47: WE NEDA’UL-MEWAZINEL-KISTE LIJEWMIL-KIJAMETI FELA TUDHLEMU NEFSUN SHEJ’ËN WE ‘IN KANE MITHKALE HEBBETIN MIN HARDELIN ‘ETEJNA BIHA WE KEFA BINA HASIBIN
21.48: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSA WE HARUNEL-FURKANE WE DIJA’EN WE DHIKRËN LILMUTTEKIN
21.49: EL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI WE HUM MINE SA’ATI MUSHFIKUN
21.50: WE HEDHA DHIKRUN MUBARAKUN ‘ENZELNAHU ‘EFE’ENTUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
21.51: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA ‘IBRAHIME RUSHDEHU MIN KABLU WE KUNNA BIHI ‘ALIMIN
21.52: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MA HEDHIHIT-TEMATHILU EL-LETI ‘ENTUM LEHA ‘AKIFUN
21.54: KALE LEKAD KUNTUM ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABA’UUKUM FI DELALIN MUBINI
21.56: KALE BEL RABBUKUM RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDIL-LEDHI FETERAHUNNE WE ‘ENA ‘ALA DHALIKUM MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
21.57: WE TALLLEHI LE’EKIDENNE ‘ESNAMEKUM BA’DE ‘EN TUWELLU MUDBIRIN
21.58: FEXHE’ALEHUM XHUDHADHËN ‘IL-LA KEBIRËN LEHUM LE’ALLEHUM ‘ILEJHI JERXHI’UN
21.59: KALU MEN FE’ALE HADHA BI’ALIHETINA ‘INNEHU LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
21.60: KALU SEMI’NA FETEN JEDHKURUHUM JUKALU LEHU ‘IBRAHIM
21.61: KALU FE’TU BIHI ‘ALA ‘A’JUNI NASI LE’ALLEHUM JESH/HEDUN
21.63: KALE BEL FE’ALEHU KEBIRUHUM HADHA FAS’ELUHUM ‘IN KANU JENTIKUN
21.65: THUMME NUKISU ‘ALA RU’USIHIM LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA HA’UULA’ JENTIKUN
21.66: KALE ‘EFETA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JENFA’UKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEDURRUKU
21.67: ‘UFFIN LEKUM WE LIMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
21.68: KALU HERRIKUHU WE ENSURU ‘ALIHETEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM FA’ILIN
21.69: KULNA JA NARU KUNI BERDËN WE SELAMËN ‘ALA ‘IBRAHIM
21.71: WE NEXHXHEJNAHU WE LUTËN ‘ILAL-’ERDI EL-LETI BARAKNA FIHA LIL’ALEMIN
21.72: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE NAFILETEN WE KULLËN XHE’ALNA SALIHIN
21.73: WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JEHDUNE BI’EMRINA WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHIM FI’LEL-HAJRATI WE ‘IKAME SELËTI WE ‘ITA’E EZ-ZEKËTI WE KANU LENA ‘ABIDIN
21.74: WE LUTËN ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE NEXHXHEJNAHU MINEL-KARJETI EL-LETI KANET TA’MELUL-HABA’ITHE ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWME SEW’IN FASIKIN
21.76: WE NUHËN ‘IDH NADA MIN KABLU FASTEXHEBNA LEHU FENEXHXHEJNAHU WE ‘EHLEHU MINEL-KERBIL-’ADHIM
21.77: WE NESERNAHU MINEL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWME SEW’IN FE’EGRAKNAHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
21.78: WE DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE ‘IDH JEHKUMANI FIL-HERTHI ‘IDH NEFESHET FIHI GANEMUL-KAWMI WE KUNNA LIHUKMIHIM SHAHIDIN
21.79: FEFEHHEMNAHA SULEJMANE WE KULLËN ‘ATEJNA HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE SEHHARNA ME’A DAWUDEL-XHIBALE JUSEBBIHNE WET-TEJRA WE KUNNA FA’ILIN
21.80: WE ‘ALLEMNAHU SEN’ATE LEBUSIN LEKUM LITUHSINEKUM MIN BE’SIKUM FEHEL ‘ENTUM SHAKIRUN
21.81: WE LISULEJMANE ER-RIHE ‘ASIFETEN TEXHRI BI’EMRIHI ‘ILAL-’ERDI EL-LETI BARAKNA FIHA WE KUNNA BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMIN
21.82: WE MINE ESH-SHEJATINI MEN JEGUSUNE LEHU WE JA’MELUNE ‘AMELËN DUNE DHALIKE WE KUNNA LEHUM HAFIDHIN
21.83: WE ‘EJJUBE ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU ‘ENNI MESSENI ED-DURRU WE ‘ENTE ‘ERHEMU ER-RAHIMIN
21.84: FASTEXHEBNA LEHU FEKESHEFNA MA BIHI MIN DURRIN WE ‘ATEJNAHU ‘EHLEHU WE MITHLEHUM ME’AHUM RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDINA WE DHIKRA LIL’ABIDIN
21.85: WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘IDRISE WE DHAL-KIFLI KUL-LUN MINE SABIRIN
21.87: WE DHA NUNI ‘IDH DHEHEBE MUGADIBËN FEDHENNE ‘EN LEN NEKDIRA ‘ALEJHI FENADA FI EDH-DHULUMATI ‘EN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENTE SUBHANEKE ‘INNI KUNTU MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
21.88: FASTEXHEBNA LEHU WE NEXHXHEJNAHU MINEL-GAMMI WE KEDHELIKE NUNXHIL-MU’UMININ
21.89: WE ZEKERIJA ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU RABBI LA TEDHERNI FERDËN WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-WARITHIN
21.90: FASTEXHEBNA LEHU WE WEHEBNA LEHU JEHJA WE ‘ESLEHNA LEHU ZEWXHEHU ‘INNEHUM KANU JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE JED’UNENA RAGABËN WE RAHEBËN WE KANU LENA HASHI’IN
21.91: WE E-ETI ‘EHSENET FERXHEHA FENEFEHNA FIHA MIN RUHINA WE XHE’ALNAHA WE EBNEHA ‘AJETEN LIL’ALEMIN
21.94: FEMEN JA’MEL MINE SALIHATI WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FELA KUFRANE LISA’JIHI WE ‘INNA LEHU KATIBUN
21.96: HETTA ‘IDHA FUTIHET JE’XHUXHU WE ME’XHUXHU WE HUM MIN KUL-LI HEDEBIN JENSILUN
21.97: WAKTERABEL-WA’DUL-HEKKU FE’IDHA HIJE SHAHISETUN ‘EBSARUL-LEDHINE KEFERU JA WEJLENA KAD KUNNA FI GAFLETIN MIN HADHA BEL KUNNA DHALIMIN
21.98: ‘INNEKUM WE MA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI HESEBU XHEHENNEME ‘ENTUM LEHA WE ERIDUN
21.99: LEW KANE HA’UULA’ ‘ALIHETEN MA WERADUHA WE KUL-LUN FIHA HALIDUN
21.100: LEHUM FIHA ZEFIRUN WE HUM FIHA LA JESMA’UN
21.102: LA JESMA’UNE HESISEHA WE HUM FI MA ESHTEHET ‘ENFUSUHUM HALIDUN
21.103: LA JEHZUNUHUMUL-FEZA’UL-’EKBERU WE TETELEKKAHUMUL-MELA’IKETU HADHA JEWMUKUMUL-LEDHI KUNTUM TU’ADUN
21.104: JEWME NETWI SEMA’E KETEJJI SIXHILLI LILKUTUBI KEMA BEDE’NA ‘EWWELE HALKIN NU’IDUHU WA’DËN ‘ALEJNA ‘INNA KUNNA FA’ILIN
