21.105: WE LEKAD KETEBNA FI EZ-ZEBURI MIN BA’DI EDH-DHIKRI ‘ENNEL-’ERDE JERITHUHA ‘IBADIJE SALIHUN
21.109: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKUL ‘ADHENTUKUM ‘ALA SEWA’IN WE ‘IN ‘EDRI ‘EKARIBUN ‘EM BA’IDUN MA TU’ADUN
21.110: ‘INNEHU JA’LEMUL-XHEHRA MINEL-KAWLI WE JA’LEMU MA TEKTUMUN
21.111: WE ‘IN ‘EDRI LE’ALLEHU FITNETUN LEKUM WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
21.112: KALE RABBI EHKUM BIL-HEKKI WE RABBUNA RAHMANUL-MUSTA’ANU ‘ALA MA TESIFUN

22.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUM ‘INNE ZELZELETE SA’ATI SHEJ’UN ‘ADHIMU
22.2: JEWME TERAWNEHA TEDH/HELU KUL-LU MURDI’ATIN ‘AMMA ‘ERDE’AT WE TEDA’U KUL-LU DHATI HEMLIN HEMLEHA WE TERA NASE SUKARA WE MA HUM BISUKARA WE LEKINNE ‘ADHABEL-LAHI SHEDIDU
22.3: WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI ALLAHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE JETTEBI’U KUL-LE SHEJTANIN MERIDI
22.4: KUTIBE ‘ALEJHI ‘ENNEHU MEN TEWALLAHU FE’ENNEHU JUDIL-LUHU WE JEHDIHI ‘ILA ‘ADHABI SA’IR
22.5: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘IN KUNTUM FI RAJBIN MINEL-BA’THI FE’INNA HALEKNAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME MIN ‘ALEKATIN THUMME MIN MUDGATIN MUHALLEKATIN WE GAJRI MUHALLEKATIN LINUBEJJINE LEKUM WE NUKIRRU FIL-’ERHAMI MA NESHA’U ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN THUMME NUHRIXHUKUM TIFLËN THUMME LITEBLUGU ‘ESHUDDEKUM WE MINKUM MEN JUTEWEFFA WE MINKUM MEN JURADDU ‘ILA ‘ERDHELIL-’UMURI LIKEJLA JA’LEME MIN BA’DI ‘ILMIN SHEJ’ËN WE TERAL-’ERDE HAMIDETEN FE’IDHA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHAL-MA’E EHTEZZET WE RABET WE ‘ENBETET MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN BEHIXHI
22.6: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNEHU JUHJIL-MEWTA WE ‘ENNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
22.7: WE ‘ENNE SA’ATE ‘ATIJETUN LA RAJBE FIHA WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE JEB’ATHU MEN FIL-KUBUR
22.8: WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI ALLAHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE LA HUDEN WE LA KITABIN MUNIRI
22.9: THANIJE ‘ITFIHI LIJUDILLE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI LEHU FI ED-DUNJA HIZJUN WE NUDHIKUHU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
22.10: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET JEDAKE WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE LEJSE BIDHEL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
22.11: WE MINE NASI MEN JA’BUDU ELLAHE ‘ALA HERFIN FE’IN ‘ESABEHU HAJRUN ETME’ENNE BIHI WE ‘IN ‘ESABET/HU FITNETUN ENKALEBE ‘ALA WEXHHIHI HASIRA ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATE DHALIKE HUWEL-HUSRANUL-MUBIN
22.12: JED’U MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JEDURRUHU WE MA LA JENFA’UHU DHALIKE HUWE ED-DELALUL-BA’ID
22.13: JED’U LEMEN DERRUHU ‘EKRABU MIN NEF’IHI LEBI’SEL-MEWLA WE LEBI’SEL-’ASHIR
22.14: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JURID
22.15: MEN KANE JEDHUNNU ‘EN LEN JENSURAHU ALLAHU FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI FELJEMDUD BISEBEBIN ‘ILA SEMA’I THUMME LIJEKTA’ FELJENDHUR HEL JUDH/HIBENNE KEJDUHU MA JEGIDH
22.16: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNAHU ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE JEHDI MEN JURID
22.17: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE SABI’INE WE NESARA WEL-MEXHUSE WEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEFSILU BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
22.18: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE JESXHUDU LEHU MEN FI SEMAWATI WE MEN FIL-’ERDI WE ESH-SHEMSU WEL-KAMERU WE NUXHUMU WEL-XHIBALU WE ESH-SHEXHERU WE ED-DEWABBU WE KETHIRUN MINE NASI WE KETHIRUN HEKKA ‘ALEJHIL-’ADHABU WE MEN JUHINI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN MUKRIMIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JESHA’
22.19: HEDHANI HASMANI EHTESEMU FI RABBIHIM FE-EL-LEDHINE KEFERU KUTTI’AT LEHUM THIJABUN MIN NARIN JUSEBBU MIN FEWKI RU’USIHIMUL-HEMIM
22.20: JUSHERU BIHI MA FI BUTUNIHIM WEL-XHULUD
22.22: KUL-LEMA ‘ERADU ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINHA MIN GAMMIN ‘U’IDU FIHA WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
22.23: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU JUHELLEWNE FIHA MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE LU’ULU’UËN WE LIBASUHUM FIHA HERIRU
22.24: WE HUDU ‘ILAT-TEJJIBI MINEL-KAWLI WE HUDU ‘ILA SIRATIL-HEMID
22.25: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WEL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMIL-LEDHI XHE’ALNAHU LILNNASI SEWA’ENL-’AKIFU FIHI WEL-BADI WE MEN JURID FIHI BI’ILHADIN BIDHULMIN NUDHIKHU MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
22.26: WE ‘IDH BEWWE’NA LI’IBRAHIME MEKANEL-BEJTI ‘EN LA TUSHRIK BI SHEJ’ËN WE TEHHIR BEJTIJE LILTTA’IFINE WEL-KA’IMINE WE ER-RUKKA’I SUXHUD
22.27: WE ‘EDHDHIN FI NASI BIL-HEXHXHI JE’TUKE RIXHALËN WE ‘ALA KUL-LI DAMIRIN JE’TINE MIN KUL-LI FEXHXHIN ‘AMIKI
22.28: LIJESH/HEDU MENAFI’A LEHUM WE JEDHKURU ESMEL-LAHI FI ‘EJJAMIN MA’LUMATIN ‘ALA MA RAZEKAHUM MIN BEHIMETIL-’EN’AM FEKULU MINHA WE ‘ET’IMUL-BA’ISEL-FEKIR
22.29: THUMME LIJEKDU TEFETHEHUM WE LIUFU NUDHURAHUM WE LIETTEWWEFU BIL-BEJTIL-’ATIK
22.30: DHALIKE WE MEN JU’ADHDHIM HURUMATI ALLAHI FEHUWE HAJRUN LEHU ‘INDE RABBIHI WE ‘UHIL-LET LEKUMUL-’EN’AM ‘IL-LA MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FAXHTENIBU ER-RIXHSE MINEL-’EWTHANI WE EXHTENIBU KAWLE EZ-ZUR
22.31: HUNEFA’E LIL-LAHI GAJRA MUSHRIKINE BIHI WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKE’ENNEMA HARRA MINE SEMA’I FETEHTEFUHUT-TEJRU ‘EW TEHWI BIHI ER-RIHU FI MEKANIN SEHIKI
22.32: DHALIKE WE MEN JU’ADHDHIM SHA’A’IRAL-LAHI FE’INNEHA MIN TEKWAL-KULUB
22.33: LEKUM FIHA MENAFI’U ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN THUMME MEHILLUHA ‘ILAL-BEJTIL-’ATIK
22.34: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN XHE’ALNA MENSEKËN LIJEDHKURU ESMEL-LAHI ‘ALA MA RAZEKAHUM MIN BEHIMETIL-’EN’AMI FE’ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN FELEHU ‘ESLIMU WE BESHSHIRIL-MUHBITIN
22.35: EL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEXHILET KULUBUHUM WE SABIRINE ‘ALA MA ‘ESABEHUM WEL-MUKIMI SELËTI WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
22.36: WEL-BUDNE XHE’ALNAHA LEKUM MIN SHA’A’IRI ALLAHI LEKUM FIHA HAJRUN FADHKURU ESMEL-LAHI ‘ALEJHA SEWAFFE FE’IDHA WEXHEBET XHUNUBUHA FEKULU MINHA WE ‘ET’IMUL-KANI’A WEL-MU’TERRA KEDHALIKE SEHHARNAHA LEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
22.37: LEN JENALEL-LAHE LUHUMUHA WE LA DIMA’UUHA WE LEKIN JENALUHUT-TEKWA MINKUM KEDHALIKE SEHHARAHA LEKUM LITUKEBBIRU ELLAHE ‘ALA MA HEDAKUM WE BESHSHIRIL-MUHSININ
22.38: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDAFI’U ‘ANIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE HAWWANIN KEFURI
22.39: ‘UDHINE LIL-LEDHINE JUKATELUNE BI’ENNEHUM DHULIMU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA NESRIHIM LEKADIRU
22.40: EL-LEDHINE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIJARIHIM BIGAJRI HEKKIN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JEKULU RABBUNALLAHU WE LEWLA DEF’U ALLAHI NASE BA’DEHUM BIBA’DIN LEHUDDIMET SEWAMI’U WE BIJA’UN WE SELEWATUN WE MESAXHIDU JUDHKERU FIHA ESMU ALLAHI KETHIRËN WE LEJENSURANNEL-LAHU MEN JENSURUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEKAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
22.41: EL-LEDHINE ‘IN MEKKENNAHUM FIL-’ERDI ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘EMERU BIL-MA’RUFI WE NEHEW ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE LIL-LEHI ‘AKIBETUL-’UMUR
22.42: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ADUN WE THEMUD
22.44: WE ‘ESHABU MEDJENE WE KUDHDHIBE MUSA FE’EMLEJTU LILKAFIRINE THUMME ‘EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
22.45: FEKE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘EHLEKNAHA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN FEHIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA WE BI’RIN MU’ATTELETIN WE KASRIN MESHIDI
22.46: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FETEKUNE LEHUM KULUBUN JA’KILUNE BIHA ‘EW ‘ADHANUN JESMA’UNE BIHA FE’INNEHA LA TA’MAL-’EBSARU WE LEKIN TA’MAL-KULUBU EL-LETI FI SUDUR
22.47: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE LEN JUHLIFEL-LAHU WA’DEHU WE ‘INNE JEWMËN ‘INDE RABBIKE KE’ELFI SENETIN MIMMA TA’UDDUN
22.48: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘EMLEJTU LEHA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN THUMME ‘EHADHTUHA WE ‘ILEJJEL-MESIR
22.49: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNEMA ‘ENA LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
22.50: FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
22.52: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RASULIN WE LA NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA ‘IDHA TEMENNA ‘ELKA ESH-SHEJTANU FI ‘UMNIJETIHI FEJENSEHU ALLAHU MA JULKI ESH-SHEJTANU THUMME JUHKIMU ALLAHU ‘AJATIHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
22.53: LIJEXH’ALE MA JULKI ESH-SHEJTANU FITNETEN LIL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN WEL-KASIJETI KULUBUHUM WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEFI SHIKAKIN BA’IDI
22.54: WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FEJU’UMINU BIHI FETUHBITE LEHU KULUBUHUM WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHADIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
22.55: WE LA JEZALUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FI MIRJETIN MINHU HETTA TE’TIJEHUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN ‘EW JE’TIJEHUM ‘ADHABU JEWMIN ‘AKIMI
22.56: EL-MULKU JEWME’IDHIN LIL-LAHI JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FI XHENNATI NA’IM
22.57: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FE’ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
22.58: WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU FI SEBILI ALLAHI THUMME KUTILU ‘EW MATU LEJERZUKANNEHUMU ALLAHU RIZKËN HESENËN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWE HAJRU ER-RAZIKIN
22.59: LEJUDHILENNEHUM MUDHALËN JERDEWNEHU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’ALIMUN HELIMU
22.60: DHALIKE WE MEN ‘AKABE BIMITHLI MA ‘UKIBE BIHI THUMME BUGIJE ‘ALEJHI LEJENSURANNEHU ALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’AFUWUN GAFURU
22.61: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
22.62: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNE MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI HUWEL-BATILU WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
22.63: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FETUSBIHUL-’ERDU MUHDERRATEN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LETIFUN HABIRU
22.64: LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
22.65: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FIL-’ERDI WEL-FULKE TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BI’EMRIHI WE JUMSIKU SEMA’E ‘EN TEKA’A ‘ALEL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIN-NASI LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
22.66: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘EHJAKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JUHJIKUM ‘INNEL-’INSANE LEKEFURU
22.67: LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN XHE’ALNA MENSEKËN HUM NASIKUHU FELA JUNAZI’UNNEKE FIL-’EMRI WE ED’U ‘ILA RABBIKE ‘INNEKE LE’ALA HUDEN MUSTEKIMI
22.68: WE ‘IN XHADELUKE FEKULI ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA TA’MELUN
22.69: ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
22.70: ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘INNE DHALIKE FI KITABIN ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
22.71: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE MA LEJSE LEHUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN NESIRI
22.72: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINATIN TA’RIFU FI WUXHUHIL-LEDHINE KEFERUL-MUNKERA JEKADUNE JESTUNE BIEL-LEDHINE JETLUNE ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATINA KUL ‘EFE’UNEBBI’UKUM BISHERRIN MIN DHELIKUMU NARU WE’ADEHALLAHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE BI’SEL-MESIR
22.73: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU DURIBE METHELUN FASTEMI’U LEHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI LEN JEHLUKU DHUBABËN WE LEWI EXHTEMA’U LEHU WE ‘IN JESLUBHUMU EDH-DHUBABU SHEJ’ËN LA JESTENKIDHUHU MINHU DA’UFET-TALIBU WEL-METLUB
22.74: MA KADERU ELLAHE HEKKA KADRIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEKAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
22.75: ALLAHU JESTEFI MINEL-MELA’IKETI RUSULËN WE MINE NASI ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
22.76: JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
22.77: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ERKA’U WE ESXHUDU WE A’BUDU RABBEKUM WE EF’ALUL-HAJRA LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
22.78: WE XHAHIDU FI ALLAHI HEKKA XHIHADIHI HUWE EXHTEBAKUM WE MA XHE’ALE ‘ALEJKUM FI ED-DINI MIN HERAXHIN MILLETE ‘EBIKUM ‘IBRAHIME HUWE SEMMAKUMUL-MUSLIMJNE MIN KABLU WE FI HADHA LIJEKUNE RASULU SHEHIDËN ‘ALEJKUM WE TEKUNU SHUHEDA’E ‘ALA NASI FE’EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE A’TESIMU BIL-LAHI HUWE MEWLAKUM FENI’MEL-MEWLA WE NI’ME NESIR

23.7: FEMENI EBTEGA WERA’E DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-’ADUN
23.12: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE MIN SULALETIN MIN TINI
23.13: THUMME XHE’ALNAHU NUTFETEN FI KARARIN MEKINI
23.14: THUMME HALEKNA NUTFETE ‘ALEKATEN FEHALEKNAL-’ALEKATE MUDGATEN FEHALEKNAL-MUDGATE ‘IDHAMËN FEKESEWNAL-’IDHAME LEHMËN THUMME ‘ENSHE’NAHU HALKËN ‘AHARA FETEBARAKEL-LAHU ‘EHSENUL-HALIKIN
23.17: WE LEKAD HALEKNA FEWKAKUM SEB’A TERA’IKA WE MA KUNNA ‘ANIL-HALKI GAFILIN
23.18: WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN BIKADERIN FE’ESKENNAHU FIL-’ERDI WE ‘INNA ‘ALA DHEHABIN BIHI LEKADIRUN
23.19: FE’ENSHE’NA LEKUM BIHI XHENNATIN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN LEKUM FIHA FEWAKIHU KETHIRATUN WE MINHA TE’KULUN
23.20: WE SHEXHERATEN TEHRUXHU MIN TURI SEJNA’E TENBUTU BID-DUHNI WE SIBGIN LIL’AKILIN
23.21: WE ‘INNE LEKUM FIL-’EN’AMI LA’IBRATEN NUSKIKUM MIMMA FI BUTUNIHA WE LEKUM FIHA MENAFI’U KETHIRATUN WE MINHA TE’KULUN
23.23: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
23.24: FEKALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI MA HADHA ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JURIDU ‘EN JETEFEDDELE ‘ALEJKUM WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LE’ENZELE MELA’IKETEN MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FI ‘ABA’INAL-’EWWELIN
23.25: ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN BIHI XHINNETUN FETERABBESU BIHI HETTA HINI
23.27: FE’EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHI ‘ENI ESNA’IL-FULKE BI’A’JUNINA WE WEHJINA FE’IDHA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA WE FARAT-TENNURU FASLUK FIHA MIN KUL-LIN ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA MEN SEBEKA ‘ALEJHIL-KAWLU MINHUM WE LA TUHATIBNI FIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘INNEHUM MUGRAKUN
23.28: FE’IDHA ESTEWEJTE ‘ENTE WE MEN ME’AKE ‘ALEL-FULKI FEKULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI NEXHXHANA MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
23.29: WE KUL RABBI ‘ENZILNI MUNZELËN MUBARAKËN WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-MUNZILIN
23.30: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN WE ‘IN KUNNA LEMUBTELIN
23.32: FE’ERSELNA FIHIM RASULËN MINHUM ‘ENI A’BUDU ELLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
23.33: WE KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMIHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’IL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ETRAFNAHUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA MA HADHA ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JE’KULU MIMMA TE’KULUNE MINHU WE JESHRABU MIMMA TESHRABUN
23.35: ‘EJA’IDUKUM ‘ENNEKUM ‘IDHA MITTUM WE KUNTUM TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘ENNEKUM MUHRAXHUN
23.37: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA ED-DUNJA NEMUTU WE NEHJA WE MA NEHNU BIMEB’UTHIN
23.38: ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN WE MA NEHNU LEHU BIMU’UMININ
23.41: FE’EHADHET/HUMU SEJHETU BIL-HEKKI FEXHE’ALNAHUM GUTHA’EN FEBU’DËN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
23.43: MA TESBIKU MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELEHA WE MA JESTE’HIRUN
23.44: THUMME ‘ERSELNA RUSULENA TETRA KUL-LE MA XHA’E ‘UMMETEN RASULUHA KEDHDHEBUHU FE’ETBA’NA BA’DEHUM BA’DËN WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘EHADITHE FEBU’DËN LIKAWMIN LA JU’UMINUN
23.45: THUMME ‘ERSELNA MUSA WE ‘EHAHU HARUNE BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
23.46: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FASTEKBERU WE KANU KAWMËN ‘ALIN
23.47: FEKALU ‘ENU’UMINU LIBESHERAJNI MITHLINA WE KAWMUHUMA LENA ‘ABIDUN
23.50: WE XHE’ALNA EBNE MERJEME WE ‘UMMEHU ‘AJETEN WE ‘AWEJNAHUMA ‘ILA RABWETIN DHATI KARARIN WE MA’INI
23.51: JA ‘EJJUHA ER-RUSULU KULU MINET-TEJJIBATI WE A’MELU SALIHËN ‘INNI BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
23.52: WE ‘INNE HEDHIHI ‘UMMETUKUM ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN WE ‘ENA RABBUKUM FE ETTEKUN
23.53: FETEKATTA’U ‘EMRAHUM BEJNEHUM ZUBURËN KUL-LU HIZBIN BIMA LEDEJHIM FERIHUN
23.55: ‘EJEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEMA NUMIDDUHUM BIHI MIN MALIN WE BENIN
23.56: NUSARI’U LEHUM FIL-HAJRATI BEL LA JESH’URUN
23.60: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UTUNE MA ‘ATEW WE KULUBUHUM WE XHILETUN ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILA RABBIHIM RAXHI’UN
23.61: ‘ULA’IKE JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE HUM LEHA SABIKUN
23.62: WE LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA WE LEDEJNA KITABUN JENTIKU BIL-HEKKI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMU
23.63: BEL KULUBUHUM FI GAMRATIN MIN HADHA WE LEHUM ‘A’MALUN MIN DUNI DHALIKE HUM LEHA ‘AMILUN
23.69: ‘EM LEM JA’RIFU RASULEHUM FEHUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
23.70: ‘EM JEKULUNE BIHI XHINNETUN BEL XHA’EHUM BIL-HEKKI WE ‘EKTHERUHUM LILHEKKI KARIHUN
23.71: WE LEWI ETTEBE’AL-HEKKU ‘EHWA’EHUM LEFESEDETI SEMAWATU WEL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHINNE BEL ‘ETEJNAHUM BIDHIKRIHIM FEHUM ‘AN DHIKRIHIM MU’RIDUN
23.72: ‘EM TES’ELUHUM HARXHËN FEHARAXHU RABBIKE HAJRUN WE HUWE HAJRU ER-RAZIKIN
23.74: WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI ‘ANI SIRATI LENAKIBUN
23.75: WE LEW RAHIMNAHUM WE KESHEFNA MA BIHIM MIN DURRIN LELEXHXHU FI TUGJANIHIM JA’MEHUN
23.76: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHNAHUM BIL-’ADHABI FEMA ESTEKANU LIRABBIHIM WE MA JETEDERRA’UN
23.77: HETTA ‘IDHA FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BABËN DHA ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDIN ‘IDHA HUM FIHI MUBLISUN
23.78: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’E LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
23.79: WE HUWEL-LEDHI DHERA’EKUM FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
23.80: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE LEHU EHTILAFUL-LEJLI WE NEHARI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
23.82: KALU ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
23.83: LEKAD WU’IDNA NEHNU WE ‘ABA’UUNA HADHA MIN KABLU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
23.84: KUL LIMENIL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHA ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
23.86: KUL MEN RABBU SEMAWATI SEB’I WE RABBUL-’ARSHIL-’ADHIM
23.88: KUL MEN BIJEDIHI MELEKUTU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWE JUXHIRU WE LA JUXHARU ‘ALEJHI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMU
23.91: MA ETTEHADHEL-LAHU MIN WELEDIN WE MA KANE ME’AHU MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IDHËN LEDHEHEBE KUL-LU ‘ILEHIN BIMA HALEKA WE LE’ALA BA’DUHUM ‘ALA BA’DIN SUBHANEL-LAHI ‘AMMA JESIFUN
23.96: EDFA’ BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU SEJJI’ETE NEHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JESIFUN
23.97: WE KUL RABBI ‘A’UDHU BIKE MIN HEMEZATI ESH-SHEJATIN
23.100: LE’ALLI ‘A’MELU SALIHËN FIMA TERAKTU KEL-LA ‘INNEHA KELIMETUN HUWE KA’ILUHA WE MIN WERA’IHIM BERZEHUN ‘ILA JEWMI JUB’ATHUN
23.101: FE’IDHA NUFIHA FI SURI FELA ‘ENSABE BEJNEHUM JEWME’IDHIN WE LA JETESA’ELUN
23.103: WE MEN HAFFET MEWAZINUHU FE’ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM FI XHEHENNEME HALIDUN
23.104: TELFEHU WUXHUHEHUMU NARU WE HUM FIHA KALIHUN
23.106: KALU RABBENA GALEBET ‘ALEJNA SHIKWETUNA WE KUNNA KAWMËN DALLIN
23.108: KALE EHSE’U FIHA WE LA TUKELLIMUN
23.109: ‘INNEHU KANE FERIKUN MIN ‘IBADI JEKULUNE RABBENA ‘AMENNA FAGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRU ER-RAHIMIN
23.110: FATTEHADHTUMUHUM SIHRIJËN HETTA ‘ENSEWKUM DHIKRI WE KUNTUM MINHUM TEDHEKUN
23.113: KALU LEBITHNA JEWMËN ‘EW BA’DE JEWMIN FAS’ELIL-’ADDIN
23.114: KALE ‘IN LEBITHTUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN LEW ‘ENNEKUM KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
23.117: WE MEN JED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA LA BURHANE LEHU BIHI FE’INNEMA HISABUHU ‘INDE RABBIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-KAFIRUN
23.118: WE KUL RABBI EGFIR WE ERHEM WE ‘ENTE HAJRU ER-RAHIMIN

24.1: SURATUN ‘ENZELNAHA WE FERADNAHA WE ‘ENZELNA FIHA ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
24.2: EZ-ZANIJETU WE EZ-ZANI FAXHLIDU KUL-LE WAHIDIN MINHUMA MIA’ETE XHELDETIN WE LA TE’HUDHKUM BIHIMA RA’FETUN FI DINI ALLAHI ‘IN KUNTUM TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE LIESH/HED ‘ADHABEHUMA TA’IFETUN MINEL-MU’UMININ
24.3: EZ-ZANI LA JENKIHU ‘IL-LA ZANIJETEN ‘EW MUSHRIKETEN WE EZ-ZANIJETU LA JENKIHUHA ‘IL-LA ZANIN ‘EW MUSHRIKUN WE HURRIME DHALIKE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININ
24.4: WEL-LEDHINE JERMUNEL-MUHSENATI THUMME LEM JE’TU BI’ERBE’ATI SHUHEDA’E FAXHLIDUHUM THEMANINE XHELDETEN WE LA TEKBELU LEHUM SHEHADETEN ‘EBEDËN WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-FASIKUN
24.5: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE TABU MIN BA’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.6: WEL-LEDHINE JERMUNE ‘EZWAXHEHUM WE LEM JEKUN LEHUM SHUHEDA’U ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSUHUM FESHEHADETU ‘EHEDIHIM ‘ERBA’U SHEHADATIN BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU LEMINE SADIKIN
24.8: WE JEDRA’U ‘ANHAL-’ADHABE ‘EN TESH/HEDE ‘ERBE’A SHEHADATIN BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU LEMINEL-KADHIBIN
24.10: WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE TEWWABUN HEKIMU
24.11: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE XHA’U BIL-’IFKI ‘USBETUN MINKUM LA TEHSEBUHU SHERRËN LEKUM BEL HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM LIKUL-LI EMRI’IN MINHUM MA EKTESEBE MINEL-’ITHMI WEL-LEDHI TEWELLA KIBRAHU MINHUM LEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.12: LEWLA ‘IDH SEMI’TUMUHU DHENNEL-MU’UMINUNE WEL-MU’UMINATU BI’ENFUSIHIM HAJRËN WE KALU HADHA ‘IFKUN MUBINU
24.13: LEWLA XHA’U ‘ALEJHI BI’ERBE’ATI SHUHEDA’E FE’IDH LEM JE’TU BISH-SHUHEDA’I FE’ULA’IKE ‘INDEL-LAHI HUMUL-KADHIBUN
24.14: WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI LEMESSEKUM FI MA ‘EFEDTUM FIHI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.15: ‘IDH TELEKKAWNEHU BI’ELSINETIKUM WE TEKULUNE BI’EFWAHIKUM MA LEJSE LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WE TEHSEBUNEHU HEJJINËN WE HUWE ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘ADHIMU
24.16: WE LEWLA ‘IDH SEMI’TUMUHU KULTUM MA JEKUNU LENA ‘EN NETEKELLEME BIHEDHA SUBHANEKE HADHA BUHTANUN ‘ADHIMU
24.17: JA’IDHUKUMU ALLAHU ‘EN TA’UDU LIMITHLIHI ‘EBEDËN ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
24.18: WE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.19: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUHIBBUNE ‘EN TESHI’AL-FAHISHETU FIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMUN FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
24.20: WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE RA’UFUN RAHI
24.21: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWATI ESH-SHEJTANI WE MEN JETTEBI’ HUTUWATI ESH-SHEJTANI FE’INNEHU JE’MURU BIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WE LEWLA FEDLU ALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU MA ZEKA MINKUM MIN ‘EHEDIN ‘EBEDËN WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JUZEKKI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.22: WE LA JE’TELI ‘ULUL-FEDLI MINKUM WE SE’ATI ‘EN JU’UTU ‘ULIL-KURBA WEL-MESAKINE WEL-MUHAXHIRINE FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE LIA’FU WE LIESFEHU ‘ELA TUHIBBUNE ‘EN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.23: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JERMUNEL-MUHSENATIL-GAFILATIL-MU’UMINATI LU’INU FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.24: JEWME TESH/HEDU ‘ALEJHIM ‘ELSINETUHUM WE ‘EJDIHIM WE ‘ERXHULUHUM BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
24.25: JEWME’IDHIN JUWEFFIHIMU ALLAHU DINEHUMUL-HEKKA WE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-HEKKUL-MUBIN
24.26: EL-HABITHATU LILHABITHINE WEL-HABITHUNE LILHABITHATI WET-TEJJIBATU LILTTEJJIBINE WET-TEJJIBUNE LILTTEJJIBATI ‘ULA’IKE MUBERRA’UNE MIMMA JEKULUNE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
24.27: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEDHULU BUJUTËN GAJRA BUJUTIKUM HETTA TESTE’NISU WE TUSELLIMU ‘ALA ‘EHLIHA DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
24.28: FE’IN LEM TEXHIDU FIHA ‘EHEDËN FELA TEDHULUHA HETTA JU’UDHENE LEKUM WE ‘IN KILE LEKUM ERXHI’U FARXHI’U HUWE ‘EZKA LEKUM WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
24.29: LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEDHULU BUJUTËN GAJRA MESKUNETIN FIHA META’UN LEKUM WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA TEKTUMUN
24.30: KUL LILMU’UMININE JEGUDDU MIN ‘EBSARIHIM WE JEHFEDHU FURUXHEHUM DHALIKE ‘EZKA LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA JESNA’UN
24.31: WE KUL LILMU’UMINATI JEGDUDNE MIN ‘EBSARIHINNE WE JEHFEDHNE FURUXHEHUNNE WE LA JUBDINE ZINETEHUNNE ‘IL-LA MA DHEHERA MINHA WE LIEDRIBNE BIHUMURIHINNE ‘ALA XHUJUBIHINNE WE LA JUBDINE ZINETEHUNNE ‘IL-LA LIBU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘ABA’IHINNE ‘EW ‘ABA’I BU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘EBNA’IHINNE ‘EW ‘EBNA’I BU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘IHWANIHINNE ‘EW BENI ‘IHWANIHINNE ‘EW BENI ‘EHAWATIHINNE ‘EW NISA’IHINNE ‘EW MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUNNE ‘EWIT-TABI’INE GAJRI ‘ULIL-’IRBETI MINE ER-RIXHALI ‘EWIT-TIFLIL-LEDHINE LEM JEDHHERU ‘ALA ‘AWRATI NISA’ WE LA JEDRIBNE BI’ERXHULIHINNE LIJU’LEME MA JUHFINE MIN ZINETIHINNE WE TUBU ‘ILA ALLAHI XHEMI’ËN ‘EJJUHAL-MU’UMINUNE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
24.32: WE ‘ENKIHUL-’EJAMA MINKUM WE SALIHINE MIN ‘IBADIKUM WE ‘IMA’IKUM ‘IN JEKUNU FUKARA’E JUGNIHIMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WEL-LAHU WASI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.33: WE LIESTA’FIFIL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE NIKAHËN HETTA JUGNIJEHUMU ALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WEL-LEDHINE JEBTEGUNEL-KITABE MIMMA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM FEKATIBUHUM ‘IN ‘ALIMTUM FIHIM HAJRËN WE ‘ATUHUM MIN MALI ALLAHIL-LEDHI ‘ATAKUM WE LA TUKRIHU FETEJATIKUM ‘ALEL-BIGA’I ‘IN ‘ERADNE TEHESSUNËN LITEBTEGU ‘ARADEL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE MEN JUKRIHHUNNE FE’INNALL-LLAHE MIN BA’DI ‘IKRAHIHINNE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.34: WE LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKUM ‘AJATIN MUBEJJINATIN WE METHELËN MINEL-LEDHINE HALEW MIN KABLIKUM WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTEKIN
24.35: ALLAHU NURU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI METHELU NURIHI KEMISHKËTIN FIHA MISBAHUNL-MISBAHU FI ZUXHAXHETIN EZ-ZUXHAXHETU KE’ENNEHA KEWKEBUN DURRIJUN JUKADU MIN SHEXHERATIN MUBARAKETIN ZEJTUNIETIN LA SHERKIJETIN WE LA GARBIJETIN JEKADU ZEJTUHA JUDI’U WE LEW LEM TEMSES/HU NARUN NURUN ‘ALA NURIN JEHDI ALLAHU LINURIHI MEN JESHA’U WE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHALE LILNNASI WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
24.36: FI BUJUTIN ‘EDHINEL-LAHU ‘EN TURFE’A WE JUDHKERA FIHA ESMUHU JUSEBBIHU LEHU FIHA BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASAL
24.37: RIXHALUN LA TULHIHIM TIXHARATUN WE LA BEJ’UN ‘AN DHIKRI ALLAHI WE ‘IKAMI SELËTI WE ‘ITA’I EZ-ZEKËTI JEHAFUNE JEWMËN TETEKAL-LEBU FIHIL-KULUBU WEL-’EBSAR
24.38: LIJEXHZIJEHUMU ALLAHU ‘EHSENE MA ‘AMILU WE JEZIDEHUM MIN FEDLIHI WEL-LAHU JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
24.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘A’MALUHUM KESERABIN BIKI’ATIN JEHSEBUHU EDH-DHEM’ANU MA’EN HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’EHU LEM JEXHID/HU SHEJ’ËN WE WEXHEDEL-LAHE ‘INDEHU FEWEFFAHU HISABEHU WEL-LAHU SERI’UL-HISAB
24.40: ‘EW KEDHULUMATIN FI BEHRIN LUXHXHIJIN JEGSHAHU MEWXHUN MIN FEWKIHI MEWXHUN MIN FEWKIHI SEHABUN DHULUMATUN BA’DUHA FEWKA BA’DIN ‘IDHA ‘EHRAXHE JEDEHU LEM JEKED JERAHA WE MEN LEM JEXH’ALI ALLAHU LEHU NURËN FEMA LEHU MIN NURI
24.41: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE JUSEBBIHU LEHU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WET-TEJRU SAFFATIN KUL-LUN KAD ‘ALIME SELATEHU WE TESBIHEHU WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIMA JEF’ALUN
24.42: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘ILA ALLAHIL-MESIR
24.43: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE JUZXHI SEHABËN THUMME JU’UELLIFU BEJNEHU THUMME JEXH’ALUHU RUKAMËN FETERAL-WEDKA JEHRUXHU MIN HILALIHI WE JUNEZZILU MINE SEMA’I MIN XHIBALIN FIHA MIN BERADIN FEJUSIBU BIHI MEN JESHA’U WE JESRIFUHU ‘AN MEN JESHA’U JEKADU SENA BERKIHI JEDH/HEBU BIL-’EBSAR
24.44: JUKALLIBU ALLAHUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LA’IBRATEN LI’WLIL-’EBSAR
24.45: WEL-LAHU HALEKA KUL-LE DABBETIN MIN MA’IN FEMINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA BETNIHI WE MINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA RIXHLEJNI WE MINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA ‘ERBA’IN JEHLUKU ALLAHU MA JESHA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
24.46: LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘AJATIN MUBEJJINATIN WEL-LAHU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
24.47: WE JEKULUNE ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WE BIR-RASULI WE ‘ETA’NA THUMME JETEWELLA FERIKUN MINHUM MIN BA’DI DHALIKE WE MA ‘ULA’IKE BIL-MU’UMININ
24.48: WE ‘IDHA DU’U ‘ILA ALLAHI WE RASULIHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM MU’RIDUN
24.50: ‘EFI KULUBIHIM MERADUN ‘EM ERTABU ‘EM JEHAFUNE ‘EN JEHIFEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE RASULUHU BEL ‘ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMU
24.51: ‘INNEMA KANE KAWLEL-MU’UMININE ‘IDHA DU’U ‘ILA ALLAHI WE RASULIHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM ‘EN JEKULU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
24.52: WE MEN JUTI’I ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE JEHSHEL-LAHE WE JETTEKHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-FA’IZUN
24.53: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN ‘EMERTEHUM LEJEHRUXHUNNE KUL LA TUKSIMU TA’ATUN MA’RUFETUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
24.54: KUL ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNEMA ‘ALEJHI MA HUMMILE WE ‘ALEJKUM MA HUMMILTUM WE ‘IN TUTI’UHU TEHTEDU WE MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
24.55: WE’ADEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEJESTEHLIFENNEHUM FIL-’ERDI KEMA ESTEHLEFEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE LEJUMEKKINENNE LEHUM DINEHUMUL-LEDHI ERTEDA LEHUM WE LEJUBEDDILENNEHUM MIN BA’DI HAWFIHIM ‘EMNËN JA’BUDUNENI LA JUSHRIKUNE BI SHEJ’ËN WE MEN KEFERA BA’DE DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-FASIKUN
24.56: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
24.57: LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MU’XHIZINE FIL-’ERDI WE ME’WAHUMU NARU WE LEBI’SEL-MESIR
24.58: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LIJESTE’DHINKUMUL-LEDHINE MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM WEL-LEDHINE LEM JEBLUGUL-HULUME MINKUM THELATHE MERRATIN MIN KABLI SELËTIL-FEXHRI WE HINE TEDA’UNE THIJA BEKUM MINE EDH-DHEHIRATI WE MIN BA’DI SELËTIL-’ISHA’I THELATHU ‘AWRATIN LEKUM LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘ALEJHIM XHUNAHUN BA’DEHUNNE TEWWAFUNE ‘ALEJKUM BA’DUKUM ‘ALA BA’DIN KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJA TI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.59: WE ‘IDHA BELEGAL-’ETFALU MINKUMUL-HULUME FELJESTE’DHINU KEMA ESTE’DHENEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.60: WEL-KAWA’IDU MINE NISA’L-LATI LA JERXHUNE NIKAHËN FELEJSE ‘ALEJHINNE XHUNAHUN ‘EN JEDA’NE THIJABEHUNNE GAJRA MUTEBERRIXHATIN BIZINETIN WE ‘EN JESTA’FIFNE HAJRUN LEHUNNE WEL-LAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.61: LEJSE ‘ALEL-’A’MA HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-’A’RAXHI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-MERIDI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EN TE’KULU MIN BUJUTIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘ABA’IKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘UMMEHATIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘IHWANIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘EHAWATIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘A’MAMIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘AMMATIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘EHWALIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI HALATIKUM ‘EW MA MELEKTUM MEFATIHEHU ‘EW SEDIKIKUM LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TE’KULU XHEMI’ËN ‘EW ‘ESHTATËN FE’IDHA DEHALTUM BUJUTËN FESELLIMU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM TEHIJETEN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI MUBARAKETEN TEJJIBETEN KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
24.62: ‘INNEMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘IDHA KANU ME’AHU ‘ALA ‘EMRIN XHAMI’IN LEM JEDH/HEBU HETTA JESTE’DHINUHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESTE’DHINUNEKE ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI FE’IDHA ESTE’DHENUKE LIBA’DI SHE’NIHIM FE’DHEN LIMEN SHI’TE MINHUM WE ESTEGFIR LEHUMU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.63: LA TEXH’ALU DU’A’E RASULI BEJNEKUM KEDU’A’I BA’DIKUM BA’DËN KAD JA’LEMU ALLAHUL-LEDHINE JETESELLELUNE MINKUM LIWADHËN FELJEHDHERIL-LEDHINE JUHALIFUNE ‘AN ‘EMRIHI ‘EN TUSIBEHUM FITNETUN ‘EW JUSIBEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
24.64: ‘ELA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KAD JA’LEMU MA ‘ENTUM ‘ALEJHI WE JEWME JURXHA’UNE ‘ILEJHI FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

25.2: EL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LEM JETTEHIDH WELEDËN WE LEM JEKUN LEHU SHERIKUN FIL-MULKI WE HALEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FEKADDERAHU TEKDIRË
25.3: WE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN LA JEHLUKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUNE WE LA JEMLIKUNE LI’NFUSIHIM DERRËN WE LA NEF’ËN WE LA JEMLIKUNE MEWTËN WE LA HEJËTEN WE LA NUSHURË
25.4: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘IFKUN EFTERAHU WE ‘A’ANEHU ‘ALEJHI KAWMUN ‘AHARUNE FEKAD XHA’U DHULMËN WE ZURË
25.5: WE KALU ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELINE EKTETEBEHA FEHIJE TUMLA ‘ALEJHI BUKRATEN WE ‘ESILË
25.6: KUL ‘ENZELEHUL-LEDHI JA’LEMU SIRRA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘INNEHU KANE GAFURËN RAHIMË
25.7: WE KALU MALI HADHA RASULI JE’KULUT-TA’AME WE JEMSHI FIL-’ESWAKI LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MELEKUN FEJEKUNE ME’AHU NEDHIRË
25.8: ‘EW JULKA ‘ILEJHI KENZUN ‘EW TEKUNU LEHU XHENNETUN JE’KULU MINHA WE KALE EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA RAXHULËN MESHURË
25.9: ENDHUR KEJFE DERABU LEKEL-’EMTHALE FEDELLU FELA JESTETI’UNE SEBILË
25.10: TEBARAKEL-LEDHI ‘IN SHA’E XHE’ALE LEKE HAJRËN MIN DHALIKE XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE JEXH’AL LEKE KUSURË
25.11: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIS-SA’ATI WE ‘A’TEDNA LIMEN KEDHDHEBE BIS-SA’ATI SA’IRË
25.12: ‘IDHA RA’ET/HUM MIN MEKANIN BA’IDIN SEMI’U LEHA TEGAJJUDHËN WE ZEFIRË
25.13: WE ‘IDHA ‘ULKU MINHA MEKANËN DEJJIKËN MUKARRANINE DE’AW HUNALIKE THUBURË
25.14: LA TED’UL-JEWME THUBURËN WAHIDËN WE ED’U THUBURËN KETHIRË
25.15: KUL ‘EDHELIKE HAJRUN ‘EM XHENNETUL-HULDI EL-LETI WU’IDEL-MUTTEKUNE KANET LEHUM XHEZA’EN WE MESIRË
25.16: LEHUM FIHA MA JESHA’UNE HALIDINE KANE ‘ALA RABBIKE WA’DËN MES’ULË
25.17: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM WE MA JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI FEJEKULU ‘E’ENTUM ‘EDLELTUM ‘IBADI HA’UULA’ ‘EM HUM DELLU SEBIL
25.18: KALU SUBHANEKE MA KANE JENBEGI LENA ‘EN NETTEHIDHE MIN DUNIKE MIN ‘EWLIJA’E WE LEKIN METTA’TEHUM WE ‘ABA’EHUM HETTA NESU EDH-DHIKRA WE KANU KAWMËN BURË
25.19: FEKAD KEDHDHEBUKUM BIMA TEKULUNE FEMA TESTETI’UNE SERFËN WE LA NESRËN WE MEN JEDHLIM MINKUM NUDHIKHU ‘ADHABËN KEBIRË
25.20: WE MA ‘ERSELNA KABLEKE MINEL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA ‘INNEHUM LEJE’KULUNET-TA’AME WE JEMSHUNE FIL-’ESWAKI WE XHE’ALNA BA’DEKUM LIBA’DIN FITNETEN ‘ETESBIRUNE WE KANE RABBUKE BESIRË
25.21: WE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNAL-MELA’IKETU ‘EW NERA RABBENA LEKADI ESTEKBERU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ATEW ‘UTUWËN KEBIRË
25.22: JEWME JERAWNEL-MELA’IKETE LA BUSHRA JEWME’IDHIN LILMUXHRIMINE WE JEKULUNE HIXHRËN MEHXHURË
25.23: WE KADIMNA ‘ILA MA ‘AMILU MIN ‘AMELIN FEXHE’ALNAHU HEBA’EN MENTHURË
25.25: WE JEWME TESHEKKAKU SEMA’U BIL-GAMAMI WE NUZZILEL-MELA’IKETU TENZILË
25.26: EL-MULKU JEWME’IDHINL-HEKKU LILRRAHMENI WE KANE JEWMËN ‘ALEL-KAFIRINE ‘ASIRË
25.27: WE JEWME JE’ADDU EDH-DHALIMU ‘ALA JEDEJHI JEKULU JA LEJTENI ETTEHADHTU ME’A RASULI SEBILË
25.28: JA WEJLETI LEJTENI LEM ‘ETTEHIDH FULANËN HALILË
25.29: LEKAD ‘EDEL-LENI ‘ANI EDH-DHIKRI BA’DE ‘IDH XHA’ENI WE KANE ESH-SHEJTANU LIL’INSANI HADHULË
25.30: WE KALE RASULU JA RABBI ‘INNE KAWMI ETTEHADHU HADHAL-KUR’ANE MEHXHURË
25.31: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA LIKUL-LI NEBIJIN ‘ADUWËN MINEL-MUXHRIMINE WE KEFA BIRABBIKE HADIËN WE NESIRË
25.32: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA NUZZILE ‘ALEJHIL-KUR’ANU XHUMLETEN WAHIDETEN KEDHALIKE LINUTHEBBITE BIHI FU’UADEKE WE RATTELNAHU TERTILË
25.33: WE LA JE’TUNEKE BIMETHELIN ‘IL-LA XHI’NAKE BIL-HEKKI WE ‘EHSENE TEFSIRË
25.34: EL-LEDHINE JUHSHERUNE ‘ALA WUXHUHIHIM ‘ILA XHEHENNEME ‘ULA’IKE SHERRUN MEKANËN WE ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.35: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE XHE’ALNA ME’AHU ‘EHAHU HARUNE WEZIRË
25.36: FEKULNA EDH/HEBA ‘ILAL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FEDEMMERNAHUM TEDMIRË
25.37: WE KAWME NUHIN LEMMA KEDHDHEBU ER-RUSULE ‘EGRAKNAHUM WE XHE’ALNAHUM LILNNASI ‘AJETEN WE ‘A’TEDNA LILDHDHALIMINE ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
25.38: WE ‘ADËN WE THEMUDE WE ‘ESHABE RASSI WE KURUNËN BEJNE DHALIKE KETHIRË
25.39: WE KULLËN DERABNA LEHUL-’EMTHALE WE KULLËN TEBBERNA TETBIRË
25.40: WE LEKAD ‘ETEW ‘ALEL-KARJETI EL-LETI ‘UMTIRAT METERA SEW’I ‘EFELEM JEKUNU JERAWNEHA BEL KANU LA JERXHUNE NUSHURË
25.41: WE ‘IDHA R’EWKE ‘IN JETTEHIDHUNEKE ‘IL-LA HUZUEN ‘EHEDHAL-LEDHI BE’ATHEL-LAHU RASULË
25.42: ‘IN KADE LEJUDIL-LUNA ‘AN ‘ALIHETINA LEWLA ‘EN SEBERNA ‘ALEJHA WE SEWFE JA’LEMUNE HINE JERAWNEL-’ADHABE MEN ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.43: ‘ERA’EJTE MENI ETTEHADHE ‘ILEHEHU HEWAHU ‘EFE’ENTE TEKUNU ‘ALEJHI WE KILË
25.44: ‘EM TEHSEBU ‘ENNE ‘EKTHERAHUM JESMA’UNE ‘EW JA’KILUNE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA KAL’EN’AM BEL HUM ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.45: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILA RABBIKE KEJFE MEDDE EDH-DHILLE WE LEW SHA’E LEXHE’ALEHU SAKINËN THUMME XHE’ALNA ESH-SHEMSE ‘ALEJHI DELILË
25.47: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LIBASËN WE NEWME SUBATËN WE XHE’ALE NEHARA NUSHURË
25.48: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE ER-RIJAHE BUSHRËN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN TEHURË
25.49: LINUHJIJE BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN WE NUSKIJEHU MIMMA HALEKNA ‘EN’AMËN WE ‘ENASIJE KETHIRË
25.50: WE LEKAD SERRAFNAHU BEJNEHUM LIJEDHDHEKKERU FE’EBA ‘EKTHERU NASI ‘IL-LA KUFURË
25.51: WE LEW SHI’NA LEBE’ATHNA FI KUL-LI KARJETIN NEDHIRË
25.52: FELA TUTI’IL-KAFIRINE WE XHAHID/HUM BIHI XHIHADËN KEBIRË
25.53: WE HUWEL-LEDHI MERAXHEL-BEHRAJNI HADHA ‘ADHBUN FURATUN WE HEDHA MILHUN ‘UXHAXHUN WE XHE’ALE BEJNEHUMA BERZEHËN WE HIXHRËN MEHXHURË
25.54: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA MINEL-MA’I BESHERËN FEXHE’ALEHU NESEBËN WE SIHRËN WE KANE RABBUKE KADIRË
25.55: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI MA LA JENFA’UHUM WE LA JEDURRUHUM WE KANEL-KAFIRU ‘ALA RABBIHI DHEHIRË
25.57: KUL MA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’E ‘EN JETTEHIDHE ‘ILA RABBIHI SEBILË
25.58: WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALEL-HEJJIL-LEDHI LA JEMUTU WE SEBBIH BIHEMDIHI WE KEFA BIHI BIDHUNUBI ‘IBADIHI HABIRË
25.59: EL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI RAHMANU FAS’EL BIHI HABIRË
25.60: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM ESXHUDU LILRRAHMENI KALU WE MA RAHMANU ‘ENESXHUDU LIMA TE’MURUNA WE ZADEHUM NUFURË
25.61: TEBARAKEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE FI SEMA’I BURUXHËN WE XHE’ALE FIHA SIRAXHËN WE KAMERËN MUNIRË
25.62: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEL-LEJLE WE NEHARA HILFETEN LIMEN ‘ERADE ‘EN JEDHDHEKKERA ‘EW ‘ERADE SHUKURË
25.63: WE ‘IBADU RAHMANIL-LEDHINE JEMSHUNE ‘ALEL-’ERDI HEWNËN WE ‘IDHA HATEBEHUMUL-XHAHILUNE KALU SELAMË
25.64: WEL-LEDHINE JEBITUNE LIRABBIHIM SUXHXHEDËN WE KIJAMË
25.65: WEL-LEDHINE JEKULUNE RABBENA ESRIF ‘ANNA ‘ADHABE XHEHENNEME ‘INNE ‘ADHABEHA KANE GARAMË
25.67: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA ‘ENFEKU LEM JUSRIFU WE LEM JEKTURU WE KANE BEJNE DHALIKE KAWAMË
25.68: WEL-LEDHINE LA JED’UNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA WE LA JEKTULUNE NEFSEL-LETI HERRAMEL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE LA JEZNUNE WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE JELKA ‘ETHAMË
25.69: JUDA’AF LEHUL-’ADHABU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE JEHLUD FIHI MUHANË
25.70: ‘IL-LA MEN TABE WE ‘AMENE WE ‘AMILE ‘AMELËN SALIHËN FE’ULA’IKE JUBEDDILU ALLAHU SEJJI’ATIHIM HESENATIN WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
25.71: WE MEN TABE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’INNEHU JETUBU ‘ILA ALLAHI METABË
25.72: WEL-LEDHINE LA JESH/HEDUNE EZ-ZURA WE ‘IDHA MERRU BIL-LEGWI MERRU KIRAMË
25.73: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKKIRU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM LEM JEHIRRU ‘ALEJHA SUMMËN WE ‘UMJANË
25.74: WEL-LEDHINE JEKULUNE RABBENA HEB LENA MIN ‘EZWAXHINA WE DHURRIJATINA KURRATE ‘A’JUNIN WE EXH’ALNA LILMUTTEKINE ‘IMAMË
25.75: ‘ULA’IKE JUXHZEWNEL-GURFETE BIMA SEBERU WE JULEKKAWNE FIHA TEHIJETEN WE SELAMË
25.76: HALIDINE FIHA HESUNET MUSTEKARRËN WE MUKAMË
25.77: KUL MA JA’BE’U BIKUM RABBI LEWLA DU’A’UUKUM FEKAD KEDHDHEBTUM FESEWFE JEKUNU LIZAMË

26.4: ‘IN NESHE’ NUNEZZIL ‘ALEJHIM MINE SEMA’I ‘AJETEN FEDHELLET ‘A’NAKUHUM LEHA HADI’IN
26.5: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN DHIKRIN MINE RAHMANI MUHDETHIN ‘IL-LA KANU ‘ANHU MU’RIDIN
26.6: FEKAD KEDHDHEBU FESEJE’TIHIM ‘ENBA’U MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
26.7: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILAL-’ERDI KEM ‘ENBETNA FIHA MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN KERIMI
26.8: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.10: WE ‘IDH NADA RABBUKE MUSA ‘ENI E’TIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
26.13: WE JEDIKU SEDRI WE LA JENTELIKU LISANI FE’ERSIL ‘ILA HARUN
26.15: KALE KEL-LA FADH/HEBA BI’AJATINA ‘INNA ME’AKUM MUSTEMI’UN
26.18: KALE ‘ELEM NURABBIKE FINA WELIDËN WE LEBITHTE FINA MIN ‘UMURIKE SININ
26.19: WE FE’ALTE FA’LETEKEL-LETI FE’ALTE WE ‘ENTE MINEL-KAFIRIN
26.21: FEFERARTU MINKUM LEMMA HIFTUKUM FEWEHEBE LI RABBI HUKMËN WE XHE’ALENI MINEL-MURSELIN
26.24: KALE RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM MUKININ
26.28: KALE RABBUL-MESHRIKI WEL-MEGRIBI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM TA’KILUN
26.29: KALE LE’INI ETTEHADHTE ‘ILEHËN GAJRI LE’EXH’ALENNEKE MINEL-MESXHUNIN
26.31: KALE FE’TI BIHI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.33: WE NEZE’A JEDEHU FE’IDHA HIJE BEJDA’U LILNNADHIRIN
26.35: JURIDU ‘EN JUHRIXHEKUM MIN ‘ERDIKUM BISIHRIHI FEMADHA TE’MURUN
26.36: KALU ‘ERXHIHI WE ‘EHAHU WE EB’ATH FIL-MEDA’INI HASHIRIN
26.41: FELEMMA XHA’E SEHERATU KALU LIFIR’AWNE ‘E’INNE LENA LE’EXHRËN ‘IN KUNNA NEHNUL-GALIBIN
26.44: FE’ELKAW HIBALEHUM WE ‘ISIJEHUM WE KALU BI’IZZETI FIR’AWNE ‘INNA LENEHNUL-GALIBUN
26.45: FE’ELKA MUSA ‘ASAHU FE’IDHA HIJE TELKAFU MA JE’FIKUN
26.49: KALE ‘AMENTUM LEHU KABLE ‘EN ‘ADHENE LEKUM ‘INNEHU LEKEBIRUKUMUL-LEDHI ‘AL-LEMEKUMU SIHRA FELESEWFE TA’LEMUNE LE’UKATTI’ANNE ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM MIN HILAFIN WE LE’USELLIBENNEKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
26.51: ‘INNA NETMA’U ‘EN JEGFIRA LENA RABBUNA HATAJANA ‘EN KUNNA ‘EWWELEL-MU’UMININ
26.63: FE’EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘ENI EDRIB BI’ASAKEL-BEHRA FANFELEKA FEKANE KUL-LU FIRKIN KALTTEWDIL-’ADHIM
26.67: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.70: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MA TA’BUDUN
26.82: WEL-LEDHI ‘ETMA’U ‘EN JEGFIRA LI HATI’ETI JEWME ED-DIN
26.83: RABBI HEB LI HUKMËN WE ‘ELHIKNI BIS-SALIHIN
26.84: WE EXH’AL LI LISANE SIDKIN FIL-’AHIRIN
26.85: WE EXH’ALNI MIN WERATHETI XHENNETI NA’IM
26.86: WE EGFIR LI’EBI ‘INNEHU KANE MINE ED-DALLIN
26.88: JEWME LA JENFA’U MALUN WE LA BENUN
26.92: WE KILE LEHUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TA’BUDUN
26.93: MIN DUNI ALLAHI HEL JENSURUNEKUM ‘EW JENTESIRUN
26.103: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.112: KALE WE MA ‘ILMI BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
26.116: KALU LE’IN LEM TENTEHI JA NUHU LETEKUNENNE MINEL-MERXHUMIN
26.118: FAFTEH BEJNI WE BEJNEHUM FETHËN WE NEXHXHINI WE MEN MA’I MINEL-MU’UMININ
26.121: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.139: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHLEKNAHUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.148: WE ZURU’IN WE NEHLIN TEL’UHA HEDIMU
26.152: EL-LEDHINE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ERDI WE LA JUSLIHUN
26.154: MA ‘ENTE ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA FE’TI BI’AJETIN ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.155: KALE HEDHIHI NAKATUN LEHA SHIRBUN WE LEKUM SHIRBU JEWMIN MA’LUMI
26.156: WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABU JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
26.158: FE’EHADHEHUMUL-’ADHABU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.166: WE TEDHERUNE MA HALEKA LEKUM RABBUKUM MIN ‘EZWAXHIKUM BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN ‘ADUN
26.167: KALU LE’IN LEM TENTEHI JA LUTU LETEKUNENNE MINEL-MUHRAXHIN
26.174: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.183: WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA’EHUM WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ERDI MUFSIDIN
26.186: WE MA ‘ENTE ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA WE ‘IN NEDHUNNUKE LEMINEL-KADHIBIN
26.187: FE’ESKIT ‘ALEJNA KISEFËN MINE SEMA’I ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.189: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHEHUM ‘ADHABU JEWMI EDH-DHULLETI ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
26.190: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.202: FEJE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
26.208: WE MA ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA LEHA MUNDHIRUN
26.211: WE MA JENBEGI LEHUM WE MA JESTETI’UN
26.213: FELA TED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETEKUNE MINEL-MU’ADHDHEBIN
26.215: WE EHFID XHENAHEKE LIMENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-MU’UMININ
26.227: ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE DHEKERU ELLAHE KETHIRËN WE ENTESERU MIN BA’DI MA DHULIMU WE SEJA’LEMUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘EJJE MUNKALEBIN JENKALIBUN

27.3: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
27.4: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI ZEJJENNA LEHUM ‘A’MALEHUM FEHUM JA’MEHUN
27.5: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE LEHUM SU’UL-’ADHABI WE HUM FIL-’AHIRATI HUMUL-’EHSERUN
27.7: ‘IDH KALE MUSA LI’HLIHI ‘INNI ‘ANESTU NARËN SE’ATIKUM MINHA BIHABERIN ‘EW ‘ATIKUM BISHIHABIN KABESIN LE’AL-LEKUM TESTELUN
27.8: FELEMMA XHA’EHA NUDIJE ‘EN BURIKE MEN FI NARI WE MEN HEWLEHA WE SUBHANEL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
27.10: WE ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FELEMMA RA’AHA TEHTEZZU KE’ENNEHA XHANNUN WELLA MUDBIRËN WE LEM JU’AKKIB JA MUSA LA TEHAF ‘INNI LA JEHAFU LEDEJJEL-MURSELUN
27.11: ‘IL-LA MEN DHELEME THUMME BEDDELE HUSNËN BA’DE SU’IN FE’INNI GAFURUN RAHIMU
27.12: WE ‘EDHIL JEDEKE FI XHEJBIKE TEHRUXH BEJDA’E MIN GAJRI SU’IN FI TIS’I ‘AJATIN ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE KAWMIHI ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWMËN FASIKIN
27.13: FELEMMA XHA’ET/HUM ‘AJATUNA MUBSIRATEN KALU HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
27.14: WE XHEHEDU BIHA WE ESTEJKANET/HA ‘ENFUSUHUM DHULMËN WE ‘ULUWËN FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
27.15: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE ‘ILMËN WE KALAL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI FEDDELENA ‘ALA KETHIRIN MIN ‘IBADIHIL-MU’UMININ
27.16: WE WERITHE SULEJMANU DAWUDE WE KALE JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘ULLIMNA MENTIKAT-TEJRI WE ‘UTINA MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘INNE HADHA LEHUWEL-FEDLUL-MUBIN
27.17: WE HUSHIRA LISULEJMANE XHUNUDUHU MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI WET-TEJRI FEHUM JUZA’UN
27.18: HETTA ‘IDHA ‘ETEW ‘ALA WADI NEMLI KALET NEMLETUN JA ‘EJJUHA NEMLU EDHULU MESAKINEKUM LA JEHTIMENNEKUM SULEJMANU WE XHUNUDUHU WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
27.19: FETEBESSEME DAHIKËN MIN KAWLIHA WE KALE RABBI ‘EWZI’NI ‘EN ‘ESHKURA NI’METEKEL-LETI ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE WE ‘ALA WE E-DEJJE WE ‘EN ‘A’MELE SALIHËN TERDAHU WE ‘EDHILNI BIRAHMETIKE FI ‘IBADIKE SALIHIN
27.20: WE TEFEKKADET-TEJRA FEKALE MA LI LA ‘ERAL-HUD/HUDE ‘EM KANE MINEL-GA’IBIN
27.21: LE’U’ADHDHIBENNEHU ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN ‘EW LE’EDHBEHENNEHU ‘EW LEJE’TIJENI BISULTANIN MUBINI
27.22: FEMEKETHE GAJRA BA’IDIN FEKALE ‘EHETTU BIMA LEM TUHIT BIHI WE XHI’TUKE MIN SEBE’IIN BINEBE’IIN JEKINI
27.23: ‘INNI WE XHEDTTU EMRA’ETEN TEMLIKUHUM WE ‘UTIJET MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE LEHA ‘ARSHUN ‘ADHIMU
27.24: WE XHEDTUHA WE KAWMEHA JESXHUDUNE LILSHSHEMSI MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FESEDDEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI FEHUM LA JEHTEDUN
27.25: ‘ELLA JESXHUDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI JUHRIXHUL-HAB’E FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE JA’LEMU MA TUHFUNE WE MA TU’LINUN
27.28: EDH/HEB BIKITABI HADHA FE’ELKIH ‘ILEJHIM THUMME TEWELLE ‘ANHUM FANDHUR MADHA JERXHI’UN
27.30: ‘INNEHU MIN SULEJMANE WE ‘INNEHU BISMI ALLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM
27.32: KALET JA ‘EJJUHAL-MELE’U ‘EFTUNI FI ‘EMRI MA KUNTU KATI’ATEN ‘EMRËN HETTA TESH/HEDUN
27.33: KALU NEHNU ‘ULU KUWETIN WE ‘ULU BE’SIN SHEDIDIN WEL-’EMRU ‘ILEJKI FANDHURI MADHA TE’MURIN
27.34: KALET ‘INNEL-MULUKE ‘IDHA DEHALU KARJETEN ‘EFSEDUHA WE XHE’ALU ‘A’IZZETE ‘EHLIHA ‘EDHILLETEN WE KEDHELIKE JEF’ALUN
27.35: WE ‘INNI MURSILETUN ‘ILEJHIM BIHEDIJETIN FENADHIRATUN BIME JERXHI’UL-MURSELUN
27.36: FELEMMA XHA’E SULEJMANE KALE ‘ETUMIDDUNENI BIMALIN FEMA ‘ATANIJEL-LAHU HAJRUN MIMMA ‘ATAKUM BEL ‘ENTUM BIHEDIJETIKUM TEFRAHUN
27.37: ERXHI’ ‘ILEJHIM FELENE’TIJENNEHUM BIXHUNUDIN LA KIBELE LEHUM BIHA WE LENUHRIXHENNEHUM MINHA ‘EDHILLETEN WE HUM SAGIRUN
27.38: KALE JA ‘EJJUHAL-MELE’U ‘EJJUKUM JE’TINI BI’ARSHIHA KABLE ‘EN JE’TUNI MUSLIMIN
27.39: KALE ‘IFRJTUN MINEL-XHINNI ‘ENA ‘ATIKE BIHI KABLE ‘EN TEKUME MIN MEKAMIKE WE ‘INNI ‘ALEJHI LEKAWIJUN ‘EMINU
27.40: KALEL-LEDHI ‘INDEHU ‘ILMUN MINEL-KITABI ‘ENA ‘ATIKE BIHI KABLE ‘EN JERTEDDE ‘ILEJKE TERFUKE FELEMMA RA’AHU MUSTEKIRRËN ‘INDEHU KALE HADHA MIN FEDLI RABBI LIJEBLUWENI ‘E’ESHKURU ‘EM ‘EKFURU WE MEN SHEKERA FE’INNEMA JESHKURU LINEFSIHI WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNE RABBI GANIJUN KERIMU
27.41: KALE NEKKIRU LEHA ‘ARSHEHA NENDHUR ‘ETEHTEDI ‘EM TEKUNU MINEL-LEDHINE LA JEHTEDUN
27.42: FELEMMA XHA’ET KILE ‘EHEKEDHA ‘ARSHUKI KALET KE’ENNEHU HUWE WE ‘UTINAL-’ILME MIN KABLIHA WE KUNNA MUSLIMIN
27.43: WE SEDDEHA MA KANET TA’BUDU MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘INNEHA KANET MIN KAWMIN KAFIRIN
27.44: KILE LEHA EDHULI SERHE FELEMMA RA’ET/HU HESIBET/HU LUXHXHETEN WE KESHEFET ‘AN SAKAJHA KALE ‘INNEHU SERHUN MUMERRADUN MIN KAWARIRA KALET RABBI ‘INNI DHELEMTU NEFSI WE ‘ESLEMTU ME’A SULEJMANE LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
27.45: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN ‘ENI A’BUDU ELLAHE FE’IDHA HUM FERIKANI JEHTESIMUN
27.46: KALE JA KAWMI LIME TESTA’XHILUNE BIS-SEJJI’ETI KABLEL-HESENETI LEWLA TESTEGFIRUNEL-LAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
27.47: KALU ETTEJJERNA BIKE WE BIMEN ME’AKE KALE TA’IRUKUM ‘INDEL-LAHI BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN TUFTENUN
27.48: WE KANE FIL-MEDINETI TIS’ATU RAHTIN JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ERDI WE LA JUSLIHUN
27.49: KALU TEKASEMU BIL-LAHI LENUBEJJITENNEHU WE ‘EHLEHU THUMME LENEKULENNE LIWELIJIHI MA SHEHIDNA MEHLIKE ‘EHLIHI WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
27.50: WE MEKERU MEKRËN WE MEKERNA MEKRËN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
27.51: FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU MEKRIHIM ‘ENNA DEMMERNAHUM WE KAWMEHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
27.52: FETILKE BUJUTUHUM HAWIJETEN BIMA DHELEMU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
27.54: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘ETE’TUNEL-FAHISHETE WE ‘ENTUM TUBSIRUN
27.55: ‘E’INNEKUM LETE’TUNE ER-RIXHALE SHEHWETEN MIN DUNI NISA’ BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN TEXHHELUN
27.56: FEMA KANE XHEWABE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EHRIXHU ‘ALE LUTIN MIN KARJETIKUM ‘INNEHUM ‘UNASUN JETETEHHERUN
27.59: KULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI WE SELAMUN ‘ALA ‘IBADIHIL-LEDHINE ESTEFA ‘AALLLEHU HAJRUN ‘EMMA JUSHRIKUN
27.60: ‘EMMEN HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE ‘ENZELE LEKUM MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ENBETNA BIHI HEDA’IKA DHATE BEHXHETIN MA KANE LEKUM ‘EN TUNBITU SHEXHERAHA ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI BEL HUM KAWMUN JA’DILUN
27.61: ‘EMMEN XHE’ALEL-’ERDE KARARËN WE XHE’ALE HILALEHA ‘ENHARËN WE XHE’ALE LEHA RAWASIJE WE XHE’ALE BEJNEL-BEHRAJNI HAXHIZËN ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
27.62: ‘EMMEN JUXHIBUL-MUDTERRA ‘IDHA DA’AHU WE JEKSHIFU SU’E WE JEXH’ALUKUM HULEFA’EL-’ERDI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN
27.63: ‘EMMEN JEHDIKUM FI DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE MEN JURSILU ER-RIJAHE BUSHRËN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI TA’ALALLAHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
27.64: ‘EMMEN JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU WE MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI KUL HATU BURHANEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
27.65: KUL LA JA’LEMU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDIL-GAJBE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE MA JESH’URUNE ‘EJJANE JUB’ATHUN
27.66: BEL EDDARAKE ‘ILMUHUM FIL-’AHIRATI BEL HUM FI SHEKKIN MINHA BEL HUM MINHA ‘AMUN
27.67: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘ABA’UUNA ‘E’INNA LEMUHRAXHUN
27.68: LEKAD WU’IDNA HADHA NEHNU WE ‘ABA’UUNA MIN KABLU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
27.69: KUL SIRU FIL-’ERDI FANDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUXHRIMIN
27.70: WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA TEKUN FI DEJKIN MIMMA JEMKURUN
27.71: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
27.72: KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE RADIFE LEKUM BA’DUL-LEDHI TESTA’XHILUN
27.73: WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JESHKURUN
27.74: WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEJA’LEMU MA TUKINNU SUDURUHUM WE MA JU’LINUN
27.75: WE MA MIN GA’IBETIN FI SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
27.76: ‘INNE HADHAL-KUR’ANE JEKUSSU ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘EKTHERAL-LEDHI HUM FIHI JEHTELIFUN
27.78: ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM BIHUKMIHI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-’ALIM
27.80: ‘INNEKE LA TUSMI’UL-MEWTA WE LA TUSMI’U SUMME ED-DU’A’E ‘IDHA WE LLEW MUDBIRIN
27.81: WE MA ‘ENTE BIHADIL-’UMJI ‘AN DELALETIHIM ‘IN TUSMI’U ‘IL-LA MEN JU’UMINU BI’AJATINA FEHUM MUSLIMUN
27.82: WE ‘IDHA WEKA’AL-KAWLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘EHRAXHNA LEHUM DABBETEN MINEL-’ERDI TUKELLIMUHUM ‘ENNE NASE KANU BI’AJATINA LA JUKINUN
27.83: WE JEWME NEHSHURU MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN FEWXHËN MIMMEN JUKEDHDHIBU BI’AJATINA FEHUM JUZA’UN
27.84: HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’U KALE ‘EKEDHDHEBTUM BI’AJATI WE LEM TUHITU BIHA ‘ILMËN ‘EMMADHA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
27.85: WE WEKA’AL-KAWLU ‘ALEJHIM BIMA DHELEMU FEHUM LA JENTIKUN
27.86: ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ENNA XHE’ALNAL-LEJLE LIJESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
27.87: WE JEWME JUNFEHU FI SURI FEFEZI’A MEN FI SEMAWATI WE MEN FIL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’EL-LAHU WE KUL-LUN ‘ETEWHU DAHIRIN
27.88: WE TERAL-XHIBALE TEHSEBUHA XHAMIDETEN WE HIJE TEMURRU MERRA SEHABI SUN’A ALLAHIL-LEDHI ‘ETKANE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘INNEHU HABIRUN BIMA TEF’ALUN
27.89: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU HAJRUN MINHA WE HUM MIN FEZA’IN JEWME’IDHIN ‘AMINUN
27.90: WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FEKUBBET WUXHUHUHUM FI NARI HEL TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
27.91: ‘INNEMA ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘A’BUDE RABBE HEDHIHIL-BELDETIL-LEDHI HERRAMEHA WE LEHU KUL-LU SHEJ’IN WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MUSLIMIN
27.92: WE ‘EN ‘ETLUWEL-KUR’ANE FEMENI EHTEDA FE’INNEMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DEL-LE FEKUL ‘INNEMA ‘ENA MINEL-MUNDHIRIN
27.93: WE KULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI SEJURIKUM ‘AJATIHI FETA’RIFUNEHA WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN

28.3: NETLU ‘ALEJKE MIN NEBE’I MUSA WE FIR’AWNE BIL-HEKKI LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
28.4: ‘INNE FIR’AWNE ‘ALA FIL-’ERDI WE XHE’ALE ‘EHLEHA SHIJA’ËN JESTED’IFU TA’IFETEN MINHUM JUDHEBBIHU ‘EBNA’EHUM WE JESTEHJI NISA’EHUM ‘INNEHU KANE MINEL-MUFSIDIN
28.5: WE NURIDU ‘EN NEMUNNE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU FIL-’ERDI WE NEXH’ALEHUM ‘E’IMMETEN WE NEXH’ALEHUMUL-WARITHIN
28.6: WE NUMEKKINE LEHUM FIL-’ERDI WE NURIJE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE XHUNUDEHUMA MINHUM MA KANU JEHDHERUN
28.7: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA ‘UMMI MUSA ‘EN ‘ERDI’IHI FE’IDHA HIFTI ‘ALEJHI FE’ELKIHI FIL-JEMMI WE LA TEHAFI WE LA TEHZENI ‘INNA RADDUHU ‘ILEJKI WE XHA’ILUHU MINEL-MURSELIN
28.8: FALTEKATEHU ‘ALU FIR’AWNE LIJEKUNE LEHUM ‘ADUWËN WE HEZENËN ‘INNE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE XHUNUDEHUMA KANU HATI’IN
28.9: WE KALET EMRA’ETU FIR’AWNE KURRATU ‘AJNIN LI WE LEKE LA TEKTULUHU ‘ASA ‘EN JENFE’ANA ‘EW NETTEHIDHEHU WELEDËN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
28.10: WE ‘ESBEHE FU’UADU ‘UMMI MUSA FARIGËN ‘IN KADET LETUBDI BIHI LEWLA ‘EN RABETNA ‘ALA KALBIHA LITEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
28.11: WE KALET LI’HTIHI KUSSIHI FEBESURAT BIHI ‘AN XHUNUBIN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
28.12: WE HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIL-MERADI’A MIN KABLU FEKALET HEL ‘EDULLUKUM ‘ALA ‘EHLI BEJTIN JEKFULUNEHU LEKUM WE HUM LEHU NASIHUN
28.13: FERADEDNAHU ‘ILA ‘UMMIHI KEJ TEKARRA ‘AJNUHA WE LA TEHZENE WE LITA’LEME ‘ENNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
28.14: WE LEMMA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ESTEWA ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
28.15: WE DEHALEL-MEDINETE ‘ALA HINI GAFLETIN MIN ‘EHLIHA FEWEXHEDE FIHA RAXHULEJNI JEKTETILANI HADHA MIN SHI’ATIHI WE HEDHA MIN ‘ADUWIHI FASTEGATHEHUL-LEDHI MIN SHI’ATIHI ‘ALEL-LEDHI MIN ‘ADUWIHI FEWEKEZEHU MUSA FEKADA ‘ALEJHI KALE HADHA MIN ‘AMELI ESH-SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU ‘ADUWUN MUDILLUN MUBINU
28.16: KALE RABBI ‘INNI DHELEMTU NEFSI FAGFIR LI FEGAFERA LEHU ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
28.17: KALE RABBI BIMA ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE FELEN ‘EKUNE DHEHIRËN LILMUXHRIMIN
28.18: FE’ESBEHE FIL-MEDINETI HA’IFËN JETERAKKABU FE’IDHAL-LEDHI ESTENSERAHU BIL-’EMSI JESTESRIHUHU KALE LEHU MUSA ‘INNEKE LEGAWIJUN MUBINU
28.19: FELEMMA ‘EN ‘ERADE ‘EN JEBTISHE BIEL-LEDHI HUWE ‘ADUWUN LEHUMA KALE JA MUSA ‘ETURIDU ‘EN TEKTULENI KEMA KATELTE NEFSËN BIL-’EMSI ‘IN TURIDU ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE XHEBBARËN FIL-’ERDI WE MA TURIDU ‘EN TEKUNE MINEL-MUSLIHIN
28.20: WE XHA’E RAXHULUN MIN ‘EKSAL-MEDINETI JES’A KALE JA MUSA ‘INNEL-MELE’E JE’TEMIRUNE BIKE LIJEKTULUKE FAHRUXH ‘INNI LEKE MINE NASIHIN
28.21: FEHARAXHE MINHA HA’IFËN JETERAKKABU KALE RABBI NEXHXHINI MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
28.22: WE LEMMA TEWEXHXHEHE TILKA’E MEDJENE KALE ‘ASA RABBI ‘EN JEHDIJENI SEWA’E SEBI
28.23: WE LEMMA WERADE MA’E MEDJENE WEXHEDE ‘ALEJHI ‘UMMETEN MINE NASI JESKUNE WE WEXHEDE MIN DUNIHIMU EMRA’TEJNI TEDHUDANI KALE MA HATBUKUMA KALETA LA NESKI HETTA JUSDIRA ER-RI’A’U WE ‘EBUNA SHEJHUN KEBIRU
28.24: FESEKA LEHUMA THUMME TEWELLA ‘ILA EDH-DHILLI FEKALE RABBI ‘INNI LIMA ‘ENZELTE ‘ILEJJE MIN HAJRIN FEKIRU
28.25: FEXHA’ET/HU ‘IHDAHUMA TEMSHI ‘ALA ESTIHJA’IN KALET ‘INNE ‘EBI JED’UKE LIJEXHZIJEKE ‘EXHRA MA SEKAJTE LENA FELEMMA XHA’EHU WE KASSE ‘ALEJHIL-KASESE KALE LA TEHAF NEXHEWTE MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
28.26: KALET ‘IHDAHUMA JA ‘EBETI ESTE’XHIRHU ‘INNE HAJRA MENI ESTE’XHERTEL-KAWIJUL-’EMIN
28.27: KALE ‘INNI ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘UNKIHEKE ‘IHDA EBNETEJJE HATEJNI ‘ALA ‘EN TE’XHURANI THEMANIJETE HIXHEXHIN FE’IN ‘ETMEMTE ‘ASHRËN FEMIN ‘INDIKE WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘ESHUKKA ‘ALEJKE SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU MINE SALIHIN
28.28: KALE DHALIKE BEJNI WE BEJNEKE ‘EJJEMAL-’EXHELEJNI KADEJTU FELA ‘UDWANE ‘ALEJJE WEL-LAHU ‘ALA MA NEKULU WE KILU
28.29: FELEMMA KADA MUSAL-’EXHELE WE SARA BI’EHLIHI ‘ANESE MIN XHANIBIT-TURI NARËN KALE LI’HLIHI EMKUTHU ‘INNI ‘ANESTU NARËN LE’ALLI ‘ATIKUM MINHA BIHABERIN ‘EW XHEDHWETIN MINE NARI LE’AL-LEKUM TESTELUN
28.30: FELEMMA ‘ETAHA NUDI MIN SHATI’IL-WADIL-’EJMENI FIL-BUK’ATIL-MUBARAKETI MINE ESH-SHEXHERATI ‘EN JA MUSA ‘INNI ‘ENALLAHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
28.31: WE ‘EN ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FELEMMA RA’AHA TEHTEZZU KE’ENNEHA XHANNUN WELLA MUDBIRËN WE LEM JU’AKKIB JA MUSA ‘EKBIL WE LA TEHAF ‘INNEKE MINEL-’AMININ
28.32: ESLUK JEDEKE FI XHEJBIKE TEHRUXH BEJDA’E MIN GAJRI SU’IN WE EDMUM ‘ILEJKE XHENAHEKE MINE RAHBI FEDHANIKE BURHANANI MIN RABBIKE ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWMËN FASIKIN
28.33: KALE RABBI ‘INNI KATELTU MINHUM NEFSËN FE’EHAFU ‘EN JEKTULUN
28.34: WE ‘EHI HARUNU HUWE ‘EFSEHU MINNI LISANËN FE’ERSILHU MA’IJE RID’ËN JUSEDDIKUNI ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘EN JUKEDHDHIBUN
28.35: KALE SENESHUDDU ‘ADUDEKE BI’EHIKE WE NEXH’ALU LEKUMA SULTANËN FELA JESILUNE ‘ILEJKUMA BI’AJATINA ‘ENTUMA WE MENI ETTEBE’AKUMAL-GALIBUN
28.36: FELEMMA XHA’EHUM MUSA BI’AJATINA BEJJINATIN KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUFTERAN WE MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FI ‘ABA’INAL-’EWWELIN
28.37: WE KALE MUSA RABBI ‘A’LEMU BIMEN XHA’E BIL-HUDA MIN ‘INDIHI WE MEN TEKUNU LEHU ‘AKIBETU ED-DARI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
28.38: WE KALE FIR’AWNU JA ‘EJJUHAL-MELE’U MA ‘ALIMTU LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRI FE’EWKID LI JA HAMANU ‘ALAT-TINI FAXH’AL LI SERHËN LE’ALLI ‘ETTELI’U ‘ILA ‘ILEHI MUSA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUHU MINEL-KADHIBIN
28.39: WE ESTEKBERA HUWE WE XHUNUDUHU FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJNA LA JURXHA’UN
28.40: FE’EHADHNAHU WE XHUNUDEHU FENEBEDHNAHUM FIL-JEMMI FANDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU EDH-DHALIMIN
28.41: WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JED’UNE ‘ILA NARI WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI LA JUNSERUN
28.42: WE ‘ETBA’NAHUM FI HEDHIHI ED-DUNJA LA’NETEN WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI HUM MINEL-MEKBUHIN
28.43: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE MIN BA’DI MA ‘EHLEKNAL-KURUNEL-’ULA BESA’IRA LILNNASI WE HUDEN WE RAHMETEN LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.44: WE MA KUNTE BIXHANIBIL-GARBIJI ‘IDH KADEJNA ‘ILA MUSAL-’EMRA WE MA KUNTE MINE ESH-SHAHIDI
28.45: WE LEKINNA ‘ENSHE’NA KURUNËN FETETAWELE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’UMURU WE MA KUNTE THAWIËN FI ‘EHLI MEDJENE TETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATINA WE LEKINNA KUNNA MURSILIN
28.46: WE MA KUNTE BIXHANIBIT-TURI ‘IDH NADEJNA WE LEKIN RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE LITUNDHIRA KAWMËN MA ‘ETAHUM MIN NEDHIRIN MIN KABLIKE LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.47: WE LEWLA ‘EN TUSIBEHUM MUSIBETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM FEJEKULU RABBENA LEWLA ‘ERSELTE ‘ILEJNA RASULËN FENETTEBI’A ‘AJATIKE WE NEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
28.48: FELEMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU MIN ‘INDINA KALU LEWLA ‘UTIJE MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA ‘EWELEM JEKFURU BIMA ‘UTIJE MUSA MIN KABLU KALU SIHRANI TEDHAHERA WE KALU ‘INNA BIKUL-LIN KAFIRUN
28.49: KUL FE’TU BIKITABIN MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI HUWE ‘EHDA MINHUMA ‘ETTEBI’HU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
28.50: FE’IN LEM JESTEXHIBU LEKE FA’LEM ‘ENNEMA JETTEBI’UNE ‘EHWA’EHUM WE MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMENI ETTEBE’A HEWAHU BIGAJRI HUDEN MINEL-LAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
28.51: WE LEKAD WESSELNA LEHUMUL-KAWLE LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.52: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE MIN KABLIHI HUM BIHI JU’UMINUN
28.53: WE ‘IDHA JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM KALU ‘AMENNA BIHI ‘INNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBINA ‘INNA KUNNA MIN KABLIHI MUSLIMIN
28.54: ‘ULA’IKE JU’UTEWNE ‘EXHRAHUM MERRATEJNI BIMA SEBERU WE JEDRA’UNE BIL-HESENETI SEJJI’ETE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
28.55: WE ‘IDHA SEMI’UL-LEGWE ‘A’RADU ‘ANHU WE KALU LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM SELAMUN ‘ALEJKUM LA NEBTEGIL-XHAHILIN
28.56: ‘INNEKE LA TEHDI MEN ‘EHBEBTE WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTEDIN
28.57: WE KALU ‘IN NETTEBI’IL-HUDA ME’AKE NUTEHATTEF MIN ‘ERDINA ‘EWELEM NUMEKKIN LEHUM HERAMËN ‘AMINËN JUXHBA ‘ILEJHI THEMERATU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN RIZKËN MIN LEDUNNA WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
28.58: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN BETIRAT MA’ISHETEHA FETILKE MESAKINUHUM LEM TUSKEN MIN BA’DIHIM ‘IL-LA KALILËN WE KUNNA NEHNUL-WARITHIN
28.59: WE MA KANE RABBUKE MUHLIKEL-KURA HETTA JEB’ATHE FI ‘UMMIHA RASULËN JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATINA WE MA KUNNA MUHLIKIL-KURA ‘IL-LA WE ‘EHLUHA DHALIMUN
28.60: WE MA ‘UTITUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEMETA’UL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE ZINETUHA WE MA ‘INDEL-LAHI HAJRUN WE ‘EBKA ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
28.61: ‘EFEMEN WE’ADNAHU WA’DËN HESENËN FEHUWE LAKIHI KEMEN METTA’NAHU META’AL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA THUMME HUWE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI MINEL-MUHDERIN
28.62: WE JEWME JUNADIHIM FEJEKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
28.63: KALEL-LEDHINE HEKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU RABBENA HA’UULA’L-LEDHINE ‘EGWEJNA ‘EGWEJNAHUM KEMA GAWEJNA TEBERRA’NA ‘ILEJKE MA KANU ‘IJANA JA’BUDUN
28.64: WE KILE ED’U SHURAKA’EKUM FEDE’AWHUM FELEM JESTEXHIBU LEHUM WE RA’EWL-’ADHABE LEW ‘ENNEHUM KANU JEHTEDUN
28.67: FE’EMMA MEN TABE WE ‘AMENE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’ASA ‘EN JEKUNE MINEL-MUFLIHIN
28.68: WE RABBUKE JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U WE JEHTARU MA KANE LEHUMUL-HIJERATU SUBHANEL-LAHI WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
28.69: WE RABBUKE JA’LEMU MA TUKINNU SUDURUHUM WE MA JU’LINUN
28.70: WE HUWEL-LAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE LEHUL-HEMDU FIL-’ULA WEL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUL-HUKMU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
28.71: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN XHE’ALEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUMUL-LEJLE SERMEDËN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU ALLAHI JE’TIKUM BIDIJA’IN ‘EFELA TESMA’UN
28.72: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN XHE’ALEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUMU NEHARA SERMEDËN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU ALLAHI JE’TIKUM BILEJLIN TESKUNUNE FIHI ‘EFELA TUBSIRUN
28.73: WE MIN RAHMETIHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA LITESKUNU FIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
28.74: WE JEWME JUNADIHIM FEJEKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
28.75: WE NEZA’NA MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN FEKULNA HATU BURHANEKUM FE’ALIMU ‘ENNEL-HEKKA LIL-LAHI WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEFTERUN
28.76: ‘INNE KARUNE KANE MIN KAWMI MUSA FEBEGA ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ATEJNAHU MINEL-KUNUZI MA ‘INNE MEFATIHEHU LETENU’U BIL-’USBETI ‘ULIL-KUWETI ‘IDH KALE LEHU KAWMUHU LA TEFRAH ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-FERIHIN
28.77: WE EBTEGI FIMA ‘ATAKEL-LAHU ED-DARAL-’AHIRATE WE LA TENSE NESIBEKE MINE ED-DUNJA WE ‘EHSIN KEMA ‘EHSENEL-LAHU ‘ILEJKE WE LA TEBGIL-FESADE FIL-’ERDI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MUFSIDIN
28.78: KALE ‘INNEMA ‘UTITUHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN ‘INDI ‘EWELEM JA’LEM ‘ENNEL-LAHE KAD ‘EHLEKE MIN KABLIHI MINEL-KURUNI MEN HUWE ‘ESHEDDU MINHU KUWETEN WE ‘EKTHERU XHEM’ËN WE LA JUS’ELU ‘AN DHUNUBIHIMUL-MUXHRIMUN
28.79: FEHARAXHE ‘ALA KAWMIHI FI ZINETIHI KALEL-LEDHINE JURIDUNEL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJA JALEJTE LENA MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE KARUNU ‘INNEHU LEDHU HEDHDHIN ‘ADHIMI
28.80: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WEJLEKUM THEWABU ALLAHI HAJRUN LIMEN ‘AMENE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN WE LA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LA SABIRUN
28.81: FEHASEFNA BIHI WE BIDARIHIL-’ERDE FEMA KANE LEHU MIN FI’ETIN JENSURUNEHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE MA KANE MINEL-MUNTESIRIN
28.82: WE ‘ESBEHEL-LEDHINE TEMENNEW MEKANEHU BIL-’EMSI JEKULUNE WEJKE’ENNEL-LAHE JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE JEKDIRU LEWLA ‘EN MENNEL-LAHU ‘ALEJNA LEHASEFE BINA WEJKE’ENNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-KAFIRUN
28.83: TILKE ED-DARUL-’AHIRATU NEXH’ALUHA LIL-LEDHINE LA JURIDUNE ‘ULUWËN FIL-’ERDI WE LA FESADËN WEL-’AKIBETU LILMUTTEKIN
28.84: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU HAJRUN MINHA WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FELA JUXHZAL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SEJJI’ATI ‘IL-LA MA KANU JA’MELUN
28.85: ‘INNEL-LEDHI FERADE ‘ALEJKEL-KUR’ANE LERADDUKE ‘ILA MA’ADIN KUL RABBI ‘A’LEMU MEN XHA’E BIL-HUDA WE MEN HUWE FI DELALIN MUBINI
28.86: WE MA KUNTE TERXHU ‘EN JULKA ‘ILEJKEL-KITABU ‘IL-LA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE DHEHIRËN LILKAFIRIN
28.87: WE LA JESUDDUNNEKE ‘AN ‘AJATI ALLAHI BA’DE ‘IDH ‘UNZILET ‘ILEJKE WE ED’U ‘ILA RABBIKE WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
28.88: WE LA TED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN HALIKUN ‘IL-LA WEXHHEHU LEHUL-HUKMU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN

29.2: ‘EHESIBE NASU ‘EN JUTRAKU ‘EN JEKULU ‘AMENNA WE HUM LA JUFTENUN
29.3: WE LEKAD FETENNAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FELEJA’LEMENNEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE LEJA’LEMENNEL-KADHIBIN
29.4: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI ‘EN JESBIKUNA SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
29.5: MEN KANE JERXHU LIKA’EL-LAHI FE’INNE ‘EXHELEL-LAHI LE’ATIN WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
29.6: WE MEN XHAHEDE FE’INNEMA JUXHAHIDU LINEFSIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEGANIJUN ‘ANIL-’ALEMIN
29.7: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUKEFFIRANNE ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘EHSENEL-LEDHI KANU JA’MELUN
29.8: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWALIDEJHI HUSNËN WE ‘IN XHAHEDAKE LITUSHRIKE BI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN FELA TUTI’HUMA ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
29.9: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUDHILENNEHUM FI SALIHIN
29.10: WE MINE NASI MEN JEKULU ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI FE’IDHA ‘UDHIJE FI ALLAHI XHE’ALE FITNETE NASI KE’ADHABI ALLAHI WE LE’IN XHA’E NESRUN MIN RABBIKE LEJEKULUNNE ‘INNA KUNNA ME’AKUM ‘EWELEJSEL-LAHU BI’A’LEME BIMA FI SUDURIL-’ALEMIN
29.12: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEBI’U SEBILENA WE LNEHMIL HATAJAKUM WE MA HUM BIHAMILINE MIN HATAJAHUM MIN SHEJ’IN ‘INNEHUM LEKADHIBUN
29.13: WE LEJEHMILUNNE ‘ETHKALEHUM WE ‘ETHKALËN ME’A ‘ETHKALIHIM WE LEJUS’ELUNNE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘AMMA KANU JEFTERUN
29.14: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FELEBITHE FIHIM ‘ELFE SENETIN ‘IL-LA HAMSINE ‘AMËN FE’EHADHEHUMUT-TUFANU WE HUM DHALIMU
29.15: FE’ENXHEJNAHU WE ‘ESHABE SEFINETI WE XHE’ALNAHA ‘AJETEN LIL’ALEMIN
29.16: WE ‘IBRAHIME ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI A’BUDU ELLAHE WE ETTEKUHU DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
29.17: ‘INNEMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘EWTHANËN WE TEHLUKUNE ‘IFKËN ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI LA JEMLIKUNE LEKUM RIZKËN FABTEGU ‘INDEL-LAHI ER-RIZKA WE A’BUDUHU WE ESHKURU LEHU ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
29.18: WE ‘IN TUKEDHDHIBU FEKAD KEDHDHEBE ‘UMEMUN MIN KABLIKUM WE MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
29.19: ‘EWELEM JERAW KEJFE JUBDI’U ALLAHUL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
29.20: KUL SIRU FIL-’ERDI FANDHURU KEJFE BEDE’EL-HALKA THUMMEL-LAHU JUNSHI’U NESH’ETEL-’AHIRATE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
29.21: JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE JERHEMU MEN JESHA’U WE ‘ILEJHI TUKLEBUN
29.22: WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZINE FIL-’ERDI WE LA FI SEMA’I WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
29.23: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE LIKA’IHI ‘ULA’IKE JE’ISU MIN RAHMETI WE ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
29.24: FEMA KANE XHEWABE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU EKTULUHU ‘EW HERRIKUHU FE’ENXHAHU ALLAHU MINE NARI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
29.25: WE KALE ‘INNEMA ETTEHADHTUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘EWTHANËN MEWEDDETE BEJNIKUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA THUMME JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JEKFURU BA’DUKUM BIBA’DIN WE JEL’ANU BA’DUKUM BA’DËN WE ME’WAKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN NASIRIN
29.26: FE’AMENE LEHU LUTUN WE KALE ‘INNI MUHAXHIRUN ‘ILA RABBI ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
29.27: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WE XHE’ALNA FI DHURRIJETIHI NUBUWETE WEL-KITABE WE ‘ATEJNAHU ‘EXHRAHU FI ED-DUNJA WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHI
29.28: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘INNEKUM LETE’TUNEL-FAHISHETE MA SEBEKAKUM BIHA MIN ‘EHEDIN MINEL-’ALEMIN
29.29: ‘E’INNEKUM LETE’TUNE ER-RIXHALE WE TEKTA’UNE SEBILE WE TE’TUNE FI NADIKUMUL-MUNKERA FEMA KANE XHEWABE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU E’TINA BI’ADHABI ALLAHI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
29.31: WE LEMMA XHA’ET RUSULUNA ‘IBRAHIME BIL-BUSHRA KALU ‘INNA MUHLIKU ‘EHLI HEDHIHIL-KARJETI ‘INNE ‘EHLEHA KANU DHALIMIN
29.32: KALE ‘INNE FIHA LUTËN KALU NEHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMEN FIHA LENUNEXHXHIJENNEHU WE ‘EHLEHU ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEHU KANET MINEL-GABIRI
29.33: WE LEMMA ‘EN XHA’ET RUSULUNA LUTËN SI’E BIHIM WE DAKA BIHIM DHER’ËN WE KALU LA TEHAF WE LA TEHZEN ‘INNA MUNEXHXHUKE WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEKE KANET MINEL-GABIRIN
29.34: ‘INNA MUNZILUNE ‘ALA ‘EHLI HEDHIHIL-KARJETI RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KANU JEFSUKUN
29.35: WE LEKAD TERAKNA MINHA ‘AJETEN BEJJINETEN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
29.36: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU ELLAHE WE ERXHUL-JEWMEL-’AHIRA WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ERDI MUFSIDI
29.37: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
29.38: WE ‘ADËN WE THEMUDE WE KAD TEBEJJENE LEKUM MIN MESAKINIHIM WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FESEDDEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI WE KANU MUSTEBSIRIN
29.39: WE KARUNE WE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MUSA BIL-BEJJINATI FASTEKBERU FIL-’ERDI WE MA KANU SABIKIN
29.40: FEKULLËN ‘EHADHNA BIDHENBIHI FEMINHUM MEN ‘ERSELNA ‘ALEJHI HASIBËN WE MINHUM MEN ‘EHADHET/HU SEJHETU WE MINHUM MEN HASEFNA BIHIL-’ERDE WE MINHUM MEN ‘EGRAKNA WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
29.41: METHELUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘EWLIJA’E KEMETHELIL-’ANKEBUTI ETTEHADHET BEJTËN WE ‘INNE ‘EWHENEL-BUJUTI LEBEJTUL-’ANKEBUTI LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
29.42: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
29.43: WE TILKEL-’EMTHALU NEDRIBUHA LILNNASI WE MA JA’KILUHA ‘IL-LAL-’ALIMUN
29.44: HALEKAL-LAHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LILMU’UMININ
29.45: ETLU MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MINEL-KITABI WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE ‘INNE SELËTE TENHA ‘ANIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WE LEDHIKRU ALLAHI ‘EKBERU WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA TESNA’UN
29.46: WE LA TUXHADILU ‘EHLEL-KITABI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM WE KULU ‘AMENNA BIEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ILEHUNA WE ‘ILEHUKUM WAHIDUN WE NEHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
29.47: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKEL-KITABE FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MIN HA’UULA’ MEN JU’UMINU BIHI WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LAL-KAFIRUN
29.48: WE MA KUNTE TETLU MIN KABLIHI MIN KITABIN WE LA TEHUTTUHU BIJEMINIKE ‘IDHËN LARTABEL-MUBTILUN
29.49: BEL HUWE ‘AJATUN BEJJINATUN FI SUDURIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LA EDH-DHALIMUN
29.50: WE KALU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJATUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNEMAL-’AJATU ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘INNEMA ‘ENA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
29.51: ‘EWELEM JEKFIHIM ‘ENNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LERAHMETEN WE DHIKRA LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
29.52: KUL KEFA BIL-LAHI BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM SHEHIDËN JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-BATILI WE KEFERU BIL-LAHI ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
29.53: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE LEWLA ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN LEXHA’EHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LEJE’TIJENNEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
29.54: JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE ‘INNE XHEHENNEME LEMUHITETUN BIL-KAFIRIN
29.55: JEWME JEGSHAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN FEWKIHIM WE MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIHIM WE JEKULU DHUKU MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
29.58: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUBEWWI’ENNEHUM MINEL-XHENNETI GURAFËN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA NI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
29.60: WE KE’EJJIN MIN DABBETIN LA TEHMILU RIZKAHALLAHU JERZUKUHA WE ‘IJAKUM WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
29.61: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE SEHHARA ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA LEJEKULUNNEL-LAHU FE’ENNA JU’UFEKUN
29.62: ALLAHU JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE JEKDIRU LEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
29.63: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN NEZZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDE MIN BA’DI MEWTIHA LEJEKULUNNEL-LAHU KULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’KILUN
29.64: WE MA HEDHIHIL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA ‘IL-LA LEHWUN WE LA’IBUN WE ‘INNE ED-DARAL-’AHIRATE LEHIJEL-HEJEWANU LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
29.65: FE’IDHA RAKIBU FIL-FULKI DE’AW ELLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINE FELEMMA NEXHXHAHUM ‘ILAL-BERRI ‘IDHA HUM JUSHRIKUN
29.66: LIJEKFURU BIMA ‘ATEJNAHUM WE LIJETEMETTA’U FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
29.67: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA XHE’ALNA HERAMËN ‘AMINËN WE JUTEHATTEFU NASU MIN HEWLIHIM ‘EFEBIALBATILI JU’UMINUNE WE BINI’METI ALLAHI JEKFURUN
29.68: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BIL-HEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHU ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILKAFIRIN
29.69: WEL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU FINA LENEHDIJENNEHUM SUBULENA WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEME’AL-MUHSININ

30.3: FI ‘EDNAL-’ERDI WE HUM MIN BA’DI GALEBIHIM SEJEGLIBUN
30.4: FI BID’I SININE LIL-LAHIL-’EMRU MIN KABLU WE MIN BA’DU WE JEWME’IDHIN JEFRAHUL-MU’UMINUN
30.5: BINESRI ALLAHI JENSURU MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’AZIZU RAHIM
30.6: WA’DEL-LAHI LA JUHLIFU ALLAHU WA’DEHU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
30.7: JA’LEMUNE DHAHIRËN MINEL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE HUM ‘ANIL-’AHIRATI HUM GAFILUN
30.8: ‘EWELEM JETEFEKKERU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM MA HALEKAL-LAHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINE NASI BILIKA’I RABBIHIM LEKAFIRUN
30.9: ‘EWELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KANU ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE ‘ETHARUL-’ERDE WE ‘AMERUHA ‘EKTHERA MIMMA ‘AMERUHA WE XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEMA KANEL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LEKIN KANU ‘ENFUSEHUM JEDHLIMUN
30.10: THUMME KANE ‘AKIBETEL-LEDHINE ‘ESA’U SU’A ‘EN KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE KANU BIHA JESTEHZI’U
30.11: ALLAHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
30.13: WE LEM JEKUN LEHUM MIN SHURAKA’IHIM SHUFA’A’U WE KANU BISHURAKA’IHIM KAFIRIN
30.14: WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JEWME’IDHIN JETEFERRAKUN
30.15: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEHUM FI RAWDETIN JUHBERUN
30.16: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE LIKA’IL-’AHIRATI FE’ULA’IKE FIL-’ADHABI MUHDERUN
30.17: FESUBHANEL-LAHI HINE TUMSUNE WE HINE TUSBIHUN
30.18: WE LEHUL-HEMDU FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘ASHIJËN WE HINE TUDHHIRUN
30.19: JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE JUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE JUHJIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA WE KEDHELIKE TUHRAXHUN
30.20: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME ‘IDHA ‘ENTUM BESHERUN TENTESHIRUN
30.21: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN HALEKA LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWAXHËN LITESKUNU ‘ILEJHA WE XHE’ALE BEJNEKUM MEWEDDETEN WE RAHMETEN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
30.22: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI HALKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE EHTILAFU ‘ELSINETIKUM WE ‘ELWANIKUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIL’ALIMIN
30.23: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI MENAMUKUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE EBTIGA’UUKUM MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
30.24: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI JURIKUMUL-BERKA HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE JUNEZZILU MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FEJUHJI BIHIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
30.25: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN TEKUME SEMA’U WEL-’ERDU BI’EMRIHI THUMME ‘IDHA DA’AKUM DA’WETEN MINEL-’ERDI ‘IDHA ‘ENTUM TEHRUXHUN
30.26: WE LEHU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KUL-LUN LEHU KANITUN
30.27: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU WE HUWE ‘EHWENU ‘ALEJHI WE LEHUL-METHELUL-’A’LA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
30.28: DERABE LEKUM METHELËN MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM HEL LEKUM MIN MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM MIN SHURAKA’E FI MA RAZEKNAKUM FE’ENTUM FIHI SEWA’UN TEHAFUNEHUM KEHIFETIKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
30.29: BEL ETTEBE’AL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘EHWA’EHUM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN FEMEN JEHDI MEN ‘EDEL-LEL-LAHU WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
30.30: FE’EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINI HENIFËN FITRATEL-LAHI EL-LETI FETERA NASE ‘ALEJHA LA TEBDILE LIHALKI ALLAHI DHALIKE ED-DINUL-KAJJIMU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
30.31: MUNIBINE ‘ILEJHI WE ETTEKUHU WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE LA TEKUNU MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
30.32: MINEL-LEDHINE FERRAKU DINEHUM WE KANU SHIJA’ËN KUL-LU HIZBIN BIMA LEDEJHIM FERIHUN
30.33: WE ‘IDHA MESSE NASE DURRUN DE’AW RABBEHUM MUNIBINE ‘ILEJHI THUMME ‘IDHA ‘EDHAKAHUM MINHU RAHMETEN ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM BIRABBIHIM JUSHRIKUN
30.35: ‘EM ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHIM SULTANËN FEHUWE JETEKELLEMU BIMA KANU BIHI JUSHRIKUN
30.36: WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNA NASE RAHMETEN FERIHU BIHA WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM ‘IDHA HUM JEKNETUN
30.37: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNEL-LAHE JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
30.38: FE’ATI DHAL-KURBA HEKKAHU WEL-MISKINE WE EBNE SEBILI DHALIKE HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JURIDUNE WEXHHEL-LAHI WE ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
30.39: WE MA ‘ATEJTUM MIN RIBËN LIJERBUWA FI ‘EMWALI NASI FELA JERBU ‘INDEL-LAHI WE MA ‘ATEJTUM MIN ZEKËTIN TURIDUNE WEXHHEL-LAHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUD’IFUN
30.40: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM THUMME RAZEKAKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JUHJIKUM HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEF’ALU MIN DHALIKUM MIN SHEJ’IN SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
30.41: DHEHERAL-FESADU FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI BIMA KESEBET ‘EJDI NASI LIJUDHIKAHUM BA’DEL-LEDHI ‘AMILU LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
30.42: KUL SIRU FIL-’ERDI FANDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLU KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MUSHRIKIN
30.43: FE’EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINIL-KAJJIMI MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA MERADDE LEHU MINEL-LAHI JEWME’IDHIN JESSEDDA’UN
30.44: MEN KEFERA FE’ALEJHI KUFRUHU WE MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELI’ENFUSIHIM JEMHEDUN
30.45: LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-KAFIRIN
30.46: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN JURSILE ER-RIJAHE MUBESHSHIRATIN WE LIJUDHIKAKUM MIN RAHMETIHI WE LITEXHRIJEL-FULKU BI’EMRIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
30.47: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE RUSULËN ‘ILA KAWMIHIM FEXHA’UHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FANTEKAMNA MINEL-LEDHINE ‘EXHRAMU WE KANE HEKKËN ‘ALEJNA NESRUL-MU’UMININ
30.48: ALLAHUL-LEDHI JURSILU ER-RIJAHE FETUTHIRU SEHABËN FEJEBSUTUHU FI SEMA’I KEJFE JESHA’U WE JEXH’ALUHU KISEFËN FETERAL-WEDKA JEHRUXHU MIN HILALIHI FE’IDHA ‘ESABE BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI ‘IDHA HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
30.49: WE ‘IN KANU MIN KABLI ‘EN JUNEZZELE ‘ALEJHIM MIN KABLIHI LEMUBLISIN
30.50: FANDHUR ‘ILA ‘ATHARI RAHMETI ALLAHI KEJFE JUHJIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE DHALIKE LEMUHJIL-MEWTA WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
30.51: WE LE’IN ‘ERSELNA RIHËN FERA’EWHU MUSFERRËN LEDHELLU MIN BA’DIHI JEKFURUN
30.52: FE’INNEKE LA TUSMI’UL-MEWTA WE LA TUSMI’U SUMME ED-DU’A’E ‘IDHA WE LLEW MUDBIRIN
30.53: WE MA ‘ENTE BIHADIL-’UMJI ‘AN DELALETIHIM ‘IN TUSMI’U ‘IL-LA MEN JU’UMINU BI’AJATINA FEHUM MUSLIMU
30.54: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN DA’FIN THUMME XHE’ALE MIN BA’DI DA’FIN KUWETEN THUMME XHE’ALE MIN BA’DI KUWETIN DA’FËN WE SHEJBETEN JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’ALIMUL-KADIR
30.55: WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JUKSIMUL-MUXHRIMUNE MA LEBITHU GAJRA SA’ATIN KEDHALIKE KANU JU’UFEKUN
30.56: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WEL-’IMANE LEKAD LEBITHTUM FI KITABI ALLAHI ‘ILA JEWMIL-BA’THI FEHEDHA JEWMUL-BA’THI WE LEKINNEKUM KUNTUM LA TA’LEMUN
30.57: FEJEWME’IDHIN LA JENFA’UL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA’DHIRATUHUM WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
30.58: WE LEKAD DERABNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN WE LE’IN XHI’TEHUM BI’AJETIN LEJEKULENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA MUBTILUN
30.59: KEDHALIKE JETBA’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
30.60: FASBIR ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE LA JESTEHIFFENNEKEL-LEDHINE LA JUKINUN

31.4: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
31.6: WE MINE NASI MEN JESHTERI LEHWEL-HEDITHI LIJUDILLE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE JETTEHIDHEHA HUZUEN ‘ULE’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
31.7: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHI ‘AJATUNA WELLA MUSTEKBIRËN KE’EN LEM JESMA’HA KE’ENNE FI ‘UDHUNEJHI WEKRËN FEBESHSHIRHU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
31.9: HALIDINE FIHA WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKËN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
31.10: HALEKA SEMAWATI BIGAJRI ‘AMEDIN TERAWNEHA WE ‘ELKA FIL-’ERDI RAWASIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIKUM WE BETHTHE FIHA MIN KUL-LI DABBETIN WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ENBETNA FIHA MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN KERIMI
31.11: HADHA HALKU ALLAHI FE’ERUNI MADHA HALEKAL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI BELI EDH-DHALIMUNE FI DELALIN MUBINI
31.12: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA LUKMANEL-HIKMETE ‘ENI ESHKUR LIL-LAHI WE MEN JESHKUR FE’INNEMA JESHKURU LINEFSIHI WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN HEMIDU
31.13: WE ‘IDH KALE LUKMANU LIABNIHI WE HUWE JA’IDHUHU JA BUNEJJE LA TUSHRIK BIL-LAHI ‘INNE ESH-SHIRKE LEDHULMUN ‘ADHIMU
31.14: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWALIDEJHI HEMELET/HU ‘UMMUHU WEHNËN ‘ALA WEHNIN WE FISALUHU FI ‘AMEJNI ‘ENI ESHKUR LI WE LIWALIDEJKE ‘ILEJJEL-MESIR
31.15: WE ‘IN XHAHEDAKE ‘ALA ‘EN TUSHRIKE BI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN FELA TUTI’HUMA WE SAHIBHUMA FI ED-DUNJA MA’RUFËN WE ETTEBI’ SEBILE MEN ‘ENABE ‘ILEJJE THUMME ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
31.16: JA BUNEJJE ‘INNEHA ‘IN TEKUN MITHKALE HEBBETIN MIN HARDELIN FETEKUN FI SEHRATIN ‘EW FI SEMAWATI ‘EW FIL-’ERDI JE’TI BIHALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LETIFUN HABIRU
31.17: JA BUNEJJE ‘EKIMI SELËTE WE ‘MUR BIL-MA’RUFI WE ENHE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE ESBIR ‘ALA MA ‘ESABEKE ‘INNE DHALIKE MIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
31.18: WE LA TUSA’’IR HADDEKE LILNNASI WE LA TEMSHI FIL-’ERDI MERAHËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE MUHTALIN FEHURI
31.19: WAKSID FI MESHJIKE WE EGDUD MIN SEWTIKE ‘INNE ‘ENKERAL-’ESWATI LESEWTUL-HEMIR
31.20: ‘ELEM TERAW ‘ENNEL-LAHE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ESBEGA ‘ALEJKUM NI’AMEHU DHAHIRATEN WE BATINETEN WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI ALLAHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE LA HUDEN WE LA KITABIN MUNIRI
31.21: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUMU ETTEBI’U MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU KALU BEL NETTEBI’U MA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABA’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE ESH-SHEJTANU JED’UHUM ‘ILA ‘ADHABI SA’IR
31.22: WE MEN JUSLIM WEXHHEHU ‘ILA ALLAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN FEKADI ESTEMSEKE BIL-’URWETIL-WUTHKA WE ‘ILA ALLAHI ‘AKIBETUL-’UMUR
31.23: WE MEN KEFERA FELA JEHZUNKE KUFRUHU ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM FENUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
31.25: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE LEJEKULUNNEL-LAHU KULIL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
31.26: LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
31.27: WE LEW ‘ENNEMA FIL-’ERDI MIN SHEXHERATIN ‘EKLAMUN WEL-BEHRU JEMUDDUHU MIN BA’DIHI SEB’ATU ‘EBHURIN MA NEFIDET KELIMATU ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
31.28: MA HALKUKUM WE LA BA’THUKUM ‘IL-LA KENEFSIN WAHIDETIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
31.29: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
31.30: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNE MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHIL-BATILU WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
31.31: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-FULKE TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BINI’METI ALLAHI LIJURIJEKUM MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBARIN SHEKURI
31.32: WE ‘IDHA GASHIJEHUM MEWXHUN KALDHDHULELI DE’AW ELLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINE FELEMMA NEXHXHAHUM ‘ILAL-BERRI FEMINHUM MUKTESIDUN WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LA KUL-LU HATTARIN KEFURI
31.33: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUM WE EHSHEW JEWMËN LA JEXHZI WE E-DUN ‘AN WELEDIHI WE LA MEWLUDUN HUWE XHAZIN ‘AN WE E-DIHI SHEJ’ËN ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN FELA TEGURRANNEKUMUL-HEJA ETU ED-DUNJA WE LA JEGURRANNEKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
31.34: ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘INDEHU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE JUNEZZILUL-GAJTHE WE JA’LEMU MA FIL-’ERHAMI WE MA TEDRI NEFSUN MADHA TEKSIBU GADËN WE MA TEDRI NEFSUN BI’EJJI ‘ERDIN TEMUTU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HABIRU

32.2: TENZILUL-KITABI LA RAJBE FIHI MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
32.3: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERAHU BEL HUWEL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE LITUNDHIRA KAWMËN MA ‘ETAHUM MIN NEDHIRIN MIN KABLIKE LE’ALLEHUM JEHTEDUN
32.4: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI MA LEKUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA SHEFI’IN ‘EFELA TETEDHEKKERUN
32.5: JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA MINE SEMA’I ‘ILAL-’ERDI THUMME JA’RUXHU ‘ILEJHI FI JEWMIN KANE MIKDARUHU ‘ELFE SENETIN MIMMA TA’UDDUN
32.7: EL-LEDHI ‘EHSENE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN HALEKAHU WE BEDE’E HALKAL-’INSANI MIN TINI
32.8: THUMME XHE’ALE NESLEHU MIN SULALETIN MIN MA’IN MEHINI
32.9: THUMME SEWWAHU WE NEFEHA FIHI MIN RUHIHI WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
32.10: WE KALU ‘E’IDHA DELELNA FIL-’ERDI ‘E’INNA LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDIN BEL HUM BILIKA’I RABBIHIM KAFIRUN
32.11: KUL JETEWEFFAKUM MELEKUL-MEWTIL-LEDHI WUKKILE BIKUM THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM TURXHA’UN
32.12: WE LEW TERA ‘IDHIL-MUXHRIMUNE NAKISU RU’USIHIM ‘INDE RABBIHIM RABBENA ‘EBSERNA WE SEMI’NA FARXHI’NA NA’MEL SALIHËN ‘INNA MUKINUN
32.13: WE LEW SHI’NA LE’ATEJNA KUL-LE NEFSIN HUDAHA WE LEKIN HEKKAL-KAWLU MINNI LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINEL-XHINNETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
32.14: FEDHUKU BIMA NESITUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA ‘INNA NESINAKUM WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HULDI BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
32.15: ‘INNEMA JU’UMINU BI’AJATINAL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKKIRU BIHA HARRU SUXHXHEDËN WE SEBBEHU BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE HUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
32.16: TETEXHAFA XHUNUBUHUM ‘ANIL-MEDAXHI’I JED’UNE RABBEHUM HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
32.17: FELA TA’LEMU NEFSUN MA ‘UHFIJE LEHUM MIN KURRATI ‘A’JUNIN XHEZA’EN BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
32.18: ‘EFEMEN KANE MU’UMINËN KEMEN KANE FASIKËN LA JESTEWUN
32.19: ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FELEHUM XHENNATUL-ME’WA NUZULËN BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
32.20: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE FESEKU FEME’WAHUMU NARU KUL-LEMA ‘ERADU ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINHA ‘U’IDU FIHA WE KILE LEHUM DHUKU ‘ADHABE NARIL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TUKEDHDHIBUN
32.21: WE LENUDHIKANNEHUM MINEL-’ADHABIL-’EDNA DUNEL-’ADHABIL-’EKBERI LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
