32.22: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN DHUKKIRA BI’AJATI RABBIHI THUMME ‘A’RADE ‘ANHA ‘INNA MINEL-MUXHRIMINE MUNTEKIMUN
32.23: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FELA TEKUN FI MIRJETIN MIN LIKA’IHI WE XHE’ALNAHU HUDEN LIBENI ‘ISRA’IL
32.24: WE XHE’ALNA MINHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JEHDUNE BI’EMRINA LEMMA SEBERU WE KANU BI’AJATINA JUKINUN
32.25: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE JEFSILU BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
32.26: ‘EWELEM JEHDI LEHUM KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-KURUNI JEMSHUNE FI MESAKINIHIM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN ‘EFELA JESMA’UN
32.27: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA NESUKUL-MA’E ‘ILAL-’ERDIL-XHURUZI FENUHRIXHU BIHI ZER’ËN TE’KULU MINHU ‘EN’AMUHUM WE ‘ENFUSUHUM ‘EFELA JUBSIRUN
32.28: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-FETHU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
32.29: KUL JEWMEL-FETHI LA JENFA’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IMANUHUM WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN

33.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ETTEKI ELLAHE WE LA TUTI’IL-KAFIRINE WEL-MUNAFIKINE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
33.2: WE ETTEBI’ MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRË
33.3: WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WE KILË
33.4: MA XHE’ALEL-LAHU LIRAXHULIN MIN KALBEJNI FI XHEWFIHI WE MA XHE’ALE ‘EZWAXHEKUMUL-LA’I TUDHAHIRUNE MINHUNNE ‘UMMEHATIKUM WE MA XHE’ALE ‘ED’IJA’EKUM ‘EBNA’EKUM DHALIKUM KAWLUKUM BI’EFWAHIKUM WEL-LAHU JEKULUL-HEKKA WE HUWE JEHDI SEBIL
33.5: ED’UHUM LI’EBA’IHIM HUWE ‘EKSETU ‘INDEL-LAHI FE’IN LEM TA’LEMU ‘ABA’EHUM FE’IHWANUKUM FI ED-DINI WE MEWALIKUM WE LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN FIMA ‘EHTE’TUM BIHI WE LEKIN MA TE’AMMEDET KULUBUKUM WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
33.6: NEBIJU ‘EWLA BIL-MU’UMININE MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘EZWAXHUHU ‘UMMEHATUHUM WE ‘ULUL-’ERHAMI BA’DUHUM ‘EWLA BIBA’DIN FI KITABI ALLAHI MINEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MUHAXHIRINE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEF’ALU ‘ILA ‘EWLIJA’IKUM MA’RUFËN KANE DHALIKE FIL-KITABI MESTURË
33.7: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MINE NEBIJINE MITHAKAHUM WE MINKE WE MIN NUHIN WE ‘IBRAHIME WE MUSA WE ‘ISA EBNI MERJEME WE ‘EHADHNA MINHUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
33.9: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH XHA’ETKUM XHUNUDUN FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN WE XHUNUDËN LEM TERAWHA WE KANEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRË
33.10: ‘IDH XHA’UKUM MIN FEWKIKUM WE MIN ‘ESFELE MINKUM WE ‘IDH ZAGATIL-’EBSARU WE BELEGATIL-KULUBUL-HENAXHIRA WE TEDHUNNUNE BIL-LAHI EDH-DHUNUN
33.11: HUNALIKE EBTULIJEL-MU’UMINUNE WE ZULZILU ZILZALËN SHEDIDË
33.12: WE ‘IDH JEKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN MA WE’ADENALLAHU WE RASULUHU ‘IL-LA GURURË
33.13: WE ‘IDH KALET TA’IFETUN MINHUM JA ‘EHLE JETHRIBE LA MUKAME LEKUM FARXHI’U WE JESTE’DHINU FERIKUN MINHUMU NEBIJE JEKULUNE ‘INNE BUJUTENA ‘AWRATUN WE MA HIJE BI’AWRATIN ‘IN JURIDUNE ‘IL-LA FIRARË
33.14: WE LEW DUHILET ‘ALEJHIM MIN ‘EKTARIHA THUMME SU’ILUL-FITNETE LE’ATEWHA WE MA TELEBBETHU BIHA ‘IL-LA JESIRË
33.15: WE LEKAD KANU ‘AHEDU ELLAHE MIN KABLU LA JUWELLUNEL-’EDBARA WE KANE ‘AHDU ALLAHI MES’ULË
33.16: KUL LEN JENFE’AKUMUL-FIRARU ‘IN FERARTUM MINEL-MEWTI ‘EWIL-KATLI WE ‘IDHËN LA TUMETTA’UNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.17: KUL MEN DHAL-LEDHI JA’SIMUKUM MINEL-LAHI ‘IN ‘ERADE BIKUM SU’ËN ‘EW ‘ERADE BIKUM RAHMETEN WE LA JEXHIDUNE LEHUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
33.18: KAD JA’LEMU ALLAHUL-MU’AWWIKINE MINKUM WEL-KA’ILINE LI’IHWANIHIM HELUMME ‘ILEJNA WE LA JE’TUNEL-BE’SE ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.19: ‘ESHIHHETEN ‘ALEJKUM FE’IDHA XHA’EL-HAWFU RA’EJTEHUM JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE TEDURU ‘A’JUNUHUM KAL-LEDHI JUGSHA ‘ALEJHI MINEL-MEWTI FE’IDHA DHEHEBEL-HAWFU SELEKUKUM BI’ELSINETIN HIDADIN ‘ESHIHHETEN ‘ALEL-HAJRI ‘ULA’IKE LEM JU’UMINU FE’EHBETEL-LAHU ‘A’MALEHUM WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRË
33.20: JEHSEBUNEL-’EHZABE LEM JEDH/HEBU WE ‘IN JE’TIL-’EHZABU JEWEDDU LEW ‘ENNEHUM BADUNE FIL-’A’RABI JES’ELUNE ‘AN ‘ENBA’IKUM WE LEW KANU FIKUM MA KATELU ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.21: LEKAD KANE LEKUM FI RASULI ALLAHI ‘USWETUN HESENETUN LIMEN KANE JERXHU ELLAHE WEL-JEWMEL-’AHIRA WE DHEKERAL-LAHE KETHIRË
33.22: WE LEMMA RA’AL-MU’UMINUNEL-’EHZABE KALU HADHA MA WE’ADENALLAHU WE RASULUHU WE SEDEKAL-LAHU WE RASULUHU WE MA ZADEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘IMANËN WE TESLIMË
33.23: MINEL-MU’UMININE RIXHALUN SEDEKU MA ‘AHEDU ELLAHE ‘ALEJHI FEMINHUM MEN KADA NEHBEHU WE MINHUM MEN JENTEDHIRU WE MA BEDDELU TEBDILË
33.24: LIJEXHZIJEL-LAHU SADIKINE BISIDKIHIM WE JU’ADHDHIBEL-MUNAFIKINE ‘IN SHA’E ‘EW JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURËN RAHIMË
33.25: WERADDEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIGAJDHIHIM LEM JENALU HAJRËN WE KEFALLAHUL-MU’UMININEL-KITALE WE KANEL-LAHU KAWIJËN ‘AZIZË
33.26: WE ‘ENZELEL-LEDHINE DHAHERUHUM MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MIN SEJASIHIM WE KADHEFE FI KULUBIHIMU ER-RU’BE FERIKËN TEKTULUNE WE TE’SIRUNE FERIKË
33.27: WE ‘EWRATHEKUM ‘ERDEHUM WE DIJARAHUM WE ‘EMWALEHUM WE ‘ERDËN LEM TETE’UHA WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRË
33.28: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LI’ZWAXHIKE ‘IN KUNTUNNE TURIDNEL-HEJA ETE ED-DUNJA WE ZINETEHA FETA’ALEJNE ‘UMETTI’KUNNE WE ‘USERRIHKUNNE SERAHËN XHEMILË
33.29: WE ‘IN KUNTUNNE TURIDNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU WE ED-DARAL-’AHIRATE FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘E’ADDE LILMUHSINATI MINKUNNE ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
33.30: JA NISA’E NEBIJI MEN JE’TI MINKUNNE BIFAHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN JUDA’AF LEHAL-’ADHABU DI’FEJNI WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRË
33.31: WE MEN JEKNUT MINKUNNE LIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TA’MEL SALIHËN NU’UTIHA ‘EXHRAHA MERRATEJNI WE ‘A’TEDNA LEHA RIZKËN KERIMË
33.32: JA NISA’E NEBIJI LESTUNNE KE’EHEDIN MINE NISA’ ‘INI ETTEKAJTUNNE FELA TEHDA’NE BIL-KAWLI FEJETME’AL-LEDHI FI KALBIHI MERADUN WE KULNE KAWLËN MA’RUFË
33.33: WE KARNE FI BUJUTIKUNNE WE LA TEBERRAXHNE TEBERRUXHEL-XHAHILIJETIL-’ULA WE ‘EKIMNE SELËTE WE ‘ATINE EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’NEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU ‘INNEMA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJUDH/HIBE ‘ANKUMU ER-RIXHSE ‘EHLEL-BEJTI WE JUTEHHIRAKUM TETHIRË
33.34: WE EDHKURNE MA JUTLA FI BUJUTIKUNNE MIN ‘AJATI ALLAHI WEL-HIKMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE LETIFËN HABIRË
33.35: ‘INNEL-MUSLIMINE WEL-MUSLIMATI WEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WEL-KANITINE WEL-KANITATI WE SADIKINE WE SADIKATI WE SABIRINE WE SABIRATI WEL-HASHI’INE WEL-HASHI’ATI WEL-MUTESEDDIKINE WEL-MUTESEDDIKATI WE SA’IMINE WE SA’IMATI WEL-HAFIDHINE FURUXHEHUM WEL-HAFIDHATI WE EDH-DHAKIRINEL-LAHE KETHIRËN WE EDH-DHAKIRATI ‘E’ADDEL-LAHU LEHUM MEGFIRATEN WE ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
33.36: WE MA KANE LIMU’UMININ WE LA MU’UMINETIN ‘IDHA KADALLAHU WE RASULUHU ‘EMRËN ‘EN JEKUNE LEHUMUL-HIJERATU MIN ‘EMRIHIM WE MEN JA’SI ELLAHE WE RASULEHU FEKAD DEL-LE DELALËN MUBINË
33.37: WE ‘IDH TEKULU LILLEDHI ‘EN’AMEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI WE ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJHI ‘EMSIK ‘ALEJKE ZEWXHEKE WE ETTEKI ELLAHE WE TUHFI FI NEFSIKE MALLAHU MUBDIHI WE TEHSHA NASE WEL-LAHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEHSHAHU FELEMMA KADA ZEJDUN MINHA WETERËN ZEWWEXHNAKEHA LIKEJ LA JEKUNE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE HERAXHUN FI ‘EZWAXHI ‘ED’IJA’IHIM ‘IDHA KADEW MINHUNNE WETERËN WE KANE ‘EMRU ALLAHI MEF’ULË
33.38: MA KANE ‘ALA NEBIJI MIN HERAXHIN FIMA FERADEL-LAHU LEHU SUNNETEL-LAHI FIL-LEDHINE HALEW MIN KABLU WE KANE ‘EMRU ALLAHI KADERËN MEKDURË
33.39: EL-LEDHINE JUBELLIGUNE RISALATI ALLAHI WE JEHSHEWNEHU WE LA JEHSHEWNE ‘EHEDËN ‘IL-LALLAHE WE KEFA BIL-LAHI HESIBË
33.40: MA KANE MUHEMMEDUN ‘EBA ‘EHEDIN MIN RIXHALIKUM WE LEKIN RASULEL-LAHI WE HATEME NEBIJINE WE KANEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
33.43: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSELLI ‘ALEJKUM WE MELA’IKETUHU LIJUHRIXHEKUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE KANE BIL-MU’UMININE RAHIMË
33.44: TEHIJETUHUM JEWME JELKAWNEHU SELAMUN WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM ‘EXHRËN KERIMË
33.45: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE SHAHIDËN WE MUBESHSHIRËN WE NEDHIRË
33.46: WE DA’IËN ‘ILA ALLAHI BI’IDHNIHI WE SIRAXHËN MUNIRË
33.47: WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININE BI’ENNE LEHUM MINEL-LAHI FEDLËN KEBIRË
33.48: WE LA TUTI’IL-KAFIRINE WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE DA’ ‘EDHAHUM WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI WE KILË
33.49: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NEKEHTUMUL-MU’UMINATI THUMME TELLEKTUMUHUNNE MIN KABLI ‘EN TEMESSUHUNNE FEMA LEKUM ‘ALEJHINNE MIN ‘IDDETIN TA’TEDDUNEHA FEMETTI’UHUNNE WE SERRIHUHUNNE SERAHËN XHEMILË
33.50: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘INNA ‘EHLELNA LEKE ‘EZWAXHEKEL-LATI ‘ATEJTE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE MA MELEKET JEMINUKE MIMMA ‘EFA’EL-LAHU ‘ALEJKE WE BENATI ‘AMMIKE WE BENATI ‘AMMATIKE WE BENATI HALIKE WE BENATI HALATIKEL-LATI HAXHERNE ME’AKE WE EMRA’ETEN MU’UMINETEN ‘IN WEHEBET NEFSEHA LILNNEBIJI ‘IN ‘ERADE NEBIJU ‘EN JESTENKIHEHA HALISETEN LEKE MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE KAD ‘ALIMNA MA FERADNA ‘ALEJHIM FI ‘EZWAXHIHIM WE MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUM LIKEJLA JEKUNE ‘ALEJKE HERAXHUN WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
33.51: TURXHI MEN TESHA’U MINHUNNE WE TU’UWI ‘ILEJKE MEN TESHA’U WE MENI EBTEGAJTE MIMMEN ‘AZELTE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKE DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN TEKARRA ‘A’JUNUHUNNE WE LA JEHZENNE WE JERDEJNE BIMA ‘ATEJTEHUNNE KUL-LUHUNNE WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA FI KULUBIKUM WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HELIMË
33.52: LA JEHIL-LU LEKE NISA’ MIN BA’DU WE LA ‘EN TEBEDDELE BIHINNE MIN ‘EZWAXHIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKE HUSNUHUNNE ‘IL-LA MA MELEKET JEMINUKE WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN RAKIBË
33.53: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEDHULU BUJUTE NEBIJI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JU’UDHENE LEKUM ‘ILA TA’AMIN GAJRA NADHIRINE ‘INAHU WE LEKIN ‘IDHA DU’ITUM FADHULU FE’IDHA TA’IMTUM FANTESHIRU WE LA MUSTE’NISINE LIHEDITHIN ‘INNE DHALIKUM KANE JU’UDHI NEBIJE FEJESTEHJI MINKUM WEL-LAHU LA JESTEHJI MINEL-HEKKI WE ‘IDHA SE’ELTUMUHUNNE META’ËN FAS’ELUHUNNE MIN WERA’I HIXHABIN DHALIKUM ‘ETHERU LIKULUBIKUM WE KULUBIHINNE WE MA KANE LEKUM ‘EN TU’UDHU RASULEL-LAHI WE LA ‘EN TENKIHU ‘EZWAXHEHU MIN BA’DIHI ‘EBEDËN ‘INNE DHALIKUM KANE ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘ADHIMË
33.54: ‘IN TUBDU SHEJ’ËN ‘EW TUHFUHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
33.55: LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHINNE FI ‘ABA’IHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’IHINNE WE LA ‘IHWANIHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’I ‘IHWANIHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’I ‘EHAWATIHINNE WE LA NISA’IHINNE WE LA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUNNE WE ETTEKINEL-LAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDË
33.56: ‘INNALL-LLAHE WE MELA’IKETEHU JUSELLUNE ‘ALA NEBIJI JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SELLU ‘ALEJHI WE SELLIMU TESLIMË
33.57: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU LE’ANEHUMU ALLAHU FI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
33.58: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI BIGAJRI MA EKTESEBU FEKADI EHTEMELU BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
33.59: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LI’ZWAXHIKE WE BENATIKE WE NISA’IL-MU’UMININE JUDNINE ‘ALEJHINNE MIN XHELABIBIHINNE DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN JU’RAFNE FELA JU’UDHEJNE WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
33.60: LE’IN LEM JENTEHIL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN WEL-MURXHIFUNE FIL-MEDINETI LENUGRIJENNEKE BIHIM THUMME LA JUXHAWIRUNEKE FIHA ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.62: SUNNETEL-LAHI FIL-LEDHINE HALEW MIN KABLU WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI ALLAHI TEBDILË
33.63: JES’ELUKE NASU ‘ANI SA’ATI KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ILMUHA ‘INDEL-LAHI WE MA JUDRIKE LE’ALLE SA’ATE TEKUNU KARIBË
33.65: HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN LA JEXHIDUNE WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
33.66: JEWME TUKAL-LEBU WUXHUHUHUM FI NARI JEKULUNE JA LEJTENA ‘ETA’NA ELLAHE WE ‘ETA’NA RASUL
33.67: WE KALU RABBENA ‘INNA ‘ETA’NA SADETENA WE KUBERA’ENA FE’EDELLUNA SEBIL
33.68: RABBENA ‘ATIHIM DI’FEJNI MINEL-’ADHABI WEL-’ANHUM LA’NËN KEBIRË
33.69: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE ‘ADHEW MUSA FEBERRA’EHU ALLAHU MIMMA KALU WE KANE ‘INDEL-LAHI WEXHIHË
33.70: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE KULU KAWLËN SEDIDË
33.71: JUSLIH LEKUM ‘A’MALEKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WE MEN JUTI’I ELLAHE WE RASULEHU FEKAD FAZE FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
33.72: ‘INNA ‘ARADNAL-’EMANETE ‘ALA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-XHIBALI FE’EBEJNE ‘EN JEHMILNEHA WE ‘ESHFEKNE MINHA WE HEMELEHAL-’INSANU ‘INNEHU KANE DHELUMËN XHEHULË
33.73: LIJU’ADHDHIBEL-LAHUL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-MUSHRIKINE WEL-MUSHRIKATI WE JETUBEL-LAHU ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË

34.1: EL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE LEHUL-HEMDU FIL-’AHIRATI WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-HABIR
34.2: JA’LEMU MA JELIXHU FIL-’ERDI WE MA JEHRUXHU MINHA WE MA JENZILU MINE SEMA’I WE MA JA’RUXHU FIHA WE HUWE RAHIMUL-GAFUR
34.3: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TE’TINA SA’ATU KUL BELA WE RABBI LETE’TIJENNEKUM ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI LA JA’ZUBU ‘ANHU MITHKALU DHERRATIN FI SEMAWATI WE LA FIL-’ERDI WE LA ‘ESGARU MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKBERU ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
34.4: LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
34.5: WEL-LEDHINE SE’AW FI ‘AJATINA MU’AXHIZINE ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MIN RIXHZIN ‘ELIMU
34.6: WE JERAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILMEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE HUWEL-HEKKA WE JEHDI ‘ILA SIRATIL-’AZIZIL-HEMID
34.7: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU HEL NEDULLUKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN JUNEBBI’UKUM ‘IDHA MUZZIKTUM KUL-LE MUMEZZEKIN ‘INNEKUM LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDI
34.8: ‘AFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EM BIHI XHINNETUN BELIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI FIL-’ADHABI WE ED-DELALIL-BA’ID
34.9: ‘EFELEM JERAW ‘ILA MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘IN NESHE’ NEHSIF BIHIMUL-’ERDE ‘EW NUSKIT ‘ALEJHIM KISEFËN MINE SEMA’I ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKUL-LI ‘ABDIN MUNIBI
34.10: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE MINNA FEDLËN JA XHIBALU ‘EWWIBI ME’AHU WET-TEJRA WE ‘ELENNA LEHUL-HEDID
34.11: ‘ENI A’MEL SABIGATIN WE KADDIR FI SERDI WE A’MELU SALIHËN ‘INNI BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
34.12: WE LISULEJMANE ER-RIHE GUDUWUHA SHEHRUN WE RAWAHUHA SHEHRUN WE ‘ESELNA LEHU ‘AJNEL-KITRI WE MINEL-XHINNI MEN JA’MELU BEJNE JEDEJHI BI’IDHNI RABBIHI WE MEN JEZIG MINHUM ‘AN ‘EMRINA NUDHIKHU MIN ‘ADHABI SA’IR
34.13: JA’MELUNE LEHU MA JESHA’U MIN MEHARIBE WE TEMATHILE WE XHIFANIN KALXHEWABI WE KUDURIN RASIJATIN A’MELU ‘ALE DAWUDE SHUKRËN WE KALILUN MIN ‘IBADIJE ESH-SHEKUR
34.14: FELEMMA KADEJNA ‘ALEJHIL-MEWTE MA DEL-LEHUM ‘ALA MEWTIHI ‘IL-LA DABBETUL-’ERDI TE’KULU MINSE’ETEHU FELEMMA HARRA TEBEJJENETIL-XHINNU ‘EN LEW KANU JA’LEMUNEL-GAJBE MA LEBITHU FIL-’ADHABIL-MUHIN
34.15: LEKAD KANE LISEBE’IIN FI MESKENIHIM ‘AJETUN XHENNETANI ‘AN JEMININ WE SHIMALIN KULU MIN RIZKI RABBIKUM WE ESHKURU LEHU BELDETUN TEJJIBETUN WE RABBUN GAFURU
34.16: FE’A’RADU FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM SEJLEL-’ARIMI WE BEDDELNAHUM BIXHENNETEJHIM XHENNETEJNI DHEWATA ‘UKULIN HAMTIN WE ‘ETHLIN WE SHEJ’IN MIN SIDRIN KALILI
34.17: DHALIKE XHEZEJNAHUM BIMA KEFERU WE HEL NUXHAZI ‘IL-LAL-KEFUR
34.18: WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUM WE BEJNEL-KURA EL-LETI BARAKNA FIHA KURAN DHAHIRATEN WE KADDERNA FIHA SEJRA SIRU FIHA LEJALIJE WE ‘EJJAMËN ‘AMININ
34.19: FEKALU RABBENA BA’ID BEJNE ‘ESFARINA WE DHELEMU ‘ENFUSEHUM FEXHE’ALNAHUM ‘EHADITHE WE MEZZEKNAHUM KUL-LE MUMEZZEKIN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBARIN SHEKURI
34.20: WE LEKAD SEDDEKA ‘ALEJHIM ‘IBLISU DHENNEHU FE ETTEBA’UHU ‘IL-LA FERIKËN MINEL-MU’UMININ
34.21: WE MA KANE LEHU ‘ALEJHIM MIN SULTANIN ‘IL-LA LINA’LEME MEN JU’UMINU BIL-’AHIRATI MIMMEN HUWE MINHA FI SHEKKIN WE RABBUKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HEFIDHU
34.22: KUL ED’UL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI LA JEMLIKUNE MITHKALE DHERRATIN FI SEMAWATI WE LA FIL-’ERDI WE MA LEHUM FIHIMA MIN SHIRKIN WE MA LEHU MINHUM MIN DHEHIRI
34.23: WE LA TENFA’U ESH-SHEFA’ATU ‘INDEHU ‘IL-LA LIMEN ‘EDHINE LEHU HETTA ‘IDHA FUZZI’A ‘AN KULUBIHIM KALU MADHA KALE RABBUKUM KALUL-HEKKA WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
34.24: KUL MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KULI ALLAHU WE ‘INNA ‘EW ‘IJAKUM LE’ALA HUDEN ‘EW FI DELALIN MUBINI
34.25: KUL LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA ‘EXHRAMNA WE LA NUS’ELU ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
34.26: KUL JEXHMA’U BEJNENA RABBUNA THUMME JEFTEHU BEJNENA BIL-HEKKI WE HUWEL-FETTAHUL-’ALIM
34.27: KUL ‘ERUNIJEL-LEDHINE ‘ELHEKTUM BIHI SHURAKA’E KEL-LA BEL HUWEL-LAHUL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
34.28: WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘IL-LA KAFFETEN LILNNASI BESHIRËN WE NEDHIRËN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
34.29: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
34.30: KUL LEKUM MI’ADU JEWMIN LA TESTE’HIRUNE ‘ANHU SA’ATEN WE LA TESTEKDIMUN
34.31: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN NU’UMINE BIHEDHAL-KUR’ANI WE LA BIEL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE LEW TERA ‘IDHI EDH-DHALIMUNE MEWKUFUNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM JERXHI’U BA’DUHUM ‘ILA BA’DINL-KAWLE JEKULUL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU LEWLA ‘ENTUM LEKUNNA MU’UMININ
34.32: KALEL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU LIL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU ‘ENEHNU SEDEDNAKUM ‘ANIL-HUDA BA’DE ‘IDH XHA’EKUM BEL KUNTUM MUXHRIMIN
34.33: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU BEL MEKRUL-LEJLI WE NEHARI ‘IDH TE’MURUNENA ‘EN NEKFURA BIL-LAHI WE NEXH’ALE LEHU ‘ENDADËN WE ‘ESERRU NEDAMETE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE XHE’ALNAL-’EGLALE FI ‘A’NAKIL-LEDHINE KEFERU HEL JUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KANU JA’MELUN
34.34: WE MA ‘ERSELNA FI KARJETIN MIN NEDHIRIN ‘IL-LA KALE MUTRAFUHA ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
34.35: WE KALU NEHNU ‘EKTHERU ‘EMWALËN WE ‘EWLADËN WE MA NEHNU BIMU’ADHDHEBIN
34.36: KUL ‘INNE RABBI JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
34.37: WE MA ‘EMWALUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM BI-ETI TUKARRIBUKUM ‘INDENA ZULFA ‘IL-LA MEN ‘AMENE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’ULA’IKE LEHUM XHEZA’U ED-DI’FI BIMA ‘AMILU WE HUM FIL-GURUFATI ‘AMINUN
34.38: WEL-LEDHINE JES’AWNE FI ‘AJATINA MU’AXHIZINE ‘ULA’IKE FIL-’ADHABI MUHDERUN
34.39: KUL ‘INNE RABBI JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI WE JEKDIRU LEHU WE MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEHUWE JUHLIFUHU WE HUWE HAJRU ER-RAZIKIN
34.40: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME JEKULU LILMELA’IKETI ‘EHA’UULA’ ‘IJAKUM KANU JA’BUDUN
34.41: KALU SUBHANEKE ‘ENTE WELIJUNA MIN DUNIHIM BEL KANU JA’BUDUNEL-XHINNE ‘EKTHERUHUM BIHIM MU’UMINUN
34.42: FALJEWME LA JEMLIKU BA’DUKUM LIBA’DIN NEF’ËN WE LA DERRËN WE NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHUKU ‘ADHABE NARI EL-LETI KUNTUM BIHA TUKEDHDHIBU
34.43: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINATIN KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN JURIDU ‘EN JESUDDEKUM ‘AMMA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABA’UUKUM WE KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘IFKUN MUFTERAN WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
34.44: WE MA ‘ATEJNAHUM MIN KUTUBIN JEDRUSUNEHA WE MA ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIM KABLEKE MIN NEDHIRI
34.45: WE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE MA BELEGU MI’SHARA MA ‘ATEJNAHUM FEKEDHDHEBU RUSULI FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
34.46: KUL ‘INNEMA ‘A’IDHUKUM BIWAHIDETIN ‘EN TEKUMU LIL-LAHI METHNA WE FURADA THUMME TETEFEKKERU MA BISAHIBIKUM MIN XHINNETIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN LEKUM BEJNE JEDEJ ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDI
34.47: KUL MA SE’ELTUKUM MIN ‘EXHRIN FEHUWE LEKUM ‘IN ‘EXHRIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
34.49: KUL XHA’EL-HEKKU WE MA JUBDI’UL-BATILU WE MA JU’ID
34.50: KUL ‘IN DELELTU FE’INNEMA ‘EDILLU ‘ALA NEFSI WE ‘INI EHTEDEJTU FEBIMA JUHI ‘ILEJJE RABBI ‘INNEHU SEMI’UN KARIBU
34.51: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH FEZI’U FELA FEWTE WE ‘UHIDHU MIN MEKANIN KARIBI
34.52: WE KALU ‘AMENNA BIHI WE ‘ENNA LEHUMUT-TENAWUSHU MIN MEKANIN BA’IDI
34.53: WE KAD KEFERU BIHI MIN KABLU WE JEKDHIFUNE BIL-GAJBI MIN MEKANIN BA’IDI
34.54: WE HILE BEJNEHUM WE BEJNE MA JESHTEHUNE KEMA FU’ILE BI’ESHJA’IHIM MIN KABLU ‘INNEHUM KANU FI SHEKKIN MURIBI

35.1: EL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI FATIRI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI XHA’ILIL-MELA’IKETI RUSULËN ‘ULI ‘EXHNIHETIN METHNA WE THULATHE WE RUBA’A JEZIDU FIL-HALKI MA JESHA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
35.2: MA JEFTEHI ALLAHU LILNNASI MIN RAHMETIN FELA MUMSIKE LEHA WE MA JUMSIK FELA MURSILE LEHU MIN BA’DIHI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
35.3: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU EDHKURU NI’METEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM HEL MIN HALIKIN GAJRU ALLAHI JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
35.4: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KUDHDHIBET RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
35.5: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN FELA TEGURRANNEKUMUL-HEJA ETU ED-DUNJA WE LA JEGURRANNEKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
35.6: ‘INNE ESH-SHEJTANE LEKUM ‘ADUWUN FE ETTEHIDHUHU ‘ADUWËN ‘INNEMA JED’U HIZBEHU LIJEKUNU MIN ‘ES'HABI SA’IR
35.7: EL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
35.8: ‘EFEMEN ZUJJINE LEHU SU’U ‘AMELIHI FERA’AHU HESENËN FE’INNALL-LLAHE JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U FELA TEDH/HEB NEFSUKE ‘ALEJHIM HESERATIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA JESNA’UN
35.9: WEL-LAHUL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE ER-RIJAHE FETUTHIRU SEHABËN FESUKNAHU ‘ILA BELEDIN MEJJITIN FE’EHJEJNA BIHIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA KEDHALIKE NUSHUR
35.10: MEN KANE JURIDUL-’IZZETE FELIL-LAHIL-’IZZETU XHEMI’ËN ‘ILEJHI JES’ADUL-KELIMUT-TEJJIBU WEL-’AMELU SALIHU JERFA’UHU WEL-LEDHINE JEMKURUNE SEJJI’ATI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WE MEKRU ‘ULA’IKE HUWE JEBUR
35.11: WEL-LAHU HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME XHE’ALEKUM ‘EZWAXHËN WE MA TEHMILU MIN ‘UNTHA WE LA TEDA’U ‘IL-LA BI’ILMIHI WE MA JU’AMMERU MIN MU’AMMERIN WE LA JUNKASU MIN ‘UMURIHI ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
35.12: WE MA JESTEWIL-BEHRANI HADHA ‘ADHBUN FURATUN SA’IGUN SHERABUHU WE HEDHA MILHUN ‘UXHAXHUN WE MIN KUL-LIN TE’KULUNE LEHMËN TERIJËN WE TESTEHRIXHUNE HILJETEN TELBESUNEHA WE TERAL-FULKE FIHI MEWAHIRA LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
35.13: JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM LEHUL-MULKU WEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNIHI MA JEMLIKUNE MIN KITMIRI
35.14: ‘IN TED’UHUM LA JESMA’U DU’A’EKUM WE LEW SEMI’U MA ESTEXHABU LEKUM WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JEKFURUNE BISHIRKIKUM WE LA JUNEBBI’UKE MITHLU HABIRI
35.16: ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JE’TI BIHALKIN XHEDIDI
35.18: WE LA TEZIRU WAZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA WE ‘IN TED’U MUTHKALETUN ‘ILA HIMLIHA LA JUHMEL MINHU SHEJ’UN WE LEW KANE DHA KURBA ‘INNEMA TUNDHIRUL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE MEN TEZEKKA FE’INNEMA JETEZEKKA LINEFSIHI WE ‘ILA ALLAHIL-MESIR
35.20: WE LA EDH-DHULUMATU WE LA NU
35.22: WE MA JESTEWIL-’EHJA’U WE LAL-’EMWATU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUSMI’U MEN JESHA’U WE MA ‘ENTE BIMUSMI’IN MEN FIL-KUBUR
35.24: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE BIL-HEKKI BESHIRËN WE NEDHIRËN WE ‘IN MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘IL-LA HALA FIHA NEDHIRU
35.25: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI WE BIZ-ZUBURI WE BIL-KITABIL-MUNIR
35.27: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI THEMERATIN MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWANUHA WE MINEL-XHIBALI XHUDEDUN BIDUN WE HUMRUN MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWANUHA WE GARABIBU SUDU
35.28: WE MINE NASI WE ED-DEWABBI WEL-’EN’AM MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWANUHU KEDHALIKE ‘INNEMA JEHSHA ELLAHE MIN ‘IBADIHIL-’ULEMA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN GAFURU
35.29: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JETLUNE KITABEL-LAHI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRËN WE ‘ALANIJETEN JERXHUNE TIXHARATEN LEN TEBUR
35.30: LIJUWEFFIJEHUM ‘UXHURAHUM WE JEZIDEHUM MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU GAFURUN SHEKURU
35.31: WEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE MINEL-KITABI HUWEL-HEKKU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BI’IBADIHI LEHABIRUN BESIRU
35.32: THUMME ‘EWRATHNAL-KITABEL-LEDHINE ESTEFEJNA MIN ‘IBADINA FEMINHUM DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI WE MINHUM MUKTESIDUN WE MINHUM SABIKUN BIL-HAJRATI BI’IDHNI ALLAHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEDLUL-KEBIR
35.33: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA JUHELLEWNE FIHA MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE LU’ULU’UËN WE LIBASUHUM FIHA HERIRU
35.34: WE KALUL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI ‘EDH/HEBE ‘ANNAL-HEZENE ‘INNE RABBENA LEGAFURUN SHEKURU
35.35: EL-LEDHI ‘EHELLENA DARAL-MUKAMETI MIN FEDLIHI LA JEMESSUNA FIHA NESEBUN WE LA JEMESSUNA FIHA LUGUBU
35.36: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM NARU XHEHENNEME LA JUKDA ‘ALEJHIM FEJEMUTU WE LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUM MIN ‘ADHABIHA KEDHALIKE NEXHZI KUL-LE KEFURI
35.37: WE HUM JESTERIHUNE FIHA RABBENA ‘EHRIXHNA NA’MEL SALIHËN GAJRAL-LEDHI KUNNA NA’MELU ‘EWELEM NU’AMMIRKUM MA JETEDHEKKERU FIHI MEN TEDHEKKERA WE XHA’EKUMU NEDHIRU FEDHUKU FEMA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN NESI
35.39: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEKUM HALA’IFE FIL-’ERDI FEMEN KEFERA FE’ALEJHI KUFRUHU WE LA JEZIDUL-KAFIRINE KUFRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA MEKTËN WE LA JEZIDUL-KAFIRINE KUFRUHUM ‘IL-LA HASARË
35.40: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM SHURAKA’EKUMUL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘ERUNI MADHA HALEKU MINEL-’ERDI ‘EM LEHUM SHIRKUN FI SEMAWATI ‘EM ‘ATEJNAHUM KITABËN FEHUM ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MINHU BEL ‘IN JA’IDU EDH-DHALIMUNE BA’DUHUM BA’DËN ‘IL-LA GURURË
35.41: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUMSIKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE ‘EN TEZULA WE LE’IN ZALETA ‘IN ‘EMSEKEHUMA MIN ‘EHEDIN MIN BA’DIHI ‘INNEHU KANE HELIMËN GAFURË
35.42: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN XHA’EHUM NEDHIRUN LEJEKUNUNNE ‘EHDA MIN ‘IHDAL-’UMEMI FELEMMA XHA’EHUM NEDHIRUN MA ZADEHUM ‘IL-LA NUFURË
35.43: ESTIKBARËN FIL-’ERDI WE MEKRA SEJJI’I WE LA JEHIKUL-MEKRU SEJJI’U ‘IL-LA BI’EHLIHI FEHEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SUNNETEL-’EWWELINE FELEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI ALLAHI TEBDILËN WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI ALLAHI TEHWILË
35.44: ‘EWELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE KANU ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE MA KANEL-LAHU LIJU’XHIZEHU MIN SHEJ’IN FI SEMAWATI WE LA FIL-’ERDI ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ALIMËN KADIRË
35.45: WE LEW JU’UAHIDHU ALLAHU NASE BIMA KESEBU MA TERAKE ‘ALA DHEHRIHA MIN DABBETIN WE LEKIN JU’UEHHIRUHUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FE’IDHA XHA’E ‘EXHELUHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BI’IBADIHI BESIRË

36.9: WE XHE’ALNA MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM SEDDËN WE MIN HALFIHIM SEDDËN FE’EGSHEJNAHUM FEHUM LA JUBSIRUN
36.10: WE SEWA’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘E’ENDHERTEHUM ‘EM LEM TUNDHIRHUM LA JU’UMINUN
36.11: ‘INNEMA TUNDHIRU MENI ETTEBE’A EDH-DHIKRA WE HASHIJE RAHMENE BIL-GAJBI FEBESHSHIRHU BIMEGFIRATIN WE ‘EXHRIN KERIMI
36.12: ‘INNA NEHNU NUHJIL-MEWTA WE NEKTUBU MA KADDEMU WE ‘ATHARAHUM WE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘HSEJNAHU FI ‘IMAMIN MUBINI
36.14: ‘IDH ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIMU ETHNEJNI FEKEDHDHEBUHUMA FE’AZZEZNA BITHALITHIN FEKALU ‘INNA ‘ILEJKUM MURSELUN
36.15: KALU MA ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA WE MA ‘ENZELE RAHMANU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA TEKDHIBUN
36.18: KALU ‘INNA TETEJJERNA BIKUM LE’IN LEM TENTEHU LENERXHUMENNEKUM WE LEJEMESSENNEKUM MINNA ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
36.19: KALU TA’IRUKUM ME’AKUM ‘E’IN DHUKKIRTUM BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN MUSRIFUN
36.20: WE XHA’E MIN ‘EKSAL-MEDINETI RAXHULUN JES’A KALE JA KAWMI ETTEBI’UL-MURSELIN
36.21: ETTEBI’U MEN LA JES’ELUKUM ‘EXHRËN WE HUM MUHTEDUN
36.22: WE MA LIJE LA ‘A’BUDUL-LEDHI FETERANI WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
36.23: ‘E’ETTEHIDHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN ‘IN JURIDNI RAHMANU BIDURRIN LA TUGNI ‘ANNI SHEFA’ATUHUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUNKIDHUN
36.26: KILE EDHULIL-XHENNETE KALE JA LEJTE KAWMI JA’LEMUN
36.27: BIMA GAFERA LI RABBI WE XHE’ALENI MINEL-MUKRAMIN
36.28: WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALA KAWMIHI MIN BA’DIHI MIN XHUNDIN MINE SEMA’I WE MA KUNNA MUNZILIN
36.29: ‘IN KANET ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WAHIDETEN FE’IDHA HUM HAMIDUN
36.30: JA HESRATEN ‘ALEL-’IBADI MA JE’TIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
36.31: ‘ELEM JERAW KEM ‘EHLEKNA KABLEHUM MINEL-KURUNI ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJHIM LA JERXHI’UN
36.32: WE ‘IN KUL-LUN LEMMA XHEMI’UN LEDEJNA MUHDERUN
36.33: WE ‘AJETUN LEHUMUL-’ERDUL-MEJTETU ‘EHJEJNAHA WE ‘EHRAXHNA MINHA HEBBËN FEMINHU JE’KULUN
36.34: WE XHE’ALNA FIHA XHENNATIN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN WE FEXHXHERNA FIHA MINEL-’UJUN
36.35: LIJE’KULU MIN THEMERIHI WE MA ‘AMILET/HU ‘EJDIHIM ‘EFELA JESHKURUN
36.36: SUBHANEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’EZWAXHE KUL-LEHA MIMMA TUNBITUL-’ERDU WE MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE MIMMA LA JA’LEMUN
36.37: WE ‘AJETUN LEHUMUL-LEJLU NESLEHU MINHU NEHARA FE’IDHA HUM MUDHLIMUN
36.38: WE ESH-SHEMSU TEXHRI LIMUSTEKARRIN LEHA DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
36.40: LA ESH-SHEMSU JENBEGI LEHA ‘EN TUDRIKEL-KAMERA WE LAL-LEJLU SABIKU NEHARI WE KUL-LUN FI FELEKIN JESBEHUN
36.42: WE HALEKNA LEHUM MIN MITHLIHI MA JERKEBUN
36.43: WE ‘IN NESHE’ NUGRIKHUM FELA SERIHA LEHUM WE LA HUM JUNKADHUN
36.45: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUMU ETTEKU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIKUM WE MA HALFEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
36.46: WE MA TE’TIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN MIN ‘AJATI RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA KANU ‘ANHA MU’RIDIN
36.47: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM ‘ENFIKU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU ALLAHU KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENUT’IMU MEN LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU ‘ET’AMEHU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA FI DELALIN MUBINI
36.48: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
36.49: MA JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WAHIDETEN TE’HUDHUHUM WE HUM JEHISSIMUN
36.50: FELA JESTETI’UNE TEWSIJETEN WE LA ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM JERXHI’UN
36.51: WE NUFIHA FI SURI FE’IDHA HUM MINEL-’EXHDATHI ‘ILA RABBIHIM JENSILUN
36.52: KALU JA WEJLENA MEN BE’ATHENA MIN MERKADINA HADHA MA WE’ADE RAHMANU WE SEDEKAL-MURSELUN
36.53: ‘IN KANET ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WAHIDETEN FE’IDHA HUM XHEMI’UN LEDEJNA MUHDERUN
36.54: FALJEWME LA TUDHLEMU NEFSUN SHEJ’ËN WE LA TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
36.57: LEHUM FIHA FAKIHETUN WE LEHUM MA JEDDA’UN
36.60: ‘ELEM ‘A’HED ‘ILEJKUM JA BENI ‘ADEME ‘EN LA TA’BUDU ESH-SHEJTANE ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
36.62: WE LEKAD ‘EDEL-LE MINKUM XHIBILLËN KETHIRËN ‘EFELEM TEKUNU TA’KILUN
36.65: EL-JEWME NEHTIMU ‘ALA ‘EFWAHIHIM WE TUKELLIMUNA ‘EJDIHIM WE TESH/HEDU ‘ERXHULUHUM BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
36.66: WE LEW NESHA’U LETEMESNA ‘ALA ‘A’JUNIHIM FASTEBEKU SIRATE FE’ENNA JUBSIRUN
36.67: WE LEW NESHA’U LEMESEHNAHUM ‘ALA MEKANETIHIM FEMA ESTETA’U MUDIJËN WE LA JERXHI’UN
36.68: WE MEN NU’AMMIRHU NUNEKKIS/HU FIL-HALKI ‘EFELA JA’KILUN
36.69: WE MA ‘ALLEMNAHU ESH-SHI’RA WE MA JENBEGI LEHU ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRUN WE KUR’ANUN MUBINU
36.70: LIJUNDHIRA MEN KANE HEJJËN WE JEHIKKAL-KAWLU ‘ALEL-KAFIRIN
36.71: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA HALEKNA LEHUM MIMMA ‘AMILET ‘EJDINA ‘EN’AMËN FEHUM LEHA MALIKUN
36.72: WE DHEL-LELNAHA LEHUM FEMINHA RAKUBUHUM WE MINHA JE’KULUN
36.73: WE LEHUM FIHA MENAFI’U WE MESHARIBU ‘EFELA JESHKURUN
36.74: WE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘ALIHETEN LE’ALLEHUM JUNSERUN
36.75: LA JESTETI’UNE NESRAHUM WE HUM LEHUM XHUNDUN MUHDERUN
36.76: FELA JEHZUNKE KAWLUHUM ‘INNA NA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUN
36.77: ‘EWELEM JERAL-’INSANU ‘ENNA HALEKNAHU MIN NUTFETIN FE’IDHA HUWE HASIMUN MUBINU
36.78: WE DERABE LENA METHELËN WE NESIJE HALKAHU KALE MEN JUHJIL-’IDHAME WE HIJE RAMIMU
36.79: KUL JUHJIHAL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EHA ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI HALKIN ‘ALIMU
36.80: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUM MINE ESH-SHEXHERIL-’EHDERI NARËN FE’IDHA ‘ENTUM MINHU TUKIDUN
36.81: ‘EWELEJSEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIKADIRIN ‘ALA ‘EN JEHLUKA MITHLEHUM BELA WE HUWEL-HALLAKUL-’ALIM
36.83: FESUBHANEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHI MELEKUTU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN

37.5: RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE RABBUL-MESHARIK
37.7: WE HIFDHËN MIN KUL-LI SHEJTANIN MARIDI
37.8: LA JESSEMMA’UNE ‘ILAL-MELE’IL-’A’LA WE JUKDHEFUNE MIN KUL-LI XHANIBI
37.11: FASTEFTIHIM ‘EHUM ‘ESHEDDU HALKËN ‘EM MEN HALEKNA ‘INNA HALEKNAHUM MIN TININ LAZIBI
37.16: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
37.19: FE’INNEMA HIJE ZEXHRATUN WAHIDETUN FE’IDHA HUM JENDHURUN
37.20: WE KALU JA WEJLENA HADHA JEWMU ED-DIN
37.22: EHSHURUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WE ‘EZWAXHEHUM WE MA KANU JA’BUDUN
37.30: WE MA KANE LENA ‘ALEJKUM MIN SULTANIN BEL KUNTUM KAWMËN TAGIN
37.39: WE MA TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
37.47: LA FIHA GAWLUN WE LA HUM ‘ANHA JUNZEFUN
37.51: KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM ‘INNI KANE LI KARINU
37.53: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEDINUN
37.57: WE LEWLA NI’METU RABBI LEKUNTU MINEL-MUHDERIN
37.85: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MADHA TA’BUDUN
37.97: KALU EBNU LEHU BUNJANËN FE’ELKUHU FIL-XHEHIM
37.102: FELEMMA BELEGA ME’AHU SA’JE KALE JA BUNEJJE ‘INNI ‘ERA FIL-MENAMI ‘ENNI ‘EDHBEHUKE FANDHUR MADHA TERA KALE JA ‘EBETI EF’AL MA TU’UMERU SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU MINE SABIRIN
37.112: WE BESHSHERNAHU BI’ISHAKA NEBIJËN MINE SALIHIN
37.113: WE BARAKNA ‘ALEJHI WE ‘ALA ‘ISHAKA WE MIN DHURRIJETIHIMA MUHSINUN WE DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI MUBINU
37.114: WE LEKAD MENENNA ‘ALA MUSA WE HARUN
37.158: WE XHE’ALU BEJNEHU WE BEJNEL-XHINNETI NESEBËN WE LEKAD ‘ALIMETIL-XHINNETU ‘INNEHUM LEMUHDERUN
37.164: WE MA MINNA ‘IL-LA LEHU MEKAMUN MA’LUMU

38.3: KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MIN KARNIN FENADEW WELATE HINE MENASI
38.4: WE ‘AXHIBU ‘EN XHA’EHUM MUNDHIRUN MINHUM WE KALEL-KAFIRUNE HADHA SAHIRUN KEDHDHABU
38.6: WE ENTELEKAL-MELE’U MINHUM ‘ENI EMSHU WE ESBIRU ‘ALA ‘ALIHETIKUM ‘INNE HADHA LESHEJ’UN JURAD
38.7: MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FIL-MILLETIL-’AHIRATI ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA EHTILAKU
38.8: ‘E’UUNZILE ‘ALEJHI EDH-DHIKRU MIN BEJNINA BEL HUM FI SHEKKIN MIN DHIKRI BEL LEMMA JEDHUKU ‘ADHAB
38.10: ‘EM LEHUM MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA FELJERTEKU FIL-’ESBAB
38.12: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ADUN WE FIR’AWNU DHUL-’EWTAD
38.13: WE THEMUDU WE KAWMU LUTIN WE ‘ESHABUL-’EJKETI ‘ULA’IKEL-’EHZAB
38.15: WE MA JENDHURU HA’UULA’ ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WAHIDETEN MA LEHA MIN FEWAKI
38.16: WE KALU RABBENA ‘AXHXHIL LENA KITTENA KABLE JEWMIL-HISAB
38.17: ESBIR ‘ALA MA JEKULUNE WE EDHKUR ‘ABDENA DAWUDE DHAL-’EJDI ‘INNEHU ‘EWWABU
38.20: WE SHEDEDNA MULKEHU WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-HIKMETE WE FESLEL-HITAB
38.22: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALA DAWUDE FEFEZI’A MINHUM KALU LA TEHAF HASMANI BEGA BA’DUNA ‘ALA BA’DIN FAHKUM BEJNENA BIL-HEKKI WE LA TUSHTIT WE EHDINA ‘ILA SEWA’I SIRAT
38.23: ‘INNE HADHA ‘EHI LEHU TIS’UN WE TIS’UNE NA’XHETEN WE LIJE NA’XHETUN WAHIDETUN FEKALE ‘EKFILNIHA WE ‘AZZENI FIL-HITAB
38.24: KALE LEKAD DHELEMEKE BISU’UALI NA’XHETIKE ‘ILA NI’AXHIHI WE ‘INNE KETHIRËN MINEL-HULETA’I LEJEBGI BA’DUHUM ‘ALA BA’DIN ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE KALILUN MA HUM WE DHENNE DAWUDU ‘ENNEMA FETENNAHU FASTEGFERA RABBEHU WE HARRA RAKI’ËN WE ‘ENAB
38.25: FEGAFERNA LEHU DHALIKE WE ‘INNE LEHU ‘INDENA LEZULFA WE HUSNE ME’ABI
38.26: JA DAWUDU ‘INNA XHE’ALNAKE HALIFETEN FIL-’ERDI FAHKUM BEJNE NASI BIL-HEKKI WE LA TETTEBI’IL-HEWA FEJUDILLEKE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEDILLUNE ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN BIMA NESU JEWMEL-HISAB
38.27: WE MA HALEKNA SEMA’E WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA BATILËN DHALIKE DHENNUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINE NAR
38.28: ‘EM NEXH’ALUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KALMUFSIDINE FIL-’ERDI ‘EM NEXH’ALUL-MUTTEKINE KALFUXHXHAR
38.32: FEKALE ‘INNI ‘EHBEBTU HUBBEL-HAJRI ‘AN DHIKRI RABBI HETTA TEWARAT BIL-HIXHAB
38.34: WE LEKAD FETENNA SULEJMANE WE ‘ELKAJNA ‘ALA KURSIJIHI XHESEDËN THUMME ‘ENAB
38.35: KALE RABBI EGFIR LI WE HEB LI MULKËN LA JENBEGI LI’HEDIN MIN BA’DI ‘INNEKE ‘ENTEL-WEHHAB
38.36: FESEHHARNA LEHU ER-RIHE TEXHRI BI’EMRIHI RUHA’EN HEJTHU ‘ESAB
38.37: WE ESH-SHEJATINE KUL-LE BENNA’IN WE GAWWASI
38.40: WE ‘INNE LEHU ‘INDENA LEZULFA WE HUSNE ME’ABI
38.41: WE EDHKUR ‘ABDENA ‘EJJUBE ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU ‘ENNI MESSENI ESH-SHEJTANU BINUSBIN WE ‘ADHABI
38.42: ERKUD BIRIXHLIKE HADHA MUGTESELUN BARIDUN WE SHERABU
38.43: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘EHLEHU WE MITHLEHUM ME’AHUM RAHMETEN MINNA WE DHIKRA LI’WLIL-’ELBAB
38.44: WE HUDH BIJEDIKE DIGTHËN FADRIB BIHI WE LA TEHNETH ‘INNA WE XHEDNAHU SABIRËN NI’MEL-’ABDU ‘INNEHU ‘EWWABU
38.45: WE EDHKUR ‘IBADENA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE ‘ULIL-’EJDI WEL-’EBSAR
38.48: WE EDHKUR ‘ISMA’ILE WEL-JESE’A WE DHAL-KIFLI WE KUL-LUN MINEL-’EHJAR
38.49: HADHA DHIKRUN WE ‘INNE LILMUTTEKINE LEHUSNE ME’ABI
38.51: MUTTEKI’INE FIHA JED’UNE FIHA BIFAKIHETIN KETHIRATIN WE SHERABI
38.54: ‘INNE HADHA LERIZKUNA MA LEHU MIN NEFADI
38.59: HADHA FEWXHUN MUKTEHIMUN ME’AKUM LA MERHEBËN BIHIM ‘INNEHUM SALU NAR
38.60: KALU BEL ‘ENTUM LA MERHEBËN BIKUM ‘ENTUM KADDEMTUMUHU LENA FEBI’SEL-KARAR
38.61: KALU RABBENA MEN KADDEME LENA HADHA FEZID/HU ‘ADHABËN DI’FËN FI NAR
38.62: WE KALU MA LENA LA NERA RIXHALËN KUNNA NA’UDDUHUM MINEL-’ESHRA
38.66: RABBU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMAL-’AZIZUL-GAFFAR
38.69: MA KANE LIJE MIN ‘ILMIN BIL-MELE’IL-’A’LA ‘IDH JEHTESIMUN
38.71: ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELA’IKETI ‘INNI HALIKUN BESHERËN MIN TINI
38.72: FE’IDHA SEWWEJTUHU WE NEFEHTU FIHI MIN RUHI FEKA’U LEHU SAXHIDIN
38.75: KALE JA ‘IBLISU MA MENE’AKE ‘EN TESXHUDE LIMA HALEKTU BIJEDEJJE ‘ASTEKBERTE ‘EM KUNTE MINEL-’ALIN
38.76: KALE ‘ENA HAJRUN MINHU HALEKTENI MIN NARIN WE HALEKTEHU MIN TINI
38.85: LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINKE WE MIMMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
38.86: KUL MA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUTEKELLIFIN

39.2: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI FA’BUDI ELLAHE MUHLISËN LEHU ED-DIN
39.3: ‘ELA LIL-LAHI ED-DINUL-HALISU WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E MA NA’BUDUHUM ‘IL-LA LIJUKARRIBUNA ‘ILA ALLAHI ZULFA ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM FI MA HUM FIHI JEHTELIFUNE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN HUWE KADHIBUN KEFFARU
39.4: LEW ‘ERADEL-LAHU ‘EN JETTEHIDHE WELEDËN LASTEFA MIMMA JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U SUBHANEHU HUWEL-LAHUL-WAHIDUL-KAHHAR
39.5: HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI JUKEWWIRUL-LEJLE ‘ALA NEHARI WE JUKEWWIRU NEHARA ‘ALEL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA ESH-SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN ‘ELA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-GAFFAR
39.6: HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WAHIDETIN THUMME XHE’ALE MINHA ZEWXHEHA WE ‘ENZELE LEKUM MINEL-’EN’AM THEMANIJETE ‘EZWAXHIN JEHLUKUKUM FI BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM HALKËN MIN BA’DI HALKIN FI DHULUMATIN THELATHIN DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM LEHUL-MULKU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TUSRAFUN
39.7: ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN ‘ANKUM WE LA JERDA LI’IBADIHIL-KUFRA WE ‘IN TESHKURU JERDEHU LEKUM WE LA TEZIRU WAZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM MERXHI’UKUM FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUNE ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
39.8: WE ‘IDHA MESSEL-’INSANE DURRUN DA’A RABBEHU MUNIBËN ‘ILEJHI THUMME ‘IDHA HAWWELEHU NI’METEN MINHU NESIJE MA KANE JED’U ‘ILEJHI MIN KABLU WE XHE’ALE LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN LIJUDILLE ‘AN SEBILIHI KUL TEMETTA’ BIKUFRIKE KALILËN ‘INNEKE MIN ‘ES'HABI NAR
39.9: ‘EMMEN HUWE KANITUN ‘ANA’EL-LEJLI SAXHIDËN WE KA’IMËN JEHDHERUL-’AHIRATE WE JERXHU RAHMETE RABBIHI KUL HEL JESTEWIL-LEDHINE JA’LEMUNE WEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE ‘INNEMA JETEDHEKKERU ‘ULUL-’ELBAB
39.10: KUL JA ‘IBADIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU RABBEKUM LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU FI HEDHIHI ED-DUNJA HESENETUN WE ‘ERDU ALLAHI WASI’ATUN ‘INNEMA JUWEFFA SABIRUNE ‘EXHRAHUM BIGAJRI HISABI
39.15: FA’BUDU MA SHI’TUM MIN DUNIHI KUL ‘INNEL-HASIRINEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM WE ‘EHLIHIM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘ELA DHALIKE HUWEL-HUSRANUL-MUBIN
39.16: LEHUM MIN FEWKIHIM DHULELUN MINE NARI WE MIN TEHTIHIM DHULELUN DHALIKE JUHAWWIFU ALLAHU BIHI ‘IBADEHU JA ‘IBADI FE ETTEKUN
39.17: WEL-LEDHINE EXHTENEBUT-TAGUTE ‘EN JA’BUDUHA WE ‘ENABU ‘ILA ALLAHI LEHUMUL-BUSHRA FEBESHSHIR ‘IBAD
39.18: EL-LEDHINE JESTEMI’UNEL-KAWLE FEJETTEBI’UNE ‘EHSENEHU ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HEDAHUMU ALLAHU WE ‘ULA’IKE HUM ‘ULUL-’ELBAB
39.19: ‘EFEMEN HEKKA ‘ALEJHI KELIMETUL-’ADHABI ‘EFE’ENTE TUNKIDHU MEN FI NAR
39.20: LEKINIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM LEHUM GURAFUN MIN FEWKIHA GURAFUN MEBNIJETUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WA’DEL-LAHI LA JUHLIFU ALLAHUL-MI’A
39.21: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FESELEKEHU JENABI’A FIL-’ERDI THUMME JUHRIXHU BIHI ZER’ËN MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWANUHU THUMME JEHIXHU FETERAHU MUSFERRËN THUMME JEXH’ALUHU HUTAMËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LEDHIKRA LI’WLIL-’ELBAB
39.22: ‘EFEMEN SHERAHEL-LAHU SEDRAHU LIL’ISLAMI FEHUWE ‘ALA NURIN MIN RABBIHI FEWEJLUN LILKASIJETI KULUBUHUM MIN DHIKRI ALLAHI ‘ULA’IKE FI DELALIN MUBINI
39.23: ALLAHU NEZZELE ‘EHSENEL-HEDITHI KITABËN MUTES'HABIHËN METHANIJE TEKSHA’IRRU MINHU XHULUDUL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM THUMME TELINU XHULUDUHUM WE KULUBUHUM ‘ILA DHIKRI ALLAHI DHALIKE HUDA ALLAHI JEHDI BIHI MEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
39.24: ‘EFEMEN JETTEKI BIWEXHHIHI SU’EL-’ADHABI JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE KILE LILDHDHALIMINE DHUKU MA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
39.25: KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FE’ETAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
39.26: FE’EDHAKAHUMU ALLAHUL-HIZJE FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
39.27: WE LEKAD DERABNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN LE’ALLEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
39.29: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN RAXHULËN FIHI SHURAKA’U MUTESHAKISUNE WE RAXHULËN SELEMËN LIRAXHULIN HEL JESTEWIJANI METHELËNL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
39.32: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KEDHEBE ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEDHDHEBE BIS-SIDKI ‘IDH XHA’EHU ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILKAFIRIN
39.33: WEL-LEDHI XHA’E BIS-SIDKI WE SEDDEKA BIHI ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUTTEKUN
39.34: LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM DHALIKE XHEZA’UL-MUHSININ
39.35: LIJUKEFFIRAL-LAHU ‘ANHUM ‘ESWE’EL-LEDHI ‘AMILU WE JEXHZIJEHUM ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENIL-LEDHI KANU JA’MELUN
39.36: ‘ELEJSEL-LAHU BIKAFIN ‘ABDEHU WE JUHAWWIFUNEKE BIEL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
39.37: WE MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN MUDILLIN ‘ELEJSEL-LAHU BI’AZIZIN DHI ENTIKAMI
39.38: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE LEJEKULUNNEL-LAHU KUL ‘EFERA’EJTUM MA TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘IN ‘ERADENIJEL-LAHU BIDURRIN HEL HUNNE KASHIFATU DURRIHI ‘EW ‘ERADENI BIRAHMETIN HEL HUNNE MUMSIKATU RAHMETIHI KUL HESBIJEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI JETEWEKKELUL-MUTEWEKKILUN
39.39: KUL JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN FESEWFE TA’LEMUN
39.40: MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE JEHIL-LU ‘ALEJHI ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
39.41: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKEL-KITABE LILNNASI BIL-HEKKI FEMENI EHTEDA FELINEFSIHI WE MEN DEL-LE FE’INNEMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
39.42: ALLAHU JETEWEFFAL-’ENFUSE HINE MEWTIHA WE E-ETI LEM TEMUT FI MENAMIHA FEJUMSIKU EL-LETI KADA ‘ALEJHAL-MEWTE WE JURSILUL-’UHRA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
39.43: ‘EMI ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI SHUFA’A’E KUL ‘EWELEW KANU LA JEMLIKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JA’KILUN
39.44: KUL LIL-LAHI ESH-SHEFA’ATU XHEMI’ËN LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
39.45: WE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEHDEHU ESHME’EZZET KULUBUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI ‘IDHA HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
39.46: KULIL-LEHUMME FATIRA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘ALIMEL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI ‘ENTE TEHKUMU BEJNE ‘IBADIKE FI MA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
39.47: WE LEW ‘ENNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LAFTEDEW BIHI MIN SU’IL-’ADHABI JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE BEDA LEHUM MINEL-LAHI MA LEM JEKUNU JEHTESIBUN
39.48: WE BEDA LEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
39.49: FE’IDHA MESSEL-’INSANE DURRUN DA’ANA THUMME ‘IDHA HAWWELNAHU NI’METEN MINNA KALE ‘INNEMA ‘UTITUHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN BEL HIJE FITNETUN WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
39.50: KAD KALEHAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEKSIBUN
39.51: FE’ESABEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MIN HA’UULA’ SEJUSIBUHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WE MA HUM BIMU’XHIZIN
39.52: ‘EWELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
39.53: KUL JA ‘IBADIL-LEDHINE ‘ESRAFU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM LA TEKNETU MIN RAHMETI ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEGFIRU EDH-DHUNUBE XHEMI’ËN ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
39.54: WE ‘ENIBU ‘ILA RABBIKUM WE ‘ESLIMU LEHU MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUL-’ADHABU THUMME LA TUNSERUN
39.55: WE ETTEBI’U ‘EHSENE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUL-’ADHABU BEGTETEN WE ‘ENTUM LA TESH’URUN
39.56: ‘EN TEKULE NEFSUN JA HESRATA ‘ALA MA FERRATTU FI XHENBI ALLAHI WE ‘IN KUNTU LEMINE SAHIRIN
39.58: ‘EW TEKULE HINE TERAL-’ADHABE LEW ‘ENNE LI KERRATEN FE’EKUNE MINEL-MUHSININ
39.59: BELA KAD XHA’ETKE ‘AJATI FEKEDHDHEBTE BIHA WE ESTEKBERTE WE KUNTE MINEL-KAFIRIN
39.60: WE JEWMEL-KIJAMETI TERAL-LEDHINE KEDHEBU ‘ALA ALLAHI WUXHUHUHUM MUSWEDDETUN ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILMUTEKEBBIRIN
39.61: WE JUNEXHXHI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW BIMEFAZETIHIM LA JEMESSUHUMU SU’U WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
39.62: ALLAHU HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
39.63: LEHU MEKALIDU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI ALLAHI ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
39.65: WE LEKAD ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE WE ‘ILAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKE LE’IN ‘ESHRAKTE LEJEHBETENNE ‘AMELUKE WE LETEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
39.66: BELI ELLAHE FA’BUD WE KUN MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
39.67: WE MA KADERU ELLAHE HEKKA KADRIHI WEL-’ERDU XHEMI’ËN KABDETUHU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI WE SEMAWATU METWIJATUN BIJEMINIHI SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
39.68: WE NUFIHA FI SURI FESA’IKA MEN FI SEMAWATI WE MEN FIL-’ERDI ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’EL-LAHU THUMME NUFIHA FIHI ‘UHRA FE’IDHA HUM KIJAMUN JENDHURUN
39.69: WE ‘ESHRAKATIL-’ERDU BINURI RABBIHA WE WUDI’AL-KITABU WE XHI’E BIN-NEBIJINE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’I WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-HEKKI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
39.70: WE WUFFIJET KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMA JEF’ALUN
39.71: WE SIKAL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA XHEHENNEME ZUMERËN HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’UHA FUTIHET ‘EBWABUHA WE KALE LEHUM HAZENETUHA ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JETLUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATI RABBIKUM WE JUNDHIRUNEKUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA KALU BELA WE LEKIN HEKKAT KELIMETUL-’ADHABI ‘ALEL-KAFIRIN
39.72: KILE EDHULU ‘EBWABE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHA FEBI’SE METHWAL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
39.73: WE SIKAL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM ‘ILAL-XHENNETI ZUMERËN HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’UHA WE FUTIHET ‘EBWABUHA WE KALE LEHUM HAZENETUHA SELAMUN ‘ALEJKUM TIBTUM FADHULUHA HALIDIN
39.74: WE KALUL-HEMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI SEDEKANA WA’DEHU WE ‘EWRATHENAL-’ERDE NETEBEWWE’U MINEL-XHENNETI HEJTHU NESHA’U FENI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
39.75: WE TERAL-MELA’IKETE HAFFINE MIN HEWLIL-’ARSHI JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-HEKKI WE KILEL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN

40.3: GAFIRI EDH-DHENBI WE KABILIT-TEWBI SHEDIDIL-’IKABI DHIT-TEWLI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
40.4: MA JUXHADILU FI ‘AJATI ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE KEFERU FELA JEGRURKE TEKALLUBUHUM FIL-BILAD
40.5: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WEL-’EHZABU MIN BA’DIHIM WE HEMMET KUL-LU ‘UMMETIN BIRASULIHIM LIJE’HUDHUHU WE XHADELU BIL-BATILI LIJUDHIDU BIHIL-HEKKA FE’EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE ‘IKAB
40.6: WE KEDHELIKE HEKKAT KELIMETU RABBIKE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEHUM ‘ESHABU NAR
40.7: EL-LEDHINE JEHMILUNEL-’ARSHE WE MEN HEWLEHU JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE JESTEGFIRUNE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU RABBENA WESI’TE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN RAHMETEN WE ‘ILMËN FAGFIR LIL-LEDHINE TABU WE ETTEBA’U SEBILEKE WE KIHIM ‘ADHABEL-XHEHIM
40.8: RABBENA WE ‘EDHILHUM XHENNATI ‘ADNIN EL-LETI WE’ADTEHUM WE MEN SELEHE MIN ‘ABA’IHIM WE ‘EZWAXHIHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM ‘INNEKE ‘ENTEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
40.9: WE KIHIMU SEJJI’ATI WE MEN TEKI SEJJI’ATI JEWME’IDHIN FEKAD RAHIMTEHU WE DHELIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
40.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUNADEWNE LEMEKTU ALLAHI ‘EKBERU MIN MEKTIKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘IDH TUD’AWNE ‘ILAL-’IMANI FETEKFURUN
40.11: KALU RABBENA ‘EMETTENA ETHNETEJNI WE ‘EHJEJTENA ETHNETEJNI FA’TERAFNA BIDHUNUBINA FEHEL ‘ILA HURUXHIN MIN SEBILI
40.12: DHALIKUM BI’ENNEHU ‘IDHA DU’IJEL-LAHU WEHDEHU KEFERTUM WE ‘IN JUSHRAK BIHI TU’UMINU FALHUKMU LIL-LAHIL-’ALIJIL-KEBIR
40.13: HUWEL-LEDHI JURIKUM ‘AJATIHI WE JUNEZZILU LEKUM MINE SEMA’I RIZKËN WE MA JETEDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA MEN JUNIB
40.14: FAD’U ELLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINE WE LEW KERIHEL-KAFIRUN
40.15: RAFI’U ED-DERAXHATI DHUL-’ARSHI JULKI ER-RUHE MIN ‘EMRIHI ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBADIHI LIJUNDHIRA JEWMET-TELAK
40.16: JEWME HUM BARIZUNE LA JEHFA ‘ALA ALLAHI MINHUM SHEJ’UN LIMENIL-MULKUL-JEWME LIL-LAHIL-WAHIDIL-KAHHAR
40.17: EL-JEWME TUXHZA KUL-LU NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET LA DHULMEL-JEWME ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
40.18: WE ‘ENDHIRHUM JEWMEL-’AZIFETI ‘IDHIL-KULUBU LEDAL-HENAXHIRI KADHIMINE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN HEMIMIN WE LA SHEFI’IN JUTA’
40.19: JA’LEMU HA’INETEL-’A’JUNI WE MA TUHFI SUDUR
40.20: WEL-LAHU JEKDI BIL-HEKKI WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JEKDUNE BISHEJ’IN ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
40.21: ‘EWE LEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE KANU MIN KABLIHIM KANU HUM ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE ‘ATHARËN FIL-’ERDI FE’EHADHEHUMU ALLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM WE MA KANE LEHUM MINI ALLAHI MIN WAKI
40.22: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KANET TE’TIHIM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEKEFERU FE’EHADHEHUMU ALLAHU ‘INNEHU KAWIJUN SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
40.23: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
40.24: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE KARUNE FEKALU SAHIRUN KEDHDHABU
40.25: FELEMMA XHA’EHUM BIL-HEKKI MIN ‘INDINA KALU EKTULU ‘EBNA’EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU WE ESTEHJU NISA’EHUM WE MA KEJDUL-KAFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DELALI
40.26: WE KALE FIR’AWNU DHERUNI ‘EKTUL MUSA WE LIED’U RABBEHU ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘EN JUBEDDILE DINEKUM ‘EW ‘EN JUDHHIRA FIL-’ERDIL-FESAD
40.27: WE KALE MUSA ‘INNI ‘UDHTU BIRABBI WE RABBIKUM MIN KUL-LI MUTEKEBBIRIN LA JU’UMINU BIJEWMIL-HISAB
40.28: WE KALE RAXHULUN MU’UMINUN MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JEKTUMU ‘IMANEHU ‘ETEKTULUNE RAXHULËN ‘EN JEKULE RABBIJEL-LAHU WE KAD XHA’EKUM BIL-BEJJINATI MIN RABBIKUM WE ‘IN JEKU KADHIBËN FE’ALEJHI KEDHIBUHU WE ‘IN JEKU SADIKËN JUSIBKUM BA’DUL-LEDHI JA’IDUKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN HUWE MUSRIFUN KEDHDHABU
40.29: JA KAWMI LEKUMUL-MULKUL-JEWME DHAHIRINE FIL-’ERDI FEMEN JENSURUNA MIN BE’SI ALLAHI ‘IN XHA’ENA KALE FIR’AWNU MA ‘URIKUM ‘IL-LA MA ‘ERA WE MA ‘EHDIKUM ‘IL-LA SEBILE RASHAD
40.30: WE KALEL-LEDHI ‘AMENE JA KAWMI ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM MITHLE JEWMIL-’EHZAB
40.31: MITHLE DE’BI KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WEL-LEDHINE MIN BA’DIHIM WE MALLAHU JURIDU DHULMËN LIL’IBAD
40.33: JEWME TUWELLUNE MUDBIRINE MA LEKUM MINEL-LAHI MIN ‘ASIMIN WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
40.34: WE LEKAD XHA’EKUM JUSUFU MIN KABLU BIL-BEJJINATI FEMA ZILTUM FI SHEKKIN MIMMA XHA’EKUM BIHI HETTA ‘IDHA HELEKE KULTUM LEN JEB’ATHEL-LAHU MIN BA’DIHI RASULËN KEDHALIKE JUDIL-LU ALLAHU MEN HUWE MUSRIFUN MURTABU
40.35: EL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATI ALLAHI BIGAJRI SULTANIN ‘ETAHUM KEBURA MEKTËN ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘INDEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KEDHALIKE JETBA’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI KALBI MUTEKEBBIRIN XHEBBARI
40.36: WE KALE FIR’AWNU JA HAMANU EBNI LI SERHËN LE’ALLI ‘EBLUGUL-’ESBAB
40.37: ‘ESBABE SEMAWATI FE’ETTELI’A ‘ILA ‘ILEHI MUSA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUHU KADHIBËN WE KEDHELIKE ZUJJINE LIFIR’AWNE SU’U ‘AMELIHI WE SUDDE ‘ANI SEBILI WE MA KEJDU FIR’AWNE ‘IL-LA FI TEBABI
40.38: WE KALEL-LEDHI ‘AMENE JA KAWMI ETTEBI’UNI ‘EHDIKUM SEBILE RASHAD
40.39: JA KAWMI ‘INNEMA HEDHIHIL-HEJA ETU ED-DUNJA META’UN WE ‘INNEL-’AHIRATE HIJE DARUL-KARAR
40.40: MEN ‘AMILE SEJJI’ETEN FELA JUXHZA ‘IL-LA MITHLEHA WE MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULA’IKE JEDHULUNEL-XHENNETE JURZEKUNE FIHA BIGAJRI HISABI
40.41: WE JAKAWMI MA LI ‘ED’UKUM ‘ILA NEXHËTI WE TED’UNENI ‘ILA NAR
40.42: TED’UNENI LI’KFURA BIL-LAHI WE ‘USHRIKE BIHI MA LEJSE LI BIHI ‘ILMUN WE ‘ENA ‘ED’UKUM ‘ILAL-’AZIZIL-GAFFAR
40.43: LA XHERAME ‘ENNEMA TED’UNENI ‘ILEJHI LEJSE LEHU DA’WETUN FI ED-DUNJA WE LA FIL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ENNE MERADDENA ‘ILA ALLAHI WE ‘ENNEL-MUSRIFINE HUM ‘ESHABU NAR
40.44: FESETEDHKURUNE MA ‘EKULU LEKUM WE ‘UFEWWIDU ‘EMRI ‘ILA ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BESIRUN BIL-’IBAD
40.45: FEWEKAHU ALLAHU SEJJI’ATI MA MEKERU WE HAKA BI’ALI FIR’AWNE SU’UL-’ADHAB
40.46: NARU JU’RADUNE ‘ALEJHA GUDUWËN WE ‘ASHIJËN WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU ‘EDHILU ‘ALE FIR’AWNE ‘ESHEDDEL-’ADHAB
40.47: WE ‘IDH JETEHAXHXHUNE FI NARI FEJEKULU ED-DU’AFA’U LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUNNA LEKUM TEBA’ËN FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUGNUNE ‘ANNA NESIBËN MINE NAR
40.48: KALEL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUL-LUN FIHA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAD HEKEME BEJNEL-’IBAD
40.49: WE KALEL-LEDHINE FI NARI LIHAZENETI XHEHENNEME ED’U RABBEKUM JUHAFFIF ‘ANNA JEWMËN MINEL-’ADHAB
40.50: KALU ‘EWE LEM TEKU TE’TIKUM RUSULUKUM BIL-BEJJINATI KALU BELA KALU FAD’U WE MA DU’A’UL-KAFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DELALI
40.51: ‘INNA LENENSURU RUSULENA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE JEWME JEKUMUL-’ESH/HAD
40.52: JEWME LA JENFA’U EDH-DHALIMINE MA’DHIRATUHUM WE LEHUMUL-LA’NETU WE LEHUM SU’U ED-DAR
40.55: FASBIR ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE ESTEGFIR LIDHENBIKE WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE BIL-’ASHIJI WEL-’IBKAR
40.56: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATI ALLAHI BIGAJRI SULTANIN ‘ETAHUM ‘IN FI SUDURIHIM ‘IL-LA KIBRUN MA HUM BIBALIGIHI FASTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
40.57: LEHALKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI ‘EKBERU MIN HALKI NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
40.58: WE MA JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE LAL-MUSI’U KALILËN MA TETEDHEKKERUN
40.59: ‘INNE SA’ATE LE’ATIJETUN LA RAJBE FIHA WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
40.60: WE KALE RABBUKUM ED’UNI ‘ESTEXHIB LEKUM ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESTEKBIRUNE ‘AN ‘IBADETI SEJEDHULUNE XHEHENNEME DAHIRIN
40.61: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LITESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
40.62: DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
40.63: KEDHALIKE JU’UFEKUL-LEDHINE KANU BI’AJATI ALLAHI JEXHHEDUN
40.64: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDE KARARËN WE SEMA’E BINA’EN WE SEWWERAKUM FE’EHSENE SUWERAKUM WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBATI DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBUKUM FETEBARAKEL-LAHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
40.65: HUWEL-HEJJU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FAD’UHU MUHLISINE LEHU ED-DINEL-HEMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
40.66: KUL ‘INNI NUHITU ‘EN ‘A’BUDEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI LEMMA XHA’ENIJEL-BEJJINATU MIN RABBI WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘USLIME LIRABBIL-’ALEMIN
40.67: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME MIN ‘ALEKATIN THUMME JUHRIXHUKUM TIFLËN THUMME LITEBLUGU ‘ESHUDDEKUM THUMME LITEKUNU SHUJUHËN WE MINKUM MEN JUTEWEFFA MIN KABLU WE LITEBLUGU ‘EXHELËN MUSEMMEN WE LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
40.68: HUWEL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU FE’IDHA KADA ‘EMRËN FE’INNEMA JEKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
40.70: EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BIL-KITABI WE BIMA ‘ERSELNA BIHI RUSULENA FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
40.73: THUMME KILE LEHUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TUSHRIKUN
40.74: MIN DUNI ALLAHI KALU DELLU ‘ANNA BEL LEM NEKUN NED’U MIN KABLU SHEJ’ËN KEDHALIKE JUDIL-LU ALLAHUL-KAFIRIN
40.75: DHALIKUM BIMA KUNTUM TEFRAHUNE FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE BIMA KUNTUM TEMRAHUN
40.76: EDHULU ‘EBWABE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHA FEBI’SE METHWAL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
40.77: FASBIR ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN FE’IMMA NURIJENNEKE BA’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’ILEJNA JURXHA’UN
40.78: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULËN MIN KABLIKE MINHUM MEN KASESNA ‘ALEJKE WE MINHUM MEN LEM NEKSUS ‘ALEJKE WE MA KANE LIRASULIN ‘EN JE’TIJE BI’AJETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI FE’IDHA XHA’E ‘EMRU ALLAHI KUDIJE BIL-HEKKI WE HASIRA HUNALIKEL-MUBTILUN
40.79: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’EN’AM LITERKEBU MINHA WE MINHA TE’KULUN
40.80: WE LEKUM FIHA MENAFI’U WE LITEBLUGU ‘ALEJHA HAXHETEN FI SUDURIKUM WE ‘ALEJHA WE ‘ALEL-FULKI TUHMELUN
40.82: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KANU ‘EKTHERA MINHUM WE ‘ESHEDDE KUWETEN WE ‘ATHARËN FIL-’ERDI FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM MA KANU JEKSIBUN
40.83: FELEMMA XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FERIHU BIMA ‘INDEHUM MINEL-’ILMI WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
40.84: FELEMMA RA’EW BE’SENA KALU ‘AMENNA BIL-LAHI WEHDEHU WE KEFERNA BIMA KUNNA BIHI MUSHRIKIN
40.85: FELEM JEKU JENFA’UHUM ‘IMANUHUM LEMMA RA’EW BE’SENA SUNNETEL-LAHI EL-LETI KAD HALET FI ‘IBADIHI WE HASIRA HUNALIKEL-KAFIRUN

41.4: BESHIRËN WE NEDHIRËN FE’A’RADE ‘EKTHERUHUM FEHUM LA JESMA’UN
41.5: WE KALU KULUBUNA FI ‘EKINNETIN MIMMA TED’UNA ‘ILEJHI WE FI ‘ADHANINA WEKRUN WE MIN BEJNINA WE BEJNIKE HIXHABUN FA’MEL ‘INNENA ‘AMILUN
41.6: KUL ‘INNEMA ‘ENA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘ENNEMA ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WAHIDUN FASTEKIMU ‘ILEJHI WE ESTEGFIRUHU WE WEJLUN LILMUSHRIKIN
41.7: EL-LEDHINE LA JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
41.9: KUL ‘E’INNEKUM LETEKFURUNE BIEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’ERDE FI JEWMEJNI WE TEXH’ALUNE LEHU ‘ENDADËN DHALIKE RABBUL-’ALEMIN
41.10: WE XHE’ALE FIHA RAWASIJE MIN FEWKIHA WE BARAKE FIHA WE KADDERA FIHA ‘EKWATEHA FI ‘ERBE’ATI ‘EJJAMIN SEWA’EN LILSSA’ILIN
41.11: THUMME ESTEWA ‘ILA SEMA’I WE HIJE DUHANUN FEKALE LEHA WE LIL’ERDI EI’TIJA TEW’ËN ‘EW KERHËN KALETA ‘ETEJNA TA’I’IN
41.12: FEKADAHUNNE SEB’A SEMAWATIN FI JEWMEJNI WE ‘EWHA FI KUL-LI SEMA’IN ‘EMRAHA WE ZEJJENNA SEMA’E ED-DUNJA BIMESABIHE WE HIFDHËN DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
41.13: FE’IN ‘A’RADU FEKUL ‘ENDHERTUKUM SA’IKATEN MITHLE SA’IKATI ‘ADIN WE THEMUD
41.14: ‘IDH XHA’ET/HUMU ER-RUSULU MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM WE MIN HALFIHIM ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE KALU LEW SHA’E RABBUNA LE’ENZELE MELA’IKETEN FE’INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
41.15: FE’EMMA ‘ADUN FASTEKBERU FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE KALU MEN ‘ESHEDDU MINNA KUWETEN ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNEL-LAHEL-LEDHI HALEKAHUM HUWE ‘ESHEDDU MINHUM KUWETEN WE KANU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
41.16: FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN SERSERËN FI ‘EJJAMIN NEHISATIN LINUDHIKAHUM ‘ADHABEL-HIZJI FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EHZA WE HUM LA JUNSERUN
41.17: WE ‘EMMA THEMUDU FEHEDEJNAHUM FASTEHEBBUL-’AMA ‘ALEL-HUDA FE’EHADHET/HUM SA’IKATUL-’ADHABIL-HUNI BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
41.19: WE JEWME JUHSHERU ‘A’DA’U ALLAHI ‘ILA NARI FEHUM JUZA’UN
41.20: HETTA ‘IDHA MA XHA’UHA SHEHIDE ‘ALEJHIM SEM’UHUM WE ‘EBSARUHUM WE XHULUDUHUM BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
41.21: WE KALU LIXHULUDIHIM LIME SHEHIDTUM ‘ALEJNA KALU ‘ENTEKANALLAHUL-LEDHI ‘ENTEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN WE HUWE HALEKAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
41.22: WE MA KUNTUM TESTETIRUNE ‘EN JESH/HEDE ‘ALEJKUM SEM’UKUM WE LA ‘EBSARUKUM WE LA XHULUDUKUM WE LEKIN DHENENTUM ‘ENNEL-LAHE LA JA’LEMU KETHIRËN MIMMA TA’MELUN
41.23: WE DHELIKUM DHENNUKUMUL-LEDHI DHENENTUM BIRABBIKUM ‘ERDAKUM FE’ESBEHTUM MINEL-HASIRIN
41.24: FE’IN JESBIRU FALNNARU METHWEN LEHUM WE ‘IN JESTA’TIBU FEMA HUM MINEL-MU’TEBIN
41.25: WE KAJJEDNA LEHUM KURANA’E FEZEJJENU LEHUM MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE HEKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INNEHUM KANU HASIRIN
41.26: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TESMA’U LIHEDHAL-KUR’ANI WEL-GAW FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEGLIBUN
41.27: FELENUDHIKANNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘ESWE’EL-LEDHI KANU JA’MELUN
41.28: DHALIKE XHEZA’U ‘A’DA’I ALLAHI NARU LEHUM FIHA DARUL-HULDI XHEZA’EN BIMA KANU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
41.29: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU RABBENA ‘ERINAL-LEDHEJNI ‘EDELLANA MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI NEXH’ALHUMA TEHTE ‘EKDAMINA LIJEKUNA MINEL-’ESFELIN
41.30: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KALU RABBUNALLAHU THUMME ESTEKAMU TETENEZZELU ‘ALEJHIMUL-MELA’IKETU ‘ELLA TEHAFU WE LA TEHZENU WE ‘EBSHIRU BIL-XHENNETI EL-LETI KUNTUM TU’ADUN
41.31: NEHNU ‘EWLIJA’UUKUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE FIL-’AHIRATI WE LEKUM FIHA MA TESHTEHI ‘ENFUSUKUM WE LEKUM FIHA MA TEDDA’UN
41.33: WE MEN ‘EHSENU KAWLËN MIMMEN DA’A ‘ILA ALLAHI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN WE KALE ‘INNENI MINEL-MUSLIMIN
41.34: WE LA TESTEWIL-HESENETU WE LA SEJJI’ETU EDFA’ BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU FE’IDHAL-LEDHI BEJNEKE WE BEJNEHU ‘ADAWETUN KE’ENNEHU WE LIJUN HEMIMU
41.35: WE MA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LAL-LEDHINE SEBERU WE MA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LA DHU HEDHDHIN ‘ADHIMI
41.36: WE ‘IMMA JENZEGANNEKE MINE ESH-SHEJTANI NEZGUN FASTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
41.37: WE MIN ‘AJATIHIL-LEJLU WE NEHARU WE ESH-SHEMSU WEL-KAMERU LA TESXHUDU LILSHSHEMSI WE LA LILKAMERI WE ESXHUDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HALEKAHUNNE ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
41.38: FE’INI ESTEKBERU FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘INDE RABBIKE JUSEBBIHUNE LEHU BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE HUM LA JES’EMUN
41.39: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘ENNEKE TERAL-’ERDE HASHI’ATEN FE’IDHA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHAL-MA’E EHTEZZET WE RABET ‘INNEL-LEDHI ‘EHJAHA LEMUHJIL-MEWTA ‘INNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
41.40: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JULHIDUNE FI ‘AJATINA LA JEHFEWNE ‘ALEJNA ‘EFEMEN JULKA FI NARI HAJRUN ‘EM MEN JE’TI ‘AMINËN JEWMEL-KIJAMETI A’MELU MA SHI’TUM ‘INNEHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
41.41: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIDH-DHIKRI LEMMA XHA’EHUM WE ‘INNEHU LEKITABUN ‘AZIZU
41.42: LA JE’TIHIL-BATILU MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE LA MIN HALFIHI TENZILUN MIN HEKIMIN HEMIDI
41.43: MA JUKALU LEKE ‘IL-LA MA KAD KILE LILRRUSULI MIN KABLIKE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU MEGFIRATIN WE DHU ‘IKABIN ‘ELIMI
41.44: WE LEW XHE’ALNAHU KUR’ANËN ‘A’XHEMIJËN LEKALU LEWLA FUSSILET ‘AJATUHU ‘E’A’XHEMIJUN WE ‘ARABIJUN KUL HUWE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU HUDEN WE SHIFA’UN WEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRUN WE HUWE ‘ALEJHIM ‘AMEN ‘ULA’IKE JUNADEWNE MIN MEKANIN BA’IDI
41.45: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FAHTULIFE FIHI WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNEHUM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
41.46: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘ESA’E FE’ALEJHA WE MA RABBUKE BIDHEL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
41.47: ‘ILEJHI JURADDU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE MA TEHRUXHU MIN THEMERATIN MIN ‘EKMAMIHA WE MA TEHMILU MIN ‘UNTHA WE LA TEDA’U ‘IL-LA BI’ILMIHI WE JEWME JUNADIHIM ‘EJNE SHURAKA’I KALU ‘ADHENNAKE MA MINNA MIN SHEHIDI
41.48: WE DEL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KANU JED’UNE MIN KABLU WE DHENNU MA LEHUM MIN MEHISI
41.49: LA JES’EMUL-’INSANU MIN DU’A’IL-HAJRI WE ‘IN MESSEHU ESH-SHERRU FEJE’USUN KANUTU
41.50: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAHU RAHMETEN MINNA MIN BA’DI DERRA’E MESSET/HU LEJEKULENNE HADHA LI WE MA ‘EDHUNNU SA’ATE KA’IMETEN WE LE’IN RUXHI’TU ‘ILA RABBI ‘INNE LI ‘INDEHU LELHUSNA FELENUNEBBI’ENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIMA ‘AMILU WE LENUDHIKANNEHUM MIN ‘ADHABIN GALIDHI
41.51: WE ‘IDHA ‘EN’AMNA ‘ALEL-’INSANI ‘A’RADE WE NE’A BIXHANIBIHI WE ‘IDHA MESSEHU ESH-SHERRU FEDHU DU’A’IN ‘ARIDI
41.52: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KANE MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI THUMME KEFERTUM BIHI MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMEN HUWE FI SHIKAKIN BA’IDI
41.53: SENURIHIM ‘AJATINA FIL-’AFAKI WE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM HETTA JETEBEJJENE LEHUM ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU ‘EWELEM JEKFI BIRABBIKE ‘ENNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
41.54: ‘ELA ‘INNEHUM FI MIRJETIN MIN LIKA’I RABBIHIM ‘ELA ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUHITU

42.4: LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-’ADHIM
42.5: TEKADU SEMAWATU JETEFETTERNE MIN FEWKIHINNE WEL-MELA’IKETU JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE JESTEGFIRUNE LIMEN FIL-’ERDI ‘ELA ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
42.6: WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’EL-LAHU HEFIDHUN ‘ALEJHIM WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
42.7: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE KUR’ANËN ‘ARABIJËN LITUNDHIRA ‘UMMEL-KURA WE MEN HEWLEHA WE TUNDHIRA JEWMEL-XHEM’I LA RAJBE FIHI FERIKUN FIL-XHENNETI WE FERIKUN FI SA’IR
42.8: WE LEW SHA’EL-LAHU LEXHE’ALEHUM ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN WE LEKIN JUDHILU MEN JESHA’U FI RAHMETIHI WE EDH-DHALIMUNE MA LEHUM MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
42.9: ‘EM ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E FE-ALLAHU HUWEL-WELIJU WE HUWE JUHJIL-MEWTA WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
42.10: WE MA EHTELEFTUM FIHI MIN SHEJ’IN FEHUKMUHU ‘ILA ALLAHI DHELIKUMU ALLAHU RABBI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI ‘UNIB
42.11: FATIRU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWAXHËN WE MINEL-’EN’AM ‘EZWAXHËN JEDHRA’UUKUM FIHI LEJSE KEMITHLIHI SHEJ’UN WE HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
42.12: LEHU MEKALIDU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JEBSUTU ER-RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
42.13: SHERA’A LEKUM MINE ED-DINI MA WESSA BIHI NUHËN WEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE WE MA WESSEJNA BIHI ‘IBRAHIME WE MUSA WE ‘ISA ‘EN ‘EKIMU ED-DINE WE LA TETEFERRAKU FIHI KEBURA ‘ALEL-MUSHRIKINE MA TED’UHUM ‘ILEJHI ALLAHU JEXHTEBI ‘ILEJHI MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI ‘ILEJHI MEN JUNIB
42.14: WE MA TEFERRAKU ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEGJËN BEJNEHUM WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘URITHUL-KITABE MIN BA’DIHIM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
42.15: FELIDHELIKE FAD’U WE ESTEKIM KEMA ‘UMIRTE WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWA’EHUM WE KUL ‘AMENTU BIMA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU MIN KITABIN WE ‘UMIRTU LI’’DILE BEJNEKUMU ALLAHU RABBUNA WE RABBUKUM LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM LA HUXHXHETE BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUMU ALLAHU JEXHMA’U BEJNENA WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
42.16: WEL-LEDHINE JUHAXHXHUNE FI ALLAHI MIN BA’DI MA ESTUXHIBE LEHU HUXHXHETUHUM DAHIDETUN ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE ‘ALEJHIM GADEBUN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDU
42.17: ALLAHUL-LEDHI ‘ENZELEL-KITABE BIL-HEKKI WEL-MIZANE WE MA JUDRIKE LE’ALLE SA’ATE KARIBU
42.18: JESTA’XHILU BIHAL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIHA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MUSHFIKUNE MINHA WE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHAL-HEKKU ‘ELA ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUMARUNE FI SA’ATI LEFI DELALIN BA’IDI
42.19: ALLAHU LETIFUN BI’IBADIHI JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-KAWIJUL-’AZIZ
42.20: MEN KANE JURIDU HERTHEL-’AHIRATI NEZID LEHU FI HERTHIHI WE MEN KANE JURIDU HERTHE ED-DUNJA NU’UTIHI MINHA WE MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN NESIBI
42.21: ‘EM LEHUM SHURAKA’U SHERA’U LEHUM MINE ED-DINI MA LEM JE’DHEN BIHI ALLAHU WE LEWLA KELIMETUL-FESLI LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
42.22: TERA EDH-DHALIMINE MUSHFIKINE MIMMA KESEBU WE HUWE WAKI’UN BIHIM WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FI RAWDATIL-XHENNATI LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM DHALIKE HUWEL-FEDLUL-KEBIR
42.23: DHALIKEL-LEDHI JUBESHSHIRU ALLAHU ‘IBADEHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KUL LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRËN ‘IL-LAL-MEWEDDETE FIL-KURBA WE MEN JEKTERIF HESENETEN NEZID LEHU FIHA HUSNËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN SHEKURU
42.24: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN FE’IN JESHE’I ALLAHU JEHTIM ‘ALA KALBIKE WE JEMHU ALLAHUL-BATILE WE JUHIKKUL-HEKKA BIKELIMATIHI ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
42.25: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JEKBELUT-TEWBET ‘AN ‘IBADIHI WE JA’FU ‘ANI SEJJI’ATI WE JA’LEMU MA TEF’ALUN
42.26: WE JESTEXHIBUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE JEZIDUHUM MIN FEDLIHI WEL-KAFIRUNE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDU
42.27: WE LEW BESETEL-LAHU ER-RIZKA LI’IBADIHI LEBEGAW FIL-’ERDI WE LEKIN JUNEZZILU BIKADERIN MA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU BI’IBADIHI HABIRUN BESIRU
42.28: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JUNEZZILUL-GAJTHE MIN BA’DI MA KANETU WE JENSHURU RAHMETEHU WE HUWEL-WELIJUL-HEMID
42.29: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI HALKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BETHTHE FIHIMA MIN DABBETIN WE HUWE ‘ALA XHEM’IHIM ‘IDHA JESHA’U KADIRU
42.30: WE MA ‘ESABEKUM MIN MUSIBETIN FEBIMA KESEBET ‘EJDIKUM WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRI
42.31: WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZINE FIL-’ERDI WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
42.33: ‘IN JESHE’ JUSKINI ER-RIHE FEJEDHLELNE RAWAKIDE ‘ALA DHEHRIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBARIN SHEKURI
42.34: ‘EW JUBIKHUNNE BIMA KESEBU WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRI
42.35: WE JA’LEMEL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATINA MA LEHUM MIN MEHISI
42.36: FEMA ‘UTITUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEMETA’UL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE MA ‘INDEL-LAHI HAJRUN WE ‘EBKA LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
42.37: WEL-LEDHINE JEXHTENIBUNE KEBA’IRAL-’ITHMI WEL-FEWAHISHE WE ‘IDHA MA GADIBU HUM JEGFIRUN
42.38: WEL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIRABBIHIM WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘EMRUHUM SHURA BEJNEHUM WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
42.40: WE XHEZA’U SEJJI’ETIN SEJJI’ETUN MITHLUHA FEMEN ‘AFA WE ‘ESLEHE FE’EXHRUHU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
42.41: WE LEMENI ENTESERA BA’DE DHULMIHI FE’ULA’IKE MA ‘ALEJHIM MIN SEBILI
42.42: ‘INNEMA SEBILU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JEDHLIMUNE NASE WE JEBGUNE FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
42.43: WE LEMEN SEBERA WE GAFERA ‘INNE DHALIKE LEMIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
42.44: WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN WE LIJIN MIN BA’DIHI WE TERA EDH-DHALIMINE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE JEKULUNE HEL ‘ILA MERADDIN MIN SEBILI
42.45: WE TERAHUM JU’RADUNE ‘ALEJHA HASHI’INE MINE EDH-DHULLI JENDHURUNE MIN TERFIN HAFIJIN WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNEL-HASIRINEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ENFUSEHUM WE ‘EHLIHIM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘ELA ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE FI ‘ADHABIN MUKIMI
42.46: WE MA KANE LEHUM MIN ‘EWLIJA’E JENSURUNEHUM MIN DUNI ALLAHI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN SEBILI
42.47: ESTEXHIBU LIRABBIKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA MERADDE LEHU MINEL-LAHI MA LEKUM MIN MELXHE’IIN JEWME’IDHIN WE MA LEKUM MIN NEKIRI
42.48: FE’IN ‘A’RADU FEMA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHËN ‘IN ‘ALEJKE ‘IL-LAL-BELAGU WE ‘INNA ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNAL-’INSANE MINNA RAHMETEN FERIHE BIHA WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM FE’INNEL-’INSANE KEFURU
42.49: LIL-LAHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U JEHEBU LIMEN JESHA’U ‘INATHËN WE JEHEBU LIMEN JESHA’U EDH-DHUKUR
42.50: ‘EW JUZEWWIXHUHUM DHUKRANËN WE ‘INATHËN WE JEXH’ALU MEN JESHA’U ‘AKIMËN ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN KADIRU
42.51: WE MA KANE LIBESHERIN ‘EN JUKELLIMEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA WEHJËN ‘EW MIN WERA’I HIXHABIN ‘EW JURSILE RASULËN FEJUHIJE BI’IDHNIHI MA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU ‘ALIJUN HEKIMU
42.52: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE RUHËN MIN ‘EMRINA MA KUNTE TEDRI MAL-KITABU WE LAL-’IMANU WE LEKIN XHE’ALNAHU NURËN NEHDI BIHI MEN NESHA’U MIN ‘IBADINA WE ‘INNEKE LETEHDI ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
42.53: SIRATI ALLAHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI ‘ELA ‘ILA ALLAHI TESIRUL-’UMUR

43.7: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
43.8: FE’EHLEKNA ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM BETSHËN WE MEDA METHELUL-’EWWELIN
43.9: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE LEJEKULUNNE HALEKAHUNNEL-’AZIZUL-’ALIM
43.10: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDE MEHDËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM FIHA SUBULËN LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
43.11: WEL-LEDHI NEZZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN BIKADERIN FE’ENSHERNA BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN KEDHALIKE TUHRAXHUN
43.12: WEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’EZWAXHE KUL-LEHA WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MINEL-FULKI WEL-’EN’AM MA TERKEBUN
43.13: LITESTEWU ‘ALA DHUHURIHI THUMME TEDHKURU NI’METE RABBIKUM ‘IDHA ESTEWEJTUM ‘ALEJHI WE TEKULU SUBHANEL-LEDHI SEHHARA LENA HADHA WE MA KUNNA LEHU MUKRININ
43.15: WE XHE’ALU LEHU MIN ‘IBADIHI XHUZ’ËN ‘INNEL-’INSANE LEKEFURUN MUBINU
43.16: ‘EM ETTEHADHE MIMMA JEHLUKU BENATIN WE ‘ESFAKUM BIL-BENIN
43.17: WE ‘IDHA BUSHSHIRA ‘EHEDUHUM BIMA DERABE LILRRAHMENI METHELËN DHELLE WEXHHUHU MUSWEDDËN WE HUWE KEDHIMU
43.18: ‘EWEMEN JUNESHSHE’U FIL-HILJETI WE HUWE FIL-HISAMI GAJRU MUBINI
43.19: WE XHE’ALUL-MELA’IKETEL-LEDHINE HUM ‘IBADU RAHMANI ‘INATHËN ‘ESHEHIDU HALKAHUM SETUKTEBU SHEHADETUHUM WE JUS’ELUN
43.20: WE KALU LEW SHA’E RAHMANU MA ‘ABEDNAHUM MA LEHUM BIDHALIKE MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
43.21: ‘EM ‘ATEJNAHUM KITABËN MIN KABLIHI FEHUM BIHI MUSTEMSIKUN
43.23: WE KEDHELIKE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE FI KARJETIN MIN NEDHIRIN ‘IL-LA KALE MUTRAFUHA ‘INNA WEXHEDNA ‘ABA’ENA ‘ALA ‘UMMETIN WE ‘INNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM MUKTEDUN
43.24: KALE ‘EWELEW XHI’TUKUM BI’EHDA MIMMA WEXHEDTUM ‘ALEJHI ‘ABA’EKUM KALU ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
43.26: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI ‘INNENI BERA’UN MIMMA TA’BUDUN
43.28: WE XHE’ALEHA KELIMETEN BAKIJETEN FI ‘AKIBIHI LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
43.29: BEL METTA’TU HA’UULA’ WE ‘ABA’EHUM HETTA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU WE RASULUN MUBINU
43.30: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU KALU HADHA SIHRUN WE ‘INNA BIHI KAFIRUN
43.31: WE KALU LEWLA NUZZILE HADHAL-KUR’ANU ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINEL-KARJETEJNI ‘ADHIMI
43.32: ‘EHUM JEKSIMUNE RAHMETE RABBIKE NEHNU KASEMNA BEJNEHUM MA’ISHETEHUM FIL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WE RAFA’NA BA’DEHUM FEWKA BA’DIN DERAXHATIN LIJETTEHIDHE BA’DUHUM BA’DËN SUHRIJËN WE RAHMETU RABBIKE HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
43.33: WE LEWLA ‘EN JEKUNE NASU ‘UMMETEN WAHIDETEN LEXHE’ALNA LIMEN JEKFURU BIR-RAHMENI LIBUJUTIHIM SUKUFËN MIN FEDDETIN WE MA’ARIXHE ‘ALEJHA JEDHHERUN
43.35: WE ZUHRUFËN WE ‘IN KUL-LU DHALIKE LEMMA META’UL-HEJËTI ED-DUNJA WEL-’AHIRATU ‘INDE RABBIKE LILMUTTEKIN
43.36: WE MEN JA’SHU ‘AN DHIKRI RAHMANI NUKAJJID LEHU SHEJTANËN FEHUWE LEHU KARINU
43.37: WE ‘INNEHUM LEJESUDDUNEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM MUHTEDUN
43.38: HETTA ‘IDHA XHA’ENA KALE JA LEJTE BEJNI WE BEJNEKE BU’DEL-MESHRIKAJNI FEBI’SEL-KARIN
43.39: WE LEN JENFE’AKUMUL-JEWME ‘IDH DHELEMTUM ‘ENNEKUM FIL-’ADHABI MUSHTERIKUN
43.40: ‘EFE’ENTE TUSMI’U SUMME ‘EW TEHDIL-’UMJE WE MEN KANE FI DELALIN MUBINI
43.41: FE’IMMA NEDH/HEBENNE BIKE FE’INNA MINHUM MUNTEKIMUN
43.44: WE ‘INNEHU LEDHIKRUN LEKE WE LIKAWMIKE WE SEWFE TUS’ELUN
43.45: WE ES’EL MEN ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RUSULINA ‘EXHE’ALNA MIN DUNI RAHMANI ‘ALIHETEN JU’BEDUN
43.46: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FEKALE ‘INNI RASULU RABBIL-’ALEMIN
43.47: FELEMMA XHA’EHUM BI’AJATINA ‘IDHA HUM MINHA JEDHEKUN
43.48: WE MA NURIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN ‘IL-LA HIJE ‘EKBERU MIN ‘UHTIHA WE ‘EHADHNAHUM BIL-’ADHABI LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
43.49: WE KALU JA ‘EJJUHA SAHIRU ED’U LENA RABBEKE BIMA ‘AHIDE ‘INDEKE ‘INNENA LEMUHTEDU
43.51: WE NADA FIR’AWNU FI KAWMIHI KALE JA KAWMI ‘ELEJSE LI MULKU MISRA WE HEDHIHIL-’ENHARU TEXHRI MIN TEHTI ‘EFELA TUBSIRUN
43.52: ‘EM ‘ENA HAJRUN MIN HADHAL-LEDHI HUWE MEHINUN WE LA JEKADU JUBIN
43.53: FELEWLA ‘ULKIJE ‘ALEJHI ‘ESWIRATUN MIN DHEHEBIN ‘EW XHA’E ME’AHUL-MELA’IKETU MUKTERININ
43.54: FASTEHAFFE KAWMEHU FE’ETA’UHU ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWMËN FASIKIN
43.57: WE LEMMA DURIBE EBNU MERJEME METHELËN ‘IDHA KAWMUKE MINHU JESIDDUN
43.58: WE KALU ‘E’ALIHETUNA HAJRUN ‘EM HUWE MA DERABUHU LEKE ‘IL-LA XHEDELËN BEL HUM KAWMUN HASIMUN
43.60: WE LEW NESHA’U LEXHE’ALNA MINKUM MELA’IKETEN FIL-’ERDI JEHLUFUN
43.61: WE ‘INNEHU LA’ILMUN LILSSA’ATI FELA TEMTERUNNE BIHA WE ETTEBI’UNI HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
43.62: WE LA JESUDDENNEKUMU ESH-SHEJTANU ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
43.63: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘ISA BIL-BEJJINATI KALE KAD XHI’TUKUM BIL-HIKMETI WE LI’EBEJJINE LEKUM BA’DEL-LEDHI TEHTELIFUNE FIHI FE ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’UN
43.64: ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWE RABBI WE RABBUKUM FA’BUDUHU HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
43.65: FAHTELEFEL-’EHZABU MIN BEJNIHIM FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMIN ‘ELIMI
43.66: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SA’ATE ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
43.68: JA ‘IBADI LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJKUMUL-JEWME WE LA ‘ENTUM TEHZENUN
43.71: JUTAFU ‘ALEJHIM BISIHAFIN MIN DHEHEBIN WE ‘EKWABIN WE FIHA MA TESHTEHIHIL-’ENFUSU WE TELEDHDHUL-’A’JUNU WE ‘ENTUM FIHA HALIDUN
43.72: WE TILKEL-XHENNETU EL-LETI ‘URITHTUMUHA BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
43.73: LEKUM FIHA FAKIHETUN KETHIRATUN MINHA TE’KULUN
43.75: LA JUFETTERU ‘ANHUM WE HUM FIHI MUBLISUN
43.76: WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LEKIN KANU HUMU EDH-DHALIMIN
43.77: WE NADEW JA MALIKU LIJEKDI ‘ALEJNA RABBUKE KALE ‘INNEKUM MAKITHUN
43.78: LEKAD XHI’NAKUM BIL-HEKKI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAKUM LILHEKKI KARIHUN
43.80: ‘EM JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNA LA NESMA’U SIRRAHUM WE NEXHWAHUM BELA WE RUSULUNA LEDEJHIM JEKTUBUN
43.82: SUBHANE RABBI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI RABBIL-’ARSHI ‘AMMA JESIFUN
43.83: FEDHERHUM JEHUDU WE JEL’ABU HETTA JULAKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN
43.84: WE HUWEL-LEDHI FI SEMA’I ‘ILEHUN WE FIL-’ERDI ‘ILEHUN WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-’ALIM
43.85: WE TEBARAKEL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE ‘INDEHU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
43.86: WE LA JEMLIKUL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI ESH-SHEFA’ATE ‘IL-LA MEN SHEHIDE BIL-HEKKI WE HUM JA’LEMUN
43.87: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKAHUM LEJEKULUNNEL-LAHU FE’ENNA JU’UFEKUN
43.88: WE KILIHI JA RABBI ‘INNE HA’UULA’ KAWMUN LA JU’UMINUN
43.89: FASFEH ‘ANHUM WE KUL SELAMUN FESEWFE JA’LEMUN

44.7: RABBI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM MUKININ
44.8: LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU RABBUKUM WE RABBU ‘ABA’IKUMUL-’EWWELIN
44.10: FARTEKIB JEWME TE’TI SEMA’U BIDUHANIN MUBINI
44.13: ‘ENNA LEHUMU EDH-DHIKRA WE KAD XHA’EHUM RASULUN MUBINU
44.14: THUMME TEWEL-LEW ‘ANHU WE KALU MU’ALLEMUN MEXHNUNU
44.17: WE LEKAD FETENNA KABLEHUM KAWME FIR’AWNE WE XHA’EHUM RASULUN KERIMU
44.19: WE ‘EN LA TA’LU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNI ‘ATIKUM BISULTANIN MUBINI
44.29: FEMA BEKET ‘ALEJHIMU SEMA’U WEL-’ERDU WE MA KANU MUNDHERIN
44.33: WE ‘ATEJNAHUM MINEL-’AJATI MA FIHI BELA’UN MUBINU
44.35: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA MEWTETUNAL-’ULA WE MA NEHNU BIMUNSHERIN
44.37: ‘EHUM HAJRUN ‘EM KAWMU TUBBA’IN WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM ‘EHLEKNAHUM ‘INNEHUM KANU MUXHRIMIN
44.38: WE MA HALEKNA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA LA’IBIN
44.39: MA HALEKNAHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
44.41: JEWME LA JUGNI MEWLEN ‘AN MEWLEN SHEJ’ËN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN

93.3: MA WEDDE’AKE RABBUKE WE MA KAL

96.15: KEL-LA LE’IN LEM JENTEHI LENESFA’A BIN-NASIJET
96.19: KEL-LA LA TUTI’HU WE ESXHUD WAKTERI

45.4: WE FI HALKIKUM WE MA JEBUTHTHU MIN DABBETIN ‘AJATUN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
45.5: WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU MINE SEMA’I MIN RIZKIN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA WE TESRIFI ER-RIJAHI ‘AJATUN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
45.6: TILKE ‘AJATU ALLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HEKKI FEBI’EJJI HEDITHIN BA’DEL-LAHI WE ‘AJATIHI JU’UMINUN
45.8: JESMA’U ‘AJATI ALLAHI TUTLA ‘ALEJHI THUMME JUSIRRU MUSTEKBIRËN KE’EN LEM JESMA’HA FEBESHSHIRHU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
45.9: WE ‘IDHA ‘ALIME MIN ‘AJATINA SHEJ’ËN ETTEHADHEHA HUZUEN ‘ULA’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
45.10: MIN WERA’IHIM XHEHENNEMU WE LA JUGNI ‘ANHUM MA KESEBU SHEJ’ËN WE LA MA ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘EWLIJA’E WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
45.11: HADHA HUDEN WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MIN RIXHZIN ‘ELIMU
45.12: ALLAHUL-LEDHI SEHHARA LEKUMUL-BEHRA LITEXHRIJEL-FULKU FIHI BI’EMRIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
45.13: WE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN MINHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
45.14: KUL LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JEGFIRU LIL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE ‘EJJAMEL-LAHI LIJEXHZIJE KAWMËN BIMA KANU JEKSIBUN
45.15: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘ESA’E FE’ALEJHA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM TURXHA’UN
45.16: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA BENI ‘ISRA’ILEL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBATI WE FEDDELNAHUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
45.17: WE ‘ATEJNAHUM BEJJINATIN MINEL-’EMRI FEMA EHTELEFU ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEGJËN BEJNEHUM ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI FIMA KANU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
45.18: THUMME XHE’ALNAKE ‘ALA SHERI’ATIN MINEL-’EMRI FE ETTEBI’HA WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWA’EL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
45.19: ‘INNEHUM LEN JUGNU ‘ANKE MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE BA’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BA’DIN WEL-LAHU WE LIJUL-MUTTEKIN
45.20: HADHA BESA’IRU LILNNASI WE HUDEN WE RAHMETUN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
45.21: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE EXHTERAHU SEJJI’ATI ‘EN NEXH’ALEHUM KAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SEWA’EN MEHJAHUM WE MEMATUHUM SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
45.22: WE HALEKAL-LAHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI WE LITUXHZA KUL-LU NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
45.23: ‘EFERA’EJTE MENI ETTEHADHE ‘ILEHEHU HEWAHU WE ‘EDEL-LEHU ALLAHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN WE HATEME ‘ALA SEM’IHI WE KALBIHI WE XHE’ALE ‘ALA BESERIHI GISHAWETEN FEMEN JEHDIHI MIN BA’DI ALLAHI ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
45.24: WE KALU MA HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA ED-DUNJA NEMUTU WE NEHJA WE MA JUHLIKUNA ‘IL-LA ED-DEHRU WE MA LEHUM BIDHALIKE MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEDHUNNUN
45.25: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINATIN MA KANE HUXHXHETEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU E’TU BI’ABA’INA ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
45.26: KULI ALLAHU JUHJIKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JEXHMA’UKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHI WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
45.27: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JEWME’IDHIN JEHSERUL-MUBTILUN
45.28: WE TERA KUL-LE ‘UMMETIN XHATHIJETEN KUL-LU ‘UMMETIN TUD’A ‘ILA KITABIHAL-JEWME TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
45.29: HADHA KITABUNA JENTIKU ‘ALEJKUM BIL-HEKKI ‘INNA KUNNA NESTENSIHU MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
45.30: FE’EMMAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUDHILUHUM RABBUHUM FI RAHMETIHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-MUBIN
45.31: WE ‘EMMAL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EFELEM TEKUN ‘AJATI TUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FASTEKBERTUM WE KUNTUM KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
45.32: WE ‘IDHA KILE ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN WE SA’ATU LA RAJBE FIHA KULTUM MA NEDRI MA SA’ATU ‘IN NEDHUNNU ‘IL-LA DHENNËN WE MA NEHNU BIMUSTEJKININ
45.33: WE BEDA LEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA ‘AMILU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
45.34: WE KILEL-JEWME NENSAKUM KEMA NESITUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA WE ME’WAKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN NASIRIN
45.35: DHALIKUM BI’ENNEKUM ETTEHADHTUM ‘AJATI ALLAHI HUZUEN WE GARRATKUMUL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA FALJEWME LA JUHRAXHUNE MINHA WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
45.36: FELIL-LAHIL-HEMDU RABBI SEMAWATI WE RABBIL-’ERDI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
45.37: WE LEHUL-KIBRIJA’U FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM

46.3: MA HALEKNA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HEKKI WE ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘AMMA ‘UNDHIRU MU’RIDUN
46.4: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM MA TED’UNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI ‘ERUNI MADHA HALEKU MINEL-’ERDI ‘EM LEHUM SHIRKUN FI SEMAWATI EI’TUNI BIKITABIN MIN KABLI HADHA ‘EW ‘ETHARATIN MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
46.5: WE MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMEN JED’U MIN DUNI ALLAHI MEN LA JESTEXHIBU LEHU ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI WE HUM ‘AN DU’A’IHIM GAFILUN
46.6: WE ‘IDHA HUSHIRA NASU KANU LEHUM ‘A’DA’EN WE KANU BI’IBADETIHIM KAFIRIN
46.7: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINATIN KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
46.8: ‘EM JEKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL ‘INI EFTERAJTUHU FELA TEMLIKUNE LI MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMA TUFIDUNE FIHI KEFA BIHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
46.9: KUL MA KUNTU BID’ËN MINE ER-RUSULI WE MA ‘EDRI MA JUF’ALU BI WE LA BIKUM ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE WE MA ‘ENA ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
46.10: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KANE MIN ‘INDI ALLAHI WE KEFERTUM BIHI WE SHEHIDE SHAHIDUN MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ALA MITHLIHI FE’AMENE WE ESTEKBERTUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
46.11: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEW KANE HAJRËN MA SEBEKUNA ‘ILEJHI WE ‘IDH LEM JEHTEDU BIHI FESEJEKULUNE HADHA ‘IFKUN KADIMU
46.12: WE MIN KABLIHI KITABU MUSA ‘IMAMËN WE RAHMETEN WE HEDHA KITABUN MUSEDDIKUN LISANËN ‘ARABIJËN LIJUNDHIRAL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WE BUSHRA LILMUHSININ
46.13: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KALU RABBUNALLAHU THUMME ESTEKAMU FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
46.14: ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHENNETI HALIDINE FIHA XHEZA’EN BIMA KANU JA’MELUN
46.15: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWALIDEJHI ‘IHSANËN HEMELET/HU ‘UMMUHU KURHËN WE WEDE’AT/HU KURHËN WE HEMLUHU WE FISALUHU THELATHUNE SHEHRËN HETTA ‘IDHA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE BELEGA ‘ERBA’INE SENETEN KALE RABBI ‘EWZI’NI ‘EN ‘ESHKURA NI’METEKEL-LETI ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE WE ‘ALA WE E-DEJJE WE ‘EN ‘A’MELE SALIHËN TERDAHU WE ‘ESLIH LI FI DHURRIJETI ‘INNI TUBTU ‘ILEJKE WE ‘INNI MINEL-MUSLIMIN
46.16: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE NETEKABBELU ‘ANHUM ‘EHSENE MA ‘AMILU WE NETEXHAWEZU ‘AN SEJJI’ATIHIM FI ‘ES'HABIL-XHENNETI WA’DE SIDKIL-LEDHI KANU JU’ADUN
46.17: WEL-LEDHI KALE LIWALIDEJHI ‘UFFIN LEKUMA ‘ETA’IDANINI ‘EN ‘UHRAXHE WE KAD HALETIL-KURUNU MIN KABLI WE HUMA JESTEGITHANI ELLAHE WEJLEKE ‘AMIN ‘INNE WA’DEL-LAHI HEKKUN FEJEKULU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
46.18: ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE HEKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INNEHUM KANU HASIRIN
46.19: WE LIKUL-LIN DERAXHATUN MIMMA ‘AMILU WE LIJUWEFFIJEHUM ‘A’MALEHUM WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
46.20: WE JEWME JU’RADUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ALA NARI ‘EDH/HEBTUM TEJJIBATIKUM FI HEJATIKUMU ED-DUNJA WE ESTEMTA’TUM BIHA FALJEWME TUXHZEWNE ‘ADHABEL-HUNI BIMA KUNTUM TESTEKBIRUNE FIL-’ERDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE BIMA KUNTUM TEFSUKUN
46.21: WE EDHKUR ‘EHA ‘ADIN ‘IDH ‘ENDHERA KAWMEHU BIL-’EHKAFI WE KAD HALETI NUDHURU MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE MIN HALFIHI ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
46.22: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LITE’FIKENA ‘AN ‘ALIHETINA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
