46.23: KALE ‘INNEMAL-’ILMU ‘INDEL-LAHI WE ‘UBELLIGUKUM MA ‘URSILTU BIHI WE LEKINNI ‘ERAKUM KAWMËN TEXHHELUN
46.24: FELEMMA RA’EWHU ‘ARIDËN MUSTEKBILE ‘EWDIJETIHIM KALU HADHA ‘ARIDUN MUMTIRUNA BEL HUWE MA ESTA’XHELTUM BIHI RIHUN FIHA ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
46.25: TUDEMMIRU KUL-LE SHEJ’IN BI’EMRI RABBIHA FE’ESBEHU LA JURA ‘IL-LA MESAKINUHUM KEDHALIKE NEXHZIL-KAWMEL-MUXHRIMIN
46.26: WE LEKAD MEKKENNAHUM FIMA ‘IN MEKKENNAKUM FIHI WE XHE’ALNA LEHUM SEM’ËN WE ‘EBSARËN WE ‘EF’IDETEN FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM SEM’UHUM WE LA ‘EBSARUHUM WE LA ‘EF’IDETUHUM MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IDH KANU JEXHHEDUNE BI’AJATI ALLAHI WE HAKA BIHIM MA KANU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
46.27: WE LEKAD ‘EHLEKNA MA HEWLEKUM MINEL-KURA WE SERRAFNAL-’AJATI LE’ALLEHUM JERXHI’UN
46.28: FELEWLA NESERAHUMUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI ALLAHI KURBANËN ‘ALIHETEN BEL DELLU ‘ANHUM WE DHELIKE ‘IFKUHUM WE MA KANU JEFTERUN
46.29: WE ‘IDH SERAFNA ‘ILEJKE NEFERËN MINEL-XHINNI JESTEMI’UNEL-KUR’ANE FELEMMA HEDERUHU KALU ‘ENSITU FELEMMA KUDIJE WE LLEW ‘ILA KAWMIHIM MUNDHIRIN
46.30: KALU JA KAWMENA ‘INNA SEMI’NA KITABËN ‘UNZILE MIN BA’DI MUSA MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI WE ‘ILA TERIKIN MUSTEKIMI
46.31: JA KAWMENA ‘EXHIBU DA’IJEL-LAHI WE ‘AMINU BIHI JEGFIR LEKUM MIN DHUNUBIKUM WE JUXHIRKUM MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
46.32: WE MEN LA JUXHIB DA’IJEL-LAHI FELEJSE BIMU’XHIZIN FIL-’ERDI WE LEJSE LEHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’U ‘ULA’IKE FI DELALIN MUBINI
46.33: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNEL-LAHEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE LEM JA’JE BIHALKIHINNE BIKADIRIN ‘ALA ‘EN JUHJIJEL-MEWTA BELA ‘INNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
46.34: WE JEWME JU’RADUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ALA NARI ‘ELEJSE HADHA BIL-HEKKI KALU BELA WE RABBINA KALE FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
46.35: FASBIR KEMA SEBERA ‘ULUL-’AZMI MINE ER-RUSULI WE LA TESTA’XHIL LEHUM KE’ENNEHUM JEWME JERAWNE MA JU’ADUNE LEM JELBETHU ‘IL-LA SA’ATEN MIN NEHARIN BELAGUN FEHEL JUHLEKU ‘IL-LAL-KAWMUL-FASIKUN

47.1: EL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI ‘EDEL-LE ‘A’MALEHU
47.2: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘AMENU BIMA NUZZILE ‘ALA MUHEMMEDIN WE HUWEL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM KEFFERA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE ‘ESLEHE BALEHU
47.3: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ETTEBA’UL-BATILE WE ‘ENNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEBA’UL-HEKKA MIN RABBIHIM KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHU LILNNASI ‘EMTHALEHU
47.4: FE’IDHA LEKITUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEDERBE ER-RIKABI HETTA ‘IDHA ‘ETHHANTUMUHUM FESHUDDUL-WETHAKA FE’IMMA MENNËN BA’DU WE ‘IMMA FIDA’EN HETTA TEDE’AL-HERBU ‘EWZARAHA DHALIKE WE LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU LANTESERA MINHUM WE LEKIN LIJEBLUWE BA’DEKUM BIBA’DIN WEL-LEDHINE KUTILU FI SEBILI ALLAHI FELEN JUDILLE ‘A’MALEHU
47.7: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TENSURU ELLAHE JENSURKUM WE JUTHEBBIT ‘EKDAMEKU
47.10: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ERDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM DEMMERAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE LILKAFIRINE ‘EMTHALUH
47.11: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LAHE MEWLAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ENNEL-KAFIRINE LA MEWLA LEHU
47.12: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JETEMETTA’UNE WE JE’KULUNE KEMA TE’KULUL-’EN’AM WE NARU METHWEN LEHU
47.13: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN HIJE ‘ESHEDDU KUWETEN MIN KARJETIKEL-LETI ‘EHRAXHETKE ‘EHLEKNAHUM FELA NASIRA LEHU
47.14: ‘EFEMEN KANE ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBIHI KEMEN ZUJJINE LEHU SU’U ‘AMELIHI WE ETTEBA’U ‘EHWA’EHU
47.15: METHELUL-XHENNETI EL-LETI WU’IDEL-MUTTEKUNE FIHA ‘ENHARUN MIN MA’IN GAJRI ‘ASININ WE ‘ENHARUN MIN LEBENIN LEM JETEGAJJER TA’MUHU WE ‘ENHARUN MIN HAMRIN LEDHDHETIN LILSHSHARIBINE WE ‘ENHARUN MIN ‘ASELIN MUSEFFEN WE LEHUM FIHA MIN KUL-LI ETH-THEMERATI WE MEGFIRATUN MIN RABBIHIM KEMEN HUWE HALIDUN FI NARI WE SUKU MA’EN HEMIMËN FEKATTE’A ‘EM’A’EHU
47.16: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’U ‘ILEJKE HETTA ‘IDHA HARAXHU MIN ‘INDIKE KALU LIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME MADHA KALE ‘ANIFËN ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE ETTEBA’U ‘EHWA’EHU
47.17: WEL-LEDHINE EHTEDEW ZADEHUM HUDEN WE ‘ATAHUM TEKWHU
47.18: FEHEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SA’ATE ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN FEKAD XHA’E ‘ESHRATUHA FE’ENNA LEHUM ‘IDHA XHA’ET/HUM DHIKRAHU
47.19: FA’LEM ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE ESTEGFIR LIDHENBIKE WE LILMU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MUTEKAL-LEBEKUM WE METHWAKU
47.20: WE JEKULUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEWLA NUZZILET SURATUN FE’IDHA ‘UNZILET SURATUN MUHKEMETUN WE DHUKIRA FIHAL-KITALU RA’EJTEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE NEDHERAL-MEGSHIJI ‘ALEJHI MINEL-MEWTI FE’EWLA LEHU
47.21: TA’ATUN WE KAWLUN MA’RUFUN FE’IDHA ‘AZEMEL-’EMRU FELEW SEDEKU ELLAHE LEKANE HAJRËN LEHU
47.22: FEHEL ‘ASEJTUM ‘IN TEWEL-LEJTUM ‘EN TUFSIDU FIL-’ERDI WE TUKATTI’U ‘ERHAMEKU
47.25: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ERTEDDU ‘ALA ‘EDBARIHIM MIN BA’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HUDA ESH-SHEJTANU SEWWELE LEHUM WE ‘EMLA LEHU
47.26: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LIL-LEDHINE KERIHU MA NEZZELEL-LAHU SENUTI’UKUM FI BA’DIL-’EMRI WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU ‘ISRARAHU
47.28: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUMU ETTEBA’U MA ‘ESHATEL-LAHE WE KERIHU RIDWANEHU FE’EHBETE ‘A’MALEHU
47.29: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MERADUN ‘EN LEN JUHRIXHEL-LAHU ‘EDGANEHU
47.30: WE LEW NESHA’U LE’ERAJNAKEHUM FELE’ARAFTEHUM BISIMAHUM WE LETA’RIFENNEHUM FI LEHNIL-KAWLI WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU ‘A’MALEKU
47.31: WE LENEBLUWENNEKUM HETTA NA’LEMEL-MUXHAHIDINE MINKUM WE SABIRINE WE NEBLUWE ‘EHBARAKU
47.32: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI WE SHAKKU RASULE MIN BA’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HUDA LEN JEDURRU ELLAHE SHEJ’ËN WE SEJUHBITU ‘A’MALEHU
47.33: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE LA TUBTILU ‘A’MALEKU
47.34: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI THUMME MATU WE HUM KUFFARUN FELEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHU
47.35: FELA TEHINU WE TED’U ‘ILA SELMI WE ‘ENTUMUL-’A’LEWNE WEL-LAHU ME’AKUM WE LEN JETIRAKUM ‘A’MALEKU
47.36: ‘INNEMAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE ‘IN TU’UMINU WE TETTEKU JU’UTIKUM ‘UXHURAKUM WE LA JES’ELKUM ‘EMWALEKU
47.38: HA’ENTUM HA’UULA’ TUD’AWNE LITUNFIKU FI SEBILI ALLAHI FEMINKUM MEN JEBHALU WE MEN JEBHAL FE’INNEMA JEBHALU ‘AN NEFSIHI WEL-LAHUL-GANIJU WE ‘ENTUMUL-FUKARA’U WE ‘IN TETEWEL-LEW JESTEBDIL KAWMËN GAJRAKUM THUMME LA JEKUNU ‘EMTHALEKU

48.2: LIJEGFIRA LEKEL-LAHU MA TEKADDEME MIN DHENBIKE WE MA TE’EHHARA WE JUTIMME NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKE WE JEHDIJEKE SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
48.4: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE SEKINETE FI KULUBIL-MU’UMININE LIJEZDADU ‘IMANËN ME’A ‘IMANIHIM WE LIL-LEHI XHUNUDU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
48.5: LIJUDHILEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA WE JUKEFFIRA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE KANE DHALIKE ‘INDEL-LAHI FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
48.6: WE JU’ADHDHIBEL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-MUSHRIKINE WEL-MUSHRIKATI EDH-DHANNINE BIL-LAHI DHENNE SEW’I ‘ALEJHIM DA’IRATU SEW’I WE GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE LE’ANEHUM WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM XHEHENNEME WE SA’ET MESIRË
48.7: WE LIL-LEHI XHUNUDU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE KANEL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
48.9: LITU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TU’AZZIRUHU WE TUWEKKIRUHU WE TUSEBBIHUHU BUKRATEN WE ‘ESILË
48.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUBAJI’UNEKE ‘INNEMA JUBAJI’UNEL-LAHE JEDU ALLAHI FEWKA ‘EJDIHIM FEMEN NEKETHE FE’INNEMA JENKUTHU ‘ALA NEFSIHI WE MEN ‘EWFA BIMA ‘AHEDE ‘ALEJHU ELLAHE FESEJU’UTIHI ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË
48.11: SEJEKULU LEKEL-MUHALLEFUNE MINEL-’A’RABI SHEGALETNA ‘EMWALUNA WE ‘EHLUNA FASTEGFIR LENA JEKULUNE BI’ELSINETIHIM MA LEJSE FI KULUBIHIM KUL FEMEN JEMLIKU LEKUM MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘IN ‘ERADE BIKUM DERRËN ‘EW ‘ERADE BIKUM NEF’ËN BEL KANEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRË
48.12: BEL DHENENTUM ‘EN LEN JENKALIBE RASULU WEL-MU’UMINUNE ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM ‘EBEDËN WE ZUJJINE DHALIKE FI KULUBIKUM WE DHENENTUM DHENNE SEW’I WE KUNTUM KAWMËN BURË
48.13: WE MEN LEM JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI FE’INNA ‘A’TEDNA LILKAFIRINE SA’IRË
48.14: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE KANEL-LAHU GAFURËN RAHIMË
48.15: SEJEKULUL-MUHALLEFUNE ‘IDHA ENTELEKTUM ‘ILA MEGANIME LITE’HUDHUHA DHERUNA NETTEBI’KUM JURIDUNE ‘EN JUBEDDILU KELAMEL-LAHI KUL LEN TETTEBI’UNA KEDHALIKUM KALEL-LAHU MIN KABLU FESEJEKULUNE BEL TEHSUDUNENA BEL KANU LA JEFKAHUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
48.16: KUL LILMUHALLEFINE MINEL-’A’RABI SETUD’AWNE ‘ILA KAWMIN ‘ULI BE’SIN SHEDIDIN TUKATILUNEHUM ‘EW JUSLIMUNE FE’IN TUTI’U JU’UTIKUMU ALLAHU ‘EXHRËN HESENËN WE ‘IN TETEWEL-LEW KEMA TEWEL-LEJTUM MIN KABLU JU’ADHDHIBKUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.17: LEJSE ‘ALEL-’A’MA HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-’A’RAXHI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-MERIDI HERAXHUN WE MEN JUTI’I ELLAHE WE RASULEHU JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE MEN JETEWELLE JU’ADHDHIBHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.18: LEKAD RADIJEL-LAHU ‘ANIL-MU’UMININE ‘IDH JUBAJI’UNEKE TEHTE ESH-SHEXHERATI FE’ALIME MA FI KULUBIHIM FE’ENZELE SEKINETE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ETHABEHUM FETHËN KARIBË
48.19: WE MEGANIME KETHIRATEN JE’HUDHUNEHA WE KANEL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
48.20: WE’ADEKUMU ALLAHU MEGANIME KETHIRATEN TE’HUDHUNEHA FE’AXHXHELE LEKUM HEDHIHI WE KEFFE ‘EJDIJE NASI ‘ANKUM WE LITEKUNE ‘AJETEN LILMU’UMININE WE JEHDIJEKUM SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
48.21: WE ‘UHRA LEM TEKDIRU ‘ALEJHA KAD ‘EHATEL-LAHU BIHA WE KANEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRË
48.22: WE LEW KATELEKUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWELLEWL-’EDBARA THUMME LA JEXHIDUNE WELIJËN WE LA NESIRË
48.23: SUNNETEL-LAHI EL-LETI KAD HALET MIN KABLU WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI ALLAHI TEBDILË
48.24: WE HUWEL-LEDHI KEFFE ‘EJDIJEHUM ‘ANKUM WE ‘EJDIJEKUM ‘ANHUM BIBETNI MEKKETE MIN BA’DI ‘EN ‘EDHFERAKUM ‘ALEJHIM WE KANEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRË
48.25: HUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDUKUM ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HERAMI WEL-HEDJE MA’KUFËN ‘EN JEBLUGA MEHILLEHU WE LEWLA RIXHALUN MU’UMINUNE WE NISA’UN MU’UMINATUN LEM TA’LEMUHUM ‘EN TETE’UHUM FETUSIBEKUM MINHUM ME’ARRATUN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN LIJUDHILEL-LAHU FI RAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U LEW TEZEJJELU LE’ADHDHEBNAL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.26: ‘IDH XHE’ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FI KULUBIHIMUL-HEMIJETE HEMIJETEL-XHAHILIJETI FE’ENZELEL-LAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WE ‘ELZEMEHUM KELIMETET-TEKWA WE KANU ‘EHEKKA BIHA WE ‘EHLEHA WE KANEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
48.27: LEKAD SEDEKAL-LAHU RASULEHU ER-RU’UJA BIL-HEKKI LETEDHULUNNEL-MESXHIDEL-HERAME ‘IN SHA’EL-LAHU ‘AMININE MUHELLIKINE RU’USEKUM WE MUKASSIRINE LA TEHAFUNE FE’ALIME MA LEM TA’LEMU FEXHE’ALE MIN DUNI DHALIKE FETHËN KARIBË
48.28: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA ED-DINI KUL-LIHI WE KEFA BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
48.29: MUHEMMEDUN RASULU ALLAHI WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU ‘ESHIDDA’U ‘ALEL-KUFFARI RUHEMA’U BEJNEHUM TERAHUM RUKKA’ËN SUXHXHEDËN JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MINEL-LAHI WE RIDWANËN SIMAHUM FI WUXHUHIHIM MIN ‘ETHERI SUXHUDI DHALIKE METHELUHUM FIT-TEWRËTI WE METHELUHUM FIL-’INXHILI KEZER’IN ‘EHRAXHE SHET’EHU FE’AZERAHU FASTEGLEDHE FASTEWA ‘ALA SUKIHI JU’XHIBU EZ-ZURRA’A LIJEGIDHE BIHIMUL-KUFFARA WE’ADEL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MINHUM MEGFIRATEN WE ‘EXHRËN ‘ADHIMË

49.1: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJI ALLAHI WE RASULIHI WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
49.2: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TERFA’U ‘ESWATEKUM FEWKA SEWTI NEBIJI WE LA TEXHHERU LEHU BIL-KAWLI KEXHEHRI BA’DIKUM LIBA’DIN ‘EN TEHBETE ‘A’MALUKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TESH’URUN
49.3: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEGUDDUNE ‘ESWATEHUM ‘INDE RASULI ALLAHI ‘ULA’IKEL-LEDHINE EMTEHENEL-LAHU KULUBEHUM LILTTEKWA LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
49.5: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM SEBERU HETTA TEHRUXHE ‘ILEJHIM LEKANE HAJRËN LEHUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
49.6: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN XHA’EKUM FASIKUN BINEBE’IIN FETEBEJJENU ‘EN TUSIBU KAWMËN BIXHEHALETIN FETUSBIHU ‘ALA MA FE’ALTUM NADIMIN
49.7: WE A’LEMU ‘ENNE FIKUM RASULEL-LAHI LEW JUTI’UKUM FI KETHIRIN MINEL-’EMRI LE’ANITTUM WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE HEBBEBE ‘ILEJKUMUL-’IMANE WE ZEJJENEHU FI KULUBIKUM WE KERRAHE ‘ILEJKUMUL-KUFRA WEL-FUSUKA WEL-’ISJANE ‘ULA’IKE HUMU ER-RASHIDUN
49.8: FEDLËN MINEL-LAHI WE NI’METEN WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
49.9: WE ‘IN TA’IFETANI MINEL-MU’UMININE EKTETELU FE’ESLIHU BEJNEHUMA FE’IN BEGAT ‘IHDAHUMA ‘ALEL-’UHRA FEKATILU EL-LETI TEBGI HETTA TEFI’E ‘ILA ‘EMRI ALLAHI FE’IN FA’ET FE’ESLIHU BEJNEHUMA BIL-’ADLI WE ‘EKSITU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
49.10: ‘INNEMAL-MU’UMINUNE ‘IHWETUN FE’ESLIHU BEJNE ‘EHAWEJKUM WE ETTEKU ELLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
49.11: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA JESHAR KAWMUN MIN KAWMIN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNU HAJRËN MINHUM WE LA NISA’UN MIN NISA’IN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNNE HAJRËN MINHUNNE WE LA TELMIZU ‘ENFUSEKUM WE LA TENABEZU BIL-’ELKABI BI’SEL-EISMUL-FUSUKU BA’DEL-’IMANI WE MEN LEM JETUB FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
49.12: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EXHTENIBU KETHIRËN MINE EDH-DHENNI ‘INNE BA’DE EDH-DHENNI ‘ITHMUN WE LA TEXHESSESU WE LA JEGTEB BA’DUKUM BA’DËN ‘EJUHIBBU ‘EHEDUKUM ‘EN JE’KULE LEHME ‘EHIHI MEJTËN FEKERIHTUMUHU WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE TEWWABUN RAHIMU
49.13: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNA HALEKNAKUM MIN DHEKERIN WE ‘UNTHA WE XHE’ALNAKUM SHU’UBËN WE KABA’ILE LITA’ARAFU ‘INNE ‘EKRAMEKUM ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘ETKAKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HABIRU
49.14: KALETIL-’A’RABU ‘AMENNA KUL LEM TU’UMINU WE LEKIN KULU ‘ESLEMNA WE LEMMA JEDHULIL-’IMANU FI KULUBIKUM WE ‘IN TUTI’U ELLAHE WE RASULEHU LA JELITKUM MIN ‘A’MALIKUM SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
49.15: ‘INNEMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI THUMME LEM JERTABU WE XHAHEDU BI’EMWALIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI ALLAHI ‘ULA’IKE HUMU SADIKUN
49.16: KUL ‘ETU’ALLIMUNEL-LAHE BIDINIKUM WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
49.17: JEMUNNUNE ‘ALEJKE ‘EN ‘ESLEMU KUL LA TEMUNNU ‘ALEJJE ‘ISLAMEKUM BELI ALLAHU JEMUNNU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EN HEDAKUM LIL’IMANI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
49.18: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU GAJBE SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WEL-LAHU BESIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN

50.2: BEL ‘AXHIBU ‘EN XHA’EHUM MUNDHIRUN MINHUM FEKALEL-KAFIRUNE HADHA SHEJ’UN ‘AXHIBU
50.3: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN DHALIKE RAXH’UN BA’IDU
50.4: KAD ‘ALIMNA MA TENKUSUL-’ERDU MINHUM WE ‘INDENA KITABUN HEFIDHU
50.5: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIL-HEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM FEHUM FI ‘EMRIN MERIXHI
50.6: ‘EFELEM JENDHURU ‘ILA SEMA’I FEWKAHUM KEJFE BENEJNAHA WE ZEJJENNAHA WE MA LEHA MIN FURUXHI
50.7: WEL-’ERDE MEDEDNAHA WE ‘ELKAJNA FIHA RAWASIJE WE ‘ENBETNA FIHA MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN BEHIXHI
50.9: WE NEZZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN MUBARAKËN FE’ENBETNA BIHI XHENNATIN WE HEBBEL-HESID
50.10: WE NEHLE BASIKATIN LEHA TEL’UN NEDIDU
50.11: RIZKËN LIL’IBADI WE ‘EHJEJNA BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN KEDHALIKEL-HURUXH
50.12: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ESHABU RASSI WE THEMUD
50.14: WE ‘ESHABUL-’EJKETI WE KAWMU TUBBA’IN KUL-LUN KEDHDHEBE ER-RUSULE FEHEKKA WA’ID
50.15: ‘EFE’AJINA BIL-HALKIL-’EWWELI BEL HUM FI LEBSIN MIN HALKIN XHEDIDI
50.16: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE WE NA’LEMU MA TUWESWISU BIHI NEFSUHU WE NEHNU ‘EKRABU ‘ILEJHI MIN HEBLIL-WERID
50.18: MA JELFIDHU MIN KAWLIN ‘IL-LA LEDEJHI RAKIBUN ‘ATIDU
50.19: WE XHA’ET SEKRATUL-MEWTI BIL-HEKKI DHALIKE MA KUNTE MINHU TEHID
50.20: WE NUFIHA FI SURI DHALIKE JEWMUL-WA’ID
50.21: WE XHA’ET KUL-LU NEFSIN ME’AHA SA’IKUN WE SHEHIDU
50.22: LEKAD KUNTE FI GAFLETIN MIN HADHA FEKESHEFNA ‘ANKE GITA’EKE FEBESERUKEL-JEWME HEDIDU
50.23: WE KALE KARINUHU HADHA MA LEDEJJE ‘ATIDU
50.26: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FE’ELKIJAHU FIL-’ADHABI ESH-SHEDID
50.27: KALE KARINUHU RABBENA MA ‘ETGAJTUHU WE LEKIN KANE FI DELALIN BA’IDI
50.28: KALE LA TEHTESIMU LEDEJJE WE KAD KADDEMTU ‘ILEJKUM BIL-WA’ID
50.29: MA JUBEDDELUL-KAWLU LEDEJJE WE MA ‘ENA BIDHEL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
50.30: JEWME NEKULU LIXHEHENNEME HEL EMTELE’TI WE TEKULU HEL MIN MEZIDI
50.33: MEN HASHIJE RAHMENE BIL-GAJBI WE XHA’E BIKALBIN MUNIBI
50.35: LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE FIHA WE LEDEJNA MEZIDU
50.36: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA KABLEHUM MIN KARNIN HUM ‘ESHEDDU MINHUM BETSHËN FENEKKABU FIL-BILADI HEL MIN MEHISI
50.37: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LEDHIKRA LIMEN KANE LEHU KALBUN ‘EW ‘ELKA SEM’A WE HUWE SHEHIDU
50.38: WE LEKAD HALEKNA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN WE MA MESSENA MIN LUGUBI
50.39: FASBIR ‘ALA MA JEKULUNE WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE KABLE TULU’I ESH-SHEMSI WE KABLEL-GURUB
50.41: WE ESTEMI’ JEWME JUNADIL-MUNADI MIN MEKANIN KARIBI
50.42: JEWME JESMA’UNE SEJHETE BIL-HEKKI DHALIKE JEWMUL-HURUXH
50.44: JEWME TESHEKKAKUL-’ERDU ‘ANHUM SIRA’ËN DHALIKE HESHRUN ‘ALEJNA JESIRU
50.45: NEHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JEKULUNE WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIXHEBBARIN FEDHEKKIR BIL-KUR’ANI MEN JEHAFU WA’ID

51.14: DHUKU FITNETEKUM HADHAL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TESTA’XHILUN
51.16: ‘AHIDHINE MA ‘ATAHUM RABBUHUM ‘INNEHUM KANU KABLE DHALIKE MUHSININ
51.22: WE FI SEMA’I RIZKUKUM WE MA TU’ADUN
51.23: FEWERABBI SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘INNEHU LEHEKKUN MITHLE MA ‘ENNEKUM TENTIKUN
51.25: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALEJHI FEKALU SELAMËN KALE SELAMUN KAWMUN MUNKERUN
51.28: FE’EWXHESE MINHUM HIFETEN KALU LA TEHAF WE BESHSHERUHU BIGULAMIN ‘ALIMI
51.29: FE’EKBELETI EMRA’ETUHU FI SERRATIN FESEKKET WEXHHEHA WE KALET ‘AXHUZUN ‘AKIMU
51.36: FEMA WEXHEDNA FIHA GAJRA BEJTIN MINEL-MUSLIMIN
51.38: WE FI MUSA ‘IDH ‘ERSELNAHU ‘ILA FIR’AWNE BISULTANIN MUBINI
51.39: FETEWELLA BIRUKNIHI WE KALE SAHIRUN ‘EW MEXHNUNU
51.40: FE’EHADHNAHU WE XHUNUDEHU FENEBEDHNAHUM FIL-JEMMI WE HUWE MULIMU
51.42: MA TEDHERU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘ETET ‘ALEJHI ‘IL-LA XHE’ALET/HU KALRRAMIM
51.43: WE FI THEMUDE ‘IDH KILE LEHUM TEMETTA’U HETTA HINI
51.44: FE’ATEW ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHIM FE’EHADHET/HUMU SA’IKATU WE HUM JENDHURUN
51.45: FEMA ESTETA’U MIN KIJAMIN WE MA KANU MUNTESIRIN
51.46: WE KAWME NUHIN MIN KABLU ‘INNEHUM KANU KAWMËN FASIKIN
51.47: WE SEMA’E BENEJNAHA BI’EJJDIN WE ‘INNA LEMUSI’UN
51.49: WE MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HALEKNA ZEWXHEJNI LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
51.50: FEFIRRU ‘ILA ALLAHI ‘INNI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN MUBINU
51.51: WE LA TEXH’ALU ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA ‘INNI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN MUBINU
51.52: KEDHALIKE MA ‘ETAL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KALU SAHIRUN ‘EW MEXHNUNU
51.57: MA ‘URIDU MINHUM MIN RIZKIN WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN JUT’IMUN
51.59: FE’INNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHENUBËN MITHLE DHENUBI ‘ES'HABIHIM FELA JESTA’XHILUN
51.60: FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN JEWMIHIMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN

52.14: HEDHIHI NARU EL-LETI KUNTUM BIHA TUKEDHDHIBUN
52.16: ESLEWHA FASBIRU ‘EW LA TESBIRU SEWA’UN ‘ALEJKUM ‘INNEMA TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
52.18: FAKIHINE BIMA ‘ATAHUM RABBUHUM WE WEKAHUM RABBUHUM ‘ADHABEL-XHEHIM
52.19: KULU WE ESHRABU HENI’ËN BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
52.20: MUTTEKI’INE ‘ALA SURURIN MESFUFETIN WE ZEWWEXHNAHUM BIHURIN ‘INI
52.21: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ETTEBE’AT/HUM DHURRIJETUHUM BI’IMANIN ‘ELHEKNA BIHIM DHURRIJETEHUM WE MA ‘ELETNAHUM MIN ‘AMELIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN KUL-LU EMRI’IN BIMA KESEBE RAHINU
52.22: WE ‘EMDEDNAHUM BIFAKIHETIN WE LEHMIN MIMMA JESHTEHUN
52.23: JETENAZA’UNE FIHA KE’SËN LA LEGWUN FIHA WE LA TE’THIMU
52.24: WE JETUFU ‘ALEJHIM GILMANUN LEHUM KE’ENNEHUM LU’ULU’UUN MEKNUNU
52.28: ‘INNA KUNNA MIN KABLU NED’UHU ‘INNEHU HUWEL-BERRU RAHIM
52.29: FEDHEKKIR FEMA ‘ENTE BINI’METI RABBIKE BIKAHININ WE LA MEXHNUNI
52.36: ‘EM HALEKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BEL LA JUKINUN
52.38: ‘EM LEHUM SULLEMUN JESTEMI’UNE FIHI FELJE’TI MUSTEMI’UHUM BISULTANIN MUBINI
52.44: WE ‘IN JERAW KISFËN MINE SEMA’I SAKITËN JEKULU SEHABUN MERKUMU
52.45: FEDHERHUM HETTA JULAKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI FIHI JUS’AKUN
52.46: JEWME LA JUGNI ‘ANHUM KEJDUHUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
52.47: WE ‘INNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘ADHABËN DUNE DHALIKE WE LEKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
52.48: WE ESBIR LIHUKMI RABBIKE FE’INNEKE BI’A’JUNINA WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE HINE TEKUM

53.2: MA DEL-LE SAHIBUKUM WE MA GAW
53.23: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ESMA’UN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABA’UUKUM MA ‘ENZELEL-LAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE MA TEHWAL-’ENFUSU WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MIN RABBIHIMUL-HUD
53.26: WE KEM MIN MELEKIN FI SEMAWATI LA TUGNI SHEFA’ATUHUM SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA MIN BA’DI ‘EN JE’DHENEL-LAHU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JERD
53.28: WE MA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘INNE EDH-DHENNE LA JUGNI MINEL-HEKKI SHEJ’Ë
53.29: FE’A’RID ‘AN MEN TEWELLA ‘AN DHIKRINA WE LEM JURID ‘IL-LAL-HEJËTE ED-DUNJ
53.30: DHALIKE MEBLEGUHUM MINEL-’ILMI ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DEL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMENI EHTED
53.31: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘ESA’U BIMA ‘AMILU WE JEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU BIL-HUSN
53.32: EL-LEDHINE JEXHTENIBUNE KEBA’IRAL-’ITHMI WEL-FEWAHISHE ‘IL-LAL-LEMEME ‘INNE RABBEKE WASI’UL-MEGFIRATI HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIKUM ‘IDH ‘ENSHE’EKUM MINEL-’ERDI WE ‘IDH ‘ENTUM ‘EXHINNETUN FI BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM FELA TUZEKKU ‘ENFUSEKUM HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMENI ETTEK
53.36: ‘EM LEM JUNEBBE’ BIMA FI SUHUFI MUS
53.52: WE KAWME NUHIN MIN KABLU ‘INNEHUM KANU HUM ‘EDHLEME WE ‘ETG
53.58: LEJSE LEHA MIN DUNI ALLAHI KASHIFETU

54.2: WE ‘IN JERAW ‘AJETEN JU’RIDU WE JEKULU SIHRUN MUSTEMIRRU
54.3: WE KEDHDHEBU WE ETTEBA’U ‘EHWA’EHUM WE KUL-LU ‘EMRIN MUSTEKIRRU
54.4: WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MINEL-’ENBA’I MA FIHI MUZDEXHERU
54.6: FETEWELLE ‘ANHUM JEWME JED’U ED-DA’I ‘ILA SHEJ’IN NUKURI
54.7: HUSHSHA’ËN ‘EBSARUHUM JEHRUXHUNE MINEL-’EXHDATHI KE’ENNEHUM XHERADUN MUNTESHIRU
54.9: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN FEKEDHDHEBU ‘ABDENA WE KALU MEXHNUNUN WE EZDUXHIR
54.14: TEXHRI BI’A’JUNINA XHEZA’EN LIMEN KANE KUFIR
54.15: WE LEKAD TERAKNAHA ‘AJETEN FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.17: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.19: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN SERSERËN FI JEWMI NEHSIN MUSTEMIRRI
54.22: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.24: FEKALU ‘EBESHERËN MINNA WAHIDËN NETTEBI’UHU ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEFI DELALIN WE SU’URI
54.25: ‘E’UULKIJE EDH-DHIKRU ‘ALEJHI MIN BEJNINA BEL HUWE KEDHDHABUN ‘ESHIRU
54.27: ‘INNA MURSILU NAKATI FITNETEN LEHUM FARTEKIBHUM WE ESTEBI
54.28: WE NEBBI’HUM ‘ENNEL-MA’E KISMETUN BEJNEHUM KUL-LU SHIRBIN MUHTEDERU
54.32: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.35: NI’METEN MIN ‘INDINA KEDHALIKE NEXHZI MEN SHEKER
54.37: WE LEKAD RAWEDUHU ‘AN DEJFIHI FETEMESNA ‘A’JUNEHUM FEDHUKU ‘ADHABI WE NUDHUR
54.40: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.43: ‘EKUFFARUKUM HAJRUN MIN ‘ULE’IKUM ‘EM LEKUM BERA’ETUN FI EZ-ZUBUR
54.46: BELI SA’ATU MEW’IDUHUM WE SA’ATU ‘ED/HA WE ‘EMERR
54.48: JEWME JUSHEBUNE FI NARI ‘ALA WUXHUHIHIM DHUKU MESSE SEKAR
54.52: WE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN FE’ALUHU FI EZ-ZUBUR
54.53: WE KUL-LU SEGIRIN WE KEBIRIN MUSTETERU

55.15: WE HALEKAL-XHANNE MIN MARIXHIN MIN NARI
55.27: WE JEBKA WEXHHU RABBIKE DHUL-XHELALI WEL-’IKRAM
55.29: JES’ELUHU MEN FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI KUL-LE JEWMIN HUWE FI SHE’NI
55.33: JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INI ESTETA’TUM ‘EN TENFUDHU MIN ‘EKTARI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI FANFUDHU LA TENFUDHUNE ‘IL-LA BISULTANI
55.35: JURSELU ‘ALEJKUMA SHUWADHUN MIN NARIN WE NUHASUN FELA TENTESIRAN
55.37: FE’IDHA ENSHEKKATI SEMA’U FEKANET WERDETEN KALDDIHAN
55.39: FEJEWME’IDHIN LA JUS’ELU ‘AN DHENBIHI ‘INSUN WE LA XHANNU
55.46: WE LIMEN HAFE MEKAME RABBIHI XHENNETAN
55.54: MUTTEKI’INE ‘ALA FURUSHIN BETA’INUHA MIN ‘ISTEBRAKIN WE XHENAL-XHENNETEJNI DANI
55.56: FIHINNE KASIRATUT-TERFI LEM JETMITHHUNNE ‘INSUN KABLEHUM WE LA XHANNU
55.68: FIHIMA FAKIHETUN WE NEHLUN WE RUMMANU
55.74: LEM JETMITHHUNNE ‘INSUN KABLEHUM WE LA XHANNU

56.18: BI’EKWABIN WE ‘EBARIKA WE KE’SIN MIN MA’INI
56.25: LA JESMA’UNE FIHA LEGWEN WE LA TE’THIMË
56.47: WE KANU JEKULUNE ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
56.60: NEHNU KADDERNA BEJNEKUMUL-MEWTE WE MA NEHNU BIMESBUKIN
56.61: ‘ALA ‘EN NUBEDDILE ‘EMTHALEKUM WE NUNSHI’EKUM FI MA LA TA’LEMUN
56.65: LEW NESHA’U LEXHE’ALNAHU HUTAMËN FEDHELELTUM TEFEKKEHUN
56.73: NEHNU XHE’ALNAHA TEDHKIRATEN WE META’ËN LILMUKWIN
56.85: WE NEHNU ‘EKRABU ‘ILEJHI MINKUM WE LEKIN LA TUBSIRUN
56.89: FERAWHUN WE RAJHANUN WE XHENNETU NA’IMI

57.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
57.2: LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
57.3: HUWEL-’EWWELU WEL-’AHIRU WE EDH-DHAHIRU WEL-BATINU WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
57.4: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWA ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JA’LEMU MA JELIXHU FIL-’ERDI WE MA JEHRUXHU MINHA WE MA JENZILU MINE SEMA’I WE MA JA’RUXHU FIHA WE HUWE ME’AKUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
57.5: LEHU MULKU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE ‘ILA ALLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
57.6: JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE HUWE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
57.7: ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘ENFIKU MIMMA XHE’ALEKUM MUSTEHLEFINE FIHI FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WE ‘ENFEKU LEHUM ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
57.8: WE MA LEKUM LA TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULU JED’UKUM LITU’UMINU BIRABBIKUM WE KAD ‘EHADHE MITHAKAKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
57.9: HUWEL-LEDHI JUNEZZILU ‘ALA ‘ABDIHI ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN LIJUHRIXHEKUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
57.10: WE MA LEKUM ‘ELLA TUNFIKU FI SEBILI ALLAHI WE LIL-LEHI MIRATHU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI LA JESTEWI MINKUM MEN ‘ENFEKA MIN KABLIL-FETHI WE KATELE ‘ULA’IKE ‘A’DHEMU DERAXHETEN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ENFEKU MIN BA’DU WE KATELU WE KULLËN WE’ADEL-LAHUL-HUSNA WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
57.11: MEN DHAL-LEDHI JUKRIDU ELLAHE KARDËN HESENËN FEJUDA’IFEHU LEHU WE LEHU ‘EXHRUN KERIMU
57.12: JEWME TERAL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI JES’A NURUHUM BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE BI’EJMANIHIM BUSHRAKUMUL-JEWME XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
57.13: JEWME JEKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-MUNAFIKATU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ENDHURUNA NEKTEBIS MIN NURIKUM KILE ERXHI’U WERA’EKUM FALTEMISU NURËN FEDURIBE BEJNEHUM BISURIN LEHU BABUN BATINUHU FIHI RAHMETU WE DHAHIRUHU MIN KIBELIHIL-’ADHAB
57.14: JUNADUNEHUM ‘ELEM NEKUN ME’AKUM KALU BELA WE LEKINNEKUM FETENTUM ‘ENFUSEKUM WE TERABBESTUM WE ERTEBTUM WE GARRATKUMUL-’EMANIJU HETTA XHA’E ‘EMRU ALLAHI WE GARRAKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
57.15: FALJEWME LA JU’UHADHU MINKUM FIDJETUN WE LA MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ME’WAKUMU NARU HIJE MEWLAKUM WE BI’SEL-MESIR
57.16: ‘ELEM JE’NI LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN TEHSHE’A KULUBUHUM LIDHIKRI ALLAHI WE MA NEZELE MINEL-HEKKI WE LA JEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLU FETALE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’EMEDU FEKASET KULUBUHUM WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FASIKUN
57.17: A’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE JUHJIL-’ERDE BA’DE MEWTIHA KAD BEJJENNA LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
57.18: ‘INNEL-MUSSEDDIKINE WEL-MUSSEDDIKATI WE ‘EKRADU ELLAHE KARDËN HESENËN JUDA’AFU LEHUM WE LEHUM ‘EXHRUN KERIMU
57.19: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI ‘ULA’IKE HUMU SIDDIKUNE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’U ‘INDE RABBIHIM LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM WE NURUHUM WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABUL-XHEHIM
57.20: A’LEMU ‘ENNEMAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE ZINETUN WE TEFAHURUN BEJNEKUM WE TEKATHURUN FIL-’EMWLI WEL-’EWLADI KEMETHELI GAJTHIN ‘A’XHEBEL-KUFFARA NEBATUHU THUMME JEHIXHU FETERAHU MUSFERRËN THUMME JEKUNU HUTAMËN WE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WE MEGFIRATUN MINEL-LAHI WE RIDWANUN WE MAL-HEJËTU ED-DUNJA ‘IL-LA META’UL-GURUR
57.21: SABIKU ‘ILA MEGFIRATIN MIN RABBIKUM WE XHENNETIN ‘ARDUHA KE’ARDI SEMA’I WEL-’ERDI ‘U’IDDET LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI DHALIKE FEDLU ALLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
57.22: MA ‘ESABE MIN MUSIBETIN FIL-’ERDI WE LA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MIN KABLI ‘EN NEBRA’EHA ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
57.23: LIKEJLA TE’SEW ‘ALA MA FATEKUM WE LA TEFRAHU BIMA ‘ATAKUM WEL-LAHU LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE MUHTALIN FEHURI
57.24: EL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE WE JE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BUHLI WE MEN JETEWELLE FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
57.25: LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULENA BIL-BEJJINATI WE ‘ENZELNA ME’AHUMUL-KITABE WEL-MIZANE LIJEKUME NASU BIL-KISTI WE ‘ENZELNAL-HEDIDE FIHI BE’SUN SHEDIDUN WE MENAFI’U LILNNASI WE LIJA’LEMEL-LAHU MEN JENSURUHU WE RUSULEHU BIL-GAJBI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
57.26: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN WE ‘IBRAHIME WE XHE’ALNA FI DHURRIJETIHIMA NUBUWETE WEL-KITABE FEMINHUM MUHTEDIN WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FASIKUN
57.27: THUMME KAFFEJNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM BIRUSULINA WE KAFFEJNA BI’ISA EBNI MERJEME WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-’INXHILE WE XHE’ALNA FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE ETTEBA’UHU RA’FETEN WE RAHMETEN WE RAHBANIJETEN EBTEDA’UHA MA KETEBNAHA ‘ALEJHIM ‘IL-LA EBTIGA’E RIDWANI ALLAHI FEMA RA’AWHA HEKKA RI’AJETIHA FE’ATEJNAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINHUM ‘EXHRAHUM WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FASIKUN
57.28: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE ‘AMINU BIRASULIHI JU’UTIKUM KIFLEJNI MIN RAHMETIHI WE JEXH’AL LEKUM NURËN TEMSHUNE BIHI WE JEGFIR LEKUM WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
57.29: LI’EL-LA JA’LEME ‘EHLUL-KITABI ‘ELLA JEKDIRUNE ‘ALA SHEJ’IN MIN FEDLI ALLAHI WE ‘ENNEL-FEDLE BIJEDI ALLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM

58.1: KAD SEMI’ALLAHU KAWLEL-LETI TUXHADILUKE FI ZEWXHIHA WE TESHTEKI ‘ILA ALLAHI WEL-LAHU JESMA’U TEHAWURAKUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
58.2: EL-LEDHINE JUDHAHIRUNE MINKUM MIN NISA’IHIM MA HUNNE ‘UMMEHATIHIM ‘IN ‘UMMEHATUHUM ‘IL-LAL-LA’I WELEDNEHUM WE ‘INNEHUM LEJEKULUNE MUNKERËN MINEL-KAWLI WE ZURËN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’AFUWUN GAFURU
58.3: WEL-LEDHINE JUDHAHIRUNE MIN NISA’IHIM THUMME JA’UDUNE LIMA KALU FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MIN KABLI ‘EN JETEMASSA DHALIKUM TU’ADHUNE BIHI WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
58.4: FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU SHEHRAJNI MUTETABI’AJNI MIN KABLI ‘EN JETEMASSA FEMEN LEM JESTETI’ FE’IT’AMU SITTINE MISKINËN DHALIKE LITU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI WE LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
58.5: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUHADDUNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU KUBITU KEMA KUBITEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE KAD ‘ENZELNA ‘AJATIN BEJJINATIN WE LILKAFIRINE ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
58.6: JEWME JEB’ATHUHUMU ALLAHU XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU ‘EHSAHU ALLAHU WE NESUHU WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
58.7: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNEL-LAHE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI MA JEKUNU MIN NEXHWA THELATHETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE RABI’UHUM WE LA HAMSETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE SADISUHUM WE LA ‘EDNA MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKTHERA ‘IL-LA HUWE ME’AHUM ‘EJNE MA KANU THUMME JUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU JEWMEL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
58.8: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE NUHU ‘ANI NEXHWA THUMME JA’UDUNE LIMA NUHU ‘ANHU WE JETENAXHEWNE BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWANI WE MA’SIJETI RASULI WE ‘IDHA XHA’UKE HEJJEWKE BIMA LEM JUHEJJIKE BIHI ALLAHU WE JEKULUNE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM LEWLA JU’ADHDHIBUNALLAHU BIMA NEKULU HESBUHUM XHEHENNEMU JESLEWNEHA FEBI’SEL-MESIR
58.9: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA TENAXHEJTUM FELA TETENAXHEW BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWANI WE MA’SIJETI RASULI WE TENAXHEW BIL-BIRRI WET-TEKWA WE ETTEKU ELLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
58.10: ‘INNEMA NEXHWA MINE ESH-SHEJTANI LIJEHZUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEJSE BIDARRIHIM SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
58.11: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA KILE LEKUM TEFESSEHU FIL-MEXHALISI FAFSEHU JEFSEHI ALLAHU LEKUM WE ‘IDHA KILE ENSHUZU FANSHUZU JERFA’I ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME DERAXHATIN WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
58.12: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NAXHEJTUMU RASULE FEKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJ NEXHWAKUM SEDEKATEN DHALIKE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘ETHERU FE’IN LEM TEXHIDU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
58.13: ‘E’ESHFEKTUM ‘EN TUKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJ NEXHWAKUM SEDEKATIN FE’IDH LEM TEF’ALU WE TABEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM FE’EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WEL-LAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
58.14: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE TEWEL-LEW KAWMËN GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MA HUM MINKUM WE LA MINHUM WE JEHLIFUNE ‘ALEL-KEDHIBI WE HUM JA’LEMUN
58.15: ‘E’ADDEL-LAHU LEHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN ‘INNEHUM SA’E MA KANU JA’MELUN
58.16: ETTEHADHU ‘EJMANEHUM XHUNNETEN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI FELEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
58.17: LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWALUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HUM FIHA HALIDUN
58.18: JEWME JEB’ATHUHUMU ALLAHU XHEMI’ËN FEJEHLIFUNE LEHU KEMA JEHLIFUNE LEKUM WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM ‘ALA SHEJ’IN ‘ELA ‘INNEHUM HUMUL-KADHIBUN
58.19: ESTEHWEDHE ‘ALEJHIMU ESH-SHEJTANU FE’ENSAHUM DHIKRAL-LAHI ‘ULA’IKE HIZBU ESH-SHEJTANI ‘ELA ‘INNE HIZBE ESH-SHEJTANI HUMUL-HASIRUN
58.22: LA TEXHIDU KAWMËN JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI JUWADDUNE MEN HADDEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU WE LEW KANU ‘ABA’EHUM ‘EW ‘EBNA’EHUM ‘EW ‘IHWANEHUM ‘EW ‘ASHIRATEHUM ‘ULA’IKE KETEBE FI KULUBIHIMUL-’IMANE WE ‘EJJEDEHUM BIRUHIN MINHU WE JUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA RADIJEL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU ‘ULA’IKE HIZBU ALLAHI ‘ELA ‘INNE HIZBEL-LAHI HUMUL-MUFLIHUN

59.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
59.2: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘EHRAXHEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MIN DIJARIHIM LI’WWELIL-HESHRI MA DHENENTUM ‘EN JEHRUXHU WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM MANI’ATUHUM HUSUNUHUM MINEL-LAHI FE’ETAHUMU ALLAHU MIN HEJTHU LEM JEHTESIBU WE KADHEFE FI KULUBIHIMU ER-RU’BE JUHRIBUNE BUJUTEHUM BI’EJDIHIM WE ‘EJDIL-MU’UMININE FA’TEBIRU JA ‘ULIL-’EBSAR
59.3: WE LEWLA ‘EN KETEBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIMUL-XHELA’E LE’ADHDHEBEHUM FI ED-DUNJA WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABU NAR
59.4: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM SHAKKU ELLAHE WE RASULEHU WE MEN JUSHAKKI ELLAHE FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
59.5: MA KATA’TUM MIN LINETIN ‘EW TERAKTUMUHA KA’IMETEN ‘ALA ‘USULIHA FEBI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE LIJUHZIJEL-FASIKIN
59.6: WE MA ‘EFA’EL-LAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI MINHUM FEMA ‘EWXHEFTUM ‘ALEJHI MIN HAJLIN WE LA RIKABIN WE LEKINNALL-LLAHE JUSELLITU RUSULEHU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
59.7: MA ‘EFA’EL-LAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI MIN ‘EHLIL-KURA FELIL-LAHI WE LILRRASULI WE LIDHIL-KURBA WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI KEJ LA JEKUNE DULETEN BEJNEL-’EGNIJA’I MINKUM WE MA ‘ATAKUMU RASULU FEHUDHUHU WE MA NEHAKUM ‘ANHU FANTEHU WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
59.8: LILFUKARA’IL-MUHAXHIRINEL-LEDHINE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIARIHIM WE ‘EMWALIHIM JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MINEL-LAHI WE RIDWANËN WE JENSURUNEL-LAHE WE RASULEHU ‘ULA’IKE HUMU SADIKUN
59.9: WEL-LEDHINE TEBEWWE’U ED-DARA WEL-’IMANE MIN KABLIHIM JUHIBBUNE MEN HAXHERA ‘ILEJHIM WE LA JEXHIDUNE FI SUDURIHIM HAXHETEN MIMMA ‘UTU WE JU’UTHIRUNE ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE LEW KANE BIHIM HASASETUN WE MEN JUKA SHUHHE NEFSIHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
59.10: WEL-LEDHINE XHA’U MIN BA’DIHIM JEKULUNE RABBENA EGFIR LENA WE LI’EHWANINAL-LEDHINE SEBEKUNA BIL-’IMANI WE LA TEXH’AL FI KULUBINA GILLËN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU RABBENA ‘INNEKE RA’UFUN RAHIMU
59.11: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-LEDHINE NAFEKU JEKULUNE LI’HWANIHIMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LE’IN ‘UHRIXHTUM LENEHRUXHENNE ME’AKUM WE LA NUTI’U FIKUM ‘EHEDËN ‘EBEDËN WE ‘IN KUTILTUM LENENSURANNEKUM WEL-LAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNEHUM LEKADHIBUN
59.12: LE’IN ‘UHRIXHU LA JEHRUXHUNE ME’AHUM WE LE’IN KUTILU LA JENSURUNEHUM WE LE’IN NESERUHUM LEJUWELLUNNEL-’EDBARA THUMME LA JUNSERUN
59.13: LE’ENTUM ‘ESHEDDU RAHBETEN FI SUDURIHIM MINEL-LAHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
59.14: LA JUKATILUNEKUM XHEMI’ËN ‘IL-LA FI KURAN MUHESSENETIN ‘EW MIN WERA’I XHUDURIN BE’SUHUM BEJNEHUM SHEDIDUN TEHSEBUHUM XHEMI’ËN WE KULUBUHUM SHETTA DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’KILUN
59.15: KEMETHELIL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KARIBËN DHAKU WEBALE ‘EMRIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
59.16: KEMETHELI ESH-SHEJTANI ‘IDH KALE LIL’INSANI EKFUR FELEMMA KEFERA KALE ‘INNI BERI’UN MINKE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ELLAHE RABBEL-’ALEMIN
59.17: FEKANE ‘AKIBETEHUMA ‘ENNEHUMA FI NARI HALIDEJNI FIHA WE DHELIKE XHEZA’U EDH-DHALIMIN
59.18: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU ELLAHE WE LTENDHUR NEFSUN MA KADDEMET LIGADIN WE ETTEKU ELLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
59.19: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LEDHINE NESU ELLAHE FE’ENSAHUM ‘ENFUSEHUM ‘ULA’IKE HUMUL-FASIKUN
59.21: LEW ‘ENZELNA HADHAL-KUR’ANE ‘ALA XHEBELIN LERA’EJTEHU HASHI’ËN MUTESEDDI’ËN MIN HASHJETI ALLAHI WE TILKEL-’EMTHALU NEDRIBUHA LILNNASI LE’ALLEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
59.22: HUWEL-LAHUL-LEDHI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALIMUL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI HUWE RAHMANU RAHIM
59.24: HUWEL-LAHUL-HALIKUL-BARI’UL-MUSEWWIRU LEHUL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA JUSEBBIHU LEHU MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM

60.1: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ADUWI WE ‘ADUWEKUM ‘EWLIJA’E TULKUNE ‘ILEJHIM BIL-MEWEDDETI WE KAD KEFERU BIMA XHA’EKUM MINEL-HEKKI JUHRIXHUNE RASULE WE ‘IJAKUM ‘EN TU’UMINU BIL-LAHI RABBIKUM ‘IN KUNTUM HARAXHTUM XHIHADËN FI SEBILI WE EBTIGA’E MERDATI TUSIRRUNE ‘ILEJHIM BIL-MEWEDDETI WE ‘ENA ‘A’LEMU BIMA ‘EHFEJTUM WE MA ‘A’LENTUM WE MEN JEF’ALHU MINKUM FEKAD DEL-LE SEWA’E SEBIL
60.2: ‘IN JETHKAFUKUM JEKUNU LEKUM ‘A’DA’EN WE JEBSUTU ‘ILEJKUM ‘EJDIJEHUM WE ‘ELSINETEHUM BIS-SU’I WE WEDDU LEW TEKFURUN
60.3: LEN TENFE’AKUM ‘ERHAMUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM JEWMEL-KIJAMETI JEFSILU BEJNEKUM WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
60.4: KAD KANET LEKUM ‘USWETUN HESENETUN FI ‘IBRAHIME WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU ‘IDH KALU LIKAWMIHIM ‘INNA BURA’A’U MINKUM WE MIMMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI ALLAHI KEFERNA BIKUM WE BEDA BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUMUL-’ADAWETU WEL-BEGDA’U ‘EBEDËN HETTA TU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEHDEHU ‘IL-LA KAWLE ‘IBRAHIME LI’EBIHI LE’ESTEGFIRANNE LEKE WE MA ‘EMLIKU LEKE MINEL-LAHI MIN SHEJ’IN RABBENA ‘ALEJKE TEWEKKELNA WE ‘ILEJKE ‘ENEBNA WE ‘ILEJKEL-MESIR
60.5: RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA FITNETEN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE EGFIR LENA RABBENA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
60.6: LEKAD KANE LEKUM FIHIM ‘USWETUN HESENETUN LIMEN KANE JERXHU ELLAHE WEL-JEWMEL-’AHIRA WE MEN JETEWELLE FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
60.7: ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JEXH’ALE BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEL-LEDHINE ‘ADEJTUM MINHUM MEWEDDETEN WEL-LAHU KADIRUN WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
60.8: LA JENHAKUMU ALLAHU ‘ANIL-LEDHINE LEM JUKATILUKUM FI ED-DINI WE LEM JUHRIXHUKUM MIN DIJARIKUM ‘EN TEBERRUHUM WE TUKSITU ‘ILEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
60.9: ‘INNEMA JENHAKUMU ALLAHU ‘ANIL-LEDHINE KATELUKUM FI ED-DINI WE ‘EHRAXHUKUM MIN DIJARIKUM WE DHAHERU ‘ALA ‘IHRAXHIKUM ‘EN TEWEL-LEWHUM WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM FE’ULA’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
60.10: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA XHA’EKUMUL-MU’UMINATU MUHAXHIRATIN FAMTEHINUHUNNEL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’IMANIHINNE FE’IN ‘ALIMTUMUHUNNE MU’UMINATIN FELA TERXHI’UHUNNE ‘ILAL-KUFFARI LA HUNNE HILLUN LEHUM WE LA HUM JEHIL-LUNE LEHUNNE WE ‘ATUHUM MA ‘ENFEKU WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘EN TENKIHUHUNNE ‘IDHA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE LA TUMSIKU BI’ISEMIL-KEWAFIRI WE ES’ELU MA ‘ENFEKTUM WE LIES’ELU MA ‘ENFEKU DHALIKUM HUKMU ALLAHI JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
60.11: WE ‘IN FATEKUM SHEJ’UN MIN ‘EZWAXHIKUM ‘ILAL-KUFFARI FA’AKABTUM FE’ATUL-LEDHINE DHEHEBET ‘EZWAXHUHUM MITHLE MA ‘ENFEKU WE ETTEKU ELLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ENTUM BIHI MU’UMINUN
60.12: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘IDHA XHA’EKEL-MU’UMINATU JUBAJI’NEKE ‘ALA ‘EN LA JUSHRIKNE BIL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JESRIKNE WE LA JEZNINE WE LA JEKTULNE ‘EWLADEHUNNE WE LA JE’TINE BIBUHTANIN JEFTERINEHU BEJNE ‘EJDIHINNE WE ‘ERXHULIHINNE WE LA JA’SINEKE FI MA’RUFIN FEBAJI’HUNNE WE ESTEGFIR LEHUNNEL-LAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
60.13: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETEWEL-LEW KAWMËN GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM KAD JE’ISU MINEL-’AHIRATI KEMA JE’ISEL-KUFFARU MIN ‘ES'HABIL-KUBUR

61.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
61.2: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU LIME TEKULUNE MA LA TEF’ALUN
61.3: KEBURA MEKTËN ‘INDEL-LAHI ‘EN TEKULU MA LA TEF’ALUN
61.4: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-LEDHINE JUKATILUNE FI SEBILIHI SEFFËN KE’ENNEHUM BUNJANUN MERSUSU
61.5: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI LIME TU’UDHUNENI WE KAD TA’LEMUNE ‘ENNI RASULU ALLAHI ‘ILEJKUM FELEMMA ZAGU ‘EZAGALLAHU KULUBEHUM WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-FASIKIN
61.6: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘INNI RASULU ALLAHI ‘ILEJKUM MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJJE MINET-TEWRËTI WE MUBESHSHIRËN BIRASULIN JE’TI MIN BA’DI ESMUHU ‘EHMEDU FELEMMA XHA’EHUM BIL-BEJJINATI KALU HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
61.7: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUWE JUD’A ‘ILAL-’ISLAMI WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
61.8: JURIDUNE LIJUTFI’U NURAL-LAHI BI’EFWAHIHIM WEL-LAHU MUTIMMU NURIHI WE LEW KERIHEL-KAFIRUN
61.9: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA ED-DINI KUL-LIHI WE LEW KERIHEL-MUSHRIKUN
61.11: TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI ALLAHI BI’EMWALIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
61.12: JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WE JUDHILKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE MESAKINE TEJJIBETEN FI XHENNATI ‘ADNIN DHALIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
61.13: WE ‘UHRA TUHIBBUNEHA NESRUN MINEL-LAHI WE FETHUN KARIBUN WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
61.14: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU KUNW ‘ENSARAL-LAHI KEMA KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME LILHEWARIJINE MEN ‘ENSARI ‘ILA ALLAHI KALEL-HEWARIJUNE NEHNU ‘ENSARU ALLAHI FE’ËMENET TA’IFETUN MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE KEFERAT TA’IFETUN FE’EJJEDNAL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU ‘ALA ‘ADUWIHIM FE’ESBEHU DHAHIRIN

62.1: JUSEBBIHU LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDIL-MELIKIL-KUDDUSIL-’AZIZIL-HEKIM
62.2: HUWEL-LEDHI BE’ATHE FIL-’UMMIJINE RASULËN MINHUM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIHI WE JUZEKKIHIM WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘IN KANU MIN KABLU LEFI DELALIN MUBINI
62.3: WE ‘AHARINE MINHUM LEMMA JELHEKU BIHIM WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
62.4: DHALIKE FEDLU ALLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WEL-LAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
62.5: METHELUL-LEDHINE HUMMILUT-TEWRËTE THUMME LEM JEHMILUHA KEMETHELIL-HIMARI JEHMILU ‘ESFARËN BI’SE METHELUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI ALLAHI WEL-LAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
62.6: KUL JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE HADU ‘IN ZE’AMTUM ‘ENNEKUM ‘EWLIJA ‘U LIL-LAHI MIN DUNI NASI FETEMENNEWL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
62.7: WE LA JETEMENNEWNEHU ‘EBEDËN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
62.8: KUL ‘INNEL-MEWTEL-LEDHI TEFIRRUNE MINHU FE’INNEHU MULAKIKUM THUMME TURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE ESH-SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
62.9: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NUDI LILSSELËTI MIN JEWMIL-XHUMU’ATI FAS’AW ‘ILA DHIKRI ALLAHI WE DHERUL-BEJ’A DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
62.10: FE’IDHA KUDIJETI SELËTU FANTESHIRU FIL-’ERDI WE EBTEGU MIN FEDLI ALLAHI WE EDHKURU ELLAHE KETHIRËN LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
62.11: WE ‘IDHA RA’EW TIXHARATEN ‘EW LEHWEN ENFEDDU ‘ILEJHA WE TERAKUKE KA’IMËN KUL MA ‘INDEL-LAHI HAJRUN MINEL-LEHWI WE MINET-TIXHARATI WEL-LAHU HAJRU ER-RAZIKIN

63.1: ‘IDHA XHA’EKEL-MUNAFIKUNE KALU NESH/HEDU ‘INNEKE LERASULU ALLAHI WEL-LAHU JA’LEMU ‘INNEKE LERASULUHU WEL-LAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNEL-MUNAFIKINE LEKADHIBUN
63.2: ETTEHADHU ‘EJMANEHUM XHUNNETEN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILI ALLAHI ‘INNEHUM SA’E MA KANU JA’MELUN
63.3: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU FETUBI’A ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JEFKAHUN
63.4: WE ‘IDHA RA’EJTEHUM TU’XHIBUKE ‘EXHSAMUHUM WE ‘IN JEKULU TESMA’ LIKAWLIHIM KE’ENNEHUM HUSHUBUN MUSENNEDETUN JEHSEBUNE KUL-LE SEJHETIN ‘ALEJHIM HUMUL-’ADUWU FAHDHERHUM KATELEHUMU ALLAHU ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
63.5: WE ‘IDHA KILE LEHUM TA’ALEW JESTEGFIR LEKUM RASULU ALLAHI LEWWEW RU’USEHUM WE RA’EJTEHUM JESUDDUNE WE HUM MUSTEKBIRUN
63.6: SEWA’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘ASTEGFERTE LEHUM ‘EM LEM TESTEGFIR LEHUM LEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMEL-FASIKIN
63.7: HUMUL-LEDHINE JEKULUNE LA TUNFIKU ‘ALA MEN ‘INDE RASULI ALLAHI HETTA JENFEDDU WE LIL-LEHI HAZA’INU SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE LEKINNEL-MUNAFIKINE LA JEFKAHUN
63.8: JEKULUNE LE’IN RAXHA’NA ‘ILAL-MEDINETI LEJUHRIXHENNEL-’E’AZZU MINHAL-’EDHELLE WE LIL-LEHIL-’IZZETU WE LIRASULIHI WE LILMU’UMININE WE LEKINNEL-MUNAFIKINE LA JA’LEMUN
63.9: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TULHIKUM ‘EMWALUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM ‘AN DHIKRI ALLAHI WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
63.10: WE ‘ENFIKU MIN MA RAZEKNAKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU FEJEKULE RABBI LEWLA ‘EHHARTENI ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN FE’ESSEDDEKA WE ‘EKUN MINE SALIHIN
63.11: WE LEN JU’UEHHIRAL-LAHU NEFSËN ‘IDHA XHA’E ‘EXHELUHA WEL-LAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN

64.1: JUSEBBIHU LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWATI WE MA FIL-’ERDI LEHUL-MULKU WE LEHUL-HEMDU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
64.2: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM FEMINKUM KAFIRUN WE MINKUM MU’UMINUN WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
64.3: HALEKA SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDE BIL-HEKKI WE SEWWERAKUM FE’EHSENE SUWERAKUM WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
64.4: JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWATI WEL-’ERDI WE JA’LEMU MA TUSIRRUNE WE MA TU’LINUNE WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
64.5: ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KABLU FEDHAKU WEBALE ‘EMRIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
64.6: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHU KANET TE’TIHIM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINATI FEKALU ‘EBESHERUN JEHDUNENA FEKEFERU WE TEWEL-LEW WE ESTEGNALLAHU WEL-LAHU GANIJUN HEMIDU
64.7: ZE’AMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EN LEN JUB’ATHU KUL BELA WE RABBI LETUB’ATHUNNE THUMME LETUNEBBE’UUNNE BIMA ‘AMILTUM WE DHELIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
64.8: FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE NURIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELNA WEL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
64.9: JEWME JEXHMA’UKUM LIJEWMIL-XHEM’I DHALIKE JEWMUT-TEGABUNI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE JA’MEL SALIHËN JUKEFFIR ‘ANHU SEJJI’ATIHI WE JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN DHALIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
64.10: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULA’IKE ‘ESHABU NARI HALIDINE FIHA WE BI’SEL-MESIR
64.11: MA ‘ESABE MIN MUSIBETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI ALLAHI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI JEHDI KALBEHU WEL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
64.12: WE ‘ETI’U ELLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FE’INNEMA ‘ALA RASULINAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
64.13: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
64.14: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNE MIN ‘EZWAXHIKUM WE ‘EWLADIKUM ‘ADUWËN LEKUM FAHDHERUHUM WE ‘IN TA’FU WE TESFEHU WE TEGFIRU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
64.16: FATTEKU ELLAHE MA ESTETA’TUM WE ESMA’U WE ‘ETI’U WE ‘ENFIKU HAJRËN LI’NFUSIKUM WE MEN JUKA SHUHHE NEFSIHI FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
64.17: ‘IN TUKRIDU ELLAHE KARDËN HESENËN JUDA’IFHU LEKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WEL-LAHU SHEKURUN HELIMU

65.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FETELLIKUHUNNE LI’IDDETIHINNE WE ‘EHSUL-’IDDETE WE ETTEKU ELLAHE RABBEKUM LA TUHRIXHUHUNNE MIN BUJUTIHINNE WE LA JEHRUXHNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TINE BIFAHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN WE TILKE HUDUDU ALLAHI WE MEN JETE’ADDE HUDUDEL-LAHI FEKAD DHELEME NEFSEHU LA TEDRI LE’ALLEL-LAHE JUHDITHU BA’DE DHALIKE ‘EMRË
65.2: FE’IDHA BELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FE’EMSIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW FARIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN WE ‘ESH/HIDU DHEWEJ ‘ADLIN MINKUM WE ‘EKIMU ESH-SHEHADETE LIL-LAHI DHALIKUM JU’ADHU BIHI MEN KANE JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MEN JETTEKI ELLAHE JEXH’AL LEHU MEHRAXHË
65.3: WE JERZUKHU MIN HEJTHU LA JEHTESIBU WE MEN JETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI FEHUWE HESBUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE BALIGU ‘EMRIHI KAD XHE’ALEL-LAHU LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADRË
65.4: WEL-LA’I JE’ISNE MINEL-MEHIDI MIN NISA’IKUM ‘INI ERTEBTUM FA’IDDETUHUNNE THELATHETU ‘ESH/HURIN WEL-LA’I LEM JEHIDNE WE ‘ULATUL-’EHMALI ‘EXHELUHUNNE ‘EN JEDA’NE HEMLEHUNNE WE MEN JETTEKI ELLAHE JEXH’AL LEHU MIN ‘EMRIHI JUSRË
65.5: DHALIKE ‘EMRU ALLAHI ‘ENZELEHU ‘ILEJKUM WE MEN JETTEKI ELLAHE JUKEFFIR ‘ANHU SEJJI’ATIHI WE JU’DHIM LEHU ‘EXHRË
65.6: ‘ESKINUHUNNE MIN HEJTHU SEKENTUM MIN WUXHDIKUM WE LA TUDARRUHUNNE LITUDEJJIKU ‘ALEJHINNE WE ‘IN KUNNE ‘ULATI HEMLIN FE’ENFIKU ‘ALEJHINNE HETTA JEDA’NE HEMLEHUNNE FE’IN ‘ERDA’NE LEKUM FE’ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE ‘TEMIRU BEJNEKUM BIMA’RUFIN WE ‘IN TA’ASERTUM FESETURDI’U LEHU ‘UHR
65.7: LIJUNFIK DHU SE’ATIN MIN SE’ATIHI WE MEN KUDIRA ‘ALEJHI RIZKUHU FELJUNFIK MIMMA ‘ATAHU ALLAHU LA JUKELLIFU ALLAHU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA MA ‘ATAHA SEJEXH’ALU ALLAHU BA’DE ‘USRIN JUSRË
65.8: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘ATET ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHA WE RUSULIHI FEHASEBNAHA HISABËN SHEDIDËN WE ‘ADHDHEBNAHA ‘ADHABËN NUKRË
65.10: ‘E’ADDEL-LAHU LEHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN FE ETTEKU ELLAHE JA ‘ULIL-’ELBABIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KAD ‘ENZELEL-LAHU ‘ILEJKUM DHIKRË
65.11: RASULËN JETLU ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATI ALLAHI MUBEJJINATIN LIJUHRIXHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE JA’MEL SALIHËN JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHA ‘EBEDËN KAD ‘EHSENEL-LAHU LEHU RIZKË
65.12: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEB’A SEMAWATIN WE MINEL-’ERDI MITHLEHUNNE JETENEZZELUL-’EMRU BEJNEHUNNE LITA’LEMU ‘ENNEL-LAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRUN WE ‘ENNEL-LAHE KAD ‘EHATE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ILMË

66.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU LIME TUHERRIMU MA ‘EHELLEL-LAHU LEKE TEBTEGI MERDËTE ‘EZWAXHIKE WEL-LAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
66.2: KAD FERADEL-LAHU LEKUM TEHILLETE ‘EJMANIKUM WEL-LAHU MEWLAKUM WE HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
66.3: WE ‘IDH ‘ESERRA NEBIJU ‘ILA BA’DI ‘EZWAXHIHI HEDITHËN FELEMMA NEBBE’ET BIHI WE ‘EDHHERAHU ALLAHU ‘ALEJHI ‘ARRAFE BA’DEHU WE ‘A’RADE ‘AN BA’DIN FELEMMA NEBBE’EHA BIHI KALET MEN ‘ENBE’EKE HADHA KALE NEBBE’ENIJEL-’ALIMUL-HABIR
66.4: ‘IN TETUBA ‘ILA ALLAHI FEKAD SEGAT KULUBUKUMA WE ‘IN TEDHAHERA ‘ALEJHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWE MEWLAHU WE XHIBRILU WE SALIHUL-MU’UMININE WEL-MELA’IKETU BA’DE DHALIKE DHEHIRU
66.5: ‘ASA RABBUHU ‘IN TELLEKAKUNNE ‘EN JUBDILEHU ‘EZWAXHËN HAJRËN MINKUNNE MUSLIMATIN MU’UMINATIN KANITATIN TA’IBATIN ‘ABIDATIN SA’IHATIN THEJJIBATIN WE ‘EBKARË
66.6: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KU ‘ENFUSEKUM WE ‘EHLIKUM NARËN WEKUDUHA NASU WEL-HIXHARATU ‘ALEJHA MELA’IKETUN GILADHUN SHIDADUN LA JA’SUNEL-LAHE MA ‘EMERAHUM WE JEF’ALUNE MA JU’UMERUN
66.7: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TA’TEDHIRUL-JEWME ‘INNEMA TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
66.8: JA ‘EJJUHAL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU TUBU ‘ILA ALLAHI TEWBETEN NESUHËN ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JUKEFFIRA ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE JUDHILEKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU JEWME LA JUHZI ALLAHU NEBIJE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU NURUHUM JES’A BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE BI’EJMANIHIM JEKULUNE RABBENA ‘ETMIM LENA NURANA WE EGFIR LENA ‘INNEKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
66.9: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU XHAHIDIL-KUFFARA WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE EGLUDH ‘ALEJHIM WE ME’WAHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SEL-MESIR
66.10: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU EIMRA’ETE NUHIN WE EIMRA’ETE LUTIN KANETA TEHTE ‘ABDEJNI MIN ‘IBADINA SALIHEJNI FEHANETAHUMA FELEM JUGNIJA ‘ANHUMA MINEL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE KILE EDHULA NARA ME’A ED-DAHILIN
66.11: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EIMRA’ETE FIR’AWNE ‘IDH KALET RABBI EBNI LI ‘INDEKE BEJTËN FIL-XHENNETI WE NEXHXHINI MIN FIR’AWNE WE ‘AMELIHI WE NEXHXHINI MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
66.12: WE MERJEME EBNETE ‘IMRANEL-LETI ‘EHSENET FERXHEHA FENEFEHNA FIHI MIN RUHINA WE SEDDEKAT BIKELIMATI RABBIHA WE KUTUBIHI WE KANET MINEL-KANITIN

67.1: TEBARAKEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHIL-MULKU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIR
67.2: EL-LEDHI HALEKAL-MEWTE WEL-HEJËTE LIJEBLUWEKUM ‘EJJUKUM ‘EHSENU ‘AMELËN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-GAFUR
67.3: EL-LEDHI HALEKA SEB’A SEMAWATIN TIBAKA MA TERA FI HALKI RAHMANI MIN TEFAWUT FARXHI’IL-BESERA HEL TERA MIN FUTUR
67.4: THUMME ERXHI’IL-BESERA KERRATEJNI JENKALIB ‘ILEJKEL-BESERU HASI’ËN WE HUWE HESIR
67.5: WE LEKAD ZEJJENNA SEMA’E ED-DUNJA BIMESABIHE WE XHE’ALNAHA RUXHUMËN LILSHSHEJATINI WE ‘A’TEDNA LEHUM ‘ADHABE SA’IR
67.6: WE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM ‘ADHABU XHEHENNEME WE BI’SEL-MESIR
67.7: ‘IDHA ‘ULKU FIHA SEMI’U LEHA SHEHIKËN WE HIJE TEFUR
67.8: TEKADU TEMEJJEZU MINEL-GAJDHI KUL-LEMA ‘ULKIJE FIHA FEWXHUN SE’ELEHUM HAZENETUHA ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEDHIRU
67.9: KALU BELA KAD XHA’ENA NEDHIRUN FEKEDHDHEBNA WE KULNA MA NEZZELEL-LAHU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA FI DELALIN KEBIRI
67.10: WE KALU LEW KUNNA NESMA’U ‘EW NA’KILU MA KUNNA FI ‘ES'HABI SA’IR
67.12: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
67.13: WE ‘ESIRRU KAWLEKUM ‘EW EXHHERU BIHI ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
67.15: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDE DHELULËN FAMSHU FI MENAKIBIHA WE KULU MIN RIZKIHI WE ‘ILEJHI NUSHUR
67.16: ‘E’EMINTUM MEN FI SEMA’I ‘EN JEHSIFE BIKUMUL-’ERDE FE’IDHA HIJE TEMUR
67.17: ‘EM ‘EMINTUM MEN FI SEMA’I ‘EN JURSILE ‘ALEJKUM HASIBËN FESETA’LEMUNE KEJFE NEDHIR
67.18: WE LEKAD KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
67.19: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILAT-TEJRI FEWKAHUM SAFFATIN WE JEKBIDNE MA JUMSIKUHUNNE ‘IL-LA RAHMANU ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN BESIRU
67.20: ‘EMMEN HADHAL-LEDHI HUWE XHUNDUN LEKUM JENSURUKUM MIN DUNI RAHMANI ‘INIL-KAFIRUNE ‘IL-LA FI GURURI
67.21: ‘EMMEN HADHAL-LEDHI JERZUKUKUM ‘IN ‘EMSEKE RIZKAHU BEL LEXHXHU FI ‘UTUWIN WE NUFURI
67.22: ‘EFEMEN JEMSHI MUKIBBËN ‘ALA WEXHHIHI ‘EHDA ‘EMMEN JEMSHI SEWIJËN ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
67.23: KUL HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EKUM WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
67.24: KUL HUWEL-LEDHI DHERA’EKUM FIL-’ERDI WE ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
67.25: WE JEKULUNE META HADHAL-WA’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
67.27: FELEMMA RA’EWHU ZULFETEN SI’ET WUXHUHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KILE HADHAL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TEDDA’UN
67.28: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘EHLEKENIJEL-LAHU WE MEN MA’I ‘EW RAHIMENA FEMEN JUXHIRUL-KAFIRINE MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
67.29: KUL HUWE RAHMANU ‘AMENNA BIHI WE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELNA FESETA’LEMUNE MEN HUWE FI DELALIN MUBINI
67.30: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘ESBEHE MA’UUKUM GAWRËN FEMEN JE’TIKUM BIMA’IN MA’INI

68.7: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DEL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTEDIN
68.10: WE LA TUTI’ KUL-LE HELLAFIN MEHINI
68.19: FETAFE ‘ALEJHA TA’IFUN MIN RABBIKE WE HUM NA’IMUN
68.32: ‘ASA RABBUNA ‘EN JUBDILENA HAJRËN MINHA ‘INNA ‘ILA RABBINA RAGIBUN
68.33: KEDHALIKEL-’ADHABU WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KANU JA’LEMUN
68.39: ‘EM LEKUM ‘EJMANUN ‘ALEJNA BALIGATUN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI ‘INNE LEKUM LEMA TEHKUMUN
68.41: ‘EM LEHUM SHURAKA’U FELJE’TU BISHURAKA’IHIM ‘IN KANU SADIKIN
68.42: JEWME JUKSHEFU ‘AN SAKIN WE JUD’AWNE ‘ILA SUXHUDI FELA JESTETI’UN
68.43: HASHI’ATEN ‘EBSARUHUM TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN WE KAD KANU JUD’AWNE ‘ILA SUXHUDI WE HUM SALIMUN
68.44: FEDHERNI WE MEN JUKEDHDHIBU BIHEDHAL-HADITHI SENESTEDRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU LA JA’LEMUN
68.48: FASBIR LIHUKMI RABBIKE WE LA TEKUN KESAHIBIL-HUTI ‘IDH NADA WE HUWE MEKDHUMU
68.49: LEWLA ‘EN TEDARAKEHU NI’METUN MIN RABBIHI LENUBIDHE BIL-’ARA’I WE HUWE MEDHMUMU
68.51: WE ‘IN JEKADUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEJUZLIKUNEKE BI’EBSARIHIM LEMMA SEMI’U EDH-DHIKRA WE JEKULUNE ‘INNEHU LEMEXHNUNU

69.7: SEHHARAHA ‘ALEJHIM SEB’A LEJALIN WE THEMANIJETE ‘EJJAMIN HUSUMËN FETERAL-KAWME FIHA SER’A KE’ENNEHUM ‘A’XHAZU NEHLIN HAWIJETI
69.9: WE XHA’E FIR’AWNU WE MEN KABLEHU WEL-MU’UTEFIKATU BIL-HATI’ET
69.12: LINEXH’ALEHA LEKUM TEDHKIRATEN WE TA’IJEHA ‘UDHUNUN WA’IJETU
69.13: FE’IDHA NUFIHA FI SURI NEFHATUN WAHIDETU
69.14: WE HUMILETIL-’ERDU WEL-XHIBALU FEDUKKETA DEKKETEN WAHIDETE
69.16: WE ENSHEKKATI SEMA’U FEHIJE JEWME’IDHIN WE EHIJETU
69.17: WEL-MELEKU ‘ALA ‘ERXHA’IHA WE JEHMILU ‘ARSHE RABBIKE FEWKAHUM JEWME’IDHIN THEMANIJETU
69.18: JEWME’IDHIN TU’RADUNE LA TEHFA MINKUM HAFIJETU
69.19: FE’EMMA MEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BIJEMINIHI FEJEKULU HA’UUM EKRA’U KITAB
69.24: KULU WE ESHRABU HENI’ËN BIMA ‘ESLEFTUM FIL-’EJJAMIL-HALIJET
69.25: WE ‘EMMA MEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BISHIMALIHI FEJEKULU JA LEJTENI LEM ‘UTE KITABI
69.32: THUMME FI SILSILETIN DHER’UHA SEB’UNE DHIRA’ËN FASLUKUH
69.41: WE MA HUWE BIKAWLI SHA’IRIN KALILËN MA TU’UMINUN
69.42: WE LA BIKAWLI KAHININ KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN

70.4: TA’RUXHUL-MELA’IKETU WE ER-RUHU ‘ILEJHI FI JEWMIN KANE MIKDARUHU HAMSINE ‘ELFE SENETI
70.11: JUBESSERUNEHUM JEWEDDUL-MUXHRIMU LEW JEFTEDI MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMI’IDHIN BIBENIH
70.14: WE MEN FIL-’ERDI XHEMI’ËN THUMME JUNXHIH
70.31: FEMENI EBTEGA WERA’E DHALIKE FE’ULA’IKE HUMUL-’ADUN
70.38: ‘EJETMA’U KUL-LU EMRI’IN MINHUM ‘EN JUDHALE XHENNETE NA’IMI
70.41: ‘ALA ‘EN NUBEDDILE HAJRËN MINHUM WE MA NEHNU BIMESBUKIN
70.42: FEDHERHUM JEHUDU WE JEL’ABU HETTA JULAKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN
70.43: JEWME JEHRUXHUNE MINEL-’EXHDATHI SIRA’ËN KE’ENNEHUM ‘ILA NUSUBIN JUFIDUN
70.44: HASHI’ATEN ‘EBSARUHUM TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN DHALIKEL-JEWMUL-LEDHI KANU JU’ADUN

71.1: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI ‘EN ‘ENDHIR KAWMEKE MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
71.2: KALE JA KAWMI ‘INNI LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
